gnas kyi mchog/ maM sa sha chen zas kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi rag ta skom gyi mchog/ zhing chen g.yang gzhi gos kyi mchog/ lha srin sde brgyad grogs kyi mchog/ de phyir khyod la 'phrin las bcol// yang na sa la
bdud kyi gzugs byas la// snying khar grub gsum hoM bsregs la// dkar thab dmar thab bsregs// rgya tshil gu gul khrag chen bsreg/ drag sngags bzlog cing drag tu bzlas// gnod sbyin shin tu khros pa
yin// 'khor gyi bka' nyan gzir ba yis// khrag gi ser ba thogs pa med// bdud kyi bla srog bsdams pa dang// gnad la bor zhing shi sa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas snying thog
snying la thog dbab pa'i sbyor ba ni/ sa stengs khru gang gru gsum la// khrag dang dug gis nag por byug/ thog lce gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// mon nam rabs chad thod pa ru// gser dngul zangs

lcags 'khar ba dang// long bu nag po dag dang ni// smigs pa pha wang klad pa dang// dug dang rme khrag gu gul nag/ 'brug rus srin rdo rdzas rnams dang// snying thog 'khor lo bris pa ste// ling ga ming rus ldan

pa la// yungs kar khra skom thun gyis brab// 'khor lo thog rta 'gram rtsar sba// drag po'i snying thog 'bab par 'gyur/ oM pha gi tsit+ta ru lu mi li/ badzra krag shu ta phaT/ che ge mo la lce 'bab pa mA ra ya/ bri dang
bzlas pa'i gsang sngags so// gnam lcags 'bab par the tshom med// drag po snying thog gi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas thugs dam bskul ba ni// nyi ma lho nub mtshams shes na// gtsug na me
'bar thugs dam can// sku mdog nag po gtum bag can// ral pa dmar nag med dpung 'bar// sdang mig nag po gyen du bsgrengs// mig nas khrag gi ser ba 'babs// snyan nas bskal pa'i 'brug

sgra sgrog/ sna nas rlung nag tshub ma 'thor// mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi la/ stag lpags rlon pa'i sham bu can// zhabs gnyis phyag bzhi cho 'phrul ston// g.yas na rdo rje lte leb phyar// g.yon na sbrul
zhags thod khrag 'phan// rlung nag tshub ma'i dkyil nas bzhengs// skyod cig nam mkha'i dkyil du bskyod// nam mkha'i dkyil du bskyod tsam na// 'brug sgra drag po 'u ru ru// glog dmar 'od chen lam se
lam// bar snang khams su bskyod tsam na// mun nag 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rlung nag tshub ma 'u ru ru// khrag gi ser ba sha ra ra// dam nyams dgra bo'i yul 'khor du// thog dang ser ba drag po
phob// thugs dam bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas sngags kyi rim pa ni// dang por 'drin 'gugs srog gi snying po'i sngags// gnyis pa drag po'i snying gzer sngags// gsum pa snying khrag

'gug cing las la sbyar// bzhi pa las kyi mtha' sdud sngags// lnga pa drin lan gtor ma gtang pa'i sngags// 'di dag las su rung ba ni// dngos grub las rnams nye bar 'gyur// su badzra ra yag sha ta phrom/

phaT nA ga drag tu phob/ de ni klu gnad la bor ba'i sngags so// badzra trag shu Ta phaT/ de ni btsan skrog pa'i sngags so// hUM ya hUM ya pu tse ta phroM phaT/ bdud dkrug pa'i sngags so// tri ya tri ya tri shaM ya nan phaT/
gnam the gzir ba'i sngags so// ya ma sha shu phob ya/ de ni smin sgrog pa'i sngags so// ya ma snying ya ma khrag ra hu la/ hri la hri la shag shag sen sen phob ya/ de ni gza' bshor ba'i sngags

so// sho na raM sta na raM dz+wa la raM/ sbyin sreg thabs kyi sngags so// mu ti tri la ya/ nor bsgrub pa'i sngags so// mi ri si ri rag sha nan/ pa to la to la ya/ ngag gnan pa ste smyos su gzhug pa'i sngags so// i daM du

b+ha liM ta gri na gri na khA hi khA hi puny+tsa to rag ta pi pa to sa ma ya swA hA/ gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags so// las so so'i sngags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas mdos kyi rim pa ni// gnas nas pha tshad spags

pa ru// maN+Dal gtsang ma khru gang la// dri dang spos ky-i chag chag gdab// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu/ ser por bri zhing phyogs bzhi ru// maN+Dal zlum po khrag gis byug/ dbus su dar dkar steng du yaM// 'bru
yi phung po bdal ba'i steng// gtsang ma de ru mdos bshams pa// bshos bu nag po zur gsum dang// mda' nag rgyang nag nam mkha' nag/ phud kyi phor ba bsham par bya// shar du mda' dang me long

bsham// lho ru g.yang gzhi dgod par bya// nub tu snying sna byang du bshos// rten gyi rta la dar snas brgyan// bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjes bsgom// mdun du bskyed la srog snying dang// dar nag g.yab cing spyan drang

mchod// thugs dam bskul zhing rgyal mtshan 'phyar// phyogs phyogs tsam cig pha gi na// nyi ma nus phyogs pha gi na// rdo rje gdan gyi byang shar na/ lcags mkhar sgo med nang shed na// bdud po chen po'i cha lugs
zhugs// byi na ya ga thugs dam can/ mthun pa'i rdzas la spyan 'dren na// thugs dam bskul phyir gshegs su gsol// mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'di bzhes la// gnag pa'i las 'di grub par mdzod// dam rdzas
dbul rta la dam bca' 'o// phyi yi mchod pa'i 'di yis ni// thugs dam bskang pa'i las dag bya// bskang ba mdos kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas gnag pa'i las bstan pa// dam tshig bstan par bya ba
la// bya nag lug nag ra rog la// ru 'am gshog pa g.yas g.yon la// srog snying gsang mtshan dar nag gdags// skye ru ming bya ling ga gdags// rten du bcas te bod cing bstab// las grub thugs dam
bskang bar bya// shin tu 'gor na drag po'i 'jigs sa bsgral// sha khrag mchod pa dbul bar bya// don snying nang du srog sngags dang// mi byang ling ga gzhug par bya// yungs kar sngags thun drag por

brab// rgyal mtshan g.yang gzhi brdab byas la// dmar tsit+ta rta gzhug par bya// des na the tshom med par 'gyur// dam tshig nag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig rten
gyi rim pa yang// bya nag lug nag rten du bya// ske ru srog gi snying po gdags// rwa 'am gshog pa g.yas g.yon la// ming dang gsang mtshan bris la gdags// rtag tu rten du bca' bar bya// sku
gzugs dur khrod ras la bris// rnal 'byor gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// mchod rten nag po bde byed 'byam// bzhengs te bya ru g.yas g.yon la// ming dang gsang mtshan bris te gdags// bum par srog snying

bris la gzhug/ rtag tu rten du gzugs par bya// sku gzugs dur khrod ras la bris// mtsho dang dur khrod mchod rten shing// phyag rgya gsang mtshan bris la gdags// nag po'i snying gi phye ma yis// snying shun dar
nag khud du gtum// srog snying bris la nang du gzhug/ rtag tu rnal 'byor lus la bcang// rten gzug pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// rtags kyi rim pa bstan pa ni// rta dang bong bu mi ro sogs// g.yal
ba'i rtags su bstan pa yin/ mi nag ral can rgal por 'byung// nye ba'i rtags su bstan pa yi// 'od dang sgra dang ra lug rnams// grub pa'i rtags su bstan pa yin// mon pa phyag byed 'bag sang dang// ri
rdib sngo rnga 'bru spung pa// las la tshud pa'i rtags yin pas// las la sbyar ba'i sbyor ba bya// mon pa mtshon thogs lcags spyang 'dur// gtor ma med 'bar bya nag lding// las la thogs pa med pa'i
rtags// khyim rdib mon pa rngu ba dang// mun pas 'thibs dang snying mi dga'// de ni ldog pa'i rtags su bstan// srog chags bsad dang sha zos dang// shing bcer srog la thebs pa'i rtags// mdze can khros
dang sbrul nag 'khyug/ shin tu khros pas bskang bar bya// bdud rtags kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas dam tshig bshad pa ni// the tshom med pa'i sems kyis bsgrub// ser ba tshub ma rtags su
lta// mdze can kha ral dmar gsum bsrung// rdzas dang sku gzigs shin tu sba// ming dang gsang mtshan sngags mi bstan// dbab dang sngags kyi lung nod cing// dam tshig nos la dngos grub blang// rtag tu
gtor ma sbyin par bya// rtag tu mchod bstod las la mos// bdud kyi dam tshig mi sha za// sngon gyi dam bcas btsan par byed// rtag tu bsrung skyob thog ser 'bebs// dam tshig nyams na srog gshed

byed// dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bsrung ba'i rim pa bshad// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad bcu// mgul du bsrung rdzas gdags par bya// sngags kyi 'phreng ba bris la bskor ba bya// rtsang

ma nyi shu rtsa lnga la// yig 'bru nyi shu rtsa lnga dgod// srog sngags byed pa bzlas par bya// srog sngags bzlog dang bcas par bzlas// lo yi mtha' bskor thun rdzas sbyin// bskul zhing las bcol ser ba
bsrung// 'khor lo la ni srog snying bri// dar nag gtums la mgul du gdags// 'bum bzlum btags na 'khor rnams bsrung// bsrung ba'i las su bstan pa'o// drag po snying rgyud las bsrung

ba bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa'i rjes su yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas// sngags kyi bdag po dam tshig can// log par lta
ba 'dul mdzad pa// nyon mongs bdud kyi dpung tshogs 'joms// phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal 'dud// phyag na rdo rje la 'khor rnams kyis bstod pa'i le'u ste rtsa gcig

pa'o//// gnod sbyin nag po drag po gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar kyi mkhan po tsaN+Da ki ti dang/ bal po ba su d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi slob dpon chen po snubs sangs rgyas ye shes rin po ches bsgyur
pa'o//
gya gar skad du/ rtsa rang gar be go rang swa tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ srog bdag gser gyi rta pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal drag po khro bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas na bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po la 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor nas bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po gzhon nu'i sras khye'u chung sngon po zhes bya
ba/ rang rigs 'dul pa'i 'khor rnams kyi nang nas langs nas gshin rje gshed po'i thad du song ste lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ sems dpa'i 'dug stangs su 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye
dpa' bo gshin rje gtso// 'jig rten stong khams 'di dag ni// dbang chen dregs pa'i rgyal po cig/ sems can kun ni sgrol la brtson// 'jig rten mi rnams zad du nye// 'di la thugs rjes gzung du
gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis bka' stsal ba/ khye'u chung nyon cig khyod kyis zhu ba spobs pa legs so// ngas gnang ba'i skabs dbye'o// zhes gsungs so// rgyal po

gser gyi rta ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis/ thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu rA dza
la byin ha ra brgyal bar gyur to// de nas brgyal ba sangs nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la bskor ba byas nas phyag btsal te/ kye ston pa pos ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du bdag gis
bgyi'o// dpa' bos bka' gsol cig ces zhus so// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// khyod kyi nga yi mngag gzhug dang// ji ltar bsgo ba'i las rnams gyis/ zhes gsungs so// rA dza des smras pa/ bdag ni
khyed kyi zhal mthong bas// byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan te// sdom pa bzhin du bdag bgyid pas// ji ltar skal dang 'tshams pa yi// rdo rje dpa' bo chen po yis// bdag gi zas skal dbog tu
gsol// zhes zhus so// rgyal po gser gyi rta pa'i rgyud las/ le byin ha ra dbang bsdu ba dang las la bkol ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dpa' bo de la rgyal po'i rigs gsol ba/ kye lha dpa'

bo chen po gdug pa 'di yis ni// sde ni gang gi rigs su gtogs// rtsal dang nus pa gang ci yod// bsgrub cing bsten na ji ltar bya// zhi zhing bcos na ji ltar bgyi// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal ba// rA dza
gdug pa'i mthu can 'di// sde ni dkor bdag rgyal por gtogs// srog dbugs kun gyi bdag po byed/ rtsal dang nus pas bsam las 'das// bdag nyid bsgrub cing bsten pa na// gnas ni ri gsum rtse
dag tu// stegs bu'i bca' gzhi bstan pa ni// mar lo tshal bka' mdun pa las la ni// ste'u nar 'jong tshul du bya// thig gnyis btab pa'i le tshe gsum// le tshe'i dbu la e yi gzugs// kha dog lcags phye

nag pos bsgyur// shar gyi zla kham shel mig tshul// nub kyi zla kham byi ru'i tshul// byang gi zla kham ser po bri// re ka dung mdog 'khor lo lcags// gru chad shar dkar lho phyogs sngo// nub dmal byang phyogs ser

por bri// phyi rol rtsang skra thod 'phreng gtang// de yi phyi rol me ri 'bar// gdug pa'i dal du lhun gyis grub// rA dza gser gyi rta pa'i rgyud las/ las kyi ldem tshig dang dal gyi bya ba'i le'u ste gsum
pa'o//// de'i steng lha yi gnas sa ni// gru gsum 'bar pa'i stegs bu la// stong gsum yid kyi gser rta la// mi men rgyal gyi sras po zhon// lcags kyu zhags pa phyag na bsnams// shin tu ldem zhing brjid
pa dgod// g.yas su zla ba tshes pa bris// g.yon du nyi ma gsal ba bri// dar dkar gur dang dmar po'i yol// rgya dar mthing nag gdugs chen dbub// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma bsham// khrag dang bdud
rtsis gnas gsum dgod// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad// rnal 'byor las kyi gshin rje bsgom// nyin ni sol nag bcag pa 'dra// gos nag bgo zhing thod nag bcing// dus skad gtong zhing ming nas

bod// mdun du byang na gtor ma bstab// ma ha bu tsa pra ti tsha ho kha hi/ zhes gtor ma bstab po// bsten cing las sngags dang drang 'don na// rA dza sa ma ya hUM hUM dza/ ri li pra ma ni hUM hUM phaT phaT/ tri

tsa la la la a shu ma dza/ nri ma ra ya dgra bo lo tog trog/ nri mA ra ya dgra bo sod sod/ rA dza mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ che ge mo mA ra ya swAhA/ rA dza gser gyi rta pa'i rgyud las/ bsgom lugs bod sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi

pa'o//// de nas gsad pa'i sngags bstan pa ni// rA dza a sha na mu rbad/ rA dza a ti pa ta ye rbad rA dza bi rnam rbad/ rA dza mu pa sha ye rbad/ rA tsa ma ta ya rbad/ pu ra ga ya rbad/ a a ta lo ga ya ma sha sha tri tri

snying kha rag sha kha thun a nri rbad/ tra kha ra mA ra ya hUM hUM/ thum ri li li ma ti b+h+yo/ gur shi ti na li/ gur ti shi na le/ shi te shi na le/ shi na le/ li to shi na li/ rbad ti shi na ling ling ma te b+h+yo/ nam phyed smad kyi cha

la drangs// 'di ni las rnams kun la 'jug/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ tsa la tsa la/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ gur ti shri gram ga ma ni swAhA/ rbad du rbad khrag ti rbad/ myag ngan ni rbad/ myogs ni ling 'gyel na rlag/ du

rbad du du rlag/ bshas so skam mo zhes gsungs so// ra dza gser gyi rta pa'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags thun bca' ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis yang bka' stsal ba/ rA dza 'di'i 'khor na
rA dza dmar po bya ba yang gnas te/ bsgrubs na las dang bsam pa yang 'grub po zhes gsungs so// kye ho dpa' bo chen po de'i sgrub thabs bshad du gsol// ces khye'u chung gis zhus pa

dang/ nyon cig byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// drag po'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// de ru dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya// ling gi phur pa de bzhin te// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// snying ngan snying khrag sna

tshogs bsag/ de la mchod cing bsgrub pa bya// spyan drang mchod bstod ling ga bsgral// thal zor drag por gnas dang 'phang// oM ma ru rtse mA ru tri li shang ga du yag sha ka ma ma ni dza dza/ de ni bod cing bsgrub

pa'i sngags// oM tri za yag sha snying tsa tsa sha ma la mugs mugs rbad ya/ de ni thun dang bsad pa'o// ra dza gser gyi rta ba'i rgyud las/ ra tsa dmar po'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom

ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ rA dza 'di yi 'khor na/ rA dza nag po bya ba yang gnas te/ bsgrubs na las dang bsam pa yang 'grub po// zhes gsungs so// kye ho de'i bsgrub pa bshad du
gsol// ces khye'u chung gis zhus pa dang// nyon cig mos pa'i blo can rnams// dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// de ru maN+Dal dkyil 'khor bri// gru bzhi phyi khyams sgo dang bcas// nang du gru gsum bzhi
byas la// de la tshon rtsis kha dog bsgyur// ling ga phur bus yan lag ldan// sa ma ya tri pha la ya ma ba ti kha la b+h+yo// ru la ru la ha ma myags thums kI li kI la ya/ zhes gsungs so// rA dza gser

gyi rta pa'i rgyud las/ rA dza nag po bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rA tsa sngon dmar rnams 'dis bsgral lo// srog gi bdag po li byin ha ra skos rje brang dkar dgra bo'i lus la sku skyod chug/ tri tsa

pa la a shug me swA hA/ nri mA ra ya dgra bo'i stobs// nr-i ma ra ya dgra bo sod/ 'jig rten srid pa'i rgyal po lo ga da ra chug chub// ra hUM na rgyob rgyob/ ra tri ra tri mA ra ya dza/ tri tri baM ri li li sod gtogs/ rgyal

po'i bka' byung gis la mar rtogs// phung pa'i dus byung gis la mor sgrol// zad pa'i dus 'byung gis la 'ur sod// kha kha le le/ sgrol ba'i ging/ rno ba'i mtshon shel gyi gri gug dgra bo'i srog la yaM yaM chod/

gdug pa'i dpal dgra bo'i srog la kregs krags chod/ ma hA ra dza tri ling shing ka la/ dri za yag sha gzir tsit+ta dza dza/ zhes gsungs so// ra dza gser gyi rta pa'i rgyud las/ ra dza shel gyi gri gug gnan sngags su

bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas khye'u chung gis zhus pa/ ra dza nyid kyi bsrung ba bshad du gsol// nyon cig brtson 'grus dad pa'i bdag/ sum thog mkhar gyi bar khang du// gzer dang zangs ma'i
snod dag tu// rjen pa'i zan la nyi zla'i gzugs// rgyal po'i gser stong gsar pa la// rta dkar g.yag dkar lnga mtshon// rim pas mgul du btags pa ni// nyi ma rigs kyi gur du gzugs// khyi dkar

sogs pa g.yas pa la// nang du che ge mo yi ming rus bri// phyi ru ltas ngan gzugs dang sngags// sog pa'i gsang la sngags 'di bri// ri di ri di di re sho ya ya/ zhes ni rta dkar khrag gis bri// zhes ni zla ba'i

steng du gzugs// nyungs kar dag la sngags 'di brjod// shel lo to pa ti kha la rbad thun ya ya/ zhes ni sogs pa'i nang du brab// ma kha la ti yaM pa shi dza li byin ha ra b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i phyogs su 'phang bar

bya'o// gang la bya ba'i che ge rnams// rgyal nad smyo nad 'chi bar 'gyur// rA dza gser gyi rta pa'i rgyud las/ rA dza ging dkar po thun gyis bsgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas khye'u chung gis zhus pa// rA dza
gdug pa 'di la ni// gzhan la phan gdags rim pa gang// sgrub pa gnod na ji ltar bya// nyon cig spobs pa'i bdag po khyod// gzhan la phan pa bstan pa ni// mdos kyi mcha' pa zag pa ste// mdos ni ru rgyud

dus bstan zhes bya ba'i sngags bstan pa ni/ sum pa ha ra rA dza be sha zhil zhil/ shan shan ti swAhA/ tshe'i sngags su bstan pa ni/ ra dza tri tsa ba la a shu mu A ya dz+nyA na/ a pa ra bruM bruM/ ra dza 'khu ldom byung ba na/ oM

ra dza thum a ti rbad/ ra dza kri nan swAhA/ nor dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang/ ra tsa ma ne ye baM ba ru na swAhA/ rnal 'byor bdag la gnod pa na// srog rtsa dam dang dam tshig bsre// shi sa bstan dang
bzlog sngags drang// zhes gsungs so/ rA dza gser gyi rta ba'i rgyud las/ gzhan la phan gdags pa dang bsgrub pa po gnod pa bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas khye'u chung gi spyan sngar/ dpa' bo

gshin rje gshed srog bdag li byin ha ra la bstod pa/ kye ho gshin rje gshed chen po// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku ni dung mdog dkar po la// gser gyi gzha' ris 'od dang bcas// sku rgyan

gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// rin chen phra mo mang pos brgyan// dar tshon sna lnga'i lce phran 'phur// sku la gser gyi slag pa gsol// g.yu phran 'bar ba'i ri mo can// chibs su gser gyi rta po la// gnam sa

gnyis kyi sga stan bstad// gza' chen brgyud kyi srab kyis spras// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyud kyis// gong thog gong rmed rgyan du byas/ bang ni bar snang khams su rgyug/ mig gzhi khams gsum zil gyis gnon// skad

ni srid pa'i 'brug stong ldir// lce ni bar snang glog tu 'khyug/ 'phrin las gling bzhi kha lo sgyur// khyod la bstod do gus phyag 'tshal// ces bstod pa'o// ra dza gser gyi rta pa'i rgyud rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ a pi shu pri pi shu tsag shur tsa d+ha ra ma ra na tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ btsan gyi rgyal po srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud/ dregs pa 'dul ba'i gnyen po thugs rje sprul

pa'i sku pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ brag ri rgyud la gnas pa'i dregs pa can rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i pho brang na/ yab btsan rje bla ba thod dkar zhes kyang

bya/ btsan gyi rgyal po ang ling gter zhes kyang bya/ gnam gyi ag se rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang/ yum klu mo zangs mgrin ma zhes kyang bya/ btsan gyi rgyal mo shib mi smras zhes kyang bya/ sa srin ma mo zhes bya ba
gnyis/ sra brtan brag gi them la bshos pa las/ zangs sgong dmar po gcig byung/ de las mi ring dmar po mdung tsam cig tu byung/ de la brag btsan dmar po zhes kyang bya/ srog zan dmar po zhes kyang

bya'o// de las sprul pa'i btsan bka'i grogs zla ba btsan kha bzhi byung ba ni/ shar phyogs dri za'i btsan// mi dkar rta dkar brgya// lho phyogs gshin rje'i btsan// mi sngon rta sngon brgya// nub phyogs klu yi
btsan// mi dmar rta dmar brgya// byang phyogs gnod sbyin btsan// mi ser rta ser brgya// bka' yi grogs zla phyed// de la btsan kha bzhi bya'o// de las sprul pa'i btsan// bka' yi grogs zla
brgya// mgyogs sde brgyad du byung ba ni// lha btsan bas dang rjes// mi dkar rta dkar brgya// klu btsan rol po glog 'gyu ni// mi bkra rta bkra brgya// gza' zan 'khrol ba ni// mi smug rta smug

brgya// srin btsan dgu po kha// mi sngon rta sngon brgya// dmu btsan rol po skya bdun dang// gnam btsan thog pa rje// sa btsan gra nam skyol// dri ba gzer thabs brgyad// de ltar sde brgyad kyang// bka' yi

grogs zla phyed// 'byung ba g.yo 'gul btsan// nam mkha' stong la dbang sgyur btsan// me btsan dmar po dang// chu btsan sngon po dang// sa btsan gri bo dang// rlung btsan 'phyo ba dang// gsang btsan gar po

dang// brag btsan sma bo dang// se btsan skya rol dang// dung btsan rkun bu dang// g.ya' btsan gos sngon dang// nags btsan smun pa dang// spang btsan rnar la sogs// lung pa brgya yi btsan// sul mang stong
gi btsan// bka' yi grogs zla byed// 'jig rten dbang byas nas// skye 'gul myal thag gcod// snga zhags mda' ltar 'phen// phyogs zhags glog ltar 'gyu// sha 'phreng zhags pa klad la bskor// gzer ltar
phur thabs 'debs// khrag skyug dar ltar rlob// srog la hab thob byed// dbugs la hur thums byed// tshe la bar chod byed// sad dang ser ba dang// btsan dang mu ge dang// dme dang mtshon 'khrug

gtong// yams nad glang thabs gtong// 'jig rten rlag par byed// de'i tshe de'i dus na// chos nyid zhi ba las// thugs rje sprul pa'i sku// dregs pa 'dul ba'i gnyen po// pad+ma he ru ka// 'bar ba'i cha byad
can// gtum khro rngam pa'i gzugs// mi bzad skur bstan nas// sprul pa'i pho nya yis// 'jig rten lhag gis bskang/ rngam pa'i nga ro yis// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra/ 'brug stong ldir bar bsgrags/ 'jig rten
khams kun kyang/ drag tu g.yos par 'gyur/ srog zan dmar po yis// bka' yi grogs zlar bcas// brgyal zhing rengs par 'gyur// brgyal sangs srog gi snying phul// 'di skad gsol ba btab// hi bka'
bdag mi 'tshal 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/ bdag cag grogs dang bcas pa la// zas skom las kyi skal ba gang// dpa' bos bka' stsal bsgo ba nyan// ces gsol pas/ 'jig
rten dpal gyis bka' bsgo ba// nyon cig 'jig rten dregs pa can// nga yi 'khor du 'dus nas kyang// zas skom las skal lung bstan gyis// nga yi bka' las ma 'da' bar// bstan pa bsrung bar khas long
zhig/ bka' las 'da' na brlag par 'gyur// ces bka' la btags te// gsang ba'i mtshan btags pa ni// rdo rje dgra 'dul mgyogs byed rtsal du btags so// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i
rgyud las/ gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas btsan btud srog zan dmar po bka'i grogs zla dang bcas pa'i mgrin gcig tu gsol pa/ kye kye/ dpa' bo 'jig rten pa yi sku// ma
'ongs phyi rabs rnal 'byor pas// bstan pa bsrung pa'i don chen du// zas skom las skal gang lags pa// lung bstan rim pas bstan du gsol// lung bstan bka' stsal gang gnang ba// bdag cag bka'
bzhin rjes su 'breng// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor gyis gleng bslangs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru kas/ dregs pa can tshar bcad pa'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// phyi rabs kyi bstan pa bsrung pa'i phyir 'di bsgrub cing nyams su blang pa'i thabs/ dgos 'brel rgyas par bka' stsal pa ni/ 'jigs te btsan rgod gnas sa ru/ dben

zhing yid du 'ong ba ru// gtor phud gser skyems btang ba dang// sman dang 'bru dang mngar sna tshogs// lha srin sde brgyad thams cad la// byin gyis brlabs te bsngos byas la// bden pa bdar zhing dpang yang
gzugs// khyad par btsan gyi rgyal po la// mchod cing las kyi gnyer gtad bya// mkha' lding zag bcas rten du gzug/ 'di zhes nges pa'i dus kyang btab// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru chad

sgo bzhi ldan par bya// 'khor lo'i gzhi la btsan bzhi dgod// bar khyams la ni sde brgyad dgod// gru chad lung pa brgya yi btsan// sgo khyud sul mangs stong gi btsan// sgo bzhi'i sgo rlon bzhi yang dgod// ras

sam gro shog gzugs ming dang// srog gi snying po bris la dgod// dmigs pa'i rten gyi sa blangs te// sa brnyen smin pa dang bsres la// kham pa'i nya bo khru gang la// mi dmar rta dmar zhon pa la// lag tu seng

gzhu skyer mda' ni// ltas ngan sgrobazhis brgyan pa skur// lhag gis khengs pa'i gzugs su bya// gro ga shog bu dag la yang// a b+hi shu che ge mo he thum bya ba bri// pho nya'i gzugs kyi snying khar bzhugs// dkyil
'khor dbus su dmigs pa'i rten// 'bru sna nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// bdun nam lnga la rin chen bdar// bre gang btsan bshos gru bzhi la// dbus su mda' dmar za 'og gzugs// zur bzhi btsan rgyang dmar
po yang// tshe dang nyungs kar sgang gshegs gzugs// bshos bu zla gam dmar po la// dbus su dar mdung dmar po gzugs// zur bzhir tshe dang nyungs kar gzugs// shel sgong zab slob tsit+ta dang/ mkha'
lding zab slag tsit+ta gdags// gang la bya ba'i ming dang gzugs// sngon dmar byed du bcug la gdags// gzhan yang gser skyems mngon cha dang// spyan gzigs sna tshogs bzhag par bya// bdag nyid dbang
chen skur gsal bas// rta yi khri la btsan bskyed de// 'khor la mos pa skyed du med// chags pa'i gnas nas spyan drangs la// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs btsan gyi
rgyal// skyes bu grogs po gshu yo khyod// 'khor na btsan 'phran 'bum gyis bskor// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'khor bcas bdag gi grogs po spyon// grogs po'i tshul du dam
la spyon// 'khor dang bcas te ma lus gshegs su gsol// e sa a tri sems dpa' dza dza/ de nas dam chu blud pa ni// btsan gyi rgyal po grogs po khyod// khyod ni bdag gi grogs po ste// sngon yang khyod
dang thugs dam gcig/ da lta bdag dang dbyar dam gcig/ thugs dang dbyar dam brtse dgongs te// bdag gi grogs la ma g.yel cig/ rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// 'bru bcud stong la sbyar ba'i
chang// gnod spyin gser skyems 'di bzhes la// bdag gi grogs las ma g.yel cig/ 'das na dam tshig dmyal pa'i chu// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin song nas// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul rlag par 'gyur// de bas

dam tshig tshul bzhin bsrung// dam las ma 'da' sa ma ya// zhes brjod la gser skyems sbreng ngo// de nas mchod pa dbul ba ni// sna tshogs 'bru yi ngar phye la// rin chen sna lnga bdar byas la// bre gang gsang

phye gru bzhi la// za 'og mda' yis rnam par brgyan// bre gang gsang phye zla gam la// gle bzangs ngar ram mda' yis brgyan// de bzhin sha dang rin chen chang// se glud rgyan dang bcas pa 'di// dam rdzas mchod

pa 'di bzhes la// dam nyams dgra la rtags phyung zhig/ shel sgong mkha' lding se bo yi// snying mchod dam pa 'di bzhes la// dam nyams dgra la rtags phyung zhig/ oM e sa a tri sems dpa' pu tsa sa ma ya

hUM/ trag rag sha kha mun dza snying badzra kha rag tsit+ta khas la rag/ snying kha la rag/ dun por rol cig kha hi/ zhes brjod la btab par bya// de nas sngags brjod pa bsnyen pa bya// bod pa sku gsung thugs

kyi sngags// a bi shu rag sha tshal pa a nri tri mA ra ya/ ang gu sha dza dza/ sku'i snying po bco brgyad pa'o// tri shu a pi shu/ a tri tra mA ra ya ang gu sha dza dza/ gsung gi dmod mo bcu drug pa'o// tsa shu shu tsi pi ri

tsag pa ni/ in tri mA ra ya/ ang gu sha sha dza/ thugs kyi dmod mo bcu dgu pa'o// bod pa'i sngags su shes par bya'o// gcig tu dril ba'i dmod mo ni/ a bi shu tri bi shu/ tsag shu/ che ge mo zhig/ he thum/

khrag thum/ paM thum rbad/ bam thuM ril shad/ rbad pa'i dmod mo nyer gsum pa'o// de nas 'phrin las btsal ba ni/ kye/ btsan rgyal grogs po gshu po khyod// kye kye skyes bu kha na byo chos// khyod kyi sku ni sprul pa
las// glang thabs drag po'i sprul pa 'gyed// dam nyams dgra la byo chos// khyod kyi gsung gi sprul pa las// gzer thabs drag po'i sprul pa 'gyed// dam nyams dgra bo'i mgo la byo chos// khyod

kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las// mi nad lang dgu'i sprul pa 'gyed// dam nyams dgra po'i lus la byo chos// kye kye skyes bu kha na byo chos// nyi ma stong khams khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// skyes bu nad stong dgra la byo
chos// gza' chen brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor nas// khrag gzer nad stong dgra la byo chos// sprin chen gtibs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// pho lo nad stong dgra la byo chos// sa gzhi bdal ba'i dkyil 'khor nas//

skyes bu'i nad stong dgra la byo chos/ ri rab gdan du 'dings pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ skyes bu glang thabs nad stong dgra la ya// rgya mtsho gdan du 'dings pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// skyes bu yams nad stong pa

dgra la ya// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// mkhris pa sha ya stong pa dgra la ya// rlung nad gdan du 'dings pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// skyes bu glo bur nad stong dgra la ya// me dpung gdan du 'dings
pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// skyes bu bal nad stong pa dgra la ya// khrag gzer me bzhin mched pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// dam nyams dgra bo'i mgo la dril// khrag gzer chu ltar 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor
nas// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dril// khrag gzer rlung ltar 'tshub pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// dam nyams dgra bo'i dbugs la dril// khrag gzer sprin ltar 'thibs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// dam nyams

dgra bo'i lus la dril// dgra bo'i lus rgyud sha la byo chos// dgra bo'i sha rgyud khrag la byo chos// dgra bo'i khrag rgyud rus la byo chos// dgra bo'i rus rgyud snying la byo chos/ btsan spyugs bcu bzhi tse re
re// dam nyams dgra bo'i mgo la byos chos// btsan spyugs phog gcig tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i klad la byo chos// btsan spyugs phog gnyis tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i mig la byo

chos// btsan spyugs phog gsum tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i rna ba la byo chos// btsan spyugs phog bzhi tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i sna la byo chos// btsan spyugs phog lnga tse re re// dam nyams dgra

bo'i lce la byo chos// btsan spyugs phog drug tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i lus la byo chos// btsan spyugs phog bdun tse re re/ dam nyams dgra bo'i yid la byo chos// btsan spyugs phog brgyad tse re re// dam

nyams dgra bo'i sems la byo chos// btsun spyugs phog dgu tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i lag pa la byo chos// btsan spyugs phog bcu tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i sha la byo chos// btsan spyugs bcu gcig
tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i khrag la byo chos// btsan spyugs bcu gnyis tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i rus la byo chos// btsan spyugs bcu gsum tse re re// dam nyams dgra bo'i dbugs la

byo chos// btsan spyugs bcu bzhi tse re re// dam nyams dgra po'i bla la ya// btsan rgyal grogs po gshu bo khyod// gser skyems dam pa 'di bzhes la// bdag gi stong dang grogs la spyon// khyod ni btsan gyi

rgyal po yin// khyod ni btsan bdud pho lha yin// 'khor ni btsan phran stong gis bskor// gong gsum 'grim zhing g.yab mos 'debs// spyugs pa'i glu len kyu ru ru// skyes pa dar gyi bdud gcod do// na chung
gzhon pa'i mngal nyul lo// 'gran gyi zla med che ba'o// chibs su btsan rta ser po chibs// stag ral g.yas la gzig shugs g.yon// sku stod za 'og 'jol ber gsol// sku smad bam ti sham thabs

can// kun kyang de 'dra dpa' mtshan can// snga zhags dgra la mda' ltar 'phen// phyi zhags dgra la gru ltar skyong// dam nyams dgra bo'i srog gcod po// legs nyes kun gyi ltang 'dzin pa'o// bcol pa'i las

rnams 'grub par mdzod// dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe// rol po kha nag srog gcod po// dbyar gyi dus la bab pa'i tshe// rtsi tig snar gyi srog gcod po// ston gyi dus la bab pa'i tshe// spang po kha ser srog

gcod po// dgun gyi dus la bab pa'i tshe// 'khyag rum sal sil srog gcod po// skye 'gro yongs kyi bdud gcod po// dam nyams sdig can las ngan 'di// dang po byung yang 'byung ba lnga las byung// bar du che

yang 'byung ba lnga yi gnyen por che// tha mar thim yang 'byung ba lnga yi nang du thim// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyud las thim pa ltar// dam nyams sdang pa'i dgra bo 'di// 'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur ba'i// btsan gyi rgyal

po grogs po yis// 'byung ba lnga yi nang du thim par mdzod// ces bskul zhing bla dgug gzugs la bstim// phur bus gdab cing gsang sngags bzlas// rgyu bre thum ril/ stam pa ka so seg ste/ tsa lo kyi ba ga
me/ kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ de nas gzugs kyi yan lag dbral// sa bdag gnyan po gnas par gnan// gzugs gcig kham pa'i nya po dang// rdzas kun khyer nas btsan gnas sar// bse gdong dmar po
gru gsum du// kha pa'i nya po dong du gsal// dgra phyogs kha bstan zur gcig la// dgra gzugs bzhag la med rtse gtad// zur gnyis dag la bshos pu re// mngon cha spyan gzigs rdzas kun bzhag/ dur
khrod g.yam pas kha bcad la// lha srin sde brgyad kun la gtad// dam bdar dpang gzugs gtad khram bya// khyad par gnas kyi bdag po la// dam nyams dgra bo 'di gtad kyis// zhag dang zla ba 'di tsam
na// dgra la rtags phyin gtang rag khas blangs bya/ dgra la phyi rtags ma byung bar// zla ba nya re der phyin la// gser skyems mngon chas gnas bdag mchod// rtags phyin gtang rag dus su

btang// rgyun gyi yi dam rtse gcig tu// gong gi snying sna khrag sna dang// chang phud rin chen bdar zhing mchod// sha reg rog po lta bu la// snying reg 'bangs su tha tshigs babs// srog zan dmar po ri dmar

'joms pa'i rgyud las/ spyi gcig tu dril ba'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas brag btsan bsgrub bya ba// gnas kyi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// stegs bu gru gsum dmar por bya// de yi steng du rgya
phor ram// zangs gzhong gla gor gtsang ma ru// btsan bshos gru gsum cha gang la// se mda' stong dmar 'ug phod brgyan// pags bu dmar gro se lu dang// le brgan dar gyir brgyan pa gzugs// gang la bya
ba'i ming dang rus// gro shog la bris mda' la gdags// 'ug pa'i sgro yis brgyan pa'i mda'// se ba drug cig bcings la bstan// kham kyong dmar po zur gsum du// spang ma tshe dang nyungs kar blugs// de
yang stegs bu'i steng du gzhag/ ra dmar kham pa rten du gzugs// zhag dang zla dus 'di bzhes la// rtags phyin gtang rag khas blangs bya// gsang mtshan bod cing dmod kyang gzugs// rin chen phud dgod

gtsang ma gtor// nub mo lta ba'i rgyal mtshan cig/ mdung rtse srin mo rkang la gdags// bsgrub dus ra gsum rgyun du gtang// nas smug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// ra snyig phye ma tshe nyungs la// sngags bzlas dgra

phyogs kha bstan gtor// srod dang tho rangs nyi ma'i zer la bzlas// a pi shu sa ma ya tri sham rbad b+h+yo/ yang snying 'bru bcu rgyun du drang// zor gyi kham skyogs dgra phyogs 'phang// de nas brag btsan srog bdag
bskul// bzhengs shig sra brtan brag gi mnga' bdag po// yab ni gnam gyi a se rgyal ba lags// yum ni sa yi klu srin dmar mo lags// bshos ni sra brtan brag gi thems la bshos// zangs sgong dmar po

gcig tu srid// zangs sgong brtol pa'i nang shed nas// mi rengs dmar po mdung tsam gcig tu byung// dbu skra bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar// smin ma lcags kyu 'khyil ba 'dra// spyan rtsa dmar po dam nyams dgra
la bzlog/ sku la le brgan dmar po'i 'jol ber gsol// g.yas kyi phyag na btsan gyi rgyu zhags dmar po dgra la 'debs// phyag ma g.yon pa brag cha 'ug pa thogs nas dgra la ltas ngan sna tshogs
'bebs// zhabs la lcags lham yu thung gsol// sbrul nag stong gi chun 'khor can// sbrul dmar gzhibs pa'i sku regs can// skar chen mang po'i tshar tsar can// bzhugs ni brag phug skam dang nang na
bzhugs// nam gyi gung la rgyu tsam na// brag gi wa mi kha nang bcibs// nyi ma'i zer la rgu tsam na// brag sha gla ba chibs su chibs// nyi ma'i gung la rgyu tsam na// gra nag rting dkar chibs su

chibs// rnal 'byor bdag gis bskul pa'i tshe// pha bas byams shing khu bas gdung zhing gshegs/ mda' bas bde la mdung bas rno ste gshegs// khyod kyi mtshan gyi sna 'dren pa// srin bya'i bu mo 'phrin ngan

skyel// dgra la ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs// nyin gyi de ni sna 'dren pa// dmu lung tshub mas sna yang 'dren// dpyid zla gsum la sna 'dren pa// skar ma gzigs mas sna yang 'dren// dbyar zla gsum la sna

'dren pa// 'brug dang glog gi sna yang 'dren// ston zla gsum la sna 'dren pa// ser ba khu 'phangs sna yang 'dren// dgun zla gsum la sna 'dren la// kha ba bu yug sna yang 'dren// khyod ni rnal 'byor grogs po

ste// sha rag ni mthu chen khyod// tha tshigs bgos shing dam tshig bsre ba'i mdo// dgra bo gsad par khas blang ba// khyod kyang dam las ma 'da' zhig/ nga yang dam las mi 'da' yis// bdag gis gsang ba'i
mtshan btags pa// rdo rje mgyogs phyed dgra 'dul btsan// grogs po bdag gis bsngags pa'i tshe// dam nyams dgra la bdud du phob// btsan gyi shod mas da thob cig/ dgra la btsan gyi se long gis// dgra
la tha ram brgya yis thob/ dgra la dmod mo sngags kyis gzer// dgra bo'i snying rum sngags kyis khong// dam nyams sdang pa'i dgra 'di la// bam log tu ni rtags phyung zhig/ mngags pa'i las la gong ma
g.yel// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// gong gi btsan bshos dmar po la// phud sbreng skor bzlog sngags bzlas te// oM skor sod/ chu zlog dril non/ yams yams/ sbrugs sdobs/ nyams nyoms/

dun dun/ btsan dgra bo thum ri li li/ dgra bo'i srog rtsa chod/ dbugs la ya/ snying la thun/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ snying rtsa la shogs zhes pa btsan gyi bskor log sngags// dgra phyogs kha bstan drag tu bzlas// btsan
bshos rtse gcad phud du dbul// ming byang mda' la btags pa de// bshos bu'i zhabs kyi nang du rtsal// btsan gnas brag srad dged sgor gnan// brag bdag de la gtad gnyer bya// zhag dang zla ba 'di

zhes pa// gtang rag gtang bar khas blangs bya// zhag gsum bar du bsgrub par bya// srog gi snying po rgyun mi gcad// gnad nas bskul zhing phud kyis mchod// rag sha ban d+ha gser skyems btang// 'di la the
tshom yid gnyis spang// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ brag btsan dmar po bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas btsan bdud bsgrub bya ba// btsan bdud gnas pa'i rten sa
nas// sa blangs kham pa smin dang sbyar// bdag po de gzugs khru gang ba// mi dmar rta dmar zhon pa la// se ba'i gzhu la sngon dmar rgyud// skyer pa'i mda' la ltas ngan sgro// srin bya 'ug pa pu

shud dang// sreg pa dang bzhi'i sgro yis bskyon/ mda' gang mde rtse dgra phyogs bstan// snying khar thod tshal dum bu la// a pi shu che ge mo zhib he thum zhes pa bri// stong du bzlas pa snying khar gzhug/ mgo la brag
nag tshe yang \u0f84gzugs// se gdong gru gsum khru gang nang// rdo leb kha gcad sas bdal la// de stengs dar zin ri rab gzugs// zur gcig btsan brgyang dmar po gzugs// zur gsum nyungs kar gang bu
re// bse dong dmar po'i nang du bzhag/ yod nges bdag pa gnas pa'i sar// 'phan dang gser skyems ma nyams pa// rin chen sman dang 'bru sna tshogs// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs la// btsan gyi
rgyal po grogs po khyod// grogs po bya bar dam bcas so// khyod kyang dam las ma 'da' zhig/ bdag kyang dam las mi 'da' 'o// dam las log na na ra skan// khyod la gsang ba'i mtshan btags pa// rdo rje
'bar ba dgra 'dul rtsal// 'phan dang gser skyems 'di bzhes la// che ge mo da'i chibs kyi zungs dmar bzhes// che ge mo 'di la btsan bdud phob// che ge snying rum khrag gis khong// glo bur bam log

rtags shig phyung// zhag dang zla ba 'di tsam na// rtags phyin gtang rag gnyan po ni// tsa ra dmar kham 'di dbul la// dam du bcas la rten du gzugs// dgra bo'i ming rus gzugs bris la// tshon skud sngon
dmar dra bar gtum// bsgrub pa'i gzhung gzugs 'gug 'dren bya// ming nas gdon zhing g.yab kyis gdab// khungs dang gzugs la phur pa gdab// rgyug breng thum rim rbad/ tra ma kha so seg te/ tsa lo kyi pa

ka ma/ kI li kI la ya hUM dza/ drug tu bzlas pas drag tu bskul// btsan gyi rgyal po grags po khyod// khyod kyi gsang ba'i mtshan gsol ba// rdo rje 'bar ba dgra 'dul rtsal// bzhugs na rten gyi mkhar la
bzhugs// btsan gyi rgyal po grogs po khyod// sku la na bza' ci gsol na// na bza' ber chen dmar po gsol// dbu la le brgan mdzub thod can// stag ral g.yas na bkra// gzig shugs g.yon na
'khyug/ chibs su ci chibs na// gyi ling dmar po chibs// bka' yi grogs zla ni// mi dmar rta dmar brgya// dgra la mngag pa'i tshe// gzig shugs g.yon rol nas// mchog dkar gra yag 'gugs// stag

ral g.yas gong nas// lung ma stong sbyar la// dgra bo'i snying la gzer// bse gdong dmar po ru// thar ma rgya yis thob// dmod mo sngags kyis gzer// dgra bo'i snying rum khrag gis khong// dam nyams dgra bo
'di la n-i// bam log tu ni rtags phyung zhig/ ched tsam ched tsam ni// btsan gyi rgyal po grogs po khyod// sku la ci gsol na// na bza' dar ber nag po gsol// thod per nag po
bcings// chibs su ci chibs na// gra nag rting dkar chibs// stag ral g.yas na bkra// gzig shugs g.yon na 'khyug/ dgra la mngags pa'i tshe// gzigs shugs g.yon rol nas// mchog dkar gra
'gugs la// stag ral g.yas gong nas// lung ma stong sbyar te// dgra bo'i snying la gzer// bse dong nag po ru// tha ram rgya yis thob// dmod mo sngags kyis gzer// snying rum khrag gis khong// bam log
rtags byung zhig/ ched tsam chen tsam na// btsan gyi rgyal po grogs po khyod// sku la ci gsol na// na bza' dar ber ser po gsol// dbu la gser gyi mdzub thod bcings// stag ral g.yas na
bkra// gzigs shugs g.yon na 'khyug/ chibs su ngang bu ser po chibs// bka' yi grogs zla ni// mi ser rta ser brgya// dgra la mngags pa'i tshe// gzig shugs g.yon rol nas// mchog dkar ra khug

la// stag ral g.yas gong nas// lung ma stong sbyar la// lcags dong skya bo ru// tha ram rgya yis thob// dmod mo sngags kyis gzer// dgra bo'i snying rum khrag gis khong// bam log rtags phyung zhig/ btsan

bdud 'dril sngags 'di// drag tu bzlas la gdab// oM kri ling shang ka du/ tra ta ha mu ke na zer/ snying khrag srog gcod/ dbugs long/ pra ha ta ya/ du la rbad/ srog pa rtsa la rbad/ snying rtsa la smugs/ glo rtsa

la thibs sod/ dmar po sig shi badzra pra ma ya thun b+h+yo/ tsa na sha sha/ hring hring sa ma ya dgra bo nri ma ra ya sod sod/ chuM thuM ri b+h+yo/ khu rug shu/ gzer nud khrag tu skyugs/ dam nyams dgra la thun b+h+yo/ snying la rag

sha/ sbos nad glang thabs dam nyams dgra la thun b+h+yo/ klad pa'i rgyas su thun b+h+yo/ dbang po lnga la thun b+h+yo/ lus kyi tshigs la thun b+h+yo/ rkang pa'i mthil du thun b+h+yo/ dbrigs prigs rgyu srog la thun rbad/ myags

myags/ myogs myogs/ sha rgyud snying la thun b+h+yo/ myogs myogs gug char lang/ thuM shu thubs thubs/ dbugs thuM/ thum shi pra mnar ya dam nyams 'gra bo btsan nad khrag tu skyugs thun b+h+yo/ zhes pa drag tu
bzlas// dmod mo sngags kyi gzer// snying rim khrag gis dgang// thar ma rgya yis gdab// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ btsan bdud du bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// lcam dral
ming sring byang sdebs la// dgra bo'i snying du gzhug pa dang// nang 'khrugs sme yi las thabs bya// dam rdzas ra dmar sha dang khrag/ bse snod dam gzhong dmar por bshams// zor la tshe dang nyungs nag
dang// sbang ma zangs nang du bsham// ra dmar bsgral pa'i rgyal mtshan la// g.yas pa'i rwa la ming byang gdags// g.yon pa'i rwa la ming byang gdags// pho lha yul lha gro ga la// bris la brda ngas
zhabs mas dril// gu gul khyi lud dug snas bdug/ dgra bo'i ming rus gzugs dang bcas// ra tsa'i kha gdangs nang du gzhug/ zhag gsum bsgrub pa gzhung bzhin bya// 'bru sna lnga yi gtor ma la// ba dmar
dmar 'du sti la// klu sman ru sbal khog par bsham// phyi rol gang la bya ba bri/ gong gi dmar gtor gzhibs la gzhag/ zor la sngags bzlas gtor thun dbab// nang 'khrug me yi thun sngags la// a pi shu sa

ma ya tri sham che ge mo la rbad b+h+yo/ snying la b+h+yo/ a pi shu che go mo'i snying dkrugs/ a pi shu dum bu dum bu dgra bo'i phan tshan du ma stong du thong zhig shu shu sa ma ya tri sham shig shig/ dgra bo'i pha tshan shig shig/ shu

shu rag+sha sa ma ya/ dun dun thum ril ril/ dgra bo'i snying la shog/ snying la zhugs/ pha bsad dme gyis/ mtshon nang bsnol/ lha zhag phyir pho/ pha dang mes por phrol/ spun nang phrol/ bu dang tsha bor phrol/ yul

mkhar gtan nas spos/ pho'i thun sngags nyin mo dbab/ mo'i thun sngags mtshan mo bzlas/ tsi pi shu sa ma ya/ tri sham rbad b+h+yo/ man chad gong dang mthun par bzlas// gong gi gtor ma dmar po ched// dngos

sam phyogs su 'phang bar bya// phyed dang dkar gyi gtor ma gnyis// brag btsan gang na yod pa na// nA ga gdug pa yod par nges// klu btsan drag po yod pa'i sar// mda' gang gru bzhi'i dong brus la// gong gi

rdzas ngan ming byang rnams// g.yas kyi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o// pho lha yul lha 'og tu gzhug/ 'jag ma'i mi la btsag gis byug/ de yi lag pa g.yas pa na// rgyu zhags dgra la 'debs par bya// de yi g.yon
du bag phye la// bud med na chung gzhon nu'i gzugs// dar dkar gos su gon pa la// sbrul gyis brgyan pa gzhag par bya// de par gong gi gtor ma la// thun sngags mang du bzlas la gsal// de yi kha

chod shing leb la// nang gi ngos la tshig 'di bri// btsan gyi rgyal po ag se rgyal// yum klu srin ma mo// de gnyis sprul pa'i sras// btsan gyi rgyal po ste// rdo rje sra brtan dang// de yi lcam mo ni// klu yi rgyal mo

de/ nA ga mda' mi 'bar// klu btsan lcam sring la// 'phrin las bcol ba ni// che ge mo 'di rnams la// rnal 'byor yongs la 'di gnod pas// cho 'phrul chen po thong// da lta btsan gyi pho brang la// sems ngan
gdug pa byas// lus ngan sbyor shom byas// klu btsan gnas la 'di bsdos pas// che ge mo 'di rnams la// btsan gyi zhags pas thob// btsan gyi skya babs dang// btsan gyi bdud phob cig/ snying rum khrag
gis khong// dmod mo sngags kyis gzer/ btsan gyis dkrugs ma gyis// gong gi sngags rnams bris la gzhug/ klu mo'i rgyal mo nA ga d+ha mi 'bar la 'phrin las bcol lo// rgyal khams yongs la

'di gnod kyis// da lta khyod kyi pho brang la// gnod pa 'di byas pas// klu yi dal kha myur du phob// che ge mo la nA ga phebs/ thed thed 'bur chings nA ga du na ga tu/ tsi tsi dza la thul bu thul bu/ nyams myogs/

dmod mo sngags kyis gzer cig/ snying la nA ga zhun/ zhun thur bu thur bu/ che ge mo la mdze la swAhA/ btsan gyi rgyal po dang/ klu mo lcam sring gnyis/ che ge mo 'di gtad pas myur du rtags thon cig/ ces pa'i

tshig gis brjod cig khong gis sngags rnams drag tu brjod// che ge mo'i pho lha dang yul lha gnyen po khyed rnams// che ge mo la sngags gzer dang gdug pa'i rdzas sbyor drag po byed// khyed cag de'i stongs ma
byed// dkrugs ma rtor yad kyis// de nas dong kha legs par gcad// mis ma tshor bar nan tan bya// de yis nang 'khrugs yul khams b+h+yo// spun dang nye ba dme 'khrug byed// mdze dang bam log khrag tu
skyug// gu gul thul gyi nad kyis 'dzin// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ klu btsan lcam sring byad sdebs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// brag btsan klu btsan lcam sring dang// yab yum

sgrub thabs so so yang// bod rbad gsad pa dril ba dang// 'gor na gnad la bor ba dang// lhang dub byed na spobs pas bstan// gcig tu dril te bzlas pa'i sngags/ tri ra tsa sa ma ya/ ra tri shor ba a ni tri/

yag sha kha la dun/ stig sna srog la dza dza/ nA ga tsi bi shu sa ma ya thibs glo rtsa thum rbad/ bdud po srog la cho cho/ rag sha khrag la rdubs/ nA ga khal ye dun dza/ bsnyen pa zor mnan pa dang/ las kyi mjug
chod dril la sngags// nga bzhi pa 'di bar mi gcad// bod rbad bsadapa dril ba'i sngags// las rnams thams cad 'grub bar nges// 'gor na gnad la bor ba'i sngags// yag sha kha la bskor chum/ a tri srog

la yid du dza// sprugs sdobs myags thuM ri li li/ sha rgyud srog la rol/ srog rgyud dbugs la rol/ ma ma e du na rbad/ so lnga pa 'di gnas kyi sngags// 'gor na gnad la bor bar bya// rA dza dmar po srog
pa'i rtsar// gzugs ming srog snying bcug nas kyang// le brgan dar du dril la bcang// bar bar sngags 'dis gnad la bor// de ni srog gcun bla rdo yin// brag dmar bse yi mkhar du mthong// 'dis ni
lha srin sde brgyad kyang// rang dbang med par gnad la 'bebs// rtag tu bzlas par mi bya'o// dril zhing gcun sngags 'di bzlas pas// zla drug tshun chad rtags 'byung nges// de bas bul na gnas pa
yi// spogs thabs cho ga tha ma bstan// klu btsan drag po gnas pa'i sa// brag gi sna 'am ri sgrom du// chu gtor gser skyems mngon cha yis// gnas bdag mchod la dpang yang gzugs// tha

ram dong gsum bca' thabs la// mda' gang gru ba'i khru phyed la// mtshan gyi bse dong dmar por bya'o// de yi dbus su mtho gang ba// rgya dang gting tu brkos byas la// gru gsum sol dong nag por bya// de

dbus zlum po thur la bru// dkar po lcags dong dkar// nang du ming dang gzugs bcug la// rabs chad thod pa'i ri rab gling// phyi rol kha khyer dril sngags bskor// dug sna thun rdzas zas ngan dang// re bas
bka' la thod pa spub// sol dong nag por shu bo dang// lcam mo'i bar du ming byang gzhug/ dkar gsum mngar gyi gtor mas mnan// shing leb drag sngags bris la bcad// bse dong dmar por nya bo'i
gzugs// dgra gzugs ling ga med rtse gtad// gtor ma thun rdzas nya bos mnan// shing leb dag la trag rag sha// bris pa kha gcad steng nas mnan// nA ga kha la ye thun sbyar// srog zan dmar po ri dmar
'joms pa'i rgyud las/ dril gcun spogs pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// srog zan dmar po bsgrub byas kyang// gal te las byed ma 'dod na// gnad la dbab pa'i las 'di bya// dam shing phyar

zhing khrag gis brdeg/ don gyi 'khu ldog med pa yi// man ngag dam pa 'di yin pas// nyams su blang zhing brtson par bya// 'di med pa yi gang zag gis// lha srin sde brgyad gang la yang// las bcol byed par

mi 'gyur pas// rang la dog pas nyams su blang// dam shing dmar nag phur pa la// gnad la dbab pa'i srog gshed bsgom/ srog gshed snying mda' 'di bzlas so// oM nri yaM/ nri tri/ mur tri/ nri yaM/ nri ma/ nri
ma/ nri tri sod ya/ zhes bzlas klad la bskor zhing brdab/ bsgrub pa'i dus su rten du gzugs// drag po'i dus su bskor zhing bsad// mi ldog mi 'khu pa'i man ngag yin// gzhan la bstan na dam tshig
nyams// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms rgyud las/ gnad la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas btsan gyi glang zor dang// gzer sngags mda' zor bstan pa ni// spra tshil chu chung nag po

dang// mu zi brun dang bag phye sbyar// gang la bya ba'i gzugs su bya// 'ug pa'i mda' la skyer mde gzhug/ mda' stong nyungs kar skye tshe dang// zor sngags rim par bzlas pas blugs// shel ni smug se sngo rtsa
gcig/ rten du btsugs la rtags phyin gtang// gzhan yang dam rdzas 'byor tshad bsag/ zor sngags rim par bstan pa ni// oM trad ma trad/ khrag khrag rbad/ tshal pa shag/ myags myags/ khrag la rol/ stong
khrag/ rgyu khrag/ snying khrag rbad myal myal/ skyer pa'i mda' dang se ba'i gzhu// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// 'od zer thabs kyis gzer mda' bsam// oM trad mo tri khang trag rbad/ 'di
tshal pa sha truM myal myal/ 'ug pa mtshan mo mig rno bas// gsal bar byed pa 'od du 'bar// gzugs kyi rnam shes kun la brdeg/ ming rus snying khar rdog pas mnan// rkang pa bdag gi 'og tu gzhug/ gzer
sngags 'di dag drug tu bzlas// gzer 'dren ni snying la gzer// snying gzer ni khrag tu zer// khrag gzer ni khrag tu gzer// rgyu gzer ni sna ru gzer// sna gzer ni pho bar gzer// gzer thabs sna dgu
yis// dam nyams dgra la zhen// thal ba rdul du rlog/ gzer sngags gzugs la dbab// sma dbab khar na dkri// phud gtor zor bdag bskul// dang po btsan byung gang nas byung// dang po ci yang mi gnas

te// dang po 'byung ba lnga las srid// sa rlung me chu 'byung ba btsan gyi rgyu// gnam btsan dkar po thog gi rje// skya ri phrag pa'i mig/ chibs su dkar po phum dmar chibs// phyag na gnam lcags phur pa

bsnams// zhal nas 'brug sgra chem chem sgrogs// stong khams ma lus sgrol bar byed// sprin dang na bun mthongs gsal nas// ri bo kun gyi rtse 'drim zhing// sad dang ser ba'i sna yang 'dren// sdang ba'i dgra
la thog ser 'bebs// dgra bgegs ma lus rdul du rlog/ de yi gcung po ba// sa btsan khra bo cig/ klu btsan khra bo btsan gyi rje// sa yi rgyal po sa btsan bdag/ dgra dang bgegs la thog ser phob// legs

ldan nag po kye 'u rgyal// chibs su dra bo rting dkar chibs// phyag na klu shing ber chen bsnams// zhal nas gzer thabs sna dgu gtong// skye 'gro thams cad brlag par byed// de yi gcung po ba// chu btsan

sngon pos bya// be'u'i lus la sram gyi mgo// sbrul 'dzin sngon po btsan gyi rje// sku la nya lcibs sngon po gsol// chibs su chu rta sngon po chibs// phyag na chu srin gdug pa 'gyed// zhal nas mdze dang skrang lhog

gtong// de yi gcung po ba// klu btsun phyur ba dmigs dang rje// na bza' skyi gser ral ka gsol// chibs su rlung rta ngang pa chibs// phyag na rlung gi rkyal ba bsnams// zhal nas bu yug tshub ma gtong// dgra
bgegs ma lus phung par byed// de yi gcung po ba// me btsan dmar po tshig gi rje// drang srong bum glang sna// me lha drang srong ra mgo cad// na bza' me 'od 'bar ba gsol// chibs su me rta 'bar ba

chibs// phyag na zangs kyi spu gri bsnams// zhal nas me yi tsha tsha 'phro// khams gsum ma lus bsreg par byed// brag dmar ma lus rtse 'drims nas// rtsa dang ser ba'i sna 'dren cing// dgra bgegs ma lus
bsreg par byed// cir mi 'ong gi spun lnga po// 'khor ni btsan 'phran 'bum gyis bskor// rgya rang kun tu rang rang sa// phul nas ming rus bcas la sba// mda' 'phang glang zor dgra phyogs
brdeg/ srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ zor gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// thun bsgrub zor gyi gsang thabs la// brag dmar btsan rgod gnas pa'i sar// brag btsan srog bsgrub gzhung

bsrang la// bsad pa thun gyi rdzas bsags te// than bya 'ug pa'i thod pa ru// bya dag ri dgas rmig zlum khrag/ nyungs kar zi ra myos chang dug/ sbyar la dar dmar kha yang bcad/ de la rim par bsgrub bya
ste// bod rbad bsad pa'i sngags rnams brdeg/ btsan bcos kha la 'ug rgyug bre thun yang// yag sha rtsa la kha la tsi sha thun/ ces pa bzlas shing thun la brab// de nas thun la drag tu bskul// hUM/

bzhengs shig bzhengs shig srid pa'i btsan// 'byung ba'i brag btsan chen po ste// rin chen brag gi logs shed na// rin chen brag phug skam dang la// byi ru dmar po'i sgo mo gsal// mthing zhun sngon po'i re bzhi can// dung
gi g.yag shing mdzes pa bcug/ de lta bu yi nang shed na// rin chen brag gi stegs bu la// srid pa'i brag btsan dmar po bzhugs// sku lus dmar po ldem pa la// ral pa dmar po gyen du brdzes// ral pa'i
rtse la me dpung 'bar// mche ba dmar po gtsigs shing rngam// btsan po thun 'phen bskyod pa'i tshe// sku la dmar po ber chen gsol// dbu la dar dmar 'jol thod bcings// g.yas na bse mdung srin mo
rkang// g.yon na gdug pa'i thun zor 'phen// btsan dmag stong sde g.yob cing sdud/ thun dang zor 'phen las la brtson// skyes bu btsan chen gdug pa can// kha nas khrag mda' dmar po 'phen// phyag na
btsan gyi thun zor 'phen// mig nas me 'od dmar po gtong// zhal nas gdug pa'i khrag mda' 'phen// bla na brag cha 'ug pa lding// g.yas na ri dgas dmar po rgyug/ g.yon ltas ngan bya khyi wa// gdong na

gdug pa'i khyi spyang 'dral// btsan bran stong sde thun la 'gyed// drag po'i thun 'phebs las la ya// gdug pa'i thun zor 'phangs pa'i tshe// dmigs pa'i rten rnams brlag par byed// lnga phung yan lag rten

rnams phrol// glo snying nang khrol brob la shog/ tsit+ta dmar po phyung la shog/ gdug pa'i btsan zor da la ya// oM de ma de zil b+h+yo/ de ma de sod b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo dgra la b+h+yo/ oM de ma de zil sod/ de ma de zil

gzer// oM sod b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM de ma de zil sod b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dgra bo la b+h+yo/ bde 'byams la b+h+yo/ zhes pa bskul zhing dgra phyogs 'phang// srog zan dmar por ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ bsad pa'i thun gyi le'u
ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas spos drir bsad thabs bstan// btsan gnas sa 'am yid mthun par// srog bsgrub bstan pa thob pa dang// bra slud mgo gzhug ma nyams pa/ bug rdol med

par mnye btul la// gra shog ming dang rus kyang bri/ rgyab tu btsan dang rgyal po dang// dri bo bdud kyi ming bris la// 'di zhes spos drir sod ces bri// gzugs kyi g.yas nas bskor log sngags// mgo bo nang

bstan dme khrag la// srog sngags bshams la sngags 'di sbyar// dur byin dur byin/ phung phung shig shig/ ther rbud ther rbud/ ru ti rbud ru ti rbud/ khar thum rbad khar thum rbad/ du tri du ti/ khruM khruM/ shig
shig/ du ru du ru sham te rbad/ ces pa 'bum du bzlas shing brdeg/ tshon skud kyis bcings rkyal par gzhug gang la bya ba'i rjes dang brun// me long gis blang sngags gdab dkrug/ gseg ma smyug ma'i thur
ma gsum// brag nag tshe gsus nyungs kar gsum// nas sngon gsum la sngags bzlas gdab// phus gdab ther chad tshon skud bcing// ra rkyal lug gi grod par gzhug/ phus gdab dog pa nag pos

bcing// dkyil 'khor steng bzhag bsnyen bsgrub bya// pho nyas bkug la sngags kyis brdeg/ stag tsher tshon skud sna lngas bcing// gong gi sngags bzlas drug tu brdung// bar bar rkyang pa phus gdab cing// rjes
shul bsdu ba'i dus su bzlas// rtags bzang byung na mnan gtad bya// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ spos drir bsad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas chu grir bsad thabs

ni// sgrub pa gzhung bzhin byas nas kyang// se ba'i gzings la dgra gzugs bskyon// bra rje'i lag tu skya ba bskur// srog sngags bsham la sngags 'di sbyar// ma kham mA ra na kha phub/ nam mkha' phub/ gru rkyal

phub/ tham kham khong phaT/ ces pa brjod cing skya bas spub// kun kha thum kha thum/ de skad brjod la chur bskyur na// chu grir 'chi bar the tsom med// bstan pa'i don du ma yin pa// 'phran tshegs tsam la dmyal
bar ltung// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ chu grir bsad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas ltas ngan dbab thabs bstan// bya dang ri dgas btang ba ni// ltas ngan bya

gcan 'du ba'i sar// bsgrub pa sngon bzhin byas pa la// brag rje'i srog dang ltas ngan sbyar// tsa tsa sho la bam yer/ yer du dza ye khu phaT/ tang tang yer ta ya khu dza phaT/ ces pa bzlas shing ltas ngan
gzugs// sha khrag rus pa ngar dang sbyar// dbang po don snying thun dang sbyar// thun gyi mtha' la gzugs kyis bskor// grub nas dgra phyogs kha bstan rbad// ltas ngan than pa gar 'dod 'bebs// ltas
ngan thun 'phang rgyal mtshan gdab// gang ltar 'dod pa'i ltas ngan yang// brag rjes 'bebs bar the tsom med// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ ltas ngan dbab pa'i le'u ste
bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas brag btsan dmar po yis// gnam lcags ser ba 'bebs 'dod pas// klu btsan drag po gnas pa'i sar// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// dbus su 'brub khung gru gsum
bya// bshos bu gru gsum khrag gis byug/ bya rgod mda' gzugs le brgan brgyan// ra snying sbyar ba'i gtor ma rnams// gru gsum dbus su rten du gzugs// gser skyems bshos bu rgyun du btang// de nas ye

shes lha bsnyen bya// bzlas pa phra ma yangs pa 'bum// mthun rdzas glang rwa rta khyi bzhi pa'o// khrag la rgyun du bzlas pa bya// bsnyen sngags 'di ni srog dang sbyar// oM rag sha hril ya/ kha sring ya/ ka tA sA ya/ ka

ta sa ya/ du ru kang/ du ru kang/ pra ma na pra ma na/ da ru ya swA hA/ khu khu khu/ ha ha ha/ hi hi hi/ du ru du ru/ s+phu ru s+phu ru/ ya ting spu ru swA hA/ de nas gar 'dod dbab pa'i sngags// oM tsin du tsin du shad shad/ dza
hUM phaT/ mkha' lding mtshal bu'i rag ta yis// bag phye'i ri lu bcu gcig byug/ kham phor blugs la drag rjes bskul// byang shar mtshams na bzhugs pa yi// dmar po spyan mi zur gsum po// phyag g.yas dar
dmar g.yab gyis g.yob// g.yon na btsan zhags dmar po 'debs// rlung dang ser ba chibs su chibs// bya btsan brgya yi ru dpon mdzad// srod la bsgrubs shing bos pa'i tshe// lcags kyi mi rta stong dang
gshegs// gung la bsgrubs shing bos pa'i tshe// nyi zla gza' skar chibs shig gshegs// sku mdog dmar po rkyang la chibs// lcags kyi ser ba skar ltar 'phro// ri lungs ma lus khu yis thog/ g.yon na mdung
dmar chems se chems// dung gi ser ba char ltar 'bebs// sngon tshe bsnyen cing bsgrub pa yi// dus 'dir ma g.yel myur du gshegs// sprul pa'i brda yis lan gsum bod// de nas las la sbyar bya ba// ra
dmar thod par khrag sna dang// yul dang yul lha'i ming bcug la// gu gul bdugs la lha rten mnan// de nas yul mthong ri gnyen khar// gru gsum brus la dmar por byug/ mtshan ngan thod pa gling bzhi

par// bsgrub rdzas steng du mi khrag dang// khyi rgya bo yi khrag gis bsnun// nyungs kar sngags bzlas nang du brab// yam shud dmar po ser ba phob// de skad brjod cing gong gi rdzas// bshos su thod ba'i nang du
skol// mda' yang thod pa'i rtsa ru gzugs// spyugs bas bos cing zhing lpags gdab// tsa ra kham pa brten du gzugs// nang skyed btsugs la thab tu slud// ra lcags gdab cing sngags 'di bzlas// oM yag

sha kha sring yang/ kha sring yang/ ka ta sa ya/ ka ta sa ya/ du ru ka ya/ du ru ka ya/ sa na ya/ da ra ya/ da ra ya/ khu khu/ oM ha hi hi/ du ru du ru/ spu ru spu ru swA hA/ oM tsin du tsan du/ shad shad swAhA/
gza' la gtad de drag tu bzlas// yul bdag gzir te gnad la dbab// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ ser ba dang dbab pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// grub kyang las byed ma
'dod na// shan dmar slon dmar dbab thabs bstan// shel ni se po stag lag gam// mkha' lding mtshal bu spun gsum gyis// bsgrub dus rten gzugs bar bar bskar// tsa ra kham pa ldan dmar la// gang
la bca' ba'i dmigs pa bca'// ming rus bla dgas brdas mtshon pa// rme bas bdug cing mtshang chus gdab// ra tsa'i snying sogs g.yas la gdags// byang shar 'brub khung khar bzhag la// bod sngags

gzer sngags rim pas gdab// shes pa dgug cing bstim par bya// mtshan rtags la phebs pa dang// khyad par rje gnas pa'i sar// gza' btsan gyi 'u ka rgyu ba'i tshe// rgya mtsho sha khrag rlon dmar dang// spu

dang pags pa ming rus dang// phung rgod rtsang mar bcas la gtor// zhe sdang drag po'i rngam stabs kyis// ma nyes dpang gzugs 'o dod 'bod// tshig tu 'di skad brjod cing gtam// che ge zhes pa'i yul phyogs

su// che ge mo zhes bya ba'i btsan// rgya mtsho ra tsa kham pa 'am// se bo spun gsum stag la gas// shan dmar srog dmar mgron du spyon// dam nyams che ge zhes bya 'di// btsan la do sdo 'gran tshol las// phyigs

kyi gzugs mar bzhes su gsol// btsan gyi se longs 'di la gyis// mgyogs kyi gshed po 'di la thob// yul che ge mo'i btsan// a pi shu sa ma ya tri sham rbad b+h+yo/ che ge mo shad ka la ku ru che ge mo de chug de
la phob ya/ de nasabaskor bzlog dmod mos gdag/ 'jig rten khams na gnas pa yi// btsan dmag bsdu zhing dmar la dbab// dun por dmigs la rang gnyer gtad// ming rus snying dang srog rtsal
gsal// mgo bor bcug la srog thun dbab// brag rje gar gnas tha ram dbab// las kyi mtha' brtul 'di byas la// 'jig rten sgyu ma'i chu bur de// myur du brlag par the tsom med// srog zan dmar po ri
dmar 'joms pa'i rgyus las/ btsan sha dmar slon dmar la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas skyes bu brag btsan gyis// thugs dam mdos kyis bskang ba stan// gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ldan

pa des// 'bru sna tshogs pa'i phye ma la// rin chen sna tshogs bdar byas la// bse yi yul dang mkhar du bcas// rtse la brag bya 'ug pa dang// btsan gyi than bya srin bya dang// zur la bse sbrul dmar po
'khril// logs la bse'i spre'u dmar po 'dzeg/ sgo zur g.yas g.yon gla dang wa// mkhar gyi mthar ma rta pas bskor// gser g.yu ngar mi tha ma la// bse yi ra skyes dmar po dang// bse glang
dmar po stag ris dang// bse lugs dang 'phar spyang dang// bse yi ri dgas yang dgod// bse yi ngar glud dmar po dang// bshos bu dmar po bse zhal dang// mda' dmar rgyang bu dmar po dang// nam
mkha' dmar po khri bzhad pa// bya dmar phod kyis brgyan pa dgod// phud dang spyan gzigs dkor cha dang// mar me mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang// rdzas rnams 'tshogs na byin gyis brlab// de yang btsan
gyi rten gnas ni// rigs kyi kha dog so sor bya// bsngo ba'i tshigs bcad 'di skad brjod// hUM/ brag btsan skyes chen gdug pa'i bu// skyes bu btsan chen brag gi bdag/ brag btsan dmar po 'byung ba'i
bdag/ yul ni btsan yul ya gi na// bse brag dmar po rums su 'bar// brag dmar 'bar ba'i them par na// brag btsan dmar po de ni bzhugs// brag btsan khyod kyi bzhugs gnas de// rin chen 'bar
ba'i gzhal yas nas// brag chen gtams pa'i bar na bzhugs// bse'i sgo mo la/ dung gi re bzhi/ de'i nang shed na/ brag phug skam dang gzhal yas khang// de na brag btsan dmar po bzhugs// brag btsan
khyod kyi pha smos pa// pha ni ag se rgyal ba lags// ma ni sa srin ma mo lags// de gnyis bshos pa'i sras/ brag btsan dmar po byung// btsan dmar ni lden pa la// sku la dar dmar ber chen gsol// dbu
la le brgan 'gying thod bcings// bse ni ral gri dang// bse ni gzhu mo bsnams// bse mda' ni stag ral dkar// 'khor gsum ni g.yas dang g.yon// tshon sna lnga yi zhags pa bsnams// bse yi yu thung

skyed la btsugs// brag gi wa mo kha nag dang// brag sha ni gla ba dang// brag gi srin bya'i bu mo dang// 'phar ba ni dmar pa rnams// chibs dang ni skor du mnga'// bse khyi dmar po khangs se khangs// bse yi
khrab chen ni sil li li// gdug bya 'ug phyag tu thogs// brag btsan dmar po'i 'khor gyis bskor// gdug pa'i klu srin pho nyar gtong// brag btsan gyi gdug pa can// srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ srid pa
kun la dbang du sgyur// gdug rtsub nad kyi bdag po khyod// sprul pa bya dmar mang po 'gyed// brag btsan dmar po bskyod pa'i tshe// kha nas khrag gi gzer mda' 'phen// gzer nad mang po gtong bar

byed// lag nas mtshon gyi zhags pa 'phen// zhags pa sdog cig nyams pa sgrol// gang la babs pa 'dzin cing sgrol// ltas ngan than bya mang po gtong// srid pa yongs la gnod pa byed// srod la bya yi ltas ngan
gtong// gung la sdig pa khyod kyis gtong// tho rangs wa rgyal khyod kyis gtong// tho rangs khyi ngu ltas ngan gtong// ltas ngan mang po khyod kyis gtong// ma nyes btsan gyi kha yogs dgra la

'debs// sha ma 'dral du byed cing khrag ma 'thor du byed// btsan gyi shod mas dgra la 'debs// spyugs pa'i glu len kyu ru ru// me 'od dmar po breng nge breng// brag btsan 'khor rnams sil li li// srid pa
kun tu nad rnams gtong// ming ni brag btsan dmar pos bya// di ring mthun pa'i yas kyis mchod// di ring srid pa'i mdos kyis mchod// de skad brjod cing rim pas bsngo// srog zan dmar po ri dmar
'joms pa'i rgyud las/ bskang ba mdos kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas brag btsan dmar po yi// las kyi mtha' sdud gnan pa'i las// gsang bas srog len rtad kram bstan// yod nges yid dang

mthun pa ru// dkyil 'khor gzhung dang mthun pa bri// yang na snam phying gtsang ma'i khar// bshos bu lnga dang btsan rgyang lnga// ne bu lnga la shing ris lnga// btsan gyi gzugs la bris la dgod// btsan gzugs kha

dog rigs dang sbyar// se gzhu skyer mda' thogs par bya// de lnga'i mdun du 'brang rgyas lnga// tshe dang yungs kyis brgyan par gzhag/ gser skyems mngon chas lnga dang 'dra// ra dmar rta snying gsur dud

gtang// de ni bsnyen pa'i dam rdzas yin// rus chen gang yin rten pa'i mgo// phag ra khyi yi thod pa gsum// phag thod sdig pa'i gzugs lnga bri// bar bar bri ba'i sngags 'di'o// gur tri gur tri chum/ ku ru ku
ru chum/ brag rje'i srog sngags dag dang sbrel// khyi thod ra thod gnyis la sbal sdig gnyis ka bri// sbal nag gzugs gsum bri// srog sngags bshams la sngags 'di bri// kyi snying la zo/ rbad rbad/ chod

chod thum ril/ tsit+ta rbad/ ling ka mi yi khrag gis bri// sngon dmar tshon skud skra lag bcing// thod pa gsum du re re gzhug/ kyi bal thi gu phyin ga log/ gsum gyis thod pa so sor bcing// mthing nag gru
gsum khru gang gru// thod pa bcug la gur nag dbub// gzhung bzhin bsgrubs la yas kun drang// chu gtor mngon dang ngar sbags gtang// bden bdar lha 'dre dpang yang gzugs// phyogs bzhir g.yab cing

'di skad brjod// btsan gyi rgyal po ang me ster// btsan gyi rgyal po shib mo ste// de las sprul pa'i btsan kha bzhi// mngag gzhug pho nya mgyogs sde brgyad// se re se btsan zhes pa dang// brag rje brag btsan
dmar po dang// btsan bdud rol pa skya bdun dang// btsan yab skya cig la sogs te// yul yul btsan rgod ming smros la// gcig gis gcig bskul 'dir 'dus shig/ che ge mo yi dur sa 'dir 'debs
pas// spyan 'dren mchod 'bul las 'chol bas// 'dir gshegs brjod la sngags kun drang// bsgrub pa thob nas las la sbyar// yod nges mtshan ma can gyis gnas// brag dmar ser po
dmar po dang// sngon po dkar po khra bo bsogs// kha dog rigs dang sbyar la gtad// kha bo che dang ra bo che// mi yi gzugs can dbyibs dang sbyar// gong gi rdzas rnams rigs dang bstun// phud gtor bden
bdar dpang yang gzugs// g.yab cing bcol bskul drag tu bya// nyams kyi mtshan ma byung ba dang// kha dang ra brag lag tu gtad// de nas mnan gtad sa mtshan ni// btsan gyi gying shang chen po bstan// sa
mtshams nyams dang sbyar ba der// dgra yi dur sa gdab par bya// gong du smos pa'i btsan rnams dang// khyad par 'di na gnas pa'i btsan// che ge dur sa 'dir 'debs pas// gtad do rtags phyin
gtang rag gtang// de skad brjod la gzir gnon bya'o// bdun rgyud khram la thebs zhes bya// 'khor ba med pa'i las su bstan// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ srog gshed spyir bstan
pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas btsan bdud 'dus pa'i 'khor de rnams yi rangs te/ mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis brgyan par 'gyur ro// kun gyis mgrin gcig tu gyur nas gsol ba/ thugs rje'i
bdag po byams thugs ldan// gtum khro dregs pa 'dul mdzad pa// gsung gi nga ros khams gsum sgrol// dri med pad+ma dbang chen la// rtag tu mi phyed dad pas 'dud// bka' dang bstan pa bsrung bar
bgyis// lung bstan rjes su bdag cag 'dreng// rgyud 'di 'chang bar gang byed pa// gtsug gi nor bu bzhin du bkur bar bgyid// gal te bka' las 'das gyur na// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ lus ngag
rdul phran bshig nas kyang// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul brlag par 'gyur// dam las mi 'da' sa ma ya// zhes dmod btsugs so// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang zhing dam tshig
gi dmod btsugs pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// dpal chen mi gnas dbyings su thim// 'jig rten dregs pa rang sar dengs// ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i rgyud// don la mtshan du gsol ba 'di// mi
nub yun gyi rtags su bzhag/ snod ldan rim pas spyad pa las// gzu lum ra chod byed pa la// bstan na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// long bas long ba 'khrid pa bzhin// gnyis ka ngam grog g.yang sar
lhung// dad pa dam tshig ldan pa yi// bka' dang gzhung bzhin byed pa yis// spyad na mi nub rgyal mtshan thob// srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud// bstan pa bsrung pa'i spu gri nyes dmigs dang
bcas pa rdzogs so// pad+ma sam b+ha was bsgyur pa'o/ a+thi+-i/ rgya rgya//// @##// dmod pa drag sngags kyi spyi rgyud/ de nas dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// phyogs bcu dregs pa bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// mthu chen bdud 'dul mngon rdzogs rgyal po bzhugs// ma 'ongs don du sngags kyi

tshad bstan gsol// bka' stsal pa/ rab kyi don du rnam pa lnga// dza/ phaT/ b+h+yo/ rbad/ nan/ 'bring gi don du rnam pa bdun// dza rbud/ tha ma'i don du rnam pa dgu// ban rbud/ mtha' la rnam pa du zhig

mchis// rab kyi don du rnam pa lnga// 'bring gi don du rnam pa bdun// tha ma dgu yis 'grub par 'gyur// thog ser gyi swa ni/ sa phrom/ tshal/ hril/ shar/ b+h+yo/ tshe tse na bi kruM sa ra dum bu khu re bya ya tshal hril b+h+yo/

gshin rje gshag zir ba ni/ ru dra ka la sha/ rak+ta ka la sha/ rak+ta kha khrag/ staM ba nan/ rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags dang gdug pa'i sngags la/ trig nan/ hUM phaT/ ces pa thams cad gzir ba'o// nA ga trig nan/ hUM

phaT/ klu gzir ba'o// 'di bzhin thams cad kun la shes par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog lam lnga yang// snang zhing mi nub pa ru ni// spyi dang drug tu gnas par gyis// rigs

kyi dbye ba ma shes na// 'bras bu 'grub pa thag ring bas// de yi dbye ba ma 'dres par// gsal ba dag tu gnas par gyis// so so'i don rnams khong rtogs nas// 'di shes nye lam dam pa ste// thabs kyi rgyal
por 'di gnas te// gsang ba gsang chen zab mo yi// don ldan nying khur gnas par gyis// de skad gsang ba'i rgya ru bstan// 'di don ma lus gsungs pa rnams// 'chad pa'i rnal 'byor dam pa
las// gsungs/ dang por e yis bsad pa yang// skye med chos dbyings yi ge e// ma ra ya nyid mthar bzhag pa// rdzas 'gugs brnyan pa'i sngags su bshad// gnyis pa'i yi ge yaM yin te// yaM gnyis bar

du ma ra ya// skyod byed yi ge b+h+yo yis bskul// gsum pa'i yi ge raM yin te// raM gnyis bar du ma ra ya// sreg byed me yi dkyil 'khor sgom// bzhi pa'i yi ge baM yin te// baM gnyis bar du ma ra ya// 'dod

chags khrag gi dkyil 'khor sgom// lnga pa'i yi ge su yin te// su gnyis bar du ma ra ya// gti mug sa yi dkyil 'khor sgom// drug pa'i yi ge haM yin te// haM gnyis bar du ma ra ya// 'od kyi gong bu lta bur

sgom// bdun pa'i yi ge phaT yin te// phaT gnyis bar du ma ra ya/ khro tshogs nam mkha'i skar ltar 'khrug/ yi ge Ni ni sa bon yin// gsod byed yi ge rbad yin te// e bzhag yi ge ma ra ya// mtha' ma dza yis
bstan pa yin// ma ra ya yi bsnyen pa yin// re res las rnams 'grub pa'i phyir// bsgrub pa chen po bdun du gsungs// spyi rgya chen po'i rgyud las/ rten gyi drag sngags kyi bsgrub lugs bdun
pa'o// le'u dang po'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ nya ni bgyi ba ji lta bu// de yi gtan tshigs bshad par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nya snyan po don gyi mdo bzhin du// rnal
'byor pa la shis pa gtong ba dang// log par lta ba rnams la ni// mdze nad dang rims nad sna tshogs pa gtong bas kyang nya bstan to// stong ni rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi skyed lugs dang/ gzas pa po gsad

par bya ba'i thabs ston par bya ba'i phyir stong zhes bya/ rak+ta ni mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi dam rdzas kyi mchog yin pa dang/ gzas pa po gang yin pa gsad pa'i thabs de las byung ba'i phyir na/ rak+ta bstan pa'o// nya
stong dang rak+ta bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// kye ma bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// thod pa rnam pa du yang gsungs// thod pa'i de nyid bshad pa zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thod

pa'i de nyid bshad bya yis// lus ngag yid gsum gus par nyon// 'phang thod de bzhin lding thod dang// spar thod nam mkhar mchong thod dang// lding thod 'grub thod ma nyams thod// rma thod za thod la sogs

pa// thod pa bcu gsum dag tu nges// yi ge laM bris ri rab ldan// dbus su nr-i dang ming rus gzhug/ bris pa mnan pa'i thod pa nges// rdzas dang mnan pa nges pa'i rdzas// sbal pa dag gi shun nam ni// sbrul gyi
shun du nges pa yin// tshig dang mnan par nges pa'i tshig/ nA ga zhes bya'i sngags kyang bzhugs// ting 'dzin dang ldan gshin rje'i sngags// a kri 'bru bdun gnya' non yin// rdo rje'i bzlas pa mi nus
pas// mnan na nges par non pa yin// dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang// gnyan dgu dag la gtad par bya// mnan thod mchod na gso bar 'gyur// 'phangs na bsgrub bya 'chor bar nges// klu la ba ma rba dur
mnan// gzhan yang rta la sogs pa'i// gzugs la mnan na nges par phung// gzhan yang mnan pa'i thod ba'am/ khal ma'i ga'u bcu'am dgu// mnan pa grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// klu la mdze nad bco
brgyad 'byung// btsan la gzer nad drug tu gsungs// sa bdag la ni zhag gsum ste// yul lhas yul nas 'byung la sogs// dmu la rmu nad dgu la sogs// lha la sogs pa gzhan rnams dang// bdun dang

lnga dang drug dang yang// brgyad dang dgu ru shes bar bya// phung byed mnan thod bshad pa'o// mchod thod nal bu dre dang lnga// zhag gsum la sogs gong dang 'dra// yongs su ma nyams thod pa la// dbus su gtso
bo'i sngags bris la// ma ra ya yi sngags bris la// rak+Sha'i rgya mtsho mchod pa'i rdzas// bod pa'i sngags ni gsur chen la// rten pa'i rdzas ni a mri ta// dam tshig rdzas kyis dam tshig bsre// sgom
bsgrub ting 'dzin ma 'khrul bas// mkha' 'gro mchod pa de yis mchod// ye shes gshed dang 'brel ba bzhin// mchod bstod dran dang rtag tu mchod// mas kyi mchod mchod rtag tu dran// dran dang yul 'khor
skyob par byed// ci 'dod bsams pa 'grub par byed// mchod pa thor mnan mkha' 'gro mnan// stong gsum srid pa'i mkha' 'gro 'khrugs// bdag gi 'khor du smyo 'bog sogs// rims nad sna tshogs 'byung

bar 'gyur// gzhan yang mdze nad sna tshogs so// 'phangs na las mkhan 'phangs pa ste// bod pa'i sngags dang tshig rnams dang// ting 'dzin bos kyang mi 'khor te// rten dang mchod pas de dang 'dra// 'khor
gyi ma mo gzhan du 'phos// lha la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o// yun du gzung ba'i mchod thod dang// rtag par bzhugs kyang rdzas su dran// mthun par bzhugs kyang gshegs bzhugs med// thod pa bzhi yis mchod
par gsungs// 'phangs thod rabs chad thod pa ru// drag sngags bris te der bzhag nas// ting 'dzin dug gi na bun 'thibs// 'phang thod mchod na drag sngags dang// na bun bdag la rtog par nges// mnan
na na bun lha 'dre yi// mnyan dgu dag tu mnan pas te// mnyan dgu'i rims nad bdag la ldog/ mchad chen kha'am byang ri nas// 'phangs na dgra yi sde rnams 'phung// nad kyi na bun 'th-ibs pa
dang// mtshon gyi bskal pa 'khrugs pa dang// dug gi na bun 'thibs par nges// byang ri'i kha nas 'phangs bar nges// thod pa bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed
pos// dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// yi ge rtsis ni ji ltar lags// de yi tshad ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis da bshad
'tshal// zhes gsol pa dang/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// sngags kyi de nyid rnam pa lnga// yang dag nges par bshad bya ba// bsnyen sngags bsgrub sngags gsad
pa'i sngags// sngags kyi 'brel pa dum dum 'brel// oM ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te// ma ra ya yi rig pa srangs// tha ma'i yi ge dza bzhag pa// rten can dag gi mnyan pa'o// oM ni chos kyi dbyings yin

te// rig pa bzhi yis rig pa drangs// tha ma dza yis 'gugs byed pa// rten can gyis ni snyen pa'o// mthar byer lnga ni yi ge oM// a ni yum lnga'i snying po ste// gro ni phyogs bcu'i khro bo yin// te ni sras bcas
snying po ste// ka ni gzugs sku'i snying po yin// hUM ni thams cad dbang du sdud// phaT kyis lha tshogs spro bar byed// 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa'o// snang bar shes pa'i dngos po ste// rang la
yod pas 'grub pa'o// yi ge b+h+yo ni bsgrub sngags te// rbad ni gsod pa'i sngags yin no// yaM ni mnan pa'i sngags yin no// ma ni gshed ma'i sngags yin no// ra ni gshed mar byed pa'o// ya ni gshed mar
rkyen yin no// gshed ma'i tshogs spro yi ge phaT// sngags kyi 'phreng pa dum dum 'brel// ye shes lnga ldan lhun gyis grub// ye shes 'phreng ba dum dum 'brel// las dang 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das// las
mkhan 'phreng ba dum dum 'brel// 'bras bu sa dang tshogs kyi gsum// lam gyi phreng ba dum dum 'brel// 'phreng ba yang dag rnam pa gsum// 'di nyid ma 'khrul spyad 'gyur na// las mkhan ma lus dbang du

sdud// rgyud ni rnam pa gsum yin te// las kyi rig ni rig pa can// lam gyi rgyud ni gsang sngags te// yi ge 'bru lnga de nyid yin// 'bras bu sku ni bde gshegs sku// rten dang rten can rnam gnyis kyi// sngags
kyi snying po ma nor bar// dregs pas rten dang bcas nas 'gugs// bsnyen sngags ma nor bde ba rnyed// bsgrub sngags ma nor las la 'dzud// gsang sngags ma nor mtshon char 'bab// i yis bsnyen par

drangs nas ni// sku gsum thob kyang 'chi bar nges// yaM gyis bsnyen par drangs nas ni// rig pa rnyed kyang gnas nas 'gugs// raM gyi bsnyen par drangs nas ni// drod lnga thob kyang lus sems 'brel// baM gyi

bsnyen pa drangs nas ni// sku lnga thob kyang sdug bsngal myong// su yis bsnyen pa drangs nas ni// sa rnams thob kyang gsod pa byed// haM gyis bsnyen par drangs nas ni// sku lnga thob kyang 'jig par 'gyur// phaT
kyis bsnyen par drangs nas ni// che bas che ba'i mthu dpung 'joms// 'di rnams gcig la gang byas kyang// las rnams grub par gdon mi za// sngags kyi tshig dang tshad ma bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi
pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gdan las bzhengs te/ kye ma bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// gong du gsungs pa'i mnan pa la// las kyi bye brag ji ltar mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsol cig/ de skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni 'gro la thugs brtse phyir// las kyi bye brag thams cad kun// 'gro la brtse phyir ngas bshad kyis// lus ngag
yid gsum gus par nyon// e ni chos kyi dbyings yin te// gru gsum mkha'i snying po yin// na gas klu yi srog nas drangs// tshal gyi klu rnams so sor 'byed// thun gyis rigs bzhi las la 'dzud// ril gyis
so sor 'dzin bar byed// nam gyi mgo lus dbang du sdud// dpung gis las rnams gdon mi za// e na ga tshal thum ril nam thug/ lcags kyi phur pa sor brgyad pa gcig gis bteg cing// yi
ge haM bsams na/ mdze rims kyis btab na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// smug ni gzas pa'i srog nas 'dren// tshal gyis las mkhan gshed ma 'gyed// tshal pa nges par gsod pa yin// dum drug gnyis brjod
mnan pa'i don// mgo tshag dang rus pa dang// rkang lag rtas mchi bar 'gyur ro// smug tshal pa dum bu krugs drum dkrugs// zangs kyi phur pa sor brgyad pa gcig bteg cing// gyo mgo la 'khor lo bris la

gtubs na gong ma'i nad kyi btab na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// nA gA zhes pas klu rnams 'bod// he he btab pas sngags yin te// d+hi ri ri yis bshad ma ldang// smug shar gshed ma bskul ba'i sngags// na ga he he

d+hi ri ri smug shar// sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas// dgra bo mdze yis zin par 'gyur ro// de dag ni drag sngags khyad par can bstan pa'o// mnan pa las kyi bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas
'jam dpal gshin rje gshed gdan las bzhengs te// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag byas nas// kye ma bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs pa yi rnal 'byor pa// thun mong sngags
rnams mi 'tshal lam// bcom ldan 'das bdag la da bshad 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags rnams spu gri 'dra ba la// shin tu bshad par mi dpags kyang// ma 'ongs rnams kyi don du

bshad// nga rang rnam shes sngags yin te// thum byer gyis ni gsod par nges// nga rang thum byer gnas pa'o// nga rang thum byer nga rang thum byed/ khyi khrag ra khrag mon pa'i khrag/ gnag gi kha chu klo ba glo rnams

la// sngags btab bskol te brgyab na gnag rnams bzung// bsnyen bsgrub sngags ni 'bum du bzlas// gza' skar be'u rdzi yin te// nyi ma gros la bya'o// rba thams dgug pa'i snying po ste// de ni rnam shes snying
por gsungs// tsi ri gnyis su brdzod par bya// rba bsregs pa'i sbyor ba yin// ma ra na gram gsad sngags te// thugs lum gnyis brjod gsang sngags yin// bar du mug byer gnyis bzhag pa// ra gsad
pa'i gsang sngags so// oM ni 'dun gyi mgo bo ste// bres 'di bus zhes rbad pa'o// thum bus 'gri na gsad pa'i sngags// dur gri sta dung btab pa'o// 'jings ni bsad pa'i sngags yin te// rta la sogs pa'i

mig zlum rnams// yongs su bteg par bya ba yin// oM bris 'di bus thum bu 'dri tang du 'jibs// dgra bo yul tshan dang rgyas na// gla ba'i chu la blugs la/ ngan sngags 'di btab na/ phu chu skam mo// he he
dum bu hu ya nag gsung zhes brjod nas/ chu la brgyab na chu mig thal ba thor gyis 'gro yo// nA gas klu yi srog nas 'dren// dum bu rbad pa'i sngags yin te// hu ya btab pa'i sngags su

gsungs// na ga thum bu hu ya/ sbal pa'i gsob tu khrag sna tshogs kyis bkang la sbal lcong gi gzugs brgyad kyis mtha' ma bskor la/ skar ma skyed gsum la bsnyen pa bya/ skar ma khrums smad la gtad/ phag

pa'i thod pa dang sems pas gnas/ dgra bo mo rgyud mtha' phung bar 'gyur ro// oM ni rnam par snang mdzad de// rje khram btsan gyi srog snying yin// wa khram btsan srin srog snying yin// rta khram phung sri srog snying

yin// oM rje khram wa khrag rta khram// rabs chad kyi thod pa dang rta'i thod par bcug la/ skar ma bi rdzi la gtad nas gong gsum du bcug la/ dgra bo'i rgyud mtha' phung par 'gyur ro// las thun mong gi sngags
