bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas de dag thams cad kyi spyi nyid bshad nas bzhugs te/ mnyam pa nyid las gnas pa las// 'jam dpal gshin rjes zhus pa las// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid
las// sngags las nges pa du zhig mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// ma 'ongs mi la phan 'dogs phyir// sngags kyi de nyid bshad

par bya// sngags kyi mgo bo oM yin te// bsnyen pa grub nas 'byung bar nges// rnam par snang mdzad yin pa'i phyir// drag po'i las la 'dul mi 'gyur// mgo med yi ge hUM gzhug bya// ye shes lnga dang ldan mod

kyang// thugs nyid rdo rje yin pa'i phyir/ khros pa drag pos 'dul bar bshad// 'dug pa gong 'og spro ba ni// ye shes rang sngags gong du'o// las mkhan srog snying 'og tu ste// bsnyen pa'i dus nyid 'gugs par
byed// yi ge dza yis kun tu 'gugs// nyin srib gnyis su dbye ba yang// zhi rgyas gnyis ni nyin yin te// gso ba'i las la shis pa'o// dbang drag gnyis ni sribs yin te// drag po'i las la shis pa'o// las

sngags sna tshogs gang byung ba// sngags kyi 'phra men 'gyed par gsungs// dz+wa la raM zhes 'byung ba dang// 'gyed ste hril zhes bya ba ni// thog gi las rnams 'grub par byed// 'di la ma 'dres rbad byung
ba// gsad ba'i las la shis pa'o// gnyis gong phrom dang hril gzhag pa// dbab pa'i las la shis pa'o// rang rang sna tshogs las rnams la// sngags mthar 'bru re gang byung ba// mthar rten bzhugs zhes de

la brjod// ji snyed lha yi grangs byung yang// rnam shes snying po re res mtshon// mang po gcig tu lcams shes bya// dam tshig rjes dran ji snyed las// snying po re res gcig tu dril// chos bu kun las btus zhes
bya// las gsum gcig tu gang zlos pa// 'ur ba gcig tu dril zhes bya// 'byung ba'i tsha grang gang 'khrugs pa// me chu 'gal ba sogs zhes bshad// rtsis tshad bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun
pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed gdan las bzhengs te/ gar gyi bdag sna tshogs pas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la rkyang phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bder
gshegs bcom ldan 'das// 'khor lo'i nges pa ji lta bu// de yi 'brel pa ji lta bu// de yi dgos pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni dus

bzhi cha mnyam 'byung// dus gsum cha yang de bzhin te// nga las hUM gi sgra byung bas// ha he mtshon pa'i tshul du phyung// hUM gi khong nas e byung bas// dkar po gru gsum chos kyi dbyings// gru gsum ma ra ya re
dgod// dkyil du rnam shes snying po dgod// de steng yi ge dza bzhag la// 'gugs byed bsnyen pa'i 'khor lo yin// sa der yi ge b+h+yo bzhag pa// sgrub pa'i 'khor lo chen po yin// sa der yi ge rbad bzhag

pa// gsod byed drag po'i 'khor lo yin// kun la de bzhin shes par bya// hUM gis khong nas hUM phyung bas// dngas ma'i 'khor lo chen po ste// dngas ma lnga la yig 'bru lnga// skye ba med pa'i byang chub
sems// 'gag pa med pas 'chi ba med// mdor na rgyu med rang bzhin skor// lhag pa byang sems 'khor lo ste// skye 'gag gnyis med gzung 'dzin bral// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa// lnga dang bcu'i

rang bzhin bskor zhes brjod// 'di ni rdzogs pa chen po'i 'khor lo yin// hUM ni khong nas yang byung bas// mchog ma gnyis dang tshang tsal gnyis// chang pa'i dkyil du yi ge 'bru lnga dgod// rlung gi dkyil

'khor gzhu 'dra la// yi ge lnga dang rab ldan pa// 'di ni 'byung ba rlung gi 'khor lo yin// me yi 'khor lo gru gsum la// yi ge lnga dang rab tu ldan// chu yi 'khor lo zlum po ste// yi ge lnga dang rab tu ldan// sa

yi 'khor lo gru bzhi la// yi ge lnga dang ldan pa ste// thams cad gong bzhin shes par bya// yi ge 'od dang ldan bar bsgom// phaT kyis sems kyis ro bsad de// raM ni sreg par byed pa yin// rba tha kyis bde ba'i

ro bsad de// chos kyis dbyings su rtag par bya// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos// thams cad byang chub sems kyis 'khrul 'khor du bskor// yongs su byang na snang bar 'gyur// 'dus byas rdzas kyi

'khor lo bskor ba mu stegs 'khrul pa'i lam// dper na mtshon rtse gcig pas btab na 'chor med bzhin// snang la rang bzh-in med pa rtse gcig bsgom// spyi rgya chen po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo de kho na nyid
bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// e ma bcom ldan gsang chen bdag/ thams cad mkhyen rdzogs phyag 'tshal lo// kun khyab bden don gsang sngags don// ji ltar gsungs pa'i bka' lung
ste// lung gi yi ge ma 'dres gsal// rang bzhin rgyud las tshig gi rgyud// rten 'brel yi ge smra brtags su// bdag gis bsdus la gnas par gyis// 'di don ma lus gsungs pa rnams// 'chad pa'i rnal
'byor dam pa ste// gsang bdag nyid du gnas par gyis// ji ltar ji lta'i mas can rnams// de lta de lta'i don rnams la// gnas shing dad par bgyi lags so// 'di spyod rnal 'byor gang dang gang// brgya

rtags zhes ni gzung bar bgyi// de la rgol dang bar chod dang// gzhan gyi sde pas mi tshugs bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa mthar phyin te/ bde ba chen po'i ngang la bzhugs so// spyi rgya chen po las/ ji
snyed par gtad pa'i le'u ste dgu ba'o//// gsang sngags thams cad kyi spyi rgya chen po'i rgyud phyi ma'i rim par gsungs pa rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ mu tra mun la tran gu h+ye tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ bal pa tra gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal dreg pa chen po na ra gir ti la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus

gcig na/ ri rab ri'i bum pa rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzhal yas khang chen po/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i klong/ zhing dang gdug pa nyi zlas yongs su mtshan pa/ rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khrug cing yongs su 'khyil
ba/ dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i/ pho brang e yi gzhal yas khang na/ dregs pa chen po na ra gir ti/ dpa' brtul chen po dregs pa zil gyis mnan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so// de ma thag tu 'khor thams cad kyang yongs su 'dus par gyur to// dregs pa chen po gtsug phud nag po dang/ bdud po yag sha nag po dang/ arga zor 'phen nag po dang/ klu gnyan ka la srog
gcod dang/ khram thogs kyi bdud dang/ gri thogs kyi gying dang/ zhags thogs kyi btsan dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi srin mo 'jigs byed rnams dang/ dregs pa'i sde dpon chen po rnams dang/ gdug pa tri
la sogs pa rnams 'dud par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na dregs pa can de dag gi nang nas/ dregs pa chen po gtsug phud nag po gdan las langs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ dregs pa'i bdag
po lha bdag gtso// 'phrin las kun gyi bdag po ste// dregs pa gshin rje gshed po khyod// 'khrul pa'i log 'dren tshar gcod pas// nyid kyi lta spyod ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor chen po ji ltar
lags// de la mchod dang las rim rdzogs pa yi// 'phrin las grub par ji ltar bgyi// yan lag rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dbang// dam tshig chen pos bdag la gsol// ces
gsungs so// snying zor nag po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang dregs pa chen po na ra gir tis/ log 'dren 'dul bar tshar gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig rdo rje gtsug phud can// lta ba theg chen yang dag ni// nam mkha'i chos nyid ye klong la// som nyi med na kun gyis bgrod// spyod pa rab bstan chur zhugs ltar// blang dor

med par bsgrub bar bya'o// de la lhun grub rdzogs pa yi// skye med dbyings las rol pa'i sku// snang med mkha' la yang dag sgom// thugs rje kun khyab yi ge la// yang dag nyid du de nyid do// mi 'gyur rdo rje
rab tu mkhregs// gzhal yas ye klong lhun gyis grub// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rdo rje'i brag/ klu bdud gdug pa rus sbal gdan// yi ge ya yi 'phro 'du las// phaT ces bskul bas khro bo'i sku// log 'dren
gdug pa 'joms pa'i lha// gshin rje yak+Sha me dbal sku// spyi gtsug mkha' lding gdug pa 'dul// smug nag 'phros pa sgrol byed yum// e ka dza ti g.yon du gnas// chos sku byang chub sems nyid las// skye
med dbyings las 'gro don du// byams dang snying rje don las bzhengs// pho brang bum pa'i da la ru// gnyis med dbyings su thim par bzhugs// arga me tog bdug pa dang// mar me zhal zas dri chab

rnams// tha dad rtog pa kun spangs te// de la gsang ba'i lha rnams la// gnyis med don gyis dbul bar bya// skye shi 'du 'bral med don la// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa 'bul// che ba'i ye shes rdzogs pa'i
don// dbang bdud lha la bstod pa dang// gsang sngags 'phreng ba'i rim pa bya// zhes gsungs so// snying zor nag po'i rgyud las le'u gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dregs pa chen pos/ 'phrin las yongs su

rdzogs pas/ khyad par gyi sbyor ba seng ge kha 'thab kyi ngan sngags/ pa tra glang snying bsgral ba'i las 'di gsungs so// las gzhi khyad pa gsad pa'i las// bsrung bzlog mnan pa bsdebs kyi grogs// thod sgrub
nag po gsang pa'i las// las kyis 'khor nas rang srog gcod// de don las rims bshad par bya// gang y-in rigs kyi thod pa bslang// pha mes tod pa mchog tu bshad// rme khrag dug sna gsang phye la// sor
lnga gru bri e byas te// a mu ka yi rdzas lnga la// ming rus rnam shes ling ga la// dmigs pa'i rten du gan rkyal bzhag/ de stengs gzugs byas re rang skyon// mdzub gang ba ni tshad yin no// lag na
dug shing phur pa yis// rang gis snying khar 'debs pa'i tshul// a kro rwa dza'i drag sngags dang// drag po 'phru bdun dpal la gdags// de yang gong gi thod nang du// e dang ling ga bcas la bzhag/ hUM

bzhi dza bzhi thod pa la// 'da' ras tsa bsdam rgya gram bya// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba yis// drag sngags bdun pa zhag bdun brab// rten pa'i gnas su mchog tu bshad// de min chu mig rta dbab can// thod pa
nag po mnan par bya// rang la rang 'brub bsad pa yis// rang gshed nag po'i las su bshad// gnod sbyin srog gi 'khor lo yis// de yi steng nas mnan par bya// leb nag rgya gram sngags kyis
'tshes// bsad pa'i tsakrar yang dag bshad// ces gsungs so// snying gzer nag po'i rgyud las le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bzlog pa'i 'khor lo rdo rje rnam par gcod pa zhes

bya ba 'di gsungs so// sna tshogs sa la sbrus pa yi// mchod rten nag po bam rim lnga// khru gang ba ni tshad yin no// dbang bskur rab tu gnas par bya// bum par 'khor lo rtsibs bzhin// ming rus bsrung ba'i
sngags kyis bskor// tshe srog bsrung phyir zangs dang lcags// gser dang bcas pa'i rim par sbyar// lag tu phur pa dpal phyir bstan// shrI many+dzu yi gsang sngags dgod// 'khor lo bre la rab brgyangs
te// log pa'i 'khor lo skabs su bskor// dus mtshams bzung ba zhes su gsungs// ces gsungs so// snying zor gyi rgyud las le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang man ngag gnan pa/ rdo rje gnan pa zhes bya ba
'di gsungs so// ri rab 'og tu mnan pa bya ba yi/ dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// 'khor lo rim pa bskor ba la// mnan pa'i sngags dang rgya gram bya// 'og tu gang yin rdzas lnga la// gzugs byas 'khor
los lce stengs mnan// sngags pa'i 'og tu yin zhes bshad// de nas so 'tshams bsrung ba mtshon cha rag log ces bya ba 'di gsungs so// gsang phye klu nag yod pa'i chu// dug khrag man tra nag po'i

rus// seng ge'i kha la 'khrul 'khor bri// so 'tshams dag tu khru gang mnan// bskal pa'i 'khor lo rang log 'gyur// sbyor ba bsrung ba'i 'khrul 'khor te// sgo gang phyogs sam de bzhin du// bzlog pur dbang
bskur phag thod mnan// rta gags sngags kyi dug mda' bzlog/ 'khrul 'khor rim pa don gyis ni// man tra'i nus pa de yis 'joms// bsrung bzlog go cha rim pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// snying zor nag
po'i rgyud las le'u lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dregs pa na ra gir ti yis/ gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las bton to// oM a kro rA dza du na sa du snying la

phril phril/ e kro rA dza tsit+ta na sha sha la rbad rbad/ ya ya rnal ma nri dza snying la kha thun mA ra ya rbad/ kro ma ri sha sha trag thun/ tsit+ta ma ra yA tri rbad/ sho ma ri rag shag kha baM/ tsit+ta tra ma rak+sha rbad/ srog te tri ma tri sha dza/

tsag re kha tri yak+sha dza/ kri tra ma tri ya ya dza/ dgra bo'i srog la rbad/ thuM ril rbad/ tsa khrag tsit+ta phyung/ nri srog hur thums dza/ nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ a mu ka du na nan/ sa du nan/ snying du nan/ pri du rbad/ kha thun rbad/

tsit+ta ni sha ku lu rbad/ mo ha ni shal dun dun/ khrag la hub hub dun khyer b+h+yo ni dza taM pa ya nan/ e ka du na bzlog/ ma hA du na bzlog sa ka du na bzlog/ tsa dur snying la bzlog/ sum tri rak+sha du na bzlog/ rak+sha ti

por du na bzlo/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka/ e ka pa ra hUM phaT/ e te pre ma sa na hUM hUM/ pra dod ka khra rak+sha hUM hUM/ oM ya be shaM tra be sham/ be shaM be shaM ru pe shaM kha thun b+h+yo/ ta pa li mu li du ru du hUM phaT/ karma tsan+ta mu

tri du ru du ru hUM phaT/ rak+sha mo du ru ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ e ka dza ti pa la ma sha dgra bo la phaT/ nag mo ra ma ti pad+ma ra ti ru ti re ma ti ha rbad b+h+yo/ oM ka ru na tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ ta ki tsa te tsi tsa te/ hu yaM hu ya/ hu

lu hu lu pu ru te pu ru te/ a mu ka me/ rak+sha rak+sha hUM/ tsa trag trag b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu dza/ trag trag a shug b+h+yo/ ru lu ru dza re rak+sha traka b+h+yo/ dgra snying la mA ra ya aM gu sha trag trag sha mA ra ya b+h+yo/ yaM khrag thun dgra snying

la rbad/ che ge mo'i srog a mo khaM rbad rbad/ thig ni cig med/ brgya chad gnyis zung srog khyer/ dbugs long ya tri ni ra zung rma tri bdud tri ni ra zung/ kro ma sha sha/ trag thun tsit+ta thun ni sha ku ru rak+sha thun ya ya

ding ding sa ma ya dza/ che ge mo a mu khaM sas stibs/ mes tshig/ chus bkur/ rlung yengs/ kha ri bal lhag sna ra yen tshe/ ri stibs ni ri khyer/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dz+wa ti ni dza dza/ rtsa ba yid bzhin

rin po che// las ni sna tshogs sbyor ba'i mtshon// rang bzhin stong nyid ngo bo'i lha// nus pa'i dkyin dang dug dbal mtshon// tshul nyid sgra drag 'bru mi gsal// yid la gsang zhing dbugs sgra lci// rtsa ba'i las

su de bzhin sbyar// yan lag so so mtshan nyid can/ ze sa kha 'du klu nag 'khrug/ rgyu thod spu gri sbab chen dang// sa gzhi ri rab skyom dang nad/ khra spyang gzan la bcum pa 'dra// lcags kyi tsha tsha 'phro tshul
gyis// bzlas pa yi ge rims bzhin bya// zhes gsungs so// snying zor nag po'i rgyud las sngags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas dregs pa chen po na ra gir tis/ bsam gtan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/
sngags kyi mtshon cha 'bar ba yul las rab tu 'phros pa'i tsakra 'di gsungs so// ting 'dzin tri la rdo rje'i sku// gshin rje yak+sha me dbal gyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal ba yi// spyi gtsug mkha'

lding rgyal po bsam// g.yon du sgrol byed yul gsal ba'i// gsang sngags 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// rdo rje khro gtum mang po yis// ba spu'i bu ga kun khyab ste// 'phros pas gdug pa nyal thag gcod// rtsa rgyud

'dul gyi bsam gtan yin// lha rgyud dril ba'i gsang sngags kyis// phra mo 'od kyi gzugs brnyan can// 'jam dpal yab yum bya khyung gi/ sprul pa dpag tu med pa yi// ze la khab 'du tshul dag kaM/ ma sa baM

la sbrang 'du bzhin// 'dus shing de nyid thim pa yis// bdag dang gzhan bsrung skyob pa yi// 'khor lo chen po yang dag bshad// bzlog pa'i dus na khro tshogs dang// ma ma srin mo mang po yis// rlung nag 'khrug
pa'i tshul dag gis// rbod gtong la sogs gzhan gyi lha// bskal pa'i rlung nag log pa ltar// bzhan gyi sbyor ba 'joms pa ni// bzlog pa'i 'khor lor yang dag bshad// dregs pa bdud dang gying btsan
gyis// gnod sbyin mang pos dmigs pa dgug/ ye shes sems dpa' khros pa yis// gnod sbyin yak+sha mgo dgu pa// zhe sdang 'khrug pa'i lus bcu rnams// snying dang rtsa bran dbang po 'joms// gsad pa'i

'khor lor yang dag bshad// nad dang mtshon che'i rlangs pa dang// dug dang spu gri dpal chen gyis// tsa rnams khyengs te lus srog gcod// mtshon cha dmag dang rang gnad du/ bskyed pa kha so'i 'khor lor

bshad// ri rab rdo rje gdan gyi mdzes// las kyi lha dang sngags dag gis// pho brang chen por bsam pa ni// mnan pa rdo rje ri rab bo// srod dang nam gung tho rangs dang// nyi ma gung la las bzhi sbyar// phyag rgya
sor bcu g.yon gdengs dang// bskum ste gnan dang g.yas pa gdengs// bsnol zhing gdengs pa'i pho nya yang// seng ge khyung dang rus sbal dang// stag gzig bcu yis gzhi sbyar// gsang ba'i las su de shes
na// las bzhi gtso ru yang dag smin// ces gsungs so// snying zor las le'u bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dregs pa chen po na ra gir tis/ mtshan ma rgyu rtsal gyi rus pa'i mthus/ bsdebs kyi grogs su drag

po rdzas kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di dag gsungs so// rtsa ba yan lag tshul dag gis// dril te sgrub dang rkyang pa yis// las kyi grogs su rdzas bzlog ces// sngags pa'i rdzas su yang dag bshad// phung khung bka' rten

rnying pa dang// nub phyogs grogs po phug rdugs sa// dug dang rme khrag sbrus pa'i er// ling ga dbang po dod pa dang// rigs dang mdzes ldan thod nag sbyar// lha dbye gnan cing gsad par sbrel// snya gnan
rang gshed 'bebs pa'i rdzas// gsad pa drag po'i rdzas su bshad// mahA rus sbal khog pa la// dbang sdud yi ge khrag chen bri// 'bru sna tshang ba'i gtor ma bca'// sha sna khrag snas rab brgyan

te// bzlog pa'i rdzas su rab bshad do// ga 'u'i bum pa'i pho brang du// gser dang zangs ma lcags su bcas// bsrung ba'i 'khor lor bcas pa dang// bsrung phur bsrung ba'i rdzas su 'gro// rme khrag gsum dang

snying sna la// snying gi yang snying bzlas pa'i thun/ kha so bskyod pa'i rdzas yin te// las kyi gtso ru de la 'dod// dar dkar rgya shog de dag la// gur kum la sogs gsang sngags bri// bri ba rgyan gyi 'khor lo

ste// mgul du btags na sbyor ba bzlogs// phung sa chu mig klu gnas chu// seng ge kha 'thab 'khor lo yis// gsang lam dgag pa'i rdzas su bshad// dug dang mtshon cha 'khor lo'i sngags// sbyor ba phag thod

rta gags kyis// dug mda' 'joms par sbyor ba'i rdzas// a mu ka yi rdzas lnga la// dug sna lnga dang phye ma lnga// bco lnga'i sbyor bas ngan pa non// ces gsungs so// pa la pa tra snying zor gyi rgyud las le'u brgyad
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dregs pa'i rgyal po na ra gir tis/ gsang ba'i rgyud 'khor la bsdams shing gtad de/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma ho rno dbal mtshon cha me// rab tu gsang ba'i

bka' rgyud lta// rtsa ba yan lag stong gi rgyud// snying po zer ba'i rgyud 'di dag/ rab tu gsang ba'i dregs pas zung// rdzas bzlog sngags bzlog gnyis su bshad// bsdebs dang rkyang pa gnyis su bshad// rdzas
la rten pa 'di lta ste// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// mchod rten rus sbal snying zor gsum// dril nas bsgrubs kyang 'gal ba med// bsrung dang bzlog dang mnan pa yang/ 'khor lo gcig gis grogs su

sbyar// gsad pa mchod kyi sbyor ba la// 'khor lo thod pa'i nang du bca'// rtsa sngags drod dang mthun par bzlas// drag sngags bdun pa bdun phrag bdun// nyin zhag bdun du bskor bar bya/ khri khri bar du gri

ba brgya// gsang ba'i lus su sngags kyis so// srod dang tho rangs nam gung la// phyi mi gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o// 'khor lo rdzogs dang mnan pa bya// de na thun sgrub zhag gsum bya// de yis dus mtha'
rtul bar byed// gal te grub par ma gyur na// sngags rnams bzlog cing dkrug par bya// spogs pa'i cho ga zhag bdun bya// 'gal byed brlag par smos ci dgos// rten pa rang gi bdud du 'bab// de dag zla ba
chung gi/ nyi shu gnyis nas dgu ru bya// tshes gcig mnan pa'i cho ga bya// brgyad pa zor kha g.yos pa dag/ dgra bo gnas pa'i phyogs su yang// gtor ma'i zor dang bcas pa 'phang// gnyen po phyogs dang
bstun pa gces// rta gags 'khrul 'khor bca' ba yang// phag thod bcug la sgo bsrungs te// phur pa dang bcas lto srog yin// seng ge kha 'thab dus 'tshams bsrun// mchod rten bca' ba ma
grub kyang// bdag nyid yak+sha gsal ba na// dam pa'i mchog tu 'di dag 'dod// bsrung log 'khor lo 'cha' ba na// 'khor lo rim pas gnas su bskor// phyir bzlog 'khor lo rgyab tu gdags// bsrung ba'i
'khor lo mgul du gdugs// ngag mnan rang gi 'og tu mnan// bsad pa gdug pa'i gnas su bskyal// 'khor lo bka' ba ma grub kyang// gsang sngags rim pas bzlas pas 'grub// gsang ba'i bka'
rgyud snying po ste// rang gshed gsang ba'i bka' rgyud 'di// bgrod pa thob pa'i stobs kyis bslang// 'khor gyi dregs pa pho mo dang// lha klu mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor la// gsang ba'i bka' rgyud ngas gtad

kyis// lnga brgya snyigs ma byung ba'i tshe// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'dzin pa la// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis byin rlob la// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i grogs kyis shig/ de nas 'dus ba'i 'khor dga' mgu yi rangs te/ dregs pa

chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// pa la pa tra gsang ba snying zor gyi rgyud las rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// pa la pa tra gsang ba snying zor gyi rgyud rdzogs so//// d+harma rgya mtsho////

rgya gar du/ d+ha dz+nyA d+ha b+ha ma ni mang hu du yak+Sha kan nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi srog tig/ pa la pa tra mchod rten nag po'i rgyud kyi yang snying zhes bya ba/ dpal dregs pa'i rgyal po na
ra gir ti la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ dpal dregs pa'i lha dbang phyug chen po/ dpag bsam gyi shing yongs su sa brtol bod kyi bum pa la/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzhal
yas khang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor gyi nang na dregs pa chen po gtsug phud nag po zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das dregs bdag chen po la zhus pa/ e ma ho/ dregs bdag chen po lha bdag gtso/ khyed kyi
dam tshig bdag la zhu// gang gis sngags pa dam nyams tshe// de yi thabs rnams ji ltar lags// bzlog bsrung mnan dang bsad pa dang// 'phrin las bcol dang sbyin sreg dang// thog ser dbab dang sa
blangs dbab// rims nad phyung gi dal kha bsrung// 'khor lo bca' dang khrag zor 'phang// sngags bsrung bdud dang bcas pa bsrub// bsad pa'i las rnams ji ltar lags// de dag bdag la bstan du
gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang// dbang phyug chen pos gsan nas ni// gtsug phud can la bka' stsal pa// nga yis khyod la bshad par bya/ khyod kyis shin tu legs par zung// dam tshig nyams pa'i
rmongs chen de// myur du gsad par bya ba'i phyir// bzlog bsrung bsad pa la sogs pa// de yi thabs rnams bstan par bya// zhes gsungs nas/ dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba'i ma hA krod+ha zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de skad ces gsungs so// oM e ka dur na bzlog sa ga dur na bzlog/ dza dur snying la bzlog/ rA dza dur na bzlog/ ma hA dur na bzlog/ sa ma ya dur na che ge mo
bzlog/ ces gsungs so// gtsug phud nag pos yang zhus pa// dregs pa'i bdag po lha bdag gtso// bsrung pa'i las rnams ji ltar lags// ces zhus pa dang/ brda cig mdzad nas bka' stsal pa// dam tshig
rang gi srog ltar bsrungs// man ngag mig gi 'bras ltar chongs// ces gsungs so// de nas gtsug phud nag pos bskor ba lan gsum mdzad nas/ bka' bzhin bgyid do// zhes gsol pas/ gnang nas
bka' stsal pa/ srog 'dus gsum gyis dus mchod bzlog ste bsrung// bzlog pa'i 'khor lo rgyab tu gdags shing bzlog sngags bzlas pas bzlog/ gsang sngags bzlas pas las rnams 'grub pas gsad
pa'o// mnan pa'i 'khor lor bca' zhing mnan pa'i sngags rnams bzlas pas thams cad mnan par bya'o// sngags pa nang 'gras byung gyur na// bzlog pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis yod de// mtshon cha'i 'khor
lo bskor mi dgos// bzlog pa'i 'khor los rbod gtong thams cad bzlog/ gtor de bzlog dang dril te bzlog kho rang rbod gtong kho nyid la// bzlog pa sngags dang bcas pa'o// oM a kro rA dza dur na sa dur

snying la hril hril/ a kro rA dza tsit+ta ni she be rbad rbad/ ya ya rnal ma rnal tri dza/ snying la kha thun mA ra rbad/ srog 'dus gsum gyi gsang sngags ta// sgrub dang dbang bskur dam pa yin// zhes bzlas pas drag
sngags kyi dmod pa yang bzlog par 'gyur ro// pa la pa tra'i rgyud kyi bcud bkol ba las/ pha rol gyi byad stems bzlog pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dregs bdag chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs

so// oM ka ru na tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ ta kyi tsa te/ byi tsa ste/ hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ pu ru te pu ru te swAhA/ oM ya man ta ka/ e ka pa ra na hUM phaT/ e te pre ta ya ras nan/ pra tod rak+sha nan/ e pa shaM/ pra pe

shaM/ ru pe sha kha thun b+h+yo/ ta la ta pa li ma li/ du ru du ru hUM phaT/ kar ma tsan+t+ra mu tri/ du ru du ru hUM phaT/ rak+sha mu ru mu ru hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM ka dzA Ti tsa pa li mi sha dgra bo la phaT/ nag mo re ma ti/ pad+ma mi ti/ ra ti re ti/

re ma ti ha rbad b+h+yo/ zhes bzlas na/ lha ma srin sde brgyad rbad do// dngos su bsgrubs kyang bdag la mi tshugs so// pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ bsrung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i sngags

gsungs pa/ tro ma ri sha sha trag thun/ tsit+ta mA ra ya tri rbad/ sho ma ri rak+sha kha baM/ tsit+ta pra ma rak+sha rbad srog te hra mi tro sha dza/ tsaka re kha re yak+sha dza/ tri ta ma ti ya sha dza/ oM a kro ma ma ri shad shad
trag thun/ tsit+ta mA ra ya thum/ ril ril/ khas khas/ yen yen/ sod sod/ pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ gsad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dregs pa'i bdag pos 'di skad gsungs so// hUM hri mA ra

ya sha ta traM pa sa ti swAhA/ sbub cig sbub cig/ this spu ra nan swAhA/ gnan sngags rgyun du drang ba/ oM du na nan/ sa du na nan/ trag tu nan/ snying du nan/ sri nu nan/ sngags pa snying du nan/ kha thun rbad/ a kro rA

dza dur na sa dur hUM/ sngags pa snying du nan/ ces gsungs so// pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ gnan pa'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang drag po'i 'phrin las 'di gsungs so// hUM/ dregs lha

chen po dbang phyug che// kun ma rA dza khro bo'i rgyal// gdug pa thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// sku mdog dmar nag me ltar 'bar// phyag na rdo rje'i tho chen 'phyar// bdud dang mu stegs thal bar rlog/ rnal 'byor
bdag la bsrung du gsol// de thugs kha'i hUM las sprul pa ni// sngags bsrungs nag mo mthu mo che// sku mdog dmar nag me lce 'phro// e ka dzA ti ral gcig ma// phyag na g.yu yi spyang mo rnams// dam la

gnas pa'i dgra lha mdzad// 'jig rten ma mo'i 'khor gyis bskor// dam tshig can gyi grogs mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas bstan pa snyigs ma yi// dam nyams dgra la rtags phyung zhig/ dgra bo lha la dbye ba/ oM tsa

nan mud nyud kha yug ti sde shig sde shig/ gram yal gram yal swAhA/ sngags bsrungs kyi yang snying/ oM tsa re yaM snying kha rag ra tri badzra dun b+h+yo/ oM me da ra lig snying kha rag rbad/ oM me da ra hri thum ril rbad/ 'uM

rbab/ rgyab tab/ t+yu/ nya/ ma/ ho/ na/ drag po bcu bdun dgu ru bsdus// gtor byed drag po'i yi ge ni// rna la gang 'gro 'brub khung nang// drag pos brabs na de bzhin 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// pa la pa tra'i
rgyud las/ 'phrin las dang sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dregs pa chen pos 'di skad gsungs so// gru gsum nag po'i dbus dag tu// ro bsregs mgal dum shing mched la// tsher ma can gyi

me spar te// ske tshe shangs tshe gu gul dang// phye ma gsum dang ling gar bcas// de dag bsreg cing sngags 'di bzlas// trag rag+sha sa ma ya snying ling sbud/ tsit+ta rak+Sha thun tsa b+h+yo/ oM 'ub che ge mo zhig rbad/ oM rgya rgya

che ge mo rbad/ ma ma che ge mo ba baM/ che ge mo hri ma ra ya rbad/ sa nam tri nal rgyug rgyug/ ma rag mo ka la yag mo rag mo/ nrir nrir/ dza dza/ zhes lan nyi shu btab la/ rtsa gcig bsreg go/ sbyin bsreg byas
pa'i thal ba ni// chu mig rta bgab can du gnan// ces gsungs so// pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas drag thog dbab pa ni// ga na gnas pa'i phyogs

su'o// gser sdud phyung la sngags 'di gdab// mu rag mo te guM na ga phruM shig/ e kar btsan bdud 'dril 'dril chems// ser ba dbab pa ni/ mi rkang sgyed por btsugs la/ ban d+ha mtshan ngan du brdeg pa ni/

Ni ra khug tsit+ta baM ril shag shig/ thab bslud pa'i thal ba dang/ mi rkang gsum bsgril la phyogs su dbo/ pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ thog ser dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// gzhan yang sa blang dbab pa

ste// de yi thabs kyang bshad par bya// skyer ba'i khram shing ring po la// zhing ngam bra bo bo yang rung// dkyil du sbas la drag pos gdug/ shin tu bskams pa'i sha tshil bsreg/ sngon dmar skud pas dkri bar

bya// de yi sngags ni/ badzra shar tsu 'byu yar 'bur bur ba/ saM laM twa laM mu niHyaM/ 'dzam gling nyi ma 'bum dgu srid gsum g.yo 'khrug mdzad// dam nyams dgra yul 'di ru sa bla phob// ces bskul na zhag

bdun nas sa bla 'bab par 'gyur ro// pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ sa bla dbab pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// gzhan yang gsungs pa/ mi yi rtsa di ma bdun la bu tsi ni byugs la/ rjes bdun gyi sar sbas/ oM bruM

hri hri traM/ zhes byin gyis brlab par bya'o// pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ mi nad phyugs nad bsrung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad du gsungs so// de nas yang 'khor lo bcas nas/ bsrung ba'i
'khor lo mdun du gdags// bzlog pa'i 'khor lo rgyab tu gdug/ gsad pa'i 'khor lo mchod rten 'og/ gnan pa'i 'khor lo mal gyi 'og/ ces gsungs so// pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bca' ba'i

le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang khrag zor 'phang ba ni/ mtshan ngan dum bu brgyad pa'i nang// rims khrag gri khrag mdzo yi khrag/ rgyu gzer nad ngan sna tshogs khrag/ sna tshogs pa'i ril bu dang// tsha

sna dug sna mngal khrag sogs// mthing nag dur gyis dril la sgrub// oM trag rak+sha ma ye ti/ dgra sha 'chong shig sha la za/ rnal phob nar ka/ ta g+han glo snying dkrugs shig/ ces bzlas te rtags byung ba dang/ dgra bo'i
khang khyim la brdeg go/ pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ khrag zor 'phang pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas ngan sngags kyi sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// dang por sngags bsrungs dgug pa'i thabs ni/ bdag

nyid che mchog tu bsgoms la/ srog gi snying po 'di gdon no// trig trig ser ser ku lu me ku/ khag ya shig baM myogs ha ta re li/ de nas bdud pho 'bod cing rbad pa/ snying kha rak+sha ga dun/ ya ga na sha rgyob/

tri thun/ kha thun/ bdud tri tsa ba la b+h+yo/ dun tri baM tri po la ya b+h+yo yaM/ trag rak+sha kha mun tra/ mu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rag mo te ke ma tsa tsa kha la b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ti b+h+yo/ trag rak+Sha kha la mu tra/ mu ru lu ru

b+h+yo hUM/ rag mo te keM tsa tsa kha la b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ti b+h+yo/ zhes snying dgug go/ sngags bsrungs bdud po dang bcas pa'i ngan sngags so// pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ sngags bsrungs bdud dang bcas te sgrub pa'i

le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsad pa'i drag sngags bstan par bya// trag rak+sha ma tsit+ta te kye ma b+h+yo/ thum 'bum 'dril/ kha yag zhung thun ma ra ya ri/ oM suM tri rak+sha b+h+yo/ nag

po kha la yan te sod/ bdud tri gyi ta sa ma ya b+h+yo/ rA dza ya srog shaM sha khyer b+h+yo/ baM khrag baM khrag ni sha ku ru rbad/ ta hul hul/ ba hul hul/ oM tar mo ta ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/
gsad pa'i drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas de'i tshe 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ gtsug phud nag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gtsug phud nag po'i 'khor rnams

kun// rgyud 'di shin tu gsang ba ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom// phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste// man ngag drag po'i rgyud 'di ni// yang tig bskol ba rgyud kyi snying// 'di ni shin tu sba bar gyis// ces gsungs
nas/ dpal dregs pa chen po cang mi gsung bar gyur to// gtsug phud nag po la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad yi rang ngo// pa la pa tra'i rgyud las/ gtsug phud nag po la rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi
pa'o//// pa la pa tra mchod rten nag po'i rgyud/ rtog pa phyi ma'i phyi ma/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i rgyud shin tu gsang ba/ rgyud kyi yang snying zhes bya ba'o// rgyud kyi bcud bkol ba

zhes yang bya'o// yang tig bskol ba zhes kyang bya'o// rdzogs so//// shu b+haM/ ba su d+ha ra bdag gis ni// bod yul dbus su sprul pas bzhengs gsol ba'i// dam pa'i chos skyong rgyal po gtsug lag khang// khyad par 'phags pa'i dbu rtse dbyar
gyi khums// zhag bdun bar du 'tsho ba'i zas med de// dam tshig dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang mjal// rgyud gsum gsang mchog rgyud dang ldan pa yi// srog tig yang tig gsang tig dang// drag sngags
bkol ba'ang dgos pa gang gces bzhi// srog gi rin du sangs rgyas nyid la gtad// rgya bod gnyis na gdams ngag 'di spyod med// ba su d+hA ra bdag gis ni// slob ma'i dam pa sangs rgyas la// dam tshig
mna' yis bsgags nas gtad// 'di man chod 'ga' tsam 'phel srid de// snga rabs gong du 'di las grags pa med// lta ba zab la dam tshig gtsang// sgrub la brtson la brtul zhugs che// de lta bu yis
bsgrubs gyur na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// snying po yang snying shin tu gsang// spyod pa 'phrin las shin tu gtsang zhing gab// thub na rigs rgyud 'phel bar 'gyur// bcam la 'phyar

bas gzhan spel na// 'dir ni tshe thung nad yang mang// bkra mi shis la khob mi gshin// de phyir snying gi dkyil du sba// mu stegs rnam pa bzhi'i rde'u gshig cing phung bar bya ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ pra ti ya man tra sa tsa tan tra ka ni ka/ bod skad du/ mchod rten nag po'i rgyud las/ pra khrid rnam pa gsum bstan pa/ dpal dregs bdag chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu
gsang ba'i gnas mchog gnas// dregs bdag lha yi dbang po la// drag po 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// gsang ba'i lung rnams sbas te gtad// skabs dang ldan pa'i dus dag la// 'khor gtsug dgu na

gus 'di skad zhus/ e ma ho/ dregs pa'i bdag po lha bdag gtso// thabs la mkhas pa'i thugs rje can// bdag cag the tshom gyur pa rnams// nges pa bskyed phyir bshad par 'tshal// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma

la// bstan pa nyams pa'i dus 'byung ste// gdug byed sbyor ba bzlog pa dang// dam tshig nang rme'i rme thabs la// bsrung dang bzlog dang gnan pa dang// gdul zhing bsad pa'i 'phrin las rnams// mchod rten
nag po'i rgyud dag las// pra khrid man ngag bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pa na ra gir ti des/ bsdams pa gnang ba'i brda cig mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// dregs pa'i tshogs rnams

bdag la nyon// lnga brgya tha ma'i dus dag tu// dam tshig nyams pa mang pa yis// rdo rje nang rme byed pa'i tshe// lta ba zab mo'i gdeng stengs su// 'dus pa'i lung gis rgyab rten bya// mchod rten nag po gtan la

dbab// gsang ba gsum gyis nyams su blangs// sbyor ba gsum gyis kha yang bskang// tha mar gsang ba'i rgya yis gdab// lag tu blang ba'i pra khrid ni// bzhi gcig lha ste bzhi gnyis phur// bzhi gsum sgo ste

bzhi bzhi phyogs// bzhi lnga dus te bzhi drug rdzas// bzhi bdun gzungs thag bzhi brgyad sngags// yang bzhi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi// bskyar te sprul pa rnam pa bzhi zhes pa// bzhi brgyad sum cu rtsa gnyis
dang// yang brgyad bzhi bcu tham pa yis// mchod rten nag po gtan la dbab// ces gsungs so// de nas yang 'khor gyi gtso bo gtsug gu nag gus 'di skad ces gsol lo// e ma ho/ dregs pa bdag
po thabs la mkhas/ lha rnam pa bzhi gang lags/ phur pa rnam pa bzhi gang lags/ sgo rnam pa bzhi gang lags/ phyogs rnam pa bzhi gang lags/ dus rnam pa bzhi gang lags/ rdzas rnam pa bzhi gang lags/
gzungs thag rnam pa bzhi gang lags/ sngags rnam pa bzhi gang lags/ phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi gang lags/ sprul pa rnam pa bzhi gang lags/ zhes rtsa ba bzhi bcu tham pa zhus so// dregs pa'i bdag

pos bka' stsal ba// gdug byed log lta 'dul ba'i phyir// rtsa ba bzhi bcu nyams su blang// dang po gzi byin bskyed pa'i lha// gnyis pa rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la// gsum pa 'du byed las kyi lha// bzhi pa gzu

dang dpang gi lha// phur pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni// bsrung zhing bzlog pa'i phur pa dang/ 'dzin pa srog gi phur pa dang// bdud du dbab pa'i phur pa dang// bsad pa las kyi phur pa'o// sgo bzhi zhes pa phyogs

bzhir ro// phyogs ni shar dang nub dang lho// dus ni srod dang nam gung dang// tho rangs nyi ma gung dus su// rdzas ni bsrung bzlog gnan bsad bzhi// gzungs thag dkar sngo dmar nag go/ sngags ni bsnyen pa

nye bsnyen dang// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa chen po'o// phyag rgya bzhi dang sprul pa ni// bsrung bzlog gnan bsad rnam bzhi'o// sbyor ba chen po tshang bas ni// ji ltar bsams pa'i don rnams 'grub// ces gsungs

so// mchod rten nag po'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba bzhi bcu tham pa bstan pa ste/ pra khrid dang po'o//// dregs pa'i bdag po na ra gi rti la// tsu gu na gus yang zhus pa// dregs pa'i bdag po lha bdag gtso// lha
bzhi'i sgom thabs ji ltar sgom// phur pa bzhi po gang la bgyid// sgo bzhi'i gdod thabs ji ltar gdod// dus bzhi'i las rnams ji ltar bya// rdzas bzhi ji ltar dgod cing bsag/ gzungs thag bzhi po ji ltar

bsgril// sngags bzhi bzlas thabs ji ltar bzlas// phyag rgya bzhi po ji ltar bsgyur// sprul pa bzhi po ji ltar bgyed// dregs bdag chen pos bka' stsal 'tshal// zhes lan gnyis su bskor te zhus so// dregs
bdag chen pos bka' stsal pa// lha bzhi'i sgom thabs 'di ltar sgom// gzi byin bskyed pa'i lha zhes pa// byin gyis rlob pa'i lha gsum ni// mchod rten rtog la bsgom par bya// btso ma gser gyi kha dog
la// dar dang rin chen sna tshogs brgyan// ral gri ut+pal bsnams pa ni// oM las bskyed pa sku yi lha// dkar 'tsher rgyan dang na bzar ldan// pad+ma mchod sbyin bsnams pa ni// AHlas bskyed pa gsung gi

lha// ljang sngon ni la'i mdog 'dra ba// rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs ldan// rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa ni// hUM las bskyed pa thugs kyi lha// dbang bskur ba yi lha lnga ni// gser btso'i mdog 'dra byang chub

brgya// 'khor lo dang ldan spyan dang bcas// oM las bskyed pa chos dbyings so// dkar ba'i mdogs las sa non can// rdo rje ldan pa ma kyir bcas// hUM las bskyed pa me long ngos// sngon po mchod sbyin rgyan
dang ldan// rin chen sangs rgyas spyan dang bcas// traM las bskyed pa mnyam nyid do// dmar ba mnyam gzhag rgya can te// pad+mar ldan pa na bza' can// hri las bskyed pa so sor rtog/ ljang bu

skyabs sbyin rgya can te// rgya gram lan pa sgrol mar bcas// a las bskyed pa bya grub bo// yum lnga phyag na bum pa bsnams dang bcas sgom// gnyis pa rtsa ba'i lha zhes pa// yak+sha che mchog spyi yi lha// bum pa

gzhal yas khang du sgom// sprul pa las kyi lha gsum ni// gshin rje nag po khros pa la// zhing dbyug dang ni thod pa 'chang// sbrul dang thod pa dur khrod brgyan// ma he'i gdan la brkyang bskum tshul// 'khor du yi

dwags bye ba 'bum// sngags bsrung nag mo khros pa la// tsit+ta dang ni sprul pa rnams// thod pa zhing dang glang chen brgyan// ro yi gdan la brkyang bskum tshul// 'khor du ma mo bye ba 'bum/ khyung chen nag po gnam
lcags las// rin chen 'bar ba gtsug na brgyan// phyag gis rdo rje 'bar ba gdug pa 'dzin// zhabs kyis gdug pa mnan zhing za// 'khor du klu gnyan bye ba 'bum// phur pa gsum la bsgom par bya// gzu
dang dpang gi lha zhes pa// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams// a las bskyed pa dang por ro// de yi phyi rim byang chub sems// rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa rnams// 'di las bskyed pa drangs med

pa'o// de yi phyi rim rang sangs rgyas// yi ge pra las bskyed par bya// phyi rim nyan thos tshogs bcas pa// thub drug nyid kyang ba las sgom// de yi phyi rim rgyal po dang// phyogs skyong la sogs lha srin

tshogs// legs nyes btang 'byed sna tshogs sgom// de ni gzhal yas nang du'o// phur pa bzhi po 'di ltar bya// bsrung zhing bzlog pa'i phur pa ni// shed shing seng ldeng skyer pa'i rgyu// sor brgyad gsum la rang

rang bsngags// bris te dbang bskur byas la gzugs// 'dzin pa srog gi phur pa ni// tsher can shing la khru gang tshad// dbu la khro bo'i zhal gsum dbyung// chu srin kha nas dbal stan pas// nyams pa spyir

gzir rang srog 'dzin// bdud du dbab pa'i phur pa ni// gdug pa'i phur bu sor bzhi la// sngags bris kho yi snying khar gdab// bsad pa las kyi phur pa ni// seng ldeng rgyu las sor bzhi pa// lho phyogs sgo ru

'brub khung gzugs// sgo bzhi gdod thabs 'di ltar gdod// mchod rten ri rab phyogs bzhi ru// shar sgo dkar la zlum par bya// byang sgo ljang la gru bzhir bya// nub sgo dmar po zla gam bya// lhor ni sngon po gru
gsum mo// re bzhi'i tshul du 'bur du gtod// sgo la bzlog sngags thams cad bri// dus bzhi'i las rnams 'di ltar bya// srod la rang bzhin bsrung bar bya// nam gung kho yi rbod gtong bzlog/ gtor de
bzlog dang dril te bzlog/ gtor ba rang gshed ngo shes gces// dril ba lha srin thams cad bzlog/ bzlog rdzas rnams la sngags shing brdeg/ sngags kyis sngags bzlog pa zhes bya// tho rangs
kho nyid gnan par bya// bla tshe lha bsrungs kho nyid gnan// dag gnan rang gi skabs dang sbyar// nyin gung kho nyid gsad par bya// nyungs kar la sogs thun brdeg cing// phur pa gdab cing mtshon gyis

gdab// drag por bsreg cing gnan par bya// phyogs bzhi'i skor thabs 'di ltar bya// phyogs bzhi'i shar nas byang du bskor bar bya// byang nas nub bskor nub nas lho// bskor zhi las bzhi'i sbyor pa bya// de
ni phyogs kyi phyogs bzlog pa'o// rdzas bzhi 'di ltar dgod cing bsag/ bsrung rdzas sku dang 'khor chos bcas// bum pa'i nang du dgod par bya// phur pa gsum ni mgul du dgod// bzlog rdzas pho rog 'ug

pa'i mda'// sna tshogs khrag dang nyungs kar dang// nyungs nag gu gul la sogs pa// sgo bzhi'i phyi rol dgod par bya// de ni rdzas kyi rdzas bzlog pa'o// gnam rdzas la cha'i sbal pa dang/ kho yi ling ga bcas

pa rnams// 'brub khung nang du gzhug par bya// bsad rdzas nyungs kar nyungs nag la// ske tshe bra bo tsha ba'i rdzas// til dang tsher mda' gzhu dang phur// rang gi g.yas su dgod cing bdag/ gzungs thag bzhi po
'di ltar sgril// bsrung ba'i gzungs thag dkar po la// ma log ma 'chus snyoms par bsgril// sku yi thugs khar rang gi lag/ bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' dang// lha nyid ye shes sems dpa'
gnyis// gnyis su med par bya ba'i phyir// 'od zer 'phreng ba'i 'phro 'du bya// bzlog pa'i gzungs thag sngon po las// log par bsgril te 'khor lo la// btag pa rang gi lag gis bzung// gnan pa'i
gzungs thag dmar po la// log dang ma log gnyis su bsgril// ling kha'i lce la btags te bzung// bsad pa'i gzungs thag nag po la// ling ga'i snying gar btags te bzung// bum pa'i 'og tu phyogs
bzhir btags// sngags bzhi'i bzlas thabs 'di ltar bzlas// dang po yi dam lha bsnyen bya// nye bsnyen 'dus pa gsum gyis bya// sgrub pa srog 'dus gsum pos bya// des ni rtags dang bstun te bya// de nas
rdzas kyi bzlog thabs bca'// sgrub pa chen po sngags dag ni// srod la bsrung sngags bzlas dus su// dge 'dun gro la 'dus pa ltar// dal zhing lha tshogs 'du bar bzlas// nam gung bzlog sngags bzlas
dus su// mkha' yi rlung nag 'tshub par ltar// drag cing gdengs dang bcas pas bzlas// tho rangs gnan sngags bzlas pa'i dus/ khra spyang gcan la bcum pa ltar// gdangs chung myur bar bya// gung la bsad
sngags bzlas dus su// mgar gyi tsha tsha 'phro ba ltar/ gtsub cing thung bar bzlas par bya// phyag rgya bzhi po 'di ltar bsgyur// bsrung ba rang lha'i phyag rgya 'di// ka ni'i phyogs su bstan cing

bsgyur// bzlog pa rlung tshub phyag rgya ni// dmigs pa'i phyogs su bstan cing bsgyur// gnan pa'i rgya gram phyag rgya ni// ri rab rmad du bstan te bsgyur// bsad pa mtshon pa'i phyag rgya ni// 'brub khung nang du bstan

te bsgyur// sprul pa bzhi ni 'di ltar dge/ bsrung ba'i sprul pa gsum po ni// byin rlon lha dang sprul pa dngos// de la grangs med sprul zhing bsrung// bzlog pa'i sprul pa rang rang bzlog/ dril ba gzungs sna

tshogs pa la// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par sprul// gnan pa'i sprul pa ri rab dang// dum ri la sogs sprul zhing gnan// bsad pa'i sprul pa mtshon dug nad// pho nya'i tshogs ni bye ba 'bum// sprul te gsad
pa'i las la sbyar// thabs kyis thabs bzlog bstan pa ni// sbyor ba nag po bcas pas so/ kho yi ting 'dzin gyis byas pa ni// bdag gi ting 'dzin gyis bzlog pa// chos sku nag po 'od 'bar ba'o// sbyor ba

'di dang ldan pa ni// lha dbang nyid kyang brlag par 'gyur// ces gsungs so// mchod rten nag po'i rgyud las/ thabs bzhi bcu bstan pa ste/ pra khrid dbu ma'o//// ston pa na ra gir ti la/ sprul pa tsu gu na

gu yis// snga ma la yang lan gsum du bskyar te zhus pa 'di ltar ro// e ma ho// dregs pa'i bdag po lha bdag gtso// ka ni nag po chen po 'di// phyi nang dmigs pa ji ltar bca'// lha bzhi dgos ched ji ltar
lags// phur pa bzhi yi dgos ched ji ltar lags// sgo bzhi'i dgos ched ji ltar lags// phyogs bzhi'i dgos ched ji ltar lags// dus bzhi'i dgos ched ji ltar lags// rdzas bzhi'i dgos ched ji ltar
lags// gzungs thag bzhi yi dgos ched ji ltar lags// sngags bzhi'i dgos ched ji ltar lags// phyag rgya bzhi yi dgos ched ji ltar lags// sprul pa bzhi yi dgos ched ji ltar lags// zhes lan gsum
bskyar te zhus so// dregs bdag chen pos bka' stsal ba// ka Ni nag po'i mchod rten nag po 'di// phyi nang dmigs pa 'di ltar bca'// phyi yi bang rim bzhi pa la// rin chen sna bzhi las grub pa// shar

phyogs gangs ga dkar po// lho ni bai TUr+Ya sngon po// nub phyogs pad+ma ra ga dmar// byang phyogs in+d+ra ni la ljang// nang gi gzhal yas khang du dmigs// 'og ni mun dong nag po la// 'khor lo mtshon cha'i 'khor

lo'o/ kho ni dngos su byad kyis bcings// rang ni sku dang ye shes ldan// ye shes me dpung klong dkyil na// 'khor du drag po 'dus pas bskor// bsrung ba go cha sna tshogs so// lha bzhi'i dgos chen 'di ltar
yin// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur bya// gzi byin bskyed pa'i dgos ched do// bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// rang gi 'dod lha'i ting 'dzin

no// las kyi lha gsum dgos ched ni// gshin rje pho rgyud bsrung zhing bzlog/ ma mo mo rgyud bsrung zhing bzlog khyung chen klu dang sa bdag go/ las rnams myur du bsgrub bya'i phyir// gzu dpa' lha rnams
bsgom bar bya// phur ba bzhi yis dgos ched do// rang nyid bsrung zhing sbod gtong bzlog/ de phyir phur pa gsum po dgos// nyams pa gzir cing rang srog 'dzin// de phyir yi dam phur pa dgos/ kho nyid
lcebs te gsad pa'i phyir// bdud du dbab pa'i phur pa dgos// las la the tshom med pa'i phyir// las kyi phur pa dgos ched che// sgo bzhi po la brten nas ni// bsrung bzlog gnan bsad dgos ched

che// shar nas rang nyid bsrung ba dang// byang nas kho yi sbod gtong bzlog/ nub nas kho yis bla tshe gnan// lho nas gsad phyir phyogs bzhir dgos// dus bzhi'i dgos ched 'di ltar yin// srod ni zhi ba'i

dus yin pas// bdag nyid bsrung ba'i dgos ched dang// gung la lha srin rgyu dus te// rbod gtong bzlog pa'i dgos ched dang// tho rangs bla mo 'khyam dus su// bla tshe nus pa sprul byas gnan// nyin gung tshe

srog nyams dus su/ kho nyid bsad pa'i dgos ched che// rdzas bzhi po yi dgos ched ni// bsrung ba'i rdzas la rten te bsrung// bzlog pa'i rdzas la rten te bzlog/ gnan pa'i rdzas la rten te gnan// bsad pa'i
rdzas la rten te bsad// gzungs thag bzhi yi dgos ched ni// las bzhi'i sprul pa ting 'dzin rnams// mi yengs phyir na gzungs thag gdags// sngags bzhi'i dgos pa'i 'di ltar yin// rang gi dam tshig gso

phyir bsnyen// lha gsum nus pa bskyed pa'i phyir// nye ba'i bsnyen pa bya ba'i phyir// las rnams mi 'grub med pa'i phyir// sgrub pa'i sngags kyi lha rnams 'grub// sgrub pa chen po'i sngags rnams ni// bsrung bzlog
gnan bsad rnam bzhi ste// bsrung ba'i sngags kyis bdag nyid do// bzlog pa'i sngags kyis sbod gtong bzlog/ gnan pa'i sngags kyis kho nyid gnan// bsad pa'i sngags kyis kho nyid bsad// bsrung bzlog

gnan bsad bsgrub bya'i phyir// phyag rgya bsgyur zhing sprul pa dge/ pho nya btang zhing bsrung ma bskul// ma nyes gsol zhing nyes pa bgrang// de la dam brdar gser skyems rtag/ mthun pa'i rdzas sbyin dam tshig

bstan// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bzlog sngags bcu dgu pa 'di gsungs so// oM ka ru na tsa le tsa le bzlog/ nA ga dun bzlog/ sa ga dun bzlog/ dza dur ting na bzlog/ ma mo rA dza yaM bzlog/ k+Shan trag

rak+sha ma bzlog/ rak+sha re ma ti bzlog/ sha na mu ru sa ma ya bzlog/ e ka du na bzlog/ sum tri rA dza ya bzlog/ rag mo glad tri tsa pa la/ rA dza ya bzlog/ oM a kro te ka shrI many+dzu sa ma ta ka ya

bzlog/ yaM ta sgyur/ thed khrel/ ba la di li bzlog/ ra dza dur na bzlog/ ma sha dur na bzlog/ rag+sha tri bor dur na bzlog/ si ngang tsa dur tsa ya bzlog/ sarba duSh+tan pa tsa ni/ ta ka ra tsa thed/ khros pa la thi li

bzlog/ bzlog cing bsad pa 'di gsungs so// tro ma ri sha sha trag thun b+h+yo/ e ka pa ra na hrid hrid/ dug kha tshe dug kha tshe b+h+yo/ oM a kro te ka shrI many+dzu/ ya man ta ka ha na ha na hUM/ ya ya bra bra ma ra ti ka la rU pa

sha rbad phye ni b+h+yo/ zhes pa bzlog sngags so// de nas bsad pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// nyungs kar dang nyungs nag gis brdeg go/ a kro rA dza dur na sa dur snying la phril phril/ a tro rA dza tsit+ta b+hi sha sha la rbad

rbad/ ya ya rnam ma tri dz+wa snying la kha thun ma ra ya rbad/ rag mo ni rag mo ni kha long tsit+ta rbad rbad/ dug ni dug ni rni kha long tsit+ta rbad rbad/ khyi kha long khyi kha long tsit+ta rbad rbad/ rtsa ti tsa ti tsit+ta rbad rbad/ nir ti nir

ti/ tsa ti mugs mugs/ thums thums subs ti ta tsit+ta rbad rbad/ snying kha 'dar yeng yed thums thums rbad rbad/ se kha lo/ mu kha long rbad rbad/ swAhA/ bsad pa'i rjes kyis brdeg par bya/ de nas bsrung pa ni/

mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje bya khyung du sprul pa'i sngags dang/ mkhyen rabs kyi bdag po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rjer sprul pa'i sngags dang thugs rje'i bdag po 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug ma mor sprul pa'i sngags dang gsum mo// oM ka ru na tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ ta ki tsi ti byi tsa te hu ya hu ya hu lu su ru ste su ru ste swAhA/ oM ya man ta ka e ka pa ra hUM phaT/ e te bre ta ya ras nan/

bra to da rak+sha nan/ oM ya b+he shaM/ ru be sha ka thun b+h+yo/ ta la ta pa li/ mu ling du ru du ru hUM phaT/ kar ma tsan+t+ra mu ti mu ru ti du ru du ru hUM phaT/ rak+sha mu ru mu ru hUM b+h+yo hUM/ e ka dzA Ti tsa pa la mi sha dgra bo la phaT/ nag

mo re ma ti/ pad+ma re ma ti/ ra ti ru ti re ma ti/ ha bad b+h+yo/ de nas gnan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// du na nan/ sa du nan/ snying du nan/ hri du nan/ kha sha thun rbad/ tsit+ta ni sha ku lu rbad/ mo ha ni sha la dun

dun/ khrag la hub hub/ dun khyer b+h+yo bri dza dza/ oM hUM a tri ma ri sha sha trag thun/ tsit+ta mA ra ya thun sho ma ri rak+sha kha hUM nan/ tsa d+ha ri sha ma ba ri khrag la dun dun nri sha ma ra rbad/ gnan cing bsad pa'i sngags
so// mchod rten nag po'i rgyud las/ dgos ched bzhi bcu tham pa sngags dang bcas pa bstan pa ste pra khrid tha ma'o//// de nas 'khor rnams la gdams pa/ drag po gdug pa 'dul ba yi// man ngag gsang
ba'i rgyud gsungs pa// dkyil 'khor bca' dang gsad pa'i thabs// lag tu blang ba'i snying gzer gsang// mchod rten bca' ba'i rtse mo gsang// lag tu blang ba'i pra khrid gsang// gzhan la
bstan par mi bya ste// lcags sgrog bu'i sems kyis bsdam// zhes gsungs te/ 'khor rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo// lag tu blang ba'i man ngag/ pra khrid rnam pa gsum du mthar gtugs pa'o// rdzogs

so//// bdag 'dra ban chung sangs rgyas kyis// gu ru ba su d+ha ra yi// rin chen thugs kyi klong brtol nas// dus ngan tha ma 'byung ba'i dus// rdo rje nang rme byung dogs te// man ngag snying po dam pa 'di// las
kyis 'tshams sbyar bdag la gnang// de yang bu pe dkar po tshad dang de ldan par// bdud rtsi dam pa blugs nas kyang// mgo la bzhag nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// dam tshig mna' bsgags snying gi

dkyil du gtad// las kyis 'jal ba'i bud+d+ha dz+nyA na khyod// 'dzam gling bod na bsod nams khyad par che// drag sngags khyad 'phags rdo rje nang rme 'di// bud+d+ha dz+nyA na thugs kyi 'akyil du sbos/ gzhan la bstan na bud+d+ha
dz+nyA na dam tshig nyams// rdo rje dmyal ba'i gnas su gshegs par mchi'o// gsang ba'i mtshan gsol rdo rje yaM dbang gter// rgyal po bka' khrims nyams shing bod khams sil bur gyur// bstan pa dam pa

bzhag pa'i gnas med kyis// dam tshig gtso ru bzung phyir gzhan la spel mi bya// gu ru ba su d+ha ras gdams pa'i drag sngags khyad par 'di// 'dzam gling bod du spel na ban chung rang kha sdig/ de skad gsungs
nas bka' yi rgyas btab pas// sgyu ma'i phung po 'di dang 'grogs nas sa yi gter du 'chi// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ shri tsan+t+ra guh+ya kar+m+ma sa mun+t+ra ha la tsa ma ri

yak+Sha tsakra kA la guh+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha yak+Sha 'khor lo nag po gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos

pa'i dus gcig na// lho phyogs gshin rje'i gnas rgya mtsho dug ri kha zhes bya ba na/ dug mtshon nag po rab tu 'jigs pa/ rlung nag rdo rje rgya gram gyis bteg pa/ rab tu khol ba/ nyam nga zhing 'jigs pa/ mun pa

chen po'i smag tu gyur pa/ dug mtshon rba tshad gting khol gyi nang na/ lcags kyi khang rom 'bar ba// bskal pa sbrul nag 'khyil pa'i pho brang na// bcom ldan 'das dpal ya man ta ka nyid/ khams gsum gdug

pa'i klu rnams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ drag po dpa' brtul chen po rngams pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rngam pa'i sgra chen po/ a la la'i gad rgyangs chen po bsgrags pas/ 'jig rten gyi klu thams
cad dang/ bdud dang/ gza' dang/ gshin rje dang/ srin po dang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad 'khor du 'dus par gyur to// de yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klu dang/ rtog pa
ye shes kyi klu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la sogs pa dang/ sa dang lam la gnas pa dang/ rang rgyud pa'i klu dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ gdol pa

can la sogs pa'i klu dang/ gnyan dang/ sa bdag dang/ dregs pa can thams cad kyis yongs su bskor te/ de yang snang srid thams cad 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ rgya mtsho chen po dang ba'i gnas chen po/ pho
brang sgo bzhi dang bcas pa'i gnas na/ klu rigs lnga dang bcas pa rig pa'i rgyal po gnas/ de dag 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas/ khams gsum dbang sdud dregs pa'i tshogs thams cad ma lus kun 'dus

te/ thams cad kyang phe rak+sha zhes bya ba'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad klu dang/ klu srin sa bdag dang/ klu bdun la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs par gyur to// de nas rdo rje snying po zhes bya
bas/ 'khor gyi nang nas bzhengs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang/ rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin dngos// lnga brgya'i snyigs ma byung ba'i tshe// gdug byed klu 'dul nag po

yis// mtshon cha las kyi 'khor lo dag/ bstan pa bsrung phyir bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje snying po che// chos kyi dbyings dang rang rig pa'i// ye
shes gnyis su med pa yis// sras mchog rig pa'i rgyal po yis// rtsa ba yan lag rdzogs pa yi// 'phrin las rim pas ngas bshad do// zhes gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha yi gsang
rgyud las/ le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas rdo rje snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// gdug byed bdag po mtshon cha 'di// gshin rje la sogs 'chi bdag sgrub pa gang// bsgrubs nas gsad pa'i las
mtha' bsdu ba ji ltar bsdu// de la yang dag rdzogs kyis nges gsungs pa/ khams gsum sems can ma rig shing dang 'dra// de yi bla srog 'chang bas gshin po'i rje// de nyid rig pa'i rgyal po'i gshed ces
bya// gshin rje la sogs 'chi bdag sems can kun la gnas// nyin bzhi 'khor los bdud bzhi rtsa srog gcod// nyams pa gang yin gshed ma srog la dbab// rgyu skar kun gyi gshed ma gza' chen
brgyad// gza' yi srog gshed gza' chen ra hu la// gza' spyang 'chi bdag sems can kun la gnas// nyams pa gang yin gshed ma srog la dbab// de nyid sgrub pa'i rim pa bshad pa ni// sku gsung thugs
kyi yon tan 'phrin las lnga// 'dzam gling klu rnams gshed mar rigs lnga'i klu// de yi gsher mar rig pa'i klu bdud che// klu yi 'chi bdag sems can kun la gnas// nyams pa gang yin gshed
ma srog la dbab// 'khor lo nag po gsang ba'i yang tig yin// klu bdud sbrul nag 'khor los bsgral ba dang// mdze nag las kyi 'khor los bsgral ba dang// sa bdag srog gi 'khor los bsgral pa

dang// sdig pa phung gshed 'khor los bsgral pa dang/ sbal nag sto sbyor 'khor los bsgral rtsa ba'i las// yan lag las la mang yang bka' rgyur 'dir// nA ga rak+sha klu la rang gshed dbab// nA ga yak+sha klu yi
nor bu sgrub// nA ga tsit+ta klu yi byad kha bzlog/ dug can klu la zas su dngos la gtad// dregs pa can la gshed mar gtad// klu mo'i tshogs la grogs su gtad// 'gran gyi dgra skal tshul du gtad// gsad

pa'i las mtha' brtul ba ni// tshad dang tshad med gang dag gis// pho brang chen po'i srang sgo dang// bya ra'i sa dang lkugs sa ru// 'chi bdag lto ba gshags la gtad par bya// thebs dang bzlog dang 'byam pa
gsum// 'gor dang rta rag log non 'gugs dang spogs// rig pa can gyis de shes bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha yi gsang rgyud las/ le'u gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo
rje snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bstan pa dam pa bsrung ba'i las mchog steng// nag po klu la nyams pa gtad 'dod na// 'dzam gling klu rnams thams cad kun// dbang du bsdu na gang gis bsdu// zil
gyis gnan na gang gis gnan// las la rbad na gang gis rbad// rdo rje 'chang gis nges gsungs pa// 'dzam gling klu rnams thams cad ni// dbang du rig pa'i rgyal pos bsdus// rtsa ba mi 'gyur byang
chub sems// bde ba chen po'i dbyings nyid nas// rang rig chen po'i pho nya ni// thams cad mnyam pa nyid ngang du// skad cig srid gsum dbang du bsdud// zil gyi sbrul nag chen pos gnan// chos sku nam

mkha'i ngang nyid las// longs sku 'bar byed khro bo'i sku// sprul sku rig pa'i rgyal po'i sku// nA ga rak+sha 'jigs pa'i sku// sbrul nag mgo dgu rngam pa'i zhal// nA ga klu yi gnyen por che// las la klu mo nag mos

gzung// srid gsum lto na yod pas na// 'khrul 'khor yum gyi lto na 'chang// ngan sngags yum gyi lto nas 'byung// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yis// rtsa ba spu gri 'dab sbyar bas// nges par klu rnams bran du
'khol// ces gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i rgyud las/ le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying pos// yang dag rdzogs la 'di skad gsol// gshin rje klu bdud nag po nyid//
nag po 'jigs pa'i gtum bag can// mchod cing sgrub pa ji ltar lags// yang dag rngam pas nges gsungs pa/ 'dzam gling klu rnams kun gyi gshed// nag po gel ba 'jigs pa'i

tshogs// gshin rje nag po dgra yi gshed// 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdud gcig po// gshed po 'chi byed 'di sgrub na// lum gsum mdo'am rtsi shing 'thug/ brag dang chu 'thab byang shar blta// klu srin mi bsgrungs

gnas phyin la// maN+Dal mnyam po yid 'ong la// dri spos sman gyis chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum ldan pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mdzes pa la// sgo dang sgo khyu bar khyams ldan// dbus su snum pa'i sa
dag la// ti pa tsa yi gzugs byad dgod// 'khor lo bzhi la klu bdud bzhi// rim pas yig 'bru dgod bar bya// zla gaM srod gshed rnam pa gsum// bar khyams sna tshogs klu yi rten/ khams pa'i bum pa mchu

'chang bar// klu sman sna tshogs 'o mas dgang// sna tshogs rdzas rnams tshogs pa dang// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// spros med mun pa lta bu nyid// rang nyid kun snang ye shes nyid// de las rgyu yi rnam par
ldan// dug chen ha la'i mdog 'dra ba// sngon dmar 'od chen 'phros pa gcig/ mdun gyi mkha' la gsal byas la// 'byung ba rims kyis gsal ba dang// phe sha gang du bruM zhes pas// bskal pa sbrul nag
'khyil pa'i klong// kun tu 'bar byed chen mo'i dbus// bag chags rgya mtsho'i gting khol 'gyur// rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus nyid na// sgo med lcags khang khang rom 'bar// sbrul nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas

khang// chu srin 'bar bas thog phub ste// rus sbal ya them ma them byas// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bar khyams ldan// gzas pa pho mo gcal du bkram// rlung gi me sbar rgya mtsho khol// gzhal yas lcags khang
gsal bar ldan// bskal pa sbrul nag 'khyil par gnas// rgyu yi yig 'bru rlung gis 'phangs// dbus su yig 'bru'i ngo bo las// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ste// sbrul nag 'khyil ba'i gzugs 'dra la// chu

srin dbu'am sdig pa'am// yang na sbrul nag mgo dgu bsam/ kha nas me yi phung po 'bar// spyan mig khrag gi skyin thang 'bab// dbu dgu phyag ni nyis brgya ste// sbrul nag zhags pa chen po dang// nad kyi rkyal

pa bsdebs shing 'thor// sbrul gzhug rgya mtsho'i gting du brkyang// sku ni ri rab ngos la brten// dbu ni bar snang yongs su 'phyo// phyag ni stong khams kun tu nyul// de yi thugs khar phe yig las// ye shes

sems dpa' 'chi bdag bsam// mdun du klu mo spyan gcig ma// ro stod mi la ro smad sbrul// sbrul nag 'bar ba'i ral pa la// mdze dang shu ba'i tsha tsha 'phro// mig nas rag+ta'i skyin thang 'khrug/ sna nas nad kyi
rlangs pa 'byin// zhal nas sbrul nag sbal pa 'gyed// g.yas 'khyud sbrul gyi zhags pa la// g.yon gyi nad rkyal phyogs bcur 'thor// de dang gnyis su med pa las// zla gam gsum la gnas pa
ni// klu bdud bgegs kyi glang po dang// sa bdag sbrul gyi rgyu ma can// gnyan mar glang gi mgo can no// 'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa ni// klu bdud rigs bzhi khro bo ste// rong nge 'jigs tshul gtso la

blta// bar khyams la ni rak+sha srin// klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag dang// dregs pa'i tshogs rnams 'du bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho dngas ma dug ri kha// las kyi rlung stengs khang rom nas// 'chi bdag khang rom

gshin rje rnams// drag po sngags kyis spyan drangs la// las kyi 'chi bdag 'khor bcas la// sbrul dang sngal ba'i sha tshil gyis// dud pa gtang zhing gtor ma sbyin// klu sman sna tshogs gtor ma btang// rtsa ba

rgyun gyi gsang sngags bzlas// de tsho grub pa'i mtshan ma yang// 'bri rog g.yag rog ro nye dang// mdze can pho mo byung ba dang// mon dang sbrul nag byung ba dang// sbal pa nag po la sogs pa// 'od dang sgra

dang gzugs brnyan dang// sdug dang mi sdug cho 'phrul dang// rdzas dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang// byung na las la rbad par bya// 'phrin las sbyor ba dug ma grub// dpal zla gsang nag po dug ri kha'i gsang

rgyud las/ klu bdud nag po sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// 'chi bdag nag po ti ba tsa// gsang ba sbal nag lto bcos kyis// nyams pa klu la gtad pa gang// las kyi dkyid pa ji

lta bu// yang dag rdo rjes nges gsungs pa// sbal nag sku yi sgrub pa ste// rgyud kyi dmod pa gsang ba'i don// sbal nag 'khor lo gab pa'i ste// nges par gtan la phab pa ste// gnyan ra 'dug pa'i bde gnas

su// maN+Dal mnyam pa'i yid 'ong la// gru bzhi rgya chad rtsi sman byug/ steng du gru gsum nang ma la// klu yi rdzas kyis byug par bya// klu gtor khyad par rdzas la bya// gza' bdud dang ni srog bdag la// gtor ma
bshos bu gser phud bsham// de ltar bsham pa kun rdzogs nas// rgya shog dang ni ka ri ka/ gtsang ma'i ras la 'khor lo bri// sbal pa dkar gnag lto ba ru// a mu ka yi gzugs bris la// klu yi ngan sngags

rim pas bskor// bcugs gzhug skud pas kha sbyar la/ khram la gdab pa'i las kyang bya// ga 'u 'brub khung phur pas bstod// rtags dang sbyar la gtad pa tsam/ kha sbyar yi ge phyir bstan la// drag po sngags

kyis brab par bya// tha ma rdzogs dang klu la gtad// dang po stong pa'i ngang nyid las// rig pas yang ni yi ge phe// de las gyur pa'i klu bdud che// nag po 'jigs pa bsgom par bya// de las spyan drang mchod phul

la// gsang sngags yi ge rim pas bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu nag po gsang ba'i sngags de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya hUM dzA nA ga kro d+hi shwa ri hUM dza nA ga du na du na

he li he li nA ga 'dus 'dus/ sa ma ya dza/ bod pa'i sngags su shes par bya// dgug pa srog gi snying po la// bye ba rjod na las rnams 'grub// a sha nag po ti pa tsa ya nA ga kro d+hI shwa ri traM shaM rbad bu gu rak+sha rbad/

ti ba tsa pa tsa kha la baM sha truM sha ma ra na dza dzA/ srog gi snying po shes par bya// rno mar las kyi spu gri 'di// bye ba brjod na kun kyang 'chi// dug gi spu gri kha 'bar yin// nag po baM tsi tsi rgyas/ drag thur snying la gul/

myags myags rtsa bzhi bskum/ shan shan srog la shan/ thur rbod rbad swAhA/ de ltar sgrub pa kun rdzogs nas// rigs bzhi klu'am gdol pa'am// dmangs rigs nag po dag la gtad// pho brang rgya mtsho yin bas
na// srang mgo dag tu gtad par bya// rigs bzhi gdol pa gar gtod kyang// 'chi bdag lto ba gshags pa gces// thebs pa'i dus la gtad par bya// ldog dang 'gyangs pa dus yin pas/ mkhas pas spang
byar shes par bya// thebs dang ldog dang 'byams dang 'gor// thebs na gtang rag gtang bar bya// log na shi sa bstan par bya// 'gor na gnyan sa bskor bar bya// gtad dmig yang yang drang bar

bya// 'byams na dgug pa'i las bya ste// dngos dang yid dang sprul pa gsum// ma nor rgyu dus shes par bya// mi ldog pa yi 'brel pa lnga// phyi mig mi blta cho mi brjod// dri ma mi btang grib ma spang// drag po
gza' yi gdong mi bzlog/ nyi zla phang du blang bar bya// yang nas yang du 'phrin las bcol// klu bdud nyid dang sprul pa dang/ gza' dang srog bdag bskul bar bya// de yis nges par brlag par

'gyur// dpal zla gsang nag mo rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ sbas nag 'khor lo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// rgyud kyi snying po las kyi gcong// mdze nag las kyi 'khor lo

dag/ bca' ba'i rim pa ji lta bu// sngags rnams bzlas pa gang dang gang// drag po thun gyis ji ltar brdeg/ tha ma gtad dang khram gyi las// rdzogs par bstan pa ji lta bu// yang dag rdo rjes nges gsungs
pa// bstan pa dam pa bsrung ba'i phyir// gnyan ra gdug pa'i dben gnas su// maN+Dal la sogs bsham pa dang// mdze nag las kyi 'khor lo bca'// brkyang pa dang ni sbag pa dang// sum sbrel dag dang rnga
gling dang// bdun bsgrags la sogs rim pa bstan// rab tu kho yi pha mes la// 'bring du mdze can nag po la// tha ma rabs chad nag po shes// gtad pa'i rgyu ru yang dag bshad// de nyid gzugs kyi phung po
la// gtad pa'i rgyu ni tha ma lnga// gtad dang khram dang bse byang dang// sbal nag dang ni sbrul nag go/ A kar sha ya u nan// phe laM shag shig nri yan/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza rbad/ nag po klu yi gsad

sngags te// dug thun mdze nag las kyi thun// a shan nag po ti pa tsa ya/ dgra bo kro d+hi shwa ri te/ shan rbad/ phu shun thun rbad ku rag sho rbad/ ti pa tsa ya dza la dza la/ dgra bo tsi tsi dza la kha yan hUM sho/ che ge mo mA

ra ya dza dza/ phur thun nag po las kyi thun// srog gshed las kyi bsad pa sngags// nag po tri rak+sha/ dgra bo'i snying la sbra thum ril mA ra ya dza/ dgra bo'i bla mA ra ya khug/ bdud ro sha phra ma ya/ dgra bo'i snying nag

po trag sha khug/ thum ril rbad/ khrag 'byung po mA ra ya dza/ phram phraM nag po tI pa tsa ya/ trag sha rol khug/ dgra bo snying sha ro la rbad/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ gtad dang khram gyi las bshad pa// bstan pa 'jig pa'i

a mu kha// stan gyi rdzas drug 'dra 'bag bya// nag po klu la gtad par bya// gtad pa mi 'chor gzer gdab pa/ khraM dmar btab la khraM gnag ni// rdo rje khraM 'debs sngags dang sbrag/ khraM dkar btab la khrag nag

la// gshin rje khram 'debs sngags su sbrag/ khram sngon btab la khram gnag la// klu yi khram 'debs sngags dang sbrag/ de yi gsang sngags 'di lta ste// oM badzra ni dung du ne du ne/ dung shing khram khraM shi ma ra ya

dung du/ ru ka ni dung dung du ne du ne/ dung shi khram khraM shi ma ra ya dung du// hUM ya ni dung du ne du ne/ shi khraM khraM shi mA ra ya dung du/ rak+sha ga ni dung du du ne du ne/ dung shi khraM shing du mA ra ya dung du/ nA ga sni dung du

du ne du ne dung shi khram khraM shi mA ra ya dung du/ ra'i ni dung dung du ne du ne du dung shi mA ra ya dung du/ khraM la gdab pa'i sngags te/ khraM gyi bdag mo dug gi sngags rtsi ba ma dag la shes par bya'o// rabs chad mon nam mdze
can gsum// gcig la rdzogs par bya ba ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ drag po 'khor lo'i ngan sngags/ nag po klu yi dug mda' 'di

gsungs so// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya nA ga rak+sha yak+sha yu shan te yu nA ga ya ni/ ku ru tsa ya/ yaM yaM mA ra ya dza dza/ rbad ya rbad ya/ nag po ti pa tsa ya na ga rak+sha dza la bi ra dza pa la/ du shan che ge mo la ma ra ya rbad yaM

yaM/ oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ na ga rak+sha yak+sha kha yan/ hUM ya hUM ya nri dza/ tsakra thums thums/ rbad ya rbad ya/ oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ sA b+ha ru pa tsa la phe shan hUM/ oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rak+sha yak+sha tsakra tsakra rbad

rbad/ oM hri Sh+tI bi kri tA nan/ hUM phaT phaT/ ma ra ya/ yab dang yum gyi 'khrul 'khor dang// steng gcod dang ni 'og gcod dang// me dang rlung gi 'khor lo ste// rkyang pa sbag ma las kyi sdebs// mdze nag las kyi
'khor lor 'dod// de ltar sgrub pa kun rdzogs nas// bsad pa'i sngags la bskyod pa'i thun// gzir nga phur ba'i las kyang bya// klu yi mig bltas ma mthong dang// rang lus 'khrig dang sbring dang
'gul// rkang 'khor bas ldags byung ba dang// myur du gtad pa'i las la 'jug/ thod 'khor gshin rje'i lto ba dang// glang ru srin po'i lto ba dang// ra ru btsan gyi lto ba dang// sbrul nag klu yi lto ba
dang// sbal nag sa bdag gi lto ba dang// sdig pa gnyan gyi lto ba dang// spyang thod gying gi lto ba dang// rus sbal srin po'i lto ba brgyad// nA ga gnas pa'i sa ru gtad// rigs bzhi klu la gtad pa

dang// gdol pa nyid la gtad pa'o// rig pa can gyis skabs sbyar la// gtad bya lam dang dgra la bya// pho brang rgya mtsho dang ba ste// chu mig klu yi srang sgro yin// de la gang du gtad kyang ni// klu yi khyim mgo

lam srang yin// ces gsungs so// de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye ma rdo rje 'chang rgyal ba// pho brang de ltar yin pas na// nA ga gnas pa'i chu mig la// rigs tshad mnyam pa ji ltar lags// lus tshad
'jal ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdo rjes nges gsungs pa// klu yi lus la nges med pas// lus tshad 'jal ba don med de// ci phyir ri bo nyungs 'bru'i gzugs// de phyir bstan pa bsrung phyir yang// rnal
'byor yid kyis sprul pa ltar// gang ltar mos pa las byed pas// sngags 'chang lus kyi tshad kyis gzhal// rigs bzhi las byed sgo ba'i tshul// bsod nams lus tshad rim pas yod// rgyal rigs dag la
'dom bdun te// pho brang grong khyer mdun sa la// 'dom ni bdun bdun yod pa yin// bram zer klu la brkyang khru bdun// rje rigs klu la bskum khru bdun// dmangs rigs la ni mda' bdun te// gdol pa la

yang khru bdun no// pho brang grong khyer mdun sa la// rim pas shes par rig par bya// tsag tsag tsig tsig mig gi chu// chu mig lkug pa sna yi chu// drag po skad 'don kha yi chu// gsal la dngas pa snying gi

chu// res drag res zhan mtshan ma'i chu// rgyal po bram ze rje'u rigs dmangs// re re la yang lnga lnga ste// klu rigs nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// lo zla dus tshod thun pa phyogs// rtags la rgyal rigs gtan la dbab// nges
pa'i las de rdzogs par bya// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ mdze nag las kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// mdze nag las kyi 'khor lo
yis// gsang ba'i sbyor ba de ltar na// klu bdud sbrul nag 'khor lo yis// bsad ba'i sbyor ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdo rjes nges gsungs pa// klu sbrul nag po bsad pa yi// dkyil 'khor rim pa 'di lta
ste// gnyan ra 'jigs pa'i sa dag la// dkyil 'khor bcas te klu rdzas byug/ dbus ni gru gsum zla gaM dmar// pad+ma bzhi ldan sbrul rigs brgyan// thod 'phreng ldan pas sgo ni mdzes// kun tu

sbrul gyis rnam par rgyan// shing sbal sa yi ga 'u 'am// pha mes thod pa mnan pa'i rdzas// rabs chad mon dang mu su ra// dag dig glen pa bkra mi shis// gshags la 'khor lo bri bar bya// klu sbrul nag po

'jigs pa la// lcags ru rab tu rno zhing 'jigs// lag na sbrul nag zhags pa bsnams// lto bar 'khor lo bri bar bshad// yang na thod pa'i phyi ru bri// me rlung las kyi 'khor lo rdzogs// brnag pa'i rjes la

gos dum skra// dri ma chu dang thigs pa rnams// rak+tas sbyar la bri bar bya// snying khar srog gi yi ge ste// ming rus bla dgas rdzogs bris la// gdug pa'i sngags kyis bskor bar bya// de nas sngags pa bdag nyid
ni// stong pa'i ngang las yi ge phe// de las sbrul nag mgo dgu pa// lcags ru 'jigs la nam mkhar sleb/ kha rlangs gdug pa sbrul du 'khyug/ de ltar bdag nyid yang dag sgom// gzas pa sngon du gyur pa
dang// srog la 'khor lo bskor byas la// byang phyogs gdol pa'am// yang na dmangs rigs gang yang rung// nag po gnas par nges gtad na// klu sbrul nag po nges par 'ching// de nas bcom ldan 'das/

klu sbrul nag po'i sngags 'di gsungs/ oM nag po ti pa tsa yaM/ nA ga go sho che ge mo/ hi gu laM phes shan phos shig shig chuM chuM hu yaM hu yaM/ klu nag po mgo dgu pa dgra bo ma ra ya dza/ nag po tri baM tsi tsir la tsa tsur tsi

ra tsi ra/ be ra ru shon che ge mo laM ya/ nag po ti pa tsa bo tsu ta raM/ tsi tra ru kha lag sho che ge mo yaM yaM/ a shaM nag po pa tsa pu/ nA ga dgra bo kro tI shwa ri ti shan rbad phu shan rbad/ ku ra ka sho rbad/ ti pa tsa phu/ dzaM laM dzaM

laM/ kho yan/ hUM shong/ che ge mo mA ra ya dza/ oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ dgra bo'i glo snying mA ra ya dza/ klu sbrul nag po nA ga snying la khrum phu ye dza/ nag po tI pa tsa ya dgra bo'i glo snying la ya/ rbad bu ye thuM ril ye dza/ na

ga dza la/ dzi dgra bo'i snying la raM raM raM ha la dus rbad/ nA ga dza la dzi dgra bo'i snying la baM baM baM dus ma ra ya/ nA ga dza la dzi la dgra bo'i snying la laM laM laM dus/ nA ga dza la dzi hA la tsa ma ri/ dgra bo'i snying la yaM yaM
yaM 'dus/ dgu 'dus nag po snying thur dgra la b+h+yo/ stong phrag gsum dang gnyis dang ni// gcig tu bstan pa sngags kyis bsdebs// las kyis lus srog 'byed pa dang// grangs su mangs na kun kyang

'chi// gnad brdeg las kyi spu gri de// 'byung ba 'khyugs pa dum re gdags// nA ga rA dza tsit+ta shogs/ chings chings/ shig shig chuM chuM rul ya/ stir ya mAr ya dza dzA/ cis ni ling ka bskor bar bya// dpal zla
gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang ba'i rgyud las// klu sbrul nag po'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis/ klu bdud sbrul gyi las de ni/ sdig pa nag po gsang ba'i phung
bshig dug mda' ji ltar lags/ sgrub pa brtsam pa ji ltar lags// cham la dbab dang gtad gnan dang// gnad la dbab pa ji lta bu// yang dag rdo rjes nges gsungs pa// rgya mtsho 'gram mam klu gnas

sar// gru gsum mthing nag dal brtsigs la// mdze can pho mo'i thod pa gshags// sa mar byugs la rgya skyegs kyi// 'khor lo'i rtsibs drug mkhas pas bri// 'khor lo klu glang rwa la bskyang// ling ga mdzes

ldan thod par gzhug kham pa skra shad gos dum la// mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la// 'bru sna rin chen sna lngas byug/ nag po klu yi lto bar bzhag/ de nas mchod pa'i rdzas bsham pa// lung pa bdun dang
dgu yi chu// dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang// 'bru snas brgyan pa'i b+ha ling dag/ dkar dmar gnyis su shes par bya// ra hu la dang srog bdag la// gser skyems gtor ma bshos bu gtong// bco brgyad sngags
kyis spyan drangs la// 'bru dgus rnam shes gzugs la 'ching// so bzhi sngags kyi gnad la dbab// sdong sngags drug gis 'phrin las bcol// drag sngags bdun pas brlag par bya// gzer bzhi las gnyer
yongs su gtad// gal te grub par ma gyur na// gdug pa'i shing la hoM byas te// nag po klu yis gsad par bya// bram ze nag po'i ngan sngags kyis// drag po las kyi sbyin sreg bya// thal ba nag po gnas su

sba// de nas bsham pa kun rdzogs nas// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po las// hUM nag dug gi tshul 'dra las// nag po 'jigs pa rngam pa'i zhal// sbrul nag lus la sdig pa'i mgo/ phung shing nag po ha la'i

sdong// lhang lhang tsher tsher skad ngan gyis// tshangs pa'i gnas chen man chad kyis// skrag cig 'gyel ba'i phung gshig mgo/ klu mo nag mo hab sha de// bud med lus la sbrul gyi gzhug/ lag na nad kyi rkyal

pa thogs// srog gshed drug dang bcas pa ste// gshin rje nag po stag mgo can// klu bdud sbrul gyis rgyu ma can// btsan dmar shu do zhags pa can// bdud kyi dgyes la 'dzum med pa dang// gying chen 'byung
po'i ded dbon dang// ma mo las zor 'phen ma dang/ khram shing thogs shing rngam pa'i zhal// bskyed la mchod dang 'phrin las bcol// las kyi bya ba rdzogs pa dang// nag po klu la gnad par bya// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa nag po gsang ba'i ngan sngags 'di gsungs so// nA ga du na nA ga shan du he/ he li he li/ nA ga rA dza a pe sha ya a/ oM pad+ma nri dza/ shang kab la ni dza/ dgra bo dam pa ya ni dza/ ga
la ge'u phu ru dza/ mi 'di klu nag po khyod la do brdo bar gda' 'o// 'di khyod la ko long gsal bar gda' 'o// 'dis ni khyod kyi gnas 'phrog par gda' 'o// 'di la nad sna tshogs thong zhig swAhA/

oM nag po ti pa tsit+ta la rgyob/ trag thur snying la phur/ snying gul gul/ myags myags rtsa bzhi skums/ shan shan srog la thur thur srog sod swAhA/ ya ma ra dza nag po dgra snying la ya ya/ gshin rje nag po dza thur dgra

la b+h+yo/ nA ga keM tse dus dus/ dza thur dgra la b+h+yo/ a be she he thum he thum/ dza thur dgra la b+h+yo/ nag po kha thun tra de chod/ dza thur dgra la b+h+yo/ dzA thur snying la thur snying la yaM/ badzra sa du snying thur dgra la b+h+yo/ dza thur

snying la yaM/ ma snying thur dgra la b+h+yo/ nA ga shan ting dun sibs/ nA ga rA dza nan/ nA ga mi ra rbud/ shan ti shan tu tshubs/ nag po o ra log sham/ nA ga dun dus gyen gyen/ nA ga sha du ya ya/ tsubs tsubs du sha

rbud/ rtags kyi drod rtags byung ba na// nA ga gnas ba'i sa phyogs su// drag po gnas kyi klu la gtad// pho brang rgya mtsho'i srang sgo ru// gang du gtad kyang 'gal ba med// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri
kha'i gsang rgyud las/ sdig pa phung gshigs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying po yis// las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba yis// klu bdud gcig pa zhes bya ba// sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo

gang// de la nges par yang dag gsungs// yak+sha nag po 'jigs byed la// sa bdag gdug pa sgrub byed na// dang po bdag nyid bsrung pa ni// rdo rje gtum po sgom pa'am// yang na sbrul nag chen po la// chu srin

gdug pa'i mgo bo can// nA ga rak+sha klu yi bdud// de yi snying la gnas pa yang// dung gi bya khyung gser mig 'khyil// gnam lcags rdo rje sen mo 'bar// de ltar bsgom par bya ba'am// sngon du bya khyung bsgom

par bya// drag po'i dus su de nyid men// sgrub pa'i dus su bsgom bya ba// lcags kyi pho mo nag mo la// lto 'phye 'jigs pa'i dam shi zhon// lto 'phye sbrul gyi mgo bo can// sbrul gyi gzhug ma rab tu 'khyil// mi yi

lus la lag pa gnyis// g.yas na sbal nag rgyal mtshan 'phyar// g.yon na sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi 'phyar/ kha rlangs khros pa sbrul du 'khyug/ gzas pa po yi skye la 'khril// ma he dmar po'i steng du bskyon// las
kyi rlung gis rgyab nas phul// bdag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang// bdag gi dmigs pa sbrul gnyis khos// dmigs pa'i mgo bo khar bcug nas// ji ltar stobs kyis mkha' la lding// snying las khros pa'i 'od

dpung las// klu bdun nag po zhes bya ba// mi lus sbrul gyi 'jug ma can// lag g.yas mtshon gyi rkyal pa thogs// mtshon gyi char ba de la 'debs// g.yon gyis nad kyi rkyal pa thogs// nad kyi dbal yang de
la 'bebs// de ltar gzas pa'i dgra bo de// bdag gi drung na nyam thag nas// shin tu 'dar zhing bred par sgom// de nas klu yi gnyan po ni// sna tshogs sman gyi gtor ma ru// dkar gsum

mngar gsum arga bsgreng// mkha' 'gro sgro la brid cing bsten// klu shing rgyang bu dngul chu bsog/ dang po klu la snyan par bya'o// de nas klu la snyan par bya'o// de nas klu la mchod pa dang// dam la btags pa'i

sngags kyang bzlas// dmod pa dug mda'i gsang sngags la// sa ya brjod na kun kyang 'chi// de ni ngan sngags ngo bo ste// bye ba brjod na gdon mi za// 'bum phrag brjod na 'chi bar 'gyur/ khri khrag gis kyang

sbyor ba rdzogs// de nas bsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// mi skra ra bal khyi bal dang// bya sgong sbal pa'i sha dang ni// tsha dang ba glang mkhris pa dang// ske tshe dang ni ram bu'i phye// bsreg pa'i sol ba de dag la// ri lu sran

ma tsam byas na// de la sngags shing go gon la// mgo la mkha' 'gro'i sgro dag shis// shar sgo nub byang phyogs dag gis// gang du kha bltas khyim du yang// de la sngags shing 'khyam du gzhug de dag ngan sngags

skyob pa yin// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// dar dkar gro ga shing shun la// nyams pa'i gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// rten gyi rdzas lnga rdzas la sbyar// yan lag rigs bzhi sbrul gyis 'khril// snying la sbrul nag
ba bri// nad dang mtshon cha sna tshogs bri// zangs lcags 'khar ba de dag la// sbal pa khog stong byas ba'am// yang na sa'am shing la bya// nang du dgra gzugs bcug nas kyang// la cha kham pa'i ga 'ur

gsal// la ca kham pa'i khug pa ru// klu yi nor brgyad rtsal bar bya// ga 'u'i phyi rgyab dag tu yang/ khyi mo nag mo'i sna khrag dang// cog la'i khu ba dmar po dang// ro bsreg thal ba spyin sbyar la// byugs shing

tshad bya khyer la yang// tsha grang 'byung ba'i sgra byung tshe// mis ma tshor bar khyim nang du// sbyar ba mkhas pas gzhug par bya// de nas yang dag nges bshad pa// dur khrod ras sam dri rgod min// gtsang ma'i ras
sam ka ri ka/ mkhas pas 'khor lo bris byas la// ling ka dang bcas thod chen gzhug/ byang phyogs gdol ba'i khyim du gzhug/ des ni rtsa rgyud rlag par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ sku

gsung thugs rdo rje las/ sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo'i ngan sngags 'di dag 'thon to// dza ye phu bi dza ye phu/ tsi ti tsi ti phu/ tsit+ta ang ke phu/ na na le phu shang ka ru te phu/ ku lu ud ka te phud/ gra he sha ra ya phu/

sa ma ye phu/ nA ga phu nA ga rA dza phu dz+dza/ oM yo ga rA dza yo ga rA dza bri te/ g+ha g+ha kha kha nA ga duM pa le/ nA ga rA dza a nan ta swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ oM sha sha shu shu shu ma li pa/ kyi tsa kyi ti hu ya hu ya/ hu li hu li swAhA/ nA ga hU ya

ba ling dung se sa ma ya/ a ti ba che ge mo/ thun sod zung nA ga shig/ ro la thib thib/ daM shi ma ma ma hA yag+sha nA ga hu ya ba ling dung ba/ dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo ma ra ya rbad/ ma ma snying khrag dun ting/ nA ga hUM

ya hUM ba ling du ba dza dza b+h+yo/ ma ra ya rbad/ ma ma ha la dun b+h+yo/ nA ga hu ya bA ling du ba dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo ma ra ya rbad/ ma ma yak+sha ma me rak+sha/ rag mo ba ling dung dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo mA ra ya rbad/ ma ma yak+sha rak+sha hur hur/ nag

mo bA ling dung ba dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo mA ra ya rbad/ dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo mA ra ya rbad/ dgug dang rbad dang bsad pa yis// ngan sngags gnad kyi sbyor ba ste// zhi bar sgrub bam drag por sgrub// gang bsgrubs 'bras bu smin par

'gyur// he he he sa byi ba tsog gi ling ma longs song/ de dag brjod/ dmod bcol bya/ dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo/ klu bdud dam shi phag mig gi

le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// yang dag rdzogs la 'di skad ces gsol// gdug pa klu yi 'khrul 'khor te// mtshon cha las kyi 'khor lo 'dir// rtsa ba'i sgrub pa bshad kyis kyang// ma
grub spogs dang gnad gcod kyis// yan lag sgrub pa bshad par mdzod// yang dag rdo rjes nges gsungs pa// gnad gcod gsang ba'i sbyor ba dag/ nag po klu yi tshogs rnams la// zas dang grogs dang dgra
skal dang// dug thun nag po zhes bya'o// dang po zas su gtad pa ni// gnyan ra 'dug pa yod pa'i sa// nag po blangs la sbrul gzugs bya/ khog stong byas la maN+Dal bzhag/ gro ga dag la 'khrul 'khor

bri// dbus su dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// ba dmar ra dkar 'o ma dang// mdzo yi 'o ma mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman sna tshogs sbyar byas la// dmigs ba'i dri dang sbyar ba byug/ sbal pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar

bri// tha ma sngags kyi phyi nang bskor// de nas dug sbrul nag po ste// ti pa tsa yi skur bsgoms la// ngan sngags khri phrag gsum bzlas la// nA ga gnas pa'i sa dag tu// dug sbrul lto bar grubs la yang// nyi zla
sa 'og song nas gtad// klu yi zas su myur par za// yang na 'khor lo gong ltar bya// glang ru srin po'i lto bar gzhugs// nA ga gnas pa'i khyim du gnan// klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag gis// zas su mthong

nas myur du za// de yi ngan sngags 'di lta ste// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga ra rag+sha che ge mo he ku la/ phe shan/ nag po shig shig tshum tshaM// hu ya hu ya/ klu nag po mgo dgu pa/ dgra bo che ge mo zung zung/ chings
