chings/ nA ga du nA ga du/ nA ga shan du/ he li dus dus/ nag po baM tsi tsi rgyas/ trag thur snying la gul/ myags myags/ rtsa gzhi skum/ shan shan srog la shan/ thur thur sod nA ga gur ling/ snying la dus dus/ snying

khrag baM mo rlul/ snying la dus dus sa ma yA/ nA ga kyen tse snying la dus dus/ nA ga du nA ga nri snying la dus dus/ nri lo nri chod/ sa ma yi daM daM dza/ na ga rak+sha dgra bo kha kha khA'i/ nyams pa'i ru dra dgra
bo de// zas su mthong nas myur du za// 'di ni gsang ba'i yang tig yin// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ dgra zas su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dag
bshad pa ni// baM chen thod chen nag po gshag/ 'byung ba lnga yi gshed rtsis la// gnyan po ma thod de dag la// 'chi bdag gzugs de mkhas pas bri// gcig la dgra gzugs legs bri la// drag po sngags

kyis 'khor bar bri// kha sbyar gnad kyi dra ba gzhug/ 'byung ba'i gnyen po steng 'og rim// shes nas yang dag sgrol bar byed// rgyal rigs klu la gtad pa'am// yang na gang yang rung ba ru// thod chen 'khor

lor bzhugs pa'am// bdag nyid stong pa'i mun pa nyid// sgyu 'phrul yi ge phe las ni// sbrul na lus la chu srin mgo/ nA ga rak+sha bsgom par bya// de yi thugs las 'od 'phros pas// klu bdud nag po zhes bya

ba// nag po 'dzin shes gtong mi shes// sbrul nag lus la rngam pa'i zhal// de la dgra bo dgra tu gtad// bcugs 'dzud sngags ni dri dang bzlas// sbyor ba rdzogs nas gnan pa bya// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA

ga rak+sha che ge mo he khu la se shan pa phos phos/ shig shig hU ya hu ya/ nag po mgo dgu pa dgra bo'i srog la breng shag/ hril myags rbad/ tsit+ta zung rbad/ rtsa khrag rbad/ khaM raM khaM raM/ snying tig rtsa tig khrag tig rbad/
ces ni stong phrag gsum du bzlas// sbyor ba brgya bar dag tu yang// bcugs sngags bzlas shing gtad gnyer bya// nyams pa'i dgra bo 'di yis ni// nag po klu yi gnas 'phrog go/ myur du brlag ste srog rtsa
gcod// ces bya'o// rtags ni jag dang tsa ra dang// ra mda' khu log dmag 'dren 'ong// 'jig rten 'dzam gling klu rnams kyis// yul khams nges par rlag par byed// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri
kha'i gsang rgyud las/ klu bdud nag po la dgra bo dgra skal du gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas gtad pa'i las bshad pa// klu mo nag mo spyan gcig ma// dgra bo grogs su gtad par

bya// dgra bo zag pa zad pa'i rdzas// dung dang mtshal dang shu dag dang// rtsi sman rnams kyis sbyar la yang// dmigs pa'i ling ga bri bar bya// snying khar bcug pa'i ngar blud la// klu mo nag mo kha sbyor bri// rgyab

tu sa yi bdag mo ste// g.yas su gnyan mo snying 'byin ma// g.yon du klu mo lto 'gro ma// legs par gzugs byas ling ka dril// sbal pa ga'u'i nang du gzhug/ byang phyogs gdol ba'i sa ru gtad// nA ga du nA

ga du/ he li he li/ nA ga dus dus/ oM nA ga kro tI shwa ri/ nA ga rag mo he zhu la/ phos phos shig shig/ hu ya hu ya/ klu mo nag mo ha zhen/ hu zhen nA ga zhen/ na ga le zhen nA ga le zhen nA ga le zhen/

bu me zhen/ sa khrag zhen/ dbugs la thus thus swAhA/ ngan sngags mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'di// stong phrag gsum las grangs mangs na// klu srin rnal 'byor nyid la 'du// des na gtad pa shin tu gces// dpal

zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ grogs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de la sgrub thabs med do skad// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// nges
par gsang rgyud mtshon cha 'dir// bsad pa'i sbyor ba gzhan bshad na// srin po bdud dang gnod sbyin gza'// 'chi bdag sgrub pha bshad par mdzod// ces gsungs bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nA ga rak+sha
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ srin po srog gi 'khor lo'i ngan sngags 'di gsungs so// las kyi nA ga gdug pa yi// mtshon cha 'khor lo log pa'am// rang rgyud rigs bzhi gdol ba'i
dug/ 'gro ba yongs la 'tshe ba'am// nag po gdug pa'i klu rnams kun// las mi byed na ar la gtad// rang nyams dben pa'i sa phyogs su// nA ga klu yi 'khor lo ni// chos kyi 'byung gnas dbugs ldan

pas// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud ldan// 'khor lo rdzogs pa rigs bzhi ste// rnam pa srid pa spub pa dang// bsnyen pa sgrub pa yang dag bshad// stong nyid snying rje'i ngo bo nyid// rgyu nyid rnam par ldan pa

las// nA ga rak+sha 'jigs pa'i sku// sbrul nag chen po 'jigs pa la// sbrul mgo brgyad ni rab tu brjid// dbu dgu nyis brgya phyag dang ldan// sbrul nag ral pa mun ltar gtibs// mdze shu'i nad kyi tsha tshar

'phro// zhags pa g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// rigs bzhi klu yi gdan stengs nas// klu bran pho mo zas su za// 'jigs byed i sha'i sgra yang sgrogs// nga ro mi snyan lhang lhang 'bod// yum ni 'jigs byed sku dang

'dra// snying la ye shes sems dpa' la// sngags kyi 'phreng ba mgal me'i tshul// de ltar bsal bar bstan pa ni// nA ga klu yi gshed mar byung// klu yi grong khyer kun kyang brlag/ nA ga rak+sha he la ta/ ha la nag

mo tsa ma ri/ de yi sngags la bshad bya ba/ oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rak+sha/ oM phe laM hUM/ nA ga rak+sha/ nA ga srog hril hur thums rbad/ de yi nA ga klu rnams kun// srog dang bral du re nas 'gyel cing skrag/ oM

nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rak+sha/ nA ga ha yaM/ thun gzer/ brang shag mA ra ya khaM shag rbad/ nA ga klu yi gnyen po ste// ltas log sbyor ba ngan na bya// gzhan du nam yong bya ba min// gzhan yang nA ga rak+sha
yi// mdze'am bsrung ba'i las bshad pa// rigs bzhi gdol pa'i nad rnams kun// 'jug sa nges pa tshad mas brtag/ rtags zin nad kyi 'khor los dkrug/ rdzas dang sngags dang ting 'dzin

ni// sbyor ba gsum gyis nges par 'joms// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba'i dug/ 'khor lo bzhi yi gnas kyis 'joms// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya nA ga rak+sha/ raM raM raM raM tsa ma ri phyung/ nA ga phu ma ra ya/ oM phe laM hUM khaM khaM

khaM khaM tsa ma ri phyung/ nA ga phu ma ra la ya/ oM phe laM hUM yaM yaM yaM yaM/ tsa ma ri phyung/ nA ga phu ma ra ya/ oM phe laM hUM/ laM laM laM laM/ tsa ma ri phyung nA ga phu ma ra ya oM phe laM hUM/ 'gug 'dren 'byung po dgug pa dang// yang

snying bsdebs la shis par brdeg/ spyi bo sa yi 'khor lo dang// mgrin pa chu yi 'khor lo dang// snying kha me yi 'khor lo dang// lte ba rlung gi 'khor lo ste// las kyi gnad nas dkrug pa'am// yang na 'khor lo

dril ba yi// yang snying nag po gsang ba'i mchog/ nA ga klu yi gshed mar che// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha yi gsang rgyud las/ nA ga rak+sha srin po 'chi bdag gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de

nas yang dag rdzogs pa yis// nA ga ru dra zhes bya ba// nag po snying gi 'khrul 'khor 'di// 'khor lo nges par bshad par bya// bdud kyi rme tri nag po dang// shan dmar spu gri nang 'thab pa'i// gsad pa'i sbyor
ba 'di lta ste// brag nag spungs pa'i ri bo 'am// nag po 'dug pa'i sa dag tu// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// mkhas pas 'khor lo bri bar bya// sdig pa nag po'i lto ba ru// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du
bskor// gru gsum zla gam rgya gram ldan// mu 'khyud 'khor lo rdzogs pa la// rtsa ba 'byung ba spu gri sngags// mkhas pas bkod la thod chen gzhug/ phung ba'i 'brub gnas gru gsum du// mkhas pas gnas la
rtsang dmar bskor// nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe dang// khrag dang dug gi sbyor ba dang// zangs phye lcags phye la sogs brdeg/ bdag nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin las// sbrul nag mgo dgu 'jigs pa

las// ral pa khaM nag tsha tsha 'phro// g.yas na srog gcod spu gri la// g.yon na sbrul nag zhags pa'o// gzas pa nyams na mdun na gnas// lcags kyu'i pho nyas khrid nas kyang// las kyi rlung gis rgyab nas
phul// bdag gi drung na nyam thag pa// thugs la dza yi 'od zer las// dza de gzas pa'i snying la thim// sdig pa mgo dgu gcig tu gyur// rnam shes rten gyi rtsa brgyad gcod// hUM nam ces pas srog gshed
ni// sdig pa'i lus la spu gri thogs// zhags pas nyams pa khrid nas kyang// 'khor lo'i 'khyams gang du 'chang// de ltar gsal par gyur pa dang// bzlas sgom bskul rnams thun du gcad// las kyi sbyor ba
rdzogs pa dang// nag po gdol pa gnas par gtad// las 'di khyad par mchog ces pa// 'chi bdag bdud kyi ngan sngags yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/

gsang sngags 'di dag 'thon to// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rak+sha che ge mo he khu la phe shan/ nag po phos phos shig shig/ chuM chuM hu ya hu ya/ klu nag po mgo dgu pa/ dgra bo'i srog la rtsa khrag snying thum ril raM

shag rbad/ nri hur thums dza/ la laM snying la dza thur sod/ raM raM tsa khrag srog ti ge rbad/ khaM khaM rtsa khrag myags ti rbad/ yaM yaM srog la breng/ shag rbad/ drag sngags mchog gis brdeg pa ste// nag po klu yi snying tig

yin/ khyad par sngags pa nang 'gras sam// spu gri rno dbal 'dren na bya// ngan sngags dug ri yi ge ste// me dang nyi ma rgyal po bzhin// yang dag rdzogs kyis nges par gsungs// yang na rus sbal chen po la// mi
bubs gcig la gtad rgyu lnga// yang snying sbrul nag 'khyil pa dang// ra rgyas che dang chung ba dang// sbal nag sdig pa la sogs pas// bdun phrag dag gis las byas na// rtsa rgyud brlag par dpa' bos
bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsrung zhing phyir bzlog pa'i// 'dir 'khor lo 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gtan sems kyi 'khor lo ni// dang po stong pa nyid dag las// phe las 'brum zhes

brjod pa las// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu lte dbus zlum// dbus kyi rgyal chen pho brang du// phe las bdag nyid klu bdud che// chos kyi dbyings dang ye shes kyi// gnyis med sras mchog ti pa tsa// sbrul nag sku la
sbrul mgo brgyad// phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags nas gzigs// spyi gtsug rin chen pho brang du// bruM las gyur pa'i rnam par rgyal// nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas sdigs mdzub lcags kyu
g.yon// zhabs gnyis dor thabs khros pa'i tshul// dbu yi gtsug tor dag tu bsam// rtsibs chen bcu la khro bcu bsam// sbrul nag gdug pa bcu dgod do// bsrung na 'khor lo gur gyi tshul// gnan na

'khor lo ri rab tshul// gsod pa'i 'khor lo mtshon cha ste// dmigs pa dang bcas de bzhin no// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag go/ oM A uSh+Ni Sha tsakra sarba lo gi swAhA/ nag po ti pa tsa nA ga rak+sha he ru khu la phe

shan phos phos shig shig chuM chuM hu ya hu ya yan+Ta man+Ta tan+t+ra sarba lo ki bruM bruM bruM bruM truM truM rduM duM tsakra khar ti ye sarba lo ki swAhA/ nam mkha' nyi zla 'od stobs dang// spu gri rno dbal 'gran pa dang// seng ge kha 'thab la
sogs pa'i// byad dang rbod gtong sngan thabs dang// sbyor ba thams cad 'dis 'joms pas// ya bag sha ya zhes bya ba// 'chi bdag las kyi 'khor lor bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i
gsang rgyud las/ 'chi bdag sdig pa phyung gshig spu gri rno dbal gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi ba'o//// de nas yang dag rdzogs pa yis// nA ya yak+sha zhes bya ba// gsang ba'i yang snying nges bshad
pa// rnal 'byor dpa' bo stobs ldan pas// dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas kyang// sems kyi dri ma kun spangs te// bde ba'i ye shes rgyun du rten// byams dang snying rje ldan pa des// sems can kun la sman

pa dang// bla med 'phags pa mnyes mchod phyir// nor bu dam pa bsgrub par bya// rin chen rgyan ldan gnas khang du// gtsang ma'i sa dag tshogs pa la// btsan phyug 'phan gyi zhing sa blang// dri spos sman dang ldan
byas la// yid 'ong me tog tshom bus mdzes// rin chen mdzes pa'i snod nang dam// yang na maN+Dal steng du'am// rin chen zur brgyad ldan pa la// dbus su pho brang zlum po la// rin po che las byas
pa'am// snum pa'i sa las byas pa yis// ti pa tsa yi sku gzugs byas// dbu dgu yan lag brgyad ldan la// phyag na ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin// nang du gang 'dod dngos grub dang// dri spos sman gyis rab tu
dgang// de nang bskyed dang spyan drang bstim// dngos grub 'dod par gsol ba gdab// mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan gdugs kyis dbub// mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs dbul// mdun du rin chen ga'u ru// sna
tshogs gang 'dod rdzas kyis dgang// 'bru sna rin chen sna lnga dag/ la sogs kha ni brgya yis gdab// sngags kyis bsnyen pa bdun 'bum mam/ khri phrag bdun nam stong phrag bdun// gang zag gsum gyis
'grub par 'gyur// nor bu rdzas kyis ga'u 'phel// rmi ltas bzang po byung pa na// ga 'u bang mdzod nang du stsal// sku gzugs mchod pa'i rten du bzhag/ gang bsams las la the tshom med// de nas yang dag

rdzogs pa nges// gsang sngags 'di dag sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rak+sha yag+sha nA ga rA dza sa ma ya gu ru/ nA ga le chuM rat+na ge po stangs hi sid+d+hi brag shag sdud daM hur khram swAhA/

sngags kyi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// gang la bya ba 'grub par bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha yi gsang rgyud las/ gnod sbyin 'chi bdag nor bu sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas
yang dag rdzogs pa yi// gza' rgod 'chi bdag ces bya ba// lo tog gzhom ba'i las bshad pa// gcan gzan mgo'am thod chen du// gdug pa gsum gyi khrag gis bsku// dri rgod mgo ra tshe tshe'i khrag/ dug
dang 'bras bu sngo sna bcas// sbal pa nag po'i gsob tu bca'// yul dbus gzhug pa'i pho brang gzhug/ dgongs dang sa sros dmar thag dbab// bco lnga dgu gsum bzhi dag la// sbyor ba rdzogs pas gnan

na yang// chu 'khyags 'khyag rom 'bab par 'gyur// de yi ngan sngags 'di dag ste// oM nag po ti pa tsa yA nA ga yak+sha ya ma ra hu la he khu la phe shan phroM hril shar shar/ nag po gu ya/ dgra bo'i lo

tog la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sa nA ga srog zir trig nan/ raM shar ya phob hril phroM b+h+yo/ nag po ti pa tsa kha la 'ur 'ur kham kham yaM yaM drag tu phob phob/ gzer gyis myur du 'bab par 'gyur// gal te 'bab par ma

gyur na// ser srun yul mi 'bru sna sngo// drag po rdzas dang bcas pa rnams// tsher ma can gyi shing la bsreg/ khrag dang dug rdzas bsres pa'i thun// yul zhing bskor zhing gtig pa dag/ dus chen nyi ma dag

la bya// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las// gza' 'chi bdag gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying po yis// yang dag rdzogs la nges zhus pa// e ma rdo rje 'chang

rgyal la// bstan pa'i dgra lnga gdul ba'i phyir// rtsa ba yan lag rdzogs pa yis// sgrub pa'i rim pa bshad kyis kyang// nag po klu la gtad pa yi// gtad tshad nges pa'i tshad ma gang// tshad can dag tu gtad pa
gang// tshad med dag tu gtad pa gang// klu yi bcud phur ji ltar gdab// gzer bzhi gdab pa ji ltar lags// rtags kyi tshad ma gang gi bgyi// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// de nas yang dag

rdzogs pa yis// rdo rje can la bshad bya ba// spyir na gtad pa nges pa ni// shar bltas rgyal po bram ze lho// nub na rje'u byang na dmangs// byang shar gdol pa nag po ste// re re la yang lnga lnga ste// nyi shu rtsa lngar

gtad pa'i grangs/ khyad par byang dang byang shar te// las byed dmangs dang gdol pa'o// tshur la mi ldog phar la 'gro// de chu mdangs chu chu chen slebs// sbrul nag 'khyug sa gtad pa yin// brag dang chu ru
'bab pa yin// rme dri shan dmar long pa dang// gtad sa nges pa'i tshad ma yin// chu mig 'khyil dang lkugs pa dang/ khyad par yin te gtad sa yin// nA ga ha la yod pas na// chu mig lkugs pa phru ba'i

kha// nag po chig shur bya pa yin// 'di las myur pa med pas na/ khyad par gtad pa nges pa'o// yang na klu rigs nyi shu lnga'i// rtags dang dus tshod ma nor na// kun kyang gtad sa nges pa yin// dpal zla
gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha yi gsang rgyud las/ gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// yang dag rdzogs kyi nges gsungs pa// nag po klu la gtad pa la// lus tshad 'jam pa 'di lta ste// ri rab

nyungs 'bru'i tshul dag la// gzugs la tshad bzung mi spogs te// rnal 'byor 'phrin las byed tshul gyis// ji ltar byas kyang las rnams 'grub// rgyal po rje dang bram ze dmangs// gdol pa la sogs klu rnams
la// 'dom dang brkyang bskum bskum khru dang/ mda' dang khru ru rim pas yod// kun la sbyar de ltar yin// byang dang byang shar sbrul nag 'khyil// mig tu byas te tshad gzhal bas// gtad sa bcu
gnyis yod pa yin// mig dang 'dom gang sna ru 'dod// der gtad ci nad nges bar 'ong// sna nas 'dom do phar tshur bcal// rna ba 'on dang skran mdze 'ong// sna nas 'dom gang kha yin te// glan dig lkugs

pa'i nang du 'ong/ kha nas 'dom gsum snying kha yin// snying nad sna tshogs 'ong bas gtad// snying nas 'dom gsum lto ba ste// dmu rdzings skran nad 'ong bas gtad// lto nas 'dom gsum lte ba ste// srid pa'i
rgyun chad 'chad pas gtad// de nas 'dom gsum chu so la// chu 'gag phol 'bras 'ong bas gtad// chu so dang ni snying kha nas// phar tshur 'dom ni gsum gsum na// yan lag gtad na zha 'brum mdze// de
nas phyir gzhan mda' bzhir gtad// dreg grum mdze 'bras gong por 'gro// mig nas 'dom bzhi gyen la bcal// sbyi steng sa ste mgo 'khor 'ong// mtshan ma dag nas 'dom bzhi na// ka rten sa ste phye 'or

'gro// de dag gtad sa bcu gnyis dag/ sbyi ni kun la bca' ba ste/ khyad par sbrul nag 'khyil ba ste// byang bltas la chu nges bcal bshad/ dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ tshad

gzhal gtad pas nad kyi dmigs rtag pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// tshad med gtad pa 'di lta ste// klu yi pho brang rgya mtsho der// chu mig klu yi srang mgo yin// rigs

bzhi klu yi sgo ba yin// pho brang srang mgo bya ra'i sa// lkugs sa la sogs mdun sa ru// gang du gtad kyang 'gal ba med// yang na chu mig dngos phyugs gzhug/ sna tshogs nad dang hur thums byed// shar gtad
rus mdze nag po 'ong// lhor gtad khrag mdze mkhris nad 'ong// nub gtad gnyan dang lhog pa 'ong// byang gtad gnyan dang 'brum bu 'ong// byang shar 'brum bu 'ong// dkar po rgyal rigs sa yi dug/ bram
ze ser po chu yi dug/ dmar po rje rigs me yi dug/ nag po dmangs rigs rlung gi dug/ sngon po gdol pa sna tshogs dug/ 'khor gyi sna tshogs nad gtong bas/ kha dog rigs kyis brtag par bya// 'dom

gang thur la bcal ba'am// lkugs pa phru ba kha zhes bya// nag po gcig shur gnas pas na// hur thums las su de yis 'gro// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ tshad med du gtad

pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// bcud phur rnam lnga ma thems na// nag po klu rnams sgrub ba dang// las 'gyangs 'ong ste rang la ngan// de don nges par bshad bya ba// lta ba chos
nyid bcud phur ni// chos kyi dbyings dang rang rig pa// gnyis med rig pa mchog gi ngang// ma bcos bcos med byang chub sems// ti pa tsa dang spyan gcig ma// dbyer med thig le chen po'i
ngang// chos nyid mun pa lta bus shes// thig le chen por gtogs pa'o// gnyen po lha yi bcud phur dag/ sbrul nag chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// nA ga bran du 'khol ba ste// dug gis dug 'joms lha yi

gnad// drag sngags gnad kyi bcud phur ni// nA ga rak+sha srin po che// klu yi gshed 'byung sngags kyis gnad// rten 'brel rdzas kyi bcud phur ni// byug pa'i gdug pa'i sgrib shing dag/ dam shing rdzogs pa rdzas

kyi gnad// pho nya las kyi bcud phur te// dug lnga las gyur lha tshogs te// klu bdud nag po yab yum dang// srog gshed byad kyi bka' nyan tshogs// rtag tu bskul zhing 'phrin las bcol// drag po gnad kyis

bskul ba'i gnad// gzer bzhi gdab pa 'di lta ste// spyi dang khyad par gsang ba yi// bsnyen pa drod thob lha yi gzer// sgrub dang mchod pa bstod pa ni// rdzas rnams tshogs pa sbyor ba'i gzer// lto ba brgyad po
'khrul 'khor gyi// dmigs pa 'dzud pa khang pa'i gzer// mi 'gyur brtan pa sgrub byed rkyen// ting 'dzin 'phro 'du dgongs pa'i gzer// rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bya// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho
dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ gzer gdab pa dang/ bcud phur gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang dag rdzogs pa yis// rtags kyi nges pa bstan pa ni// g.yag rgod mdzo rgod byung ba na// nag po chig
shur shes pa yin// las ni myur la gtad par bya// gtad pa 'gor na rang la gnod// rta dang bong bu byung ba na// btsun pa a tsa ra dang ni// bu chung spre'u bya dkar dang// rgyal rigs las byed rtags su

bzung// dmu chu smyo 'bog nad kyang 'byung// phag pa rog pa khra bo dang// bud med nag mo ral pa can// na chung srin mo mdza' mo dang/ khyi dang mdzo ni bram ze ste// gtad na dgra bo mdze yis 'dzin// sprang po

byung dang ri dwags dang// rta pa skyes pa chas bzangs dang// brag dmar chu 'byung rje'u rigs// rme dri nag po 'byung par 'gyur// bya dang ba glang mdzo rta rnams// dmangs rigs rtags te dri rgod 'byung// ban+d+he byung

na ser po ste// las myur skom mdze 'ong bar 'gyur// mi reng byung na klu dkar te// skrangs sbos 'chi bar byed pa'o// byis pa byung na gdol pa yin// de yang gri rgod dag tu 'chi// bud med byung na dmar po'i

rigs// rtsa rgyud 'chad par yang dag bshad// lha khang byung na klu rnams kyis// mdun ser sleb pas nad rnams yong// dmag mi byung na klu btsan yin// rta gri rbab gri mtshon grir 'chi// rtags dang sbyar te
gtad pa dang// las myur gtad pa de bzhin te// yang dag bla med dpa' bos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las// rtags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig
pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// yang dag rdzogs la 'di skad gsol// rtags kyi tshad ma de ltar na// gdug pa sa la gnas pa'i phyir// rus sbal lto bar ji ltar gtad// lto 'phye'i lto ru gzhug pa
gang// sa bdag nag po'i lce mdung la// nyams pa gtad pa gang dang gang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal ba// 'khyig dang lkugs pa rus sbal gnas// gcod pa dug gi bdag nyid can// rlung rta srog
las tshe gnas khrus// shis pas rus sbal mdzod la gtad// yan lag lnga dang dbang po brgyad// nang grol sman lnga tshigs mgo bdun// lus kyi bang mdzod bcu drug bzhi// gnad gzir mgo dang pho brang
'bar// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig dmigs brtags la// de la gtad pa'i rim pa bya// tha chung shar lta 'bring po lho// ra ba nur dang nur dang bstod// byang du mgo ni ltas par 'gyur// rtag tu spub la gung gnyis

lta// lo gshed gtad pa'i sbyor ba ni/ kha ru sbrul la ra g.yas 'brug/ lag g.yas yos bu mtshan g.yas rta// rkang g.yas glang la gsang gnas phag/ gsang g.yon byi ba rkang g.yon gyi// lto g.yon bya ste mtshan

g.yon spre'u// lag g.yon lug la rkang g.yon rta// gshed bdag nyid la gtad pa ni// byi phag gshin rje'i 'chi bdag la// bya spre bdud po 'chi bdag la// rta sbrul srin po 'chi bdag la// glang lug khyi 'brug
bzhi po ni// gnod sbyin 'chi bdag de la gtad// rigs bzhi dug bzhi nad bzhi 'joms// lo yi gshed gcod sbyor ba yin/ khaM chen lnga yi srog lus sbyar// mgo dang mjug ma g.yas dang g.yon// yan lag

kun la sbyor ba ni// ji khams 'u dang bkag dang bshang// kung la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga// sbyor ba kham cher sbyor bar bshad// dbang po lnga yi shes pa ni// mig dang rna ba kha dang rwa// sna dang sgroms dang snying kha

ste// rgyal po rje dang sngags pa dmangs// bon po lha dang yul bsrungs dang// blon po 'gran zla stobs kyis te// rnam shes dbang po'i sbyor bar bshad// don snying lnga yi nad dang rigs// snying la bsad pa glo ba
smyo// mchin pas 'bogs 'thibs rgyu mas rims// mkhal ma lha dang dbye ba'i las// gang sgrub las la thogs pa med/ khyon la sbyar ba 'di lta ste// sgye la rengs dang dgug par sbyar// sogs pa gnyis la

gri thog ste// byang khog dbang du sdud pa la// rdzing la rnol dang rme dri ste// rgyu zhags rims dang snyom bu la// gsang bar skye rgyun gcod dang 'pho// chu shul gnan na las kun 'grub// rus sbal lto bar dkrug par
bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ rus sbal lto dkrug pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag rdzogs pa yi// lto 'phye 'chi bdag nag po
yi// gtad dmigs gcig la bshad par bya// sa bdag rgyal po ha la gnag// mgo la gtad na bu mang 'chi// rgyab tu gtad na rang la ngan// mjug mar gtad na nor rdzas 'bri// de phyir 'chi bdag nas
lugs bstan// dpyid zla gsum na byang na mgo/ shar du kha bltas mjug ma lho// dbyar zla gsum na nub na mgo/ byang du kha la mjug ma shar// ston zla gsum na lho na mgo/ nub na kha la mjug ma
byang// dgun zla gsum la shar du mgo/ lho ru kha la mjug ma nub// 'chi bdag lto 'phye de ltar gnas// dpyid gsum nub ltas brkos na thebs// shar dang lho dang byang du ni// 'chi bdag bu smad nor la

ngan// de phyir gsum po spang bar bya// dbyar gsum lhor bltas brkos na thebs// byang bltas shar dang lho dag spang// ston gsum shar du bltas la rko// de bzhin gsum po spang bar bya// dgun gsum byang du

kha bltas brko// gsum po spang bar bya ba ste// lto 'phye'i lto bar chud pa na// nges par phar la thebs pas na// de phyir gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/

'chi bdag lto 'phye nag po lto gshag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag rdzogs pa yi// sa bdag lce mdung nag po bshad// chu dang shing dang brag dang sa// klu gnyan sa bdag gzugs brnyan

te// dkar po rgyal rigs ser po bram ze ste// dmar po rje rigs nag po dmangs// sngon po gdol pa'i rigs bzhi ste// 'khor dang rtags dang dus las sbyar// sbrul dang sbal pa nya dang ni// lcong ge glang dang

phag pa dang// sdig pa chu srin rta bla'o// grog mo sbur pa rus sbal dang// dmug pa'i bu mo 'dra pa dang// mgo lnga mgo gsum gzugs 'dra brtag/ sbrul 'dra lnga ste nam mkha' brag/ sa dang chu shing sbrul nag

gi/ mjug ma mdung la gtad pa dang// sna gdong lce la gtad pa dang// sbal 'dra gsum las sa rdo ri/ kha ni lce la sbal pa mdung// lce mdung la ni gtad par bya// nya la gnyis te chu dang sa// gshog rtse lce la

zer pa mdung// lcong ke bzhi ste na chung dang// brag dang sa'o// mtshul pa lce la mjug ma mdung// glang la gsum ste gad rdo ris// dmigs bzhi lce la rab rtse mdung// phag kyang gsum ste gad rdo ri/ kha la lce

ste sna rtse mdung// sdig pa gsum ste ri chu brag/ spyi mdo lce la rwa rtse mdung// chu srin gnyis te ri dang chu// sna rtse lce la sbal lag mdung// rta bla gnyis te lam dang sa/ kha la lce la lag pa mdung// grog mo gnyis
te sa dang brag kha la mdung la lag pa lce// rus sbal gnas khang brag ri ste// lto pa lce pa rgyab na mdung// dmugs pa 'dra bas dang brag/ ra la lce la kha la mdung// mgo lnga la sogs gzugs
brnyan la/ kha la lce la lag pa mdung// sa bdag lce mdung 'di dag la// gtad na gang yang brlag pa ste// bskal pa'i mthar yang mi thar bas// bdud kyi btson rar chud pas na// nag po klu yis zin pa

yin// las kyi rnam grangs du ma kun// rtsa ba yan lag gang byed kyang// 'di bzhi sbyar na las kun 'grub// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ sbrul nag lce mdung gi le'u ste nyi shu
bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// bde chen lha la yang dag gsol// 'jigs byed gdug pa klu yi tshogs// sgrub cing dgra bo gtad pa dang// gtad pa'i 'khor lo bstan gyis kyang// byad kyi bka'
nyan las kyis bsdeb// rno myur mgyogs pa'i sna 'dren gang// yang dag rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// srog gshed byad kyi bka' nyan du// 'chi bdag bdud dang srog bdag gza'// byad kyi bka' nyan bsgrub par

bya// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das mtshams shed na// bdud dang gshin rje'i pho nya ste// gshin rje dmar po yi dwags rje// sgrub cing las la rbad pa dang// klu dang gdong du gzhug pa dang// mgyogs kyi sna
'dren rbad par bya// 'brang rgyas bshos bu ri rab dang// dar mda' za 'og rgyan ldan lug/ srid pa bskor la bris la dbul// rta mgrin dbang ngam ting 'dzin gyis// dang po srog bdag bod par bya// grub
rtags sngon du byung ba'i tshe// gzhal yas dmar po'i bse mkhar nas// yam shod dmar po bskul bar bya// gdug pa dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// bsad pa'i mtshon cha dbab par bya// srog gi snying po bod par

bya// haM shaM tri taM rtsal tri ra gaM sa ma ya dza/ byis pa khyi'u dang/ rta ba dang/ 'od la sogs pa byung na rbad/ haM shaM tri mA ra ya b+h+yo/ las la rbad sngags/ tri kha thun b+h+yo/ tri kha thun b+h+yo/ thib hab ha ra/ ti li ti li/ tib

tib haM hab/ nA ga rA dza dgra bo la dza/ de nas klu dang sdong pa ni// nA ga krod+ha ni/ nA ga kro ta ni/ badzra rak+sha kro d+he ni/ nA ga nA ga ni/ ri men tar phran d+ha dza dzA/ zhes pa'o// nyi ma byang shar pha gi na// yam shod dmar

po srog gi bdag/ skye 'gro tshe la mnga' mdzad pa// 'bru gtor 'o ma chang dang n-i+i// snyug rgod sa shing thun phrom gyis// gsol lo yam shud dmar po mchod// gnyer du gtad de sa ma ya// klu yi sna 'dren chen po
ste// myur mgyogs drag shul glog gi bang// gsang ba mchog gi sgrub par bshad// kye/ 'jig rten 'das dang mtshams shed na// bdud dang gshin rje de na gnas// gzhal yas dmar po bse mkhar
na// zangs lcags re them sgo mo rtsal// bse logs dmar po gru bzhi la// sprul pa glog stong mang po 'gyu// sprin dang 'od phung stug pos g.yos// de yi mkhar gyi nang shed na// srog bdag yaM shod
dmar po bzhugs// sku la bse yi glog ba gsol// bse yi ljang dkar phyag na bsnams// le brgan dmar po'i ze ba can// bye ru dmar po'i skye chings can// ra gan dmar po'i lham sgrog can// 'og na bya khyung

smug po zhon// steng na bse yi bya khra lding// bse yi ru mtshon gnam du 'phyar// sprul pa mi dmar rta dmar 'gyed// mngag gzhug 'gong po spyang khu gtong// yang sprul the'u brang sum brgya 'gyed// bud med chags

pa che ba'i rigs// snying dang yid du 'ong ba la// de 'drar sprul nas tshe srog 'brel// mi rigs srid thag ring ba la// bu chung 'dra bar skye zhing slu/ khyod ni mi rigs bdag po ste// gnam gyi dmar po la sogs

pa// kun kyang khyod kyi bka' bzhin byed// ra lcags dkar po'i ru mtshon 'phyar// zhags pa dkar nag klad la skor// drang srong yab bzhin mthu rtsal che// bram ze yum bzhin dmod mo rno// gshin rje dmar po
yi dwags rje// nyin bzhin mi phyugs brgya brgya gsol/ khyod kyi phu bo gtsen po la// rta dkar phum dmar chibs su bcibs// bya dkar ze dmar klad la lding// khyi dkar sna dmar phyi nas 'breng// ra dkar

pags pa sku la gsol// ra lpags dkar po'i rgyal mtshan can// nyin bzhin bdud mo brgya brgya srol// mtshan bzhin na chu brgya la sbyor// 'khor ni 'gong po spun dgu dang// spyi yi gling dang bcas pa 'gyed// rdo

rje 'chang gi bka' ma bcag/ yab shud dmar po dgra la ya// de skad bskul zhing las gnyer gtad// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ yam shod gshed mar sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi

shu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag rdzogs pa yis// srog bdag chen po'i las bshad pa// klu tsha gsang ba'i ngan sngags ni// dben pa nyams dga' yid 'ong ba// zhal zas phud dang gsang phyi dang// rgyan dang

dam rdzas kun bsog la// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// bsad pa'i rdzas kun rdzogs bsogs la// gsang sngags 'di yis bod par bya// oM badzra sum tri rak+sha/ rA dza pa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ de nas

rbad pa'i sngags bstan pa/ sum tri rak+sha b+h+yo/ ra dza nag po b+h+yo/ ging ka ra rgyal du chug/ gnod sbyin nag po cho cho/ dkar po gyu reng rtsa la rgyug breng/ nag po spu gri rtsa la rngubs/ dun gyi yaM yaM b+h+yo/ mA ra ya mA ra ya ni

ra zung zung/ zhes rbad par bya'o// rtags ni ci ding ci byung yang// tshul la 'khyu dang ldog na 'di yis gnan// oM AHhUM mA ra ya nan phra ma rA dza trig nan/ 'khu na rak+sha rbud long/ oM badzra badzra krod+ha krod+ha rA dza sid+d+hi
a mri te hUM phaT/ rA dza sa ti sa ma ya thibs dza/ zhes pas rgyal po'i rang gnad yin// grub pa'i rtags rnams byung ba dang// klu dang sdong du 'dis 'jug go/ nA ga breng ni/ ya ma rA dza nag po ti pa

ni/ sum khri rak+sha tshal pa snying// bab dum cho rn-ir dza dza/ dgra bo'i srog la rgyug brengs mA ra ya/ de yis klu dang sdong du gzhug/ ngan sngags dug gi spu gri ste// rtags sbyar 'bum mam stong stong ste// las 'grub dza
la nag po'am// smyo 'bog nad kyi dmigs pa brlag/ ces gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ srog klu sa ma ta li gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de nas yang
dag rdzogs pa yis// gza' spyang chen po'i drag sngags bshad// ki kang rog ti mi bzad pa// sgrub dang srog la gshed mar dbab// klu dang sdong pa'i las dag ni// brag nag spungs pa'i nags tshal du// lha

srin drag po'i rgyu srang du// 'brub khung mthing nag gru gsum rtsig/ ra rog snying dang mchin pa dang// 'bru dang rtsi sman dkar gsum bsag/ bsad pa'i dug khrag nyungs kar sbyar// gsang ba'i ngan sngags 'di

yis bod// oM ke ta ke ta ra shul hu la swAhA/ tsa ba ya ni ra hU la dgra bo'i srog la bred shag rbad/ ma shag mu shag rbad// da ni du ni rbad/ tsa tra mu ti ni rbad/ kha rag smra sha dun dun dza dza/ ra hu la dgra bo'i srog la

ma ra ya thuM thuMs/ oM tsa ba ma ni ra hu la nA ga ra dza sa du dgra snying tshal pa tshal pa nAM ga snying thur dgra la b+h+yo/ ki kang brgyad kyi dus dag tu// gtor ma btang zhing 'phrin las bcol// rno myur shugs ldan drang srong

che// gza' rgod gdug pa'i ngan sngags te// mtshon cha las kyi 'khor lo yin// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las// gza' rgod ra hu la'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang

dag rdzogs pa yis// bya byed mang po 'jigs pa ste// sngo nag g.yu yi go zu can// bod dang las la rbad pa dang// klu dang sdong du gzhug ba'i las// 'khor la bshad ba 'di lta ste// dung ngam nya phyis de dag

tu// sbal lcong nya sha la sogs pa// sha sna 'bru sna'i gtor ma bsham// ma mo bod cing gtor ma sbyin// mthing nag gur dang bcas par sgrub// trag rak+sha mu tra snying ka rag ma b+h+yo/ e tsa rA dza dgra snying la thun/ che

ge mo rtsa thang mu le tsit+ta rbad/ nA ga ma ma dgra snying hur rbud thuM/ snying tsit+ta dum bu ra ti ru ti rbad nA ga rA dza ma ma b+h+yo/ dgra snying la gul myags myags nA ga dgra bo'i srog la b+h+yo/ gsang ba las kyi yang snying

ste// byad ka ma mo klu bdud kyis// nyams pa dgra bo sgrol bar byed// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ klu dang ma mos bsgral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag
rdzogs pa yis// dregs pa mgyogs byed shu bo yi// ngan sngags nges par bshad bar bya// btsan ra dmar po'i thod pa ru// ling ga sna tshogs rdzas kyi brub// bshos bu sum brtsegs ra dmar
dang// mi dmar rta dmar sha ba dag/ klu btsan chen po nyid la dbul// bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// btsan bod srog la gshed dmar dbab// tha mar klu dang sdong par bya// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag

go/ oM nA ga shu la a tri sems dpa' dza dza/ nA ga a pi shu la/ tsan+t+ra tsan+t+ri hri hri/ raM raM kha la rak+sha rak+ta du si du si/ srog la breng/ shag rbad/ gul gul slu ma a ne gu ye ye/ rum gu de yo sod/ mi 'di ni bdud
khal ches so// bdud la lag rings so// btsan la khal ches so// lag rings so// bdud btsan klu dang gsum la dbul lo// nyi ma nub kyi btsan/ bya yi lus po la sbrul gyi mgo bo can/ lho phyogs kyi btsan/

mi lcags rta lcags zangs kyi tshems khrab can/ shar gyi btsan shal gyi mi po stag gi mgo bo can/ srin a te rgyal ba'i phyag tu dbul lo// btsan kha bzhi la gtad do// bdud nag po la gtad do// klu gel ba la
gtad do// de skad brjod la brag dmar po'am// klu btsan gnas ba'i sa ru gtad// thogs pa med par las rnams 'grub// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ klu btsan la gtad
pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// yang dag rdzogs la 'di skad gsol// gsang ba zla gsang nag po yi// rgya mtsho dug ri gsang rgyud 'dir// klu yi 'khrul 'khor bshad bya

ba// dbyings kyi klu dang byang sems klu// sprul pa'i klu dang rang rgyud klu// gnas pa'i sa dang mthun pa'i grogs// 'dul ba'i gnyen po gang la bgyi// mi mthun rkyen yang ji ltar sgrub// de la yang dag bka' stsal

pa// de la dbyings kyi klu zhes pa// chos dbyings rnam dag bde chen gnas// lhun gyis grub pa'i pho brang na// ye shes lnga dang lhan cig gnas// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gos pa yis// nyon mongs spangs te bsgrub

par bya// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i klu// 'og min pho brang dag pa na// rigs lnga'i lha dang lhan cig gnas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// ngar 'dzin shes pa spangs te sgrub// de las sprul pa'i klu rnams

ni// ri rab zom dang rgya mtsho'i gting// 'jig rten lha klu rnams dang bcas// klu bdud chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// thab gzhob mi gtsang spangs la sgrub// ji ltar 'jig rten rang rgyud klu// 'dzam gling yongs la

khyad par gnas// sna tshogs don dang bcas pa nyid// lta ba gyabs dang gnyen po stobs// thabs ldan rnams kyis spangs la sgrub// ces gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud
las/ klu bzhi gnas tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// gdug pa'i klu bdud nag po 'di// dang po skye ba'i rgyud nyid gang// gnas pa'i tshul ni ji lta bu// phyi

dang nang dang gsang ba dang// klu yi gnas tshul ji ltar lags// 'khor lo'i dbye ba ji lta bu// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// gdug pa klu bdud nag po ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang las byung// ngar

'dzin nyon mongs drag po las// gti mug nag po ti pa tsa// 'dod chags klu mo mgo dkar mo// nga rgyal bgegs kyi glang po dang// phrag dog gnyan dmar glang gi mgo/ zhes sdang sbrul gyi rgyu ma can// dug lnga'i

rang bzhin drag po'i rgyu// ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid// gnas tshul bstan pa 'di lta ste// rtsa ba mi 'gyur byang chub sems// shes shing rig pa'i ngo bo nyid// rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ste// de nyid ngang gis stong bas
na// yum chen klu mo nag mos bya// dug gsum ye shes rol pas 'di// srog gshed gsum gyis rang bzhin gyis// sgo lnga yul la 'phro ba nyid// klu rigs lnga yi rang bzhin te// yid tshul 'jig rten 'das pa'i
klu// klu rigs du ma thams cad kun// mi rtog mnyam pa chen po'i ngang// mi phyed mi shigs rdo rje'i sku// chos nyid mun pa lta bu ste// dbu mar mi gnas spros dang bral// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu
gsum// dbyer med chos dbyings gdal pa'i klong// klu yi chos nyid spros bral bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ klu yi chos nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste so gcig

pa'o//// yang dag dpa' bos nges gsungs pa// phyi nang gsang ba 'di lta ste// phyi ni gling bzhi ri rab ste// srid pa rus sbal lto na gnas// snang srid thams cad 'khor ba'i bzhi'o// pho brang rgya mtsho lhun po

ste// zhe sdang sdug pa ti pa tsa// pho brang rgya mtsho mer ba ni// klu rigs du ma 'khor dang bcas// rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i gling la gnas// rdo rje rigs kyi shing chen

te// yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya na// klu yi rgyal po rgyal rigs te// rigs kyi 'khor dang rnam par ldan// rin chen spungs pa zhes bya'i shing// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i gling dag la// bram ze rgyal po rta mgo

gnas// rigs kyi khyad par mngon par snang// pad+mo shing yongs brtsegs pa'i zhes// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i gling dag la// rje rigs wa gdong rgyal po gnas// klu rigs du ma ldan pa gnas// byang phyogs pho
brang 'khor lo'i gling// las las grub pa'i shing dag la// dmangs rigs rgyal po bya rog gdong// rgyal rigs bram ze rje rigs dang// dmangs dang gdol pa la sogs pa// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/ klu
rigs nyi shu rtsa lnga yis// brdung zhing sems can gtub cing gsod// 'khor kyang dkor bdag srog bdag gi/ dri za zur phud lnga pa ru// yam shud klu btsan gnam the'u dang// rgyal bran sum brgya

drug cu'i bdag/ rgyal rigs dag gi 'khor ni gnas// klu bsen mo dang mtsho sman dang// tsa mun ta dang bung byed gnag/ klu mo bdud mo ma mo kun// bram ze rje rigs 'khor na gnas// btsan dang klu dang klu

srin dang// zha bo sgur po 'on pa rnams// rje rigs klu yi 'khor na gnas// dam sri mo dang sa bsen dang// 'byung po btsan dang sna tshogs ston// dmangs rigs gdol pa'i 'khor na gnas// theg chen rgyal po

sa dang 'dra/ khrus la dga' bas bram ze chu// tsha bdud me 'dra rje'u rigs// yang g.yo mi brtan dmangs rigs la/ lci 'thib tsha bsreg drang zhing bsil// yang zhing g.yo ba'i dug kyang 'phro// rgyal rigs sha dang

mgo la 'jug/ bas ldags gze gu me dba' dang// 'brum nad nad kyi sna tshogs gtong// bram ze khrag dang chu la 'jug khrag skye btsan ltar snying mi dga'// 'gro snying 'dod dang du 'dod gla// phyogs sangs
khyer te gzhan la 'phro// rje rigs drod la 'jug ste skams// sha mdangs bar zug lus po rtse// skabs su pho log glang nad 'ong// dmangs rigs rlung gi sgo nas 'jug/ glu len gar byed mig rtsa srung// nad

rigs du ma gtong ba ste// rigs bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas// 'gro ba yongs la 'tshe bar byed// bdud kyi khyams ka nang du khrid// gling chen gcig la brtsi ba'am// yang na ri bo gcig la yang// chu mig

gcig la rim pa sbyar// sa dkar sa ser dmar dang gnag/ rigs kyi lta phyogs kun la khyab// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ phyi gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa la/ klu gnas
tshul dang/ de yi 'khor dang/ dug dang/ nad dang/ rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag rdzogs pa yis// 'khor la nges par bka' stsal pa// srid pa'i ri bo lhun po
yis// dpag bsam ljon shing rdzogs pa'i 'og/ rgya mtsho 'khyil ba zhes pa'am// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das par// gson gshin gnyis kyi zam kha ba// bdud po nag po skye 'gro'i bdud// sku ni ri rab
ngos la rten// zhabs ni rgya mtsho'i gting du brkyang// spyan mig 'gro ba yongs la gzigs// phyag ni stong gsum kun tu nyul// srid gsum tshangs pa'i rgyal por gnas// srid gsum 'joms pa gdug pa'i

yum// dbang po lnga nyid klu rigs lnga// rtsa rgyus rgya mtsho ljon shing tshul/ khyon du rdzogs pa'i gzugs gnyis la// 'chi bdag klu yi rang bzhin rdzogs// gsang bar mi gnas gzhed byed yul// yang dag mtha' la
rnam par gnas// gsang ba dbus kyi thig le nyid// rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs byed sku// 'bras bu mi gnas chos kyi dbyings// chos nyid rtsa la rgyal rigs te// sa yi 'jigs pa rnam dag

nas// 'bras bu me long lta bu'i sku// ye shes rtsa la bram ze ste// mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid// yon tan de bzhin rje rigs te// me dang me ru 'dzin pa nyid// so sor kun rtog ye shes dang// rang rgyud rtsa la

dmangs rigs te// skyon byed rlung nyid bya ba grub// tshogs brgyad rten gyi si ra brgyad// byang sems rgyal po nA ga brgyad// rtsa bran sna tshogs nA ga klu// yon tan lhun grub mngon sangs rgyas// nA ga rak+sha ye shes
chos kyi sku// shes pa 'pho bas gzugs brnyan nyid// rtsa bzhi'i dgongs pa nam mkha'i khongs su sdud// srid gsum lus dang shes pa'i rgyud la gnas// 'bras bu mi gnas ye shes 'jam pa'i sku// zhes gsungs

so// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ gzugs kyi phung po dang/ rtsa brgyad shes yul klu dang rang bzhin gnas pa'i le'u ste sum cu so gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po

yis// 'khor lo nag po'i dbye ba bshad// 'khor lo rnam pa gsum yin te// gnas pa rang rgyud 'khor lo dang// las rgyud mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bshad// gnas pa rang rgyud 'khor lo lnga// spyi bo sa yi 'khor lo
dang// mgrin pa chu yi 'khor lo dang// snying kha me yi 'khor lo dang// lte ba rlung gi 'khor lo dang// gsang ba skye gnas 'khor lo lnga// bde chen 'dab bzhi sum cu gnyis// snying po dbus na rgyal po

rigs// dkar khra sbrul gyi 'khrul 'khor te// pad+ma ka li'i yig 'bru gang// tshangs pa bde chen mgo la gnas// longs spyod bde chen rdzogs mdzad pa// bzhi dbus brgyad gnyis ldan pa la// dbus na snying po
bram ze gnas// mi yig A li ldan par gnas// mgrin pa skyod byed lam la gnas// chos kyi 'khor lo bzhi dang brgyad// tshe srog 'dzin 'bru de yis gang// rje rigs rin po che la gnas// sprul pa bzhi dbus

'khor lo ni// drug cu bzhi ldan dmangs rigs dbus// rgyu yi yig 'bru ldan pa ste// rin chen rdzing la rten par gnas// gsang ba skye gnas 'khor lo ni// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi bde chen drod// bong byed yig 'bru

du ma gang// gdol pa gsang ba'i rtsa la gnas// drug gis rang bzhin rjes su 'jug/ sbor g.yo sdud pa'i dbus na yam// thig le brten pa'i srog shing tshul// steng sgo 'og sgo sbyor ba'i sa// 'phel 'grib srog
sbyor thabs dang ldan// rang gnas bsam gtan 'brel bar bshad// las 'grub mtshon cha'i 'khor lo dag/ rtsa ba yan lag log then gsum// 'khrul 'khor nag po ma ra'i dug/ rdzas kyi sbyor ba thams cad
kyis// sngags kyi mtshon cha gcod par bshad// nA ga sku yi sgrub pa 'di// sbal nag lto sbyor dgra gzugs la// rbad bsad drag po'i yi ge spras// 'chi bdag srin po shu bu yi// lto bar gtad de

mnan pa dag/ sbal nag lto sbyor 'khor lo bshad// nA ga thugs kyi sgrub pa ste// lnga phung tshang pa'i gzugs phung la// 'chi bdag yab yum sku gzugs dang// sbrul brgyad dang ni khram shing dang// sbal nag nyi shu

rtsa brgyad dang// lce spyang la sogs sa bdag gzugs// lto brgyad ldan pa'i dbugs dril tu// bdun bsgrags sum bsgrags rnga gling dang// dril dang so sor gtor ba dang// rnam grangs du ma byed pa ste// dze nag
las kyi 'khor lo gsungs// nA ga gsung gi sgrub pa ste// thod pa gshags nas klu gzugs bya// sbrul nag gdug pa'i ra can gyis// lto bar 'khor lo bris nas ni// sngags gsum bod rbad gsang dang gsum

rdzogs nas// 'byung bzhi sngags kyis las mtha' rtul// klu bdun sbrul nag 'khor lor bshad// phung shig nag po sgrub pa ste// mdze thod pho mor 'khor lo bri// sdig pa dang ldan rtsa sngags stong// dregs pa drug

gis khram la gdab/ khram sngags bdud kyis gsang ba tsam// phung shig ngan sngags las kyi gcong// phung bshig sdig pa'i 'khor lor bshad// klu bdud gcig pa zhes bya ba// srog gi spar pu nag po ste// rten
mchod las kyi dam shig bsad// sbyor ba mkhas pas khyim du gzhug/ sa bdag srog gi 'khor lor bshad// yan lag 'khor lor bshad bya ba// sbal pa dkar nag lto ba ru// rten gyi yang dag ling ga
sngags// nA ga klu la gtad pa'i za byed nag po'i 'khor lor bshad// bam chen thod pa rab gshags la// 'byung ba dgra gshed nag po'i ming// shan pa dgra gshed 'khor lor bshad// mi rus ling ga'i mig

gzugs gnyis// lto sbyor g.yas g.yon rgya dag tu// 'dus pa'i gzugs kyis spras pa ste// gro ga skal pa'i las dag ni// sdug byed nag po'i 'khor lor bshad// nA ga rak+sha zhes bya ba// 'chi bdag srin po'i

sgrub pa ste// rang gnad stobs kyi 'khor lo bshad// nA ga ru tra zhes bya ba// spu gri rno dbal stobs 'gran pa// sdig pa phung shig po ste// ur mo sogs 'debs 'khor lor bshad// nA ga yak+sha gnod sbyin

klu// nor bu bum pa sgrub pa ste// gnod sbyin 'chi bdag ces bya ba// longs spyod 'phel ba'i 'khor lor bshad// bza' rgod 'chi bdag ces bya ba// sbyor ba kun gyi mthu dril bas// 'jig rten cho 'brang rlag

byed pa// skyin thang nag po'i 'khor lor bshad// yan lag bsdebs kyi 'khrul 'khor ni// byad kyi bka' nyan sna 'dren ni// srog bdag yab shud sgrub pa ste// shan pa srog gi 'khor lo bshad// sdong zla nA ga sa
ma ti// bod rbad klu yi sdong zlar bshad// phung shig nag po'i 'khor lor bshad// myur mgyogs drag shul ki kang ste// dus tshod stobs kyis ki kang 'bab// za byed srog gi 'khor lor
bshad// byad ma sna tshogs nad kyi bdag/ sngon mo go zu rbad pa ni// nad 'bebs ma mo'i 'khor lor bshad// log then dkrugs cing bzlog pa ste// sngags bzlog 'byung ba dkrug pa ni// las kun gdug

pa'am shing tu 'khor// lan gsum las kyi thus ka de// de ma yin par rang nyid brlag/ shi sa nad kyi 'khor lor bshad// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo de dag la// rtog pa gnas bsgyur 'khor lo dang// sbyor

ba rten byed rdzas kyi 'khor lo dang// dngas snyigs dbye ba sngags kyi 'khor gsum// gang grub re la khyab par bya ba gces// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsar rgyud las/ 'khor lo bstan pa'i

le'u ste sum cu so bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// yang dag rdzogs la 'di skad gsol// snyigs ma lnga yi dus dag tu// sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas tshe// gal te las 'gyangs don med pa// lto
dkrugs ar la gtad pa dang// 'byung pa gshed du dbab pa gang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// las rnams kun gyis ma byung na// srid pa lto ba dkrug par bshad// de min rang la gnod pas

na// 'ga' la ma yin smos tshad brlag/ de yi sbyor ba bshad bya ba// rgyu bzhin ldan pa'i 'khor lo ste// ka ri ka li bri ba yang// sbal ba'i lto ba dag la ni// dag gzugs lus la 'byung ba'i sngags// bsad dang
rbad pa sngags mgo nang// gru gsum nang tshangs bcas pa la// sngags pa mi lus sbrul mgo brgyad pa gdag pa'i mtshon// sngags ni spu gri nag po ste// a mu ka yi gnad gcod byed// 'khor lo zhag grangs

gsum du bskor// ngan sngags gdug pa 'di lta ste// dza dza/ Na ra ma sha truM sha baM/ sa la la tsa pa tsa pa/ ti rbad/ sha rag gu bu rbad/ sh-i kri ri sha ti gro ga na tsa ba ti po nag shaM nag po paM krag thur snying la/ snying la

tsi tsi rgyas/ rtsa bzhi bskums/ 'gul myags myags// thur sod swAhA/ srog la bred shag/ raM raM raM/ laM laM laM khaM khaM khaM/ yaM yaM yaM/ nag po snying la thur thur gshogs/ ces ni bzlas shing yungs kar brab// 'khor

lo lto dkrug thod par gzhug/ nag po klu yi grong khyer gtad// myur du brlag par yang dag bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ sbal na 'khor lo lto dkrug gi le'u ste sum cu
so lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mdze ldan thod pa nag po bzhag/ 'khor lo yab yum rnal ma las// 'khor lo nyi ma bzhi ru bskor// las kyi ngan sngags thun bzhi yang// nyi ma bzhi ru shes
par bya// thod pa 'khor lo re bas gtum// gdug pa gnas pa'i sa ru gtad// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rak+sha che ge mo la he khu la phe shan phos phos shag shig/ chum chuM hu ya hu ya klu nag po mgo

dgu pa/ dgra bo'i srog laM laM nag po baM tsi tsi rgyas// ha la ha la dza la snying la 'dus/ sha thur sod rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la raM raM raM/ nag po tsi tsi rgyas/ ha la ha la rtsa ma ri/ rtsa la 'dus/ baM khris srog

la thur thur sod rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la khang khaM khaM khaM nag po rtsi rtsi rgyas/ ha la ha la/ rtsa ma ri khrag la tig khaM 'dus ro la thiM/ shan shan tsit+ta rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la yaM yaM/ nag po baM tsi tsi rgyas/ trag thur snying

la ha tsa ma ri yaM 'gul myags myags rbad/ nyi ma bzhi ru 'khor lo bskor// dang po kha thun sngags dang sbrags// gnyis pa khrag thun brab par bya// gsum pa phur thun drag po ste// bzhi pa dug gi thun gyis
brab// 'khor lo rdzogs par gyur pa dang// nA ga gnas sar gnan gtad bya// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ mdze nag gnad gcod 'byung ba dkrugs pa'i phung shig nag po'i
le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges bshad pa// sbrul nag gdug ba'i 'khor lo ste// ras sam thod pa de dag la// dug sbrul nag po 'jigs pa la// lcags kyi rwa brgyad 'jigs pa'i

ltor// 'byung ba'i ngan sngags 'khrul 'khor bca'// bdag nyid dug sbrul rwa can gyi// rnal 'byor byas la sngags 'di bzlas// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ dgra bo'i glo snying la ma ra ya dza/ klu sbrul nag po snying la khruM

bu ye rbad// nag po ti pa tsa yA/ dgra bo'i glo snying la yA/ rbad bu ye thuM/ ril ye dza na ga rak+sha dza la tsi/ dgra snying la ha la 'dus/ laM laM laM rbad/ nA ga rak+sha dz+wa la tsi dgra snying la ha la 'dus/ raM raM raM rbad/ na ga

rak+sha dz+wa la tsi 'dus/ dgra snying la khaM khaM khaM rbad/ nA ga rak+sha dza la tsi/ dgra bo'i snying la ha la 'dus/ yaM yaM yaM rbad/ drag po gnad kyi dregs pa ste// zhag gsum rdzogs dang gnan pa bya// dpal zla gsang nag po

rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ dug sbrul nag po'i le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges bshad pa// sbal ba'i lto'am sbrul gyi lto// a mu ka'i sngags bris la// 'khor lo rdzogs par bya

ba 'don// bdag nyid klu yi rnal 'byor gyis// bod rbad sngags kyi grangs thim nas// 'byung bzhi mtshon cha'i 'khor lo dkrug/ nA ga hu ya b+ha ling dud pa che ge mo thuM sod/ zung nA' ga shig rol thib thib/ dam

shig ma ma mahA yak+sha na ga hu ya ba ling dung ba laM laM laM rtsa ta srog la hur shag myags myags khraM shig rbad/ ma ma snying khrag dun ting na ga hUM ya hUM ba ling dur pa raM raM raM tsit+ta srog la myal ti rbad/ tsit+ta brang shag mA

ra ya rbad/ ma ma ha la dun b+h+yo na ga hU ya bA ling dung pa khaM khaM khaM kha la khrag tig myag rmugs tsit+ta shag hur rbad/ ma ma yak+shi ma la rak+sha trag mo ba ling du ba yaM yaM yaM srog phye shag srog tig snying la

rbud/ ma ma yak+sha rak+sha/ nag mo ba ling dung pa baM raM khaM yaM/ dgra bo'i snying la hur rbud thums sod/ ma ha yak+sha rbad/ dam shi lnga yi ngan sngags la// 'byung ba dkrug ba'i sngags btags te// rtsa rgyud shes pa nye bar

gcod// dug gi spu gri nag po ste// ya bak+sha'i las yin te/ ha la nag po sbrul zin 'dra// bi tag ta'i khu ba bzhin// bya ba gang 'grub rlag par byed// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang ba'i rgyud

las/ srog pa'i 'khor lo nag po'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// yang dag rdzogs la 'di skad gsol// e ma bde chen nyid kyi sku// sangs rgyas drug gi rgyal po ste// rdo rje 'chang

gi ngo bo nyid// bka' rgyud gsang ba'i ngan sngags te// mtshon cha gsang ba'i 'khor lo 'di// dang po gang nas byung zhing gang du rgyud// rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// 'chi bdag ngo bo ji ltar lags// rgyud
kyi btsal thabs ji ltar lags// rdogs par gtad pa gang lags pa// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// rdo rje can la bka' stsal ba// e ma bde ba chen po'i sku// e

ma zhi ba'i rang bzhin can// skye med rnam dag chos dbyings na// skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'bar ba'i sku// rdo rje 'dzin la nga nyid kyis// bstan pa'i dgra lnga 'dul slad du// rtsa ba yan lag spu gri'i rgyud// zla gsang nag
po gsang ba'i bka'// gshin rje gshed kyi rang bzhin dngos// gdug ba'i 'khrul 'khor rol par shar// lho phyogs 'jig rten gshin rje'i yul// dug ri rgya mtsho 'khrug pa ru// rdo rje snying po nyid la
yang// gsang sngags rgyud kyi de nyid bstan// mtshan nyid zla gsang nag po ste/ ha la nag po'i dug bzhin du// kun gyi bya ba ma yin no// la sogs gsal bar bkod bas na// las rgyud 'khor lo rgyal por

gsungs// ngan sngags gdug po'i mtshon cha ston pas na// mtshon cha las kyi 'khor lo bshad// phung shig gdug pa can gyi rgyud// srog rgyud sa bdag snying gi rgyud// 'khrul 'khor mdze nag las kyi rgyud// phung

shig dug sbrul nag po'i rgyud// za byed rol ba shan dmar rgyud// gsang rgyud ngan sngags mtshon cha ste// rgya mtsho dug ri kha ru bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ rgyud 'byung ba

dang mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu ba'o//// de las 'chi bdag ngo bo ni// chos sku stong pa spros bral las// ya man ta ka 'jigs pa'i sku// sprul sku nag po ti ba tsa// dug lnga dbang sdud dregs
ba'i sku// rig pa'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// klu rnams kun gyi ded dpon de// ti pi tsa ya zhes su bstan// gshin rje kun gyi ded dpon te// dbye ba gung byings zhes su bstan// bdud kyi ded
dpon chen po ni// ha nu dpag shu gsod byed che// gnod sbyin rnams kyi ded dpon ni// ral pa tshar dgu zhes su bstan// lha yi ded dpon mdzad pa ni// mahA de ba na dgur grags// srin po kun gyi dad dpon

ni// srin po yak+sha mgo dgur grags// gza' yi ded dpon ra hu la// srid pa'i me po tshangs pa ni// tshangs ba'i shrI ral pa can// dregs pa chen pos 'dzin pa ste// nA ga rak+sha gdug ba'i sku// rgya mtsho rlung gi bar

na gnas// gshin rje nag po dgra yi gshed// bdud po mi zan skye 'gro'i bdud// skye dang 'chi dang na ba'i sa// srid pa dbang sgyur dregs pa ste// kun gyi ltag pa'i bdud khung na// srog bdag chen po de na
gnas// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ 'chi bdag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// gsang ba'i bka' rgyud las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di/ btsal thabs bstan pa 'di lta ste/

dper na brjod pa'i rgyal po seng ge gangs la sba/ gcan gzan ri dwags yongs su skrag pa ltar// de bzhin rang gnad dug ri rgya mtsho 'di// sems kyi dkyil du rang rgyal btab la sba// e ma mkha' 'gro lha dang

mi// gsang ba rgyud kyi spu gri 'di// rnam rgyal pho brang byang shar gyi// yongs su sa brtol khog pa ru// rin chen sgrom bu rang rgyas btab// yang na 'dzam gling lho phyogs gling// sha ma ta'i 'jig rten gyi// pho brang
sbrul ril can 'og tu// bse lcags sdig sbrul bar du bca'// gang dag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// gsang ba'i bka' rgyud de ltar bca'// chu srin gre ba'i rin chen ltar// srid pa 'khrugs kyang khar mi
'byung// zhes lung btsa' bar dam bcas te// rgyal po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ rgyud btsal ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas yongs su rdzogs par gtad de/ chos nyid spros

bral bde ba chen po'i ngang// 'du bral med pa'i don du gtad// ye shes lha yi rang bzhin las// 'og min pho brang brdal ba ru// longs spyod rdzogs pa rgyal ba yi// rang dngas rig pa'i ye shes la// ngar 'dzin
med pa'i klong du gtang// de bzhin byang sems rdo rje yis// ri rab zom dang rgya mtsho'i klong// dregs pa'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu// 'gro ba gdul phyir bka' rgyud gtad// lha dang mkha' 'gro dregs pa

dang// gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang// srog bdag gnod sbyin lha klu dang// bdud dang srin bu lha ma yin// kun kyang gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor// lho phyogs dur khrod gtum drag tshal// rgya mtsho dug ri
yod pa'i gnas// 'jigs byed rgya mtsho 'khrug pa ru// gshin rje gshed po dge 'dun dang// sna tshogs gzhan dang ldan cig tu// rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid// phyag rgya chen po rngam pa yis// 'chi

bdag bdud kyi 'khor lo ste// dug gi spu gri gsang rgyud 'di// rdo rje snying po nyid la gtad// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po yis// lha dang mkha' 'gro rnams la gtad// lha dang mkha' 'gro mang po des// 'dzam gling nga
phyogs lo ka ste// sha ma ta yi lo ka ru// rin po che yi rang nan byas// lha dang dregs pa'i bka' rgyas btab// bse lcags sdig pa'i bar du gtams// de nas de rnams mi snang bar gyur to// dpal zla gsang

nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas lha dang mkha' 'gro de rnams 'dus te// klu rigs du ma dang bcas pa de dag gis bstod pa/ e ma ho/

sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang// mi rtog dbyings las thugs rje rol pa yis// 'gro drug thugs rjes 'dul mdzad phyag rgya'i sku// gnyis med rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// dregs pa 'joms mdzad

'jigs byed rdo rje can// mkha' ltar dag pa'i sku lnga 'jigs pa'i sku// rdo rje snying po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// dug lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes rnam dag sku// dbyings las rol pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po ste// bdud
kyi bdud gcig gshin rje gshed la 'dud// ces gsungs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dpal zla gsang nag po rgya mtsho dug ri kha'i gsang rgyud las/ bstod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//// dug

gi spu gri lta bu'i mtshon cha'i 'khor lo nag po// gsang ba'i rgya mtsho dug ri kha/ yak+sha 'khor lo nag po 'chi bdag klu yi zla gsang rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba su d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba snubs
ban rdo rje khri gtsug gis bsgyur ba/ rtsi yis byugs la chu dang brag la sbos/ ces gsungs so// ma sA ma yA/ na ra kan/ guh+ya/ a+thiMH//
rgya gar skad du/ shrI yak+sha tsakra kr-i sna gu ya sa mu tra ha la nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal yak+sha nag po gsang ba'i dug/ rgya mtsho dug ri nag po zhes bya ba/ dpal 'joms byed srin po klu 'dul

ba la phyag 'tshal lo// ma rig pa smag rum mun pa'i dbus rgya mtsho myos byed dug ri kha zhes bya ba bskal ba sbrul nag 'khyil ba'i gzhal yas khang/ rab tu 'jigs shing ya nga ba'i gnas/ dregs pa mdung pa'i
ded dpon/ dug sbrul nag po kha nas me 'bar ba/ lcags ru nag po gnam du zang nge 'dug pa/ khrag mig dmar po bzlogs nas gzigs pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa zhig dang/ yum klu mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma bya
ba/ ro stod mi la ro smad sbrul du 'dug pa/ srid gsum lto na 'char ba zhig gnas so// yab yum khram la 'debs shing khams gsum dbang du sdud bar gnas so// gzhan yang 'dug par byed kyi

klu bdud sbrul gyi gdeng ka can dang/ sa bdag nag mo za byed can dang/ gnyan ma glang gi mgo bo can la sogs pa'i sprul pa dang bcas pa pho brang rgya mtsho 'khyil pa na ri rab kyi ngos la sku rten te gnas
so// gzhan yang pho brang gi sgo re re na/ klu rgyal rigs dang/ rje rigs dang/ bram ze'i rigs dang/ dmangs rigs rnams gnas so// gzhan yang de dag re re la/ 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor te/ nad kyi

skal pa dang/ mtshon cha ngar bas sems can gyi srog dang bkrag mdangs la dbang sgyur te/ 'jig rten na grags shing dbang che ba bdud gtum bag can dang/ klu mi srun pa dag yin te/ de dag kyang sbrul nag po

'dis bran du 'khol bas/ de phyir sbrul nag 'dil mnan gtad do// rgya mtsho dug ri kha las rtog pa dang po'o//// de nas bstan pa la bar chod byed pa'i dgra bo bsgral ba'i phyir/ nA ga rA dza srin po sgrub

cing dgra la mdze nad sna tshogs gtang ba'i phyir/ gdug pa'i klu sgrub par bya'o// klu yi gnyen po nag po ti pa tsa bsgrub par bya'o// de yang chos kyi sku kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo nyid las/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku

dpal ya man ta ka/ sprul pa'i sku za byed nag po mgo dgu pa yin te/ don skye 'gag med pa'i sras zhe sdang nag po ti pa tsa zhes bya ba yin no// gsung las sprul bar gyad kyi yam shud dmar po yin no// thugs

las sprul pa za byed phung byed gza' sbyang chen po yin no// des na 'di nyid la nan tan byas nas khams gsum dus gcig la sgrol bar 'gyur ro// dang po bsnyen pa'i stobs kyis lha sgrub pa dang/ de nas nyid

sgrub te gtad khram so sor bya ba'o// dang po bsnyen po stobs kyi lha ni thad kyi gnyen po klu bdud nag po yin pas/ dang po dkyil 'khor gru gsum la// zla gam dmar po gsum gyis bskor// de yi phyi rim la

sbrul 'khyud pa bya'o// gru chad dang sgo drang ldan par byas la/ dbus su klu bdud kyi gzugs bzhag/ klu bdud la gtor ma dang/ 'bras chan dang/ gser skyems bshos bu yang dgram mo// de nas ting nge 'dzin
rnam gsum las/ yi ge hUM mthing nag gcig sgom mo// hUM las 'byung ba rim par chags pa las/ khaM zhes brjod pas gzhal yas khang gcig sgom mo// oM phe sha ga/ bruM zhes brjod pas/ sbrul nag gi gzhal

yas khang/ chu srin gyi thog phub pa/ rus sbal gyi ya them dang ma them byas pa/ gzas pa pho mo'i gdan dang ldan pa la/ rlung nag gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa/ de yi gdan stengs su yi ge hUM de babs pa las/ oM

nag po ti pa tsa ya swa dwa du pa tsa dza be ru na hUM/ zhes brjod pas da ci bas kyang gsal 'od sngo dmar 'phro bar bsam/ oM nag po ti pa tsa ya kha sha sha hu ya hu dza hUM yaM hUM ya/ zhes pa brjod pas sbrul

nag po kha nas me 'bar ba/ mig dang sna nas khrag dang chu ser 'dzag pa/ sbrul nag de lag pa brgya dang ldan pa/ g.yas pa sbrul gyi zhags pas dgra po 'ching ba/ g.yon pa nad kyi rkyal pa rdegs pa/ mjug ma rgya

mtshor brkyang ba/ gzugs phung ri rab la bsten pa/ dbu bar snang khams su 'phyo ba/ lag pas stong gsum nyab par bsam mo// oM nA ga rak+sha phe shan shu shi pa rak+sha hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ yum klu mo nag mo sku

stod bud med nag mo'i cha lugs su 'dug pa/ sku smad sbrul nag la nya chen yor mo'i thul pa gon pa/ sbrul nag gi ral pa la mdze shu tsha tsha 'phro ba/ mig nas khrag 'dzag ba/ sna nas nad kyi rlangs pa 'byin pa/

zhal nas sbrul dang sbal pa nag po'i cho 'phrul 'gyed pa/ g.yas pa sbrul nag gi zhags pa thogs nas gtso la 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa mdze shu'i rkyal pa phyogs bcur 'thor pa/ gzas pa po ni snying brabs/ nas

gtso la btab par sgom/ yum gyi thugs kha nas hUM nam las/ sku yi sprul pa klu bdud kyi gdeng kha can dang/ gsung gi sbrul pa gnyan dmar glang mgo can dang/ thugs kyi sbrul pa sa bdag za byed nag po dang/

gzhan yang phe rak+sha zhes brjod pas/ dzaHhUM zhes brjod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/ klu dang klu bdud sa bdag dang klu btsan du ma gyur pa med pa gtso bo la phyag byed cing las la rgyug par bsam/ de

nas/ oM nag po ti pa tsa ya kha yak+sha hu ya hu ya dza hUM ya hUM ya dza/ nA ga rak+sha phe shan shu sha be rak+sha hUM sa ma ya dza dza/ zhes spyan drangs la gnyis su med pa la/ oM nA ga rA dza du ba pu tsa me hUM/ ba ling ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/

zhes mchod pa dbul lo// de nas rgyun gyi bsnyen pa ni/ oM a shaM nag po ti pa tsa nas ga krod+hi shwa ri traM shaM cad bu gu rak+sha sa ma ya hUM dza dza/ zhes bzlas so// rtags ni lus kyug 'gul pa'am 'khrig pa 'ong/ rmi

ltas su sbrul nag po 'ong/ sbal pa nag po 'ong// 'bri rog dang g.yag rog po 'ong// sbrul dang nya sram mang po 'ong/ phyugs ma mang po ded cing rmi ba dang 'khor ba 'byung/ de rnams ma lus bran du 'khol ba'i

rtags yin no// rdzas dang/ sngags dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyis nag po ti pa tsa nyid sgrub pa dang klu rnams bran du 'khol cing bzlog pa bya ba de la med/ rgya mtsho dug ri kha gnyen ti pa tsa sngon du sgrub pa'i rtog pa
gnyis pa'o//// de nas nag po ti pa tsa mdze nag las kyi 'khor nag po 'khor lo bzhi lcags kyi las thod pa zhal 'byed 'di brtsam mo// sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas la/ mdze can nam/ mo rab chad
nag po mgo bo'am/ lnga phung yan lag rdzogs pa gcig blangs la/ zhag bdun du bsgrubs la gtad las rdzogs par bya'o// de yang gtad khram chen por bya ba dang/ 'khor lo bzhi lcags kyi thod

sgrub dang/ las rkyang pa thor bur so sor bya ba gsum du gsungs so// de la dang po gtad khram chen po byed na/ mdze can nam/ dig pa rabs chad kyi lnga phung yan lag gcig la ma lus par mnan pa'i rdzas su

gtad de/ de ci'i phyir gtad na/ de dag sa bdag klu gnyan gyi grong khyer chen po cig yin pas so// de las gtad pa'i las rims la/ dang po rten bca' ba dang/ 'khor lo bri ba dang/ bsgrub pa bya ba dang/ tha
ma gtad pa dang gsum du gsungs so// rten bca' ba ni ris sam 'bur du gtod/ sbrul nag kha nas me 'bar ba cig rten du bzhag go/ 'khor lo bri zhing dgod pa ni/ mdze can thod pa sha ras ris med par

byas la/ sog les gshags la/ dbus su gshin rje'i zhal bris la/ tha ma gsang sngags kyis bskor la/ gcig la yum gyi 'khor lo bri// de ni dpe chung ltar bya/ thod pa sbrul gyi pho brang ngo// de nas rkang brgyad

ni sbrul nag brgyad yin pas kha dog bsgyur/ sgal tshigs ni sbal pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad du kha dog bsgyur/ de nas dgra re re la ling ga sum cu rtsa bdun byas la thod par brubs la/ klu yi dkyil 'khor gong mar
bzhengs pa'am 'brub khung gi dkyil 'khor bcas la drag po'i sngags la 'jug par bya'o// de yang nyid sgrub mtshan bsad pa'o// de ni drag sngags gsang bar bzlas pa yin te/ rnal 'byor pas lus mi bde ba

byung na las grub yin pas chog go/ dang po klu bskyed pa dang/ spyan drangs pa dang/ mchod pa dbul ba dang/ 'phrin las bcol ba kun shes par byas la/ sgrub sngags 'dis zhag bdun du sgrub bo// oM a shaM

nag po ti pa tsa na ga kro tI shA ri traM shad rbad/ bu ga rak+sha tsit+ta rbad/ sha truM sha ma ra ya na hUM dza dza/ zhes sgrub pa zhag bdun bya/ de nas zhag bdun bsad pa'i sngags 'di nyi mtshan phye la bya'o// de la nyi ma bdun gyi

sngags ni 'di dag go/ oM nag po ti pa tsi ya/ na ga rak+sha che ge mo hi gu sa phye shan phos phos shig shig chum chum hu ya hu ya/ klu nag po mgo dgu pa dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ zhes bzlas so// mtshan bdun gyi sngags ni/

nag po pang tsit+ta la rgyob trag thur snying la thur/ snying gul gul myags myags rtsa bzhi skums/ shan shan srog la shan/ thur thur srog la thur/ che ge mo ma ra ya sod swAhA/ zhes mtshan mo bzlas so// de nas rtsigs

ma la khram shing byas la/ dgra bo khram la dza thur gyi sngags kyi gyad dbab pa byung ste/ ya ma ra dza dgra bo'i snying la ya ya/ gshin rje nag po dza hur dgra la b+h+yo/ nA ga gen tsi 'dus 'dus dza thur dgra la b+h+yo/ a be she

he/ thuM he thuM dza thur dgra la b+h+yo/ nag po kha nun tra de chod dgra la ya ya/ dza thur snying la thur snying la/ yaM dza thur snying la yaM ma snying thur dgra la yam/ ma snying thur dgra la yaM b+h+yo/ de nas zhag bdun

sgrub pa rdzogs pa dang mnan gtad byas te/ de yang byang phyogs kyis chu mig gam/ chu mig kha phyogs bcur bltas par thod par gzhug go/ de nas rkang brgyad sbrul nag brgyad du byas la khog par ling ga re re

bcug la chu mig phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir gnan to// de nas sbal ba'i khung par liM ga re bcug la klu nag gi lce mdung re re la gtad do// sogs gnyis la ling ga re re bris la seng ldeng gi phur pa re re la
btab la/ dur khrod kyi byad kyi bka' nyan la gtad do// de ltar byas na myur du brlag par 'gyur/ gal te lo dus rtags med na las ma grub pas zhag bdun nam gsum du bkan bzlog gi las 'di byas te

'di grub par the tshom med do// gnyan sa dgu yi chu mig nas chu blangs la/ de yi nang du yungs kar la sngags bzlas la/ dgra bo'i ling ga mang po bris la/ bra ma'i sbyin sreg byas la thal pa chu yi nang du blugs

la/ sngar gang gnan pa byas pa'i steng du chu bag re blug go/ des ni klu 'byams pa 'gugs las la 'dzud do// gnad la phebs so// gyang 'gyel ba bzhin du 'gro'o// oM nag po mgo dgu pa hu ya hu ya chuM chuM/

shig shig phos phos phe shag he gu la che ge mo na ga rak+Sha tsi pa la ya nag po dgra bo ma ra ya dza/ nag po srog la shan thur thur srog la nan shan shan/ rtsa bzhi bskum myags myags/ snying gul gul snying la thur

rnag thur tsit+ta la rgyob/ baM dgra bo mA ra ya sod swAhA/ zhes bkan bzlos kyi sngags dkrug cing chu la bstim mo// ling ga la brab cing/ hom la bsregs la/ de nas gtad sar klu des dgra gyang 'gyel ba ltar
'gro'o// rgya mtsho dug ri kha las/ mdze nag las kyi 'khor lo bsad pa'i gtad khram chen po'i las bstan pa rdzogs so// rtog pa gsum pa'o//// de nas nag po ti pa tsa yi mgo dgu pa yi ngan sngags/

mdze nag las kyi 'khor lo nag po 'khor lo bzhi sbags dug gsum sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste/ de yang thog mar bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas la/ zhag bdun du klu za byed nag po 'byung ba 'khrug pa'i ngan sngags 'di la
'jug go/ mdze can gyi thod pa blangs la/ dri bsangs la/ sha med bar byas ste/ de'i nang du dgra bo'i a mu ka'i rdzas blangs la/ dgra gzugs legs par byas la/ rgya shog gi ro ras 'khor lo bzhi byas la/

mdze rigs dug mdar 'phang ba ste/ gcig sbal nag gi lto bar mdze nag sa yi 'khor lo bca'/ sbal pa ljang nag gi lto bar mdze skya rlung gi 'khor lo bca'/ sngal pa dmar po'i lto bar mdze dmar me yi 'khor
lo bca'/ sbal pa ser po'i lto bar mdze thun chu'i 'khor lo bca'/ de nas 'khor lo'i rigs bzhir rgyas gdab ste/ mdze thod dam thod ngan gyi khar dgram mo// bca' bzhi rdzogs pa dang/ bdag

nyid dug sbrul nag po'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ ngan sngags brab bo// rtags ni thod pa 'gul ba dang/ rang gi lus phrig phrig pa dang/ shig shig pa dang/ kyug kyug pa'o// nam byung ba dang gtod/ 'chi
bdag bskyed pa dang/ spyan drangs pa dang/ 'phrin las bcol ba kun shes par bya ba'o// des grub nges te/ gal te 'dod pa'i dus su rtags ma byung na// dkyug bzlog nag po zor gyi las byas na mthar brlag

par 'gyur ro// klu yi sgrib shing bcang ba gal che'o// sa ma ya/ ngan sngags nyin mtshan phye la bzlas so// oM nag po ti ca ya/ nA ga rak+sha che ge mo he gu la phe shan phos phos/ shig shig chuM chuM/ hu ya hu ya/ klu nag

po mgo dgu pos dgra bo ma ra ya dza/ dza nag dzo la baM baM baM tsit+ta la khas/ nri mA ra dza la dzi baM baM tsit+ta nA' ga raM baM baM baM nan dgra bo la mA ra ya/ dza nag dzi la raM raM raM tsit+ta khas nri dza la dza la raM raM raM tsit+ta nA gar

nan dgra bo mA ra ya/ dza nag dzi la khaM khaM khaM tsit+ta khas ni la dzi dza la dzi khaM khaM khaM tsit+ta na ga ra khaM khaM khaM nan dgra bo mA ra ya dza nag dzi la yaM yaM yaM tsit+ta nA ga raM baM baM baM dgra bo mA ra ya/ nyin mo bzlas so// mtshan nag mo
las spu gri btags la bzlas so// de rdzogs pa dang/ thod pa 'khor lo chu mig kha phyogs bcur bltas pa'am/ byang shar du gnan ne/ 'khor lo bzhi sbrul nag gi lto bar bcug la gnan par bya ste/ phyogs

bzhir mnan no// lo dus su 'gor yang rtag 'ong ngo// gal te ma byung na/ oM nag po mgo dgu pa hu ya hu ya/ chuM chuM shig shig phos phos phe shan he gu la che ge mo mA ra ya nA ga rak+sha tsi pa ya nag po dgra bo ba mA ra

ya dza/ baM baM dza nag ji la tsit+ta khas/ baM baM baM nri dza la dzi tsit+ta nA ga ra baM baM baM nan dgra bo mA ra ya/ zhes bzlas gzhan des 'dre/ mtshan nag mo'am bam dkrugs pa bzlos/ 'khor lo bzhi sbags ni/ sbrul nag

sdig pa/ chu srin sbal nag bzhi bya'o// sa ma ya/ rgya mtsho dug ri kha las/ mdze nag las kyi 'khor lo nag po bzhi dang sbags pa'i rtogs pa bzhi pa'o//// rgya yig bya'o// de nas klu yi pho nya bskul zhing las
bcol ba ni/ hUM/ rgya mtsho mer ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rin chen gling dgu'i gzhal yas nas// ri rgyal lhun po'i khri stengs nas// sbrul nag chen po sku bzhengs shig/ sku ni nam mkha'i gtos dang
mnyam// thugs ni srid gsum sa le gzigs// gsung ni sgra chen 'jig rten sgrogs// dbang ni bar snang khams nas 'phyo// zhal ni bar snang khams na gdangs// lce ni khams gsum rnyog cing nyal// spyan mig
gzigs pa'i sdang mig bgrad// sems ni gdug rtsub nang na bzhugs// legs nyes zhal lce drag tu gcod// phyag ni stong khams yongs su rnyeg/ zhe sdang dbang gi sbrul du bzhugs// sku ni dug

sbrul nag po la// zhabs ni brnag ba'i dgra bo gzir// lhang lhang tsher tsher skad ngan gyis// tshangs pa'i gnas chen man chod du// sdug bsngal nga ro mi snyan pa// mgo ba'i lha dang dbang med phral// sbrul nag
lus la rngam pa'i zhal// rngams pa'i zhal ni 'jigs par gdengs// las ngan dus zas zhal du rdabs// sbrul nag lus la me chen 'bar// me yi nga rgyal gdug par 'khyil// dam nyams 'byung po thal bar
rlog/ sbrul nag lus la sdig pa'i dbu// dam nyams dgra la mi 'khril lam// sbrul gyi mjug mas rgya mtsho 'khrug/ klu gnyan pho mo las la 'dzud// dam nyams 'di las 'khyud re ran// sbrul nag thugs kyis

stong khams khyab// thugs kyi sprul pas snang srid 'gengs// snang srid lha 'dre ra mda' gnyer// dam nyams drung nas 'byung re ren// hUM/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gting rum nas// yan lag brgyad ldan nang nas sku
bzhengs shig/ sbrul nag lus la glang gi dbu// byol song lus la srul gyis brgyan// thugs kyi dkyil nas dbu dbyung ba// sbrul gyi thor tshugs cod pan can// 'khor ni klu rgyal 'bum gyis bskor// rgyal
rigs klu rnams pho nyar 'gyed// nyams pa'i dgra bo myur du sgrol// bka' yi las mdzad sprul pa ni// sbrul nag 'bum gyi dkyil 'khor nas// nad kyi mun nag 'thibs pa nas// klu bdud sbrul gyi gdengs ka
can// mi yi lus la sbrul gyi gzhug/ sbrul mgo gdengs pa'i 'jigs tshul can// lag nas sbrul nag zhags pa 'debs// klu bdud klu srin dmag dpung byed// sdang ba'i dgra bo myur du sgrol// gsung gi sprul
pa bka' nyan ni// gnyan dmar glang gi mgo bo can// sku ni dmar nag khrag rul 'dra// lag na zhags pa dmar po bsnams// spyan mig nyi ma'i zer bas rno// mi yi lus la sbrul gyi gzhug/ sbrul gzhug rgya

mtsho'i gting du brkyang// gnyan gyi dmag dpung sdud par byed// sdang ba'i dgra bo myur du sgrol// thugs kyi sprul pa bka' nyan ni// sa bdag za byed nag po ni// sku mdog dud kha 'jigs pas te// sbal nag

stams pa'i khri la bzhugs// mi yi lus la gcan gzan mgo/ sbrul gzhug rgya mtsho'i gting yang 'khrug/ lag na zhags pa nag po thogs/ kha rlangs nad kyi mtsho sprin chags// mche ba rnon bo dug gi ngar// sbal

pa nag po pho nyar 'gyed// sa bdag gnyan gyi dmag dpung sdud// sdang ba'i dgra bo myur du sgrol// hUM/ lcags mtsho nag po'i klong dkyil nas// klu mo nag mo mgo 'phyang ma// thugs ni rgya mtsho'i gting na
bzhugs// sku la sbrul gyi glog pa gsol// klu chen brgyad kyi sbyor ba mdzad// chibs su chu srin pir la chibs// chibs kyi de ni snga gong na// nad kyi rkyal ba sngo dmar bkal// chibs kyi de ni phyi

long la// mtshon gyi gru gu dmar nag bkal// mdze dang lhog pa'i sna 'dren ma// kha nas dbugs 'byin mi nad gtong// dgra bo'i shi la yengs ma nga// dgra bo'i bla la mthu ma chung// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting

rum nas// klu srin sring mo mgo brgya ma// chibs su chu glang sngon po bcibs// sku la chu dar sngon po gsol// mi thur chen mo gshen gcig ma// lcags kyi sbal pas stong gsum 'gengs// ral pa re la nad skal

re// nad kyi rkyal pas stong khams khengs// dgra bo rnams la yam nad thong// rgya mtsho'i nang nas sku bzhengs la// klu mo nag mo spyan gcig ma// ber nag khra bo sku la gsol// rin chen stong gi 'phreng

ba spyan// nyin bzhin ri rab rtse la bzhugs// mtshan mo rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// yud tsam spyan drangs mchis pa'i tshe// rgyug 'dral thabs kyi dgra bo 'dul// dam nyams dgra bo myur du sgrol// rin chen

gling dgu'i gzhal yas nas// klu bdud nag po spyan gcig ma// klu ba stong gi dbus na 'gying// chibs su sbal nag bre bo bcibs// sku la chu srin thul pa gsol// chibs kyi de ni snga gong la// nad kyi de ni

rkyal pa bkal// chibs kyi de ni phyi long la// mtshon gyi de ni gru gu bkal// phyag na khra baM dkar nag bsnams// bdag gis dung dung bos pa'i tshe// nad kyi rkyal pa brdeb kyin byon// mtshon gyi gru gu skyong ging

byon// ces bskul lo// rgya mtsho dug ri kha las/ klu bdud las la bskul ba'i rtog pa lnga pa'o//// de nas ngan sngags kyi rgyal po sdig pa phung shig 'khor lo 'di bsgrubs te/ gnas yid dang 'thad par phyin

la/ mdze can pho mo'i thod pa blangs la sha ras ris med par byas/ thod pa rgya skyegs kyis byugs la/ 'khor lo rtsibs drug la sdig pa rwa bgrad pa drug/ gcig la ling ga drug byas la lto sbyar te/ klu yi dam rdzas

bsags la/ bdag sdig pa phung shig tu bsgoms la/ ngan sngags 'di bzlas la gtad do// gtad sgrub zhag bdun las mang du mi rung// oM nag po ti pa tsi ya hU~M dza/ nA ga krod+hi shwa ri hU~M dza/ nA ga ra dza hU~M yaM hu yaM

baM ril dza/ nA ga rA dza ya her haM her haM baM ril dza/ nA ga ra dza du na du na hi li hi li na ga 'dus 'dus sa ma ya dza/ zhes rbod cing bsnyen no// oM nag po ti pa tsi ya/ dgra bo'i glo snying ma ra ya dza nag po ti ba tsa ya/

dgra bo'i snying la rbad bu rbad/ ye thum ril e dza nA ga rA dza dgra bo ni rbad/ shan ti rbad/ srog ti rbad/ snying ril ril rbad/ shaM shaM rbad/ mA ra ya rbad rbad/ ces bzlas na/ 'khor lo dang thod pa la sdom dang sdig
pa 'dzul nas 'ong ngo// rang gi lus skyug skyug na ba 'ong// thod pa mdzeg 'tsheg pa dang/ 'gas pa dang/ zer ba'o// rtags rdzogs pa dang/ gtad pa kun yin yang khyad par du byang phyogs

gdol pa'i chu mig tu gtad do// las myur du/ sngo la sbas pa skyal 'ong/ skya la sbal pa sngo la 'ong/ 'dom gang 'thur la bcal ba ni srang sgo'o// g.yas na lkugs sa thod legs ni me long ngo// de la gtad
do// las 'di las myur ba med do// zla ba gsum na mdzes khyer ba dang/ dri rgod dang lhog sgal drag pos 'gum mo// 'gor na sdig pa phung shigs 'dis klu gnad la dbab par 'gyur te/ chu mig dgu'i chu dang

dug khrag bsres la thun bcas la/ oM dza ye ril thum ye/ pu rbad ya/ dgra bo yo pa tsa ya/ ti pa nag dza ye bu khum la snying/ nA ga nag po'i klu sbrul dza ma ra ya/ glo snying dgra bo nag po ti ba tsa ya/ nA ga krod+hI shwa ri/

nA ga rA dza dgra bo snying la tshal pa tshal pa baM ril rbad thun b+h+yo/ nA ga rA dza dgra snying la hu yaM hu yaM rbad thun b+h+yo/ nA ga rA dza dgra snying la hur thums hur thums rbad thun b+h+yo/ zhes gtad pa'i sa phyogs su 'phangs na

klu gnad la phebs te/ myur du dgra bo khrag skyug pa dang mdze nad tsit+tas 'gum par 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho dug ri kha las sdig pa phung shig gi rtog pa drug pa'o//// de nas gtad pa sa yi 'khrul 'khor dang/ mi

ldog gnad kyi gzer mig bshad pa ni/ gtad pa ni rnam grangs mang yang/ 'dir ni rnam pa bzhi yi tshul lo// chu mig ni klu yi sgo ru 'dod do// klu yi rgyal po nag po mgo dgu pa rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs

so// chu mig na las byed pa'i klu rgyu'o// chu mig na klu rigs bzhi gnas te sgo ba yin no// de nas gang du gtad kyang gal med do// de yang gtad tshul bzhi yi 'khrul 'khor la// klu sbrul nag po mdze nag las

kyi 'khor lo'i gtad thabs ni/ chu mig kha phyogs bcur bltas par gzhug/ phyogs bzhi mi 'gyur ba'i gzer bzhi gdab bo// thod pa gnan pa'o// rkang brgyad dang sgal tshigs nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ klu sbrul nag

po'i lce dang mdung la gtad do// gzugs brnyan gyi sgo nas gtad pa yin// de yang sbrul 'dra ba dang/ sbal pa 'dra bar dang/ nya 'dra ba dang/ lcong mo 'dra ba dang/ glang dang/ phag pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ chu

srin dang/ rta bla ba dang/ 'bu dang/ grog mo dang/ sbur pa dang/ smyags pa'i bu mo dang/ mgo lnga mgo gsum la gtad do// de rnams kyang chu dang chas na klu/ shing dang chas na gnyan/ brag dang chas na sa
bdag/ de kun med kyang klu gnyan gzugs te/ sa mdog dmar na klu btsan/ gnag na klu bdud/ ser na sa bdag/ sngo na gnyan/ dkar na klu sman/ khrag bor na dug na klu srin yod do// de yang sbrul la rigs
lnga ste/ nam mkha' sbrul 'dra/ sa sbrul 'dra/ brag sbrul 'dra/ chu sbrul 'dra/ shing sbrul 'dra/ de yi mjug ma 'jug ma la mdung yod pas gtad pa yin/ gdong na lce yod pas gtad pa yin/ sbal pa

'dra ba la gsum ste/ sa sbal 'dra/ brag sbal 'dra/ ri sbal 'dra/ kha la lce yod pas gtad sa yin/ smad la mdung yod pas gtad do// nya la gnyis te/ sa nya dang chu nya'o// gshog la lce yod pas gtad do// ze

ba la mdung yod pas gtad do// lcong mo la bzhi ste/ sa dang/ chu dang/ na dang/ brag go/ mtshul pa la lce yod pas gtad do// mjug ma la mdung yod pas gtad do// glang la bzhi ste/ gad pa rdo ri nang/ mig

bzhi la lce yod pas gtad do// rwa rtse la mdung yod pas gtad do// phag pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ kha lce sna lce mdung yod pas gtad do// sdig pa la gsum ste/ ri dang chu brag go/ 'doms la lce rwa rtse mdung/ de

la gtad do// chu srin gnyis ri dang chu/ sna rtse lce/ sbar lag mdung yin pas gtad do// rta bla ba la gnyis/ nam mkha' dang sa'o// kha la lce/ lag pa mdung yod bas gtad do// 'bu la gnyis te/ sgang dang

brag/ lto ba la lce/ sgal pa la mdung yod pas gtad do// grog mo la gnyis te/ sa dang brag kha la mdung la yan lag la lce ste de ru gtad do// rus sbal la sgang dang/ ri dang/ brag dang ste/ lto ba la lce/ rgyab
la mdung yod pas gtad do// smug pa 'dra ba la dang brag kha la mdung/ yan lag lce rtse ru 'dod do// de la gtad na lce rtse yin/ mgo lnga mgo dgu thams cad la// kha la lce la yan lag mdung// klu bdud

sbal nag lce mdung la gtad na gar yang 'chor ba med do// gtad kha sum cu rtsa bdun rdzogs par bya ba ya bag sha sngags pa nang rgyas byung ba'am/ pha tshan ched po dgrar byung na// mdze nag po 'khor lo yi// lnga

phung rten dang bcas pa dag/ klu yi pho brang gtad pa 'di// gtad las chen po zhes bya'o// smos dgu rlag pa'i las su bshad do// gzhan la ni gtad thor bu re re 'grub nges so// gzhan nag po 'khor lo sbags
la 'byung bzhi dkrug pa'i gtad do// mtsho lkugs pa la bya bar shis so// sdig pa phung shig ni byang shar gdol pa byad par shis so gtad do// sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo ni sa'am gzhan yang dmangs rigs la
gtad do// klu mi log par bya ba ni/ dug gi dug 'joms pa/ bdud kyi bdud gcig nag po mgo dgu pa/ sbrul kha nas me 'bar ba sgom mo// sngon nas gtad kha phan chod do// gtad rdzogs thon nas phyag na rdo

rje sgom/ yang na gshin rje gshed po sgom/ klu yi sgrib shing bla shing dang/ shi shing lus la rten no// spyir za byed nag po sgom na ldog mi srid do// rgya mtsho dug ri kha las rtog pa bdun pa'o//// de nas sa bdag
srog gi 'khor lo nag pos/ dgra bo phung bar bya ba ni/ gzhung dang mthun par gnas su phyin la gtad sa'i sa nas sa chu blangs la/ dar ram shog shog la 'khor lo sbal pa'i gzugs byas la/
dbus su dgra gzugs bri/ tha ma la sngags kyis bskor la/ sa bdag klu sbrul gyi gzhug ma can/ mi yi lus po can/ chibs su lcags kyi phag mo la chibs pa/ g.yas na sbal nag gi rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba/

g.yon pa sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi 'phyar ba/ kha rlangs sbrul du 'khyug pa gcig tu sgom mo// de yi mdun na bdag gi dgra bo de/ ma he dmar po la bskyon nas las kyi rlung dmar gyis rgyab nas phul te/ zhe sdang sbrul
nag gnyis kyi kho yi lag pa khar bcug nas 'dug par bsam mo// de nas snying kha nas 'od nag po gcig 'phros pa las// klu bdud nag po zhes bya ba mi yi lus lag pa gnyis/ g.yas na mtshon gyi rkyal
