pa/ the'u gshog lcag mig ser/ gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mchu sder can/ so lcags de ltar rgyan dang cha lugs ldan pa ni des gzhan 'dul bas thugs rjes gzhan sgrol ba'o// phyi ma las dbang du bsdu ba'o// klu
dam tshig gi rgyud phyi ma las/ dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// klu'i dam tshig gi rgyud phyi ma'i las khol bu rdzogs so//// nA ga rA tsa sa ma ya tan+t+ra sa ma pa tra// a+thi+-i////
rgya gar skad du/ nA ga ka la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ klu nag po'i rgyud/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ ya ma lag na rdo rje 'chang/ klu'i bdag po

'jam dpal dpal 'bar che/ gnyen po gnad ldan bas nA ga bkol/ rdo rje drag po 'bar ba che// mi shigs pas na rdo rje drag/ tsham rngam 'bar ba yang dag go/ sbrul nag 'khyil ba'i ra ba khyon// 'jig rten klu

rnams sku la rdzogs/ khyab bdag che la yang dag par// 'chi bdag nag po mgo dgu pa// las kyi gshin rje rgyal po des/ nyid kyi srog gi de nyid/ smras pa/ nA ga du na he li he li/ 'dus 'dus/ 'khor dbang du

sdud par bya bar rig par bya'o// a sham nag po ti pa tsa/ nA ga kro d+hi shwa ri tri sham rbad/ nu gu rag sha rbad/ ti pa tsa pa tsa kha la baM sha truM sha ma ra na dzA dzA/ srog gi snying por rig par bya// nag po baM tsi rgyas/

trag thul snying 'gul myags myags/ rtsa bzhi bskums shan sha srog la shan thur sod swAhA/ klu yi dug mda' nag po ste// gsad pa'i mtshon char rig par bya// de nas de yi 'phrin las de// dben zhing nyam nga

gdug pa'i gnas// brag dang chu 'thab gnas mchog dang// rtsi shing stug po klu gnas par// maN+Dal mnyam po yid 'ong la// dri spos sman gyis chag chag gdab// klu gtor gtang zhing klu mchod bya// de rdzogs
a yi maN+Dal brtsig/ de yi las kyi 'khor lo yang// sbal nag las kyi 'khor lo ste// ka ri ka'am rgya shog gam// ta la'i lo ma gzhan dag la// sbal pa'i lto bar 'khor lo bri// dkar gtor klu gnas rdzas

kyis byug/ klu yi 'khor lo nag po la// gcug sngags dag gis brgyan pa ni/ kho ra khor yum rim pas brgyan// lte bar a mu ka yi rdzas// de las rgyu byas ling ka bri// srog gzhug khram la gdab par bya// sbal
nag 'khor lo sbyar ste// tshon skud bcings la bsgrub par bya// dang po bod pa srog gi gnad// 'khor rnams las la myur cing bod// gsang sngags yig drug gnyis te// rtags rnams ma byang bar du'o// de
rdzogs srog gi snying po ste// bcu gsum rtsa ba bdun pa dag/ de dag de la gdags zhes pa// bcu bzhi rtsa ba dgu pa'i sngags// las kyi gcong zhes yang dag bshad// de mthar bcu gnyis bzhi ldan pa// gsad

pa zhes kyi yang dag go/ rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba// chos kyi dbyings dang rang rig pa'i// ye shes gnyis su med pa las// sprul pa'i gshin rje dbu dgu pa// nA ga rag sha 'di sgoms shig/ kha sbyar yi ge phyir bstan
pa// bdud mda' la sogs rdzas kyis brab// rdzogs dang gtad pa'i las bya ba// rgyal po rje'u dang bram ze dmangs// kun la bya bar bshad kyang ni// 'di ni gdol pa nag po'i sngags// byang phyogs gnas pa
dmangs rigs kyang// las byed klu yi rigs su bzung// gsum gyi dbus sam gnyis kyi g.yas// gcig po dag la 'gyur ba med// thol thol ba ni mig yin pas// de 'og 'dom gang bcal

ba na// gdug pa can gyi kha yin gtad// zas dang grogs dang dgrar gtad pa// de ni bsam pa'i ngo bor bshad// klu la ldog pa'i dus dang rkyen// sngon du ldog dang sbyor ba ldog/ thug phrad rjes la ldog pa

dang// phyis ldog pas ni ldog dus yin// rang la ldog na dgra la ldog/ bsrung ba tsakra'i dang ldan ces// sngon du ldog par byed pa'i rkyen// rang sngags bzlas pas klu rnams 'du// dug chen klu rigs 'di dag
ni// dug 'joms 'chi bdag chen po bsgom// sbyor ba ldog pa 'di dag ste// 'khor lo yi ge dgra gzugs la/ kha rlangs dri dang dri ma dag/ 'dres na rang la ldog pas spang// thugs phrad ldog pa gtad dus
yin// lcags kyi sa kha dbye ba yin// de bzhin tshon dang dug shing dang// gdug pa tsher ma can gyi me// 'dir ni sha ru rtsi sman ldan// de ni nges par bya bar bshad// des dug spang zhing gza' dang

'grogs// rjes bzlog par ni gcad par bya// phyi mig mi lta khrag rjes gcad// lam phyag gos brun bskor ba bya// de bzhin klu yi gnyen po bskul// phyis ldog dgra zad rang la ldog/ ling ka rin po che dang

sbrag/ yang na gson gshin lag sbrel bya// des ni ldog pa lnga dag bsrung// de nas klu yi rgyal po dag/ bsrung ba'i rim pa de dag go/ klu yi rgyu dus rnam pa gsum// dngos dang yid dang sprul pa'o// dngos ni ra

ba bzhi la rgyu// yid ni 'bring po bzhi la ste// sprul pa tha chung bzhi la'o// de bzhin zhag dus re re la// dngos dang yid dang sprul pa gsum// tshes gcig nas ni gsum gyi bar// de bzhin zla ba rim pas
ni// 'khor lo lta bur rgyu bar bshad// dngos la gtad pa'i las bya zhing// yid rgyu ba la gtad lam bstan// sprul pa rgyu dus gtad dmag drangs// thebs dang ldog dang 'jam dang 'gor// thebs na gtang
rag gtang bar bya// 'byams na dgug par bya ba dang// 'gor na dmag drang ldog na bsrung// de rtags sngon du byung ba ni// zhag grangs gsum cu rtsa bdun na// klu yi rigs tshogs 'du bas ni// rtags rnams

de la 'byung bar bshad// rno myur srog gshed yin pas na// ra hu la dang yam shud bskul// dus tshod mtshon cha 'dra bas na// dmangs dang gdol pa'i dus nyid bzung// zhi drag rdzas kyis dbye bas na// thod

chen rdzas sbal glang ru yin// 'dir ni stobs chen khyu ba sto// dmar po mchog tu bshad ba yin// yang na tshe de kham pa'i mgo/ de yang shis par dpa' bos bshad// sbal nag 'khor lo las bskul ba// ka mar
nye bar btus pa ni// klu yi rgyal po gsang ba yi// bstod pa 'di dag rmad byung ngo// 'chi bdag nges par gnas bskul bas// bskal pa rlung nag 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rig pa'i rgyal

po 'chi bdag mgo dgu pa// bdud kyi bdud cig 'chi bdag kun gyi bdud// dgra bo'i bdud du 'chi bdag khyod las lhag pa med// rgyu ni rgya mtsho'i gting du rgyu// mgo ni klu srin pho nyar 'gyed// sku ni ri rab
ngos la brten/ khams gsum klu rnams dbang du sdud// sbrul nag 'bar ba'i ral pa la// mdze dang shu ba'i tsha tsha 'phro// a li sha'i sgra bsgrags pas/ khams gsum ma lus mdze yis 'gengs// mig nas khrag
gi bu yug 'bebs// zhal nas me yi phung po 'thor// sngags pas bos shing bcol ba'i tshe// g.yas rgya sbrul gyi zhags pa 'debs// g.yon na nad kyi rkyal pa 'thor// klu chen brgyad ni thugs kyi dkyil nas

'char// klu bran stong ni zhabs kyi 'og nas rgyu// klu bdud stong ni sku yi g.yas nas rgyu// sa bdag stong ni sku yi g.yon nas rgyu// sa bdag dza la stong la dbang sgyur la// stong gsum dgra bo kun la mdze yi

khong// de dang gnyis med sbyor ba'i yum// bud med lus la sbrul gyi mjug/ rgyu ni bar snang khams su rgyu// klu bran mang pos sku la brgyan// klu chen brgyad dang sbyor ba mdzad// sa bdag mang po pho nyar
'gyed// zhags pa stong ni thugs la 'char// klu bran stong ni gnan gzir byed// bdud kyi mi la bab na nad kyis thob// bdud kyi bdud cig 'gro ba kun gyi bdud// dgra bo'i bdud du khyod las lhag pa
med// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la// pho la bab na khram la thob// skur cig dgra bo rlung la bskur// yang na myos shing lkugs su chug/ yang na
myos shing 'bog tu chug/ yang na mdze dang shu pa thong// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la// gtad pa'i las rnams sho ra re// de yis 'chi bdag
bskul bar bshad// sbal nag 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud// las kyi shan pa bkol ba'i lung// gtad khram las kyi mthar gtugs pa/ khyab bdag rdo rje chen pos bshad// de las de yi rim par ldan// bstan
bsrung bka' yi bya ra ste// bstan pa yun du gnas par byed// sbal nag 'khor lo zhes bya ba klu nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ sa ma ya karma rA dza tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dam tshig las kyi rgyal po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal thugs rje rang byung gi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus

gcig na/ rgya mtsho chen po rang bzhin gyis lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rang las byung ba/ pad+ma rin po che'i gzhal yas khang/ rgya khyon dpag tu med

pa'i nang na/ klu'i rgyal po yid bzhin 'dzin pa zhes bya ba/ longs spyod kun gyi bdag por bzhugs te/ gdug pa 'dzin byed kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas so// de'i khams gsum gyi sems can la don byed kyi las

dang thugs rje'i bsod nams med de/ gnam la sprin med pas sa la rtsi ma 'khrungs/ sdug bsngal gyi las dang rang sha la rang za/ rang khrag la rang 'thung/ rang gis sdug bsngal la rang spyod par gnas so// de'i
tshe dpal kun tu bzang po byin brlabs/ chos nyid dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ dpal thugs rje rang byung gi bdag pos/ sems can kun la thugs rje'i 'od kyis gzigs nas kyang/ mkha' lding rgyal por

sku sprul te/ ri rab kyi khar byon te/ dam tshig las kyi phyag rgya bcas la/ thugs ye shes me dpung 'bar ba'i 'khor lo// ting nge 'dzin skad cig mas gdug pa 'dzin byed kyi lus la bskor bas/ rgya mtsho khol/

srid pa g.yos/ ri rab kyang rab tu g.yos/ ri rab kyi srag dpag bsam gyi shing la me 'bar te/ 'jig rten stongs la khad do// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi 'dzin gdug pa'i sems la dran pa'i dbang
med par sdug bsngal bzod thabs med par/ lus kyi nyams su myong ngo// de'i tshe klu'i yid bzhin 'dzin/ sdug pa'i sems la 'gyod pa'i sems la 'gyod pa'i sems drag po skyes pas thugs rje chen po'i byin
brlabs kyis/ sdug bsngal gyi las sems nyid bde ba chen po yis/ ngang du zhi ste sangs rgyas kyi zhal gzigs te/ dpal kun tu bzang po'i sa non no// de'i tshe 'bras bu yang dag pa'i don/ chos nyid bden

pa'i don mthong nas/ thugs rin po che pad+ma'i gzhal yas khang nas/ ye shes du gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang/ sems nyid don rang byung las kyi snying po/ yid bzhin gyi thugs las sems can don byed pa las kyi

klu chen po brgyad/ sa bdag 'khor dang bcas par sku sprul te/ 'gro ba sems can gyi don gyis cig par bka' stsal to// de'i tshe de'i dus su sa chen po rab tu g.yo ba dang/ bar snang la sgra snyan rab tu sgrog pa

yang byung ste/ kun tu yang nyams dga' yid la spro ba yang byung ste/ khams gsum gyi sems can 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnam pa lnga phun sum tshogs te/ 'gro ba sems can gyi don byed pa rgyun du 'byung ngo// de'i tshe
sems can gyi bsod nams thams cad kun la thogs pa med de/ mthar rgyas so// de nas klu chen po brgyad sa bdag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis// bsam 'phel gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu

rin po che klu'i rgyal po la phul nas/ bskor ba dang phyag mdzad nas/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bos zhus pa/ e ma ho/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog nas// yid bzhin thugs las sprul mdzad klu rgyal

ngo mtshar can// bdag cag sems can don byed pas// las kyi rgyal po rgyu cig zhu// zhes gsol ba btab pas/ klu'i rgyal po rang byung bzhi'i don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ mdo don rtsa ba'i snying po la dgongs
nas byin gyis brlabs te/ bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin thugs las sprul pa'i klu chen brgyad// sa bdag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// sems can las kyi don byed pa// rgyud kyi rgyal po zhu ba legs// dam tshig
chen po nga yis bshad// klu rgyal dga' bo gus pas nyon// gzhan yang dad pa can gyi 'khor// lus ngag yid gsum gus pas btud// ces bka' stsal to// dam tshig las kyi rgyal po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i

le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma ngo mtshar rmad byung byin rlabs can// chos nyid lhun grub byin rlabs rdzogs pa'i thugs// rang byung snying po byin brlabs dbang gi sku// yon
tan cir yang 'phel mdzad klu rgyal chos kyi bdag/ dam tshig las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// thabs kyis rgyal po ji ltar drang// zhes zhus pas/ bka' stsal pa/

sems can las kyi don byed grub pa la// thabs ky-i rgyal po snying rje mchog gis drang// snying rje med na don byed ci la nus// dper na nyin gcig gis 'dzam gling bzhi'i don byed gsal ba bzhin// snying rje'i

don rtogs don rnams ci yang nus// chos nyid don ldan ye shes gsal ba yin// dper na nyi ma'i snying pos mun pa 'joms pa bzhin// rang byung ye shes snying rje'i snying po gcig gis srid pa gsum gyi don byed

rgyun du gnas// snying rje med na srid pa ci la gnas// de phyir srid pa thugs kyi 'khor lo bstan// srid pa'i 'khor lo rang byung ste// snying rje thabs kyi rgyal por drang// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de
nas yang dag bshad bya ba// phyag rgya lus kyi dam tshig gis// srid pa sgrol byed thugs kyi 'khor lo bskor// ye shes thugs kyis bdud rnams bsreg/ rang byung thugs kyis srid gsum bsgral// byin rlabs
brtul zhugs kyis sa bcu lam lnga bgrod// snying rje'i las kyis pha rol bsgral// shes rab stobs kyis 'bras bu bsgrub// theg pa'i thabs kyis dbang rnams bskur// de phyir dbang rnams rim gyis
bskur// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis gsungs// byin rlabs med na thugs rje ci la 'byung// de phyir snying rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rgyud// dgongs rgyud phal gyi thun mong min// byin brlabs

dbang bskur rgyal po rgyud// las rgyud phal gyi thun mong min// dam tshig las kyi rgyal po rgyud// nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab// rgya mtsho bzhin du rlabs kyis dbang// bya khyung bzhin du rlabs kyis

gcod// seng ge bzhin du shugs kyis mchong// de phyir rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di// yid bzhin 'dzin gyi dngos grub byin rlabs phun sum tshogs par 'byung// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// rgyud kyi mtshan

nyid che bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang klu rgyal mtha' yas kyis zhus pa// e ma ngo mtshar snying po'i thugs// rang bzhin rnam dag skye ba med pa'i sku// byin rlabs rgyud la spel mdzad 'gro

ba'i mgon// dam tshig las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir// rtsa ba'i dam tshig ji ltar lags// las kyi khog pa ji ltar rgya'i// las kyi gzhung de ji ltar bsgrub// las kyi gzhi de gang gis ji ltar gzung// zhes zhus
pas/ don kun 'gro ba la dgongs nas gsungs pa// sems can don byed las kyi glu// dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// 'khor rnams gus pas yid la nyon// las kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa la// rtsa ba'i dam tshig

sku gsung thugs// las kyis khog pa byin brlabs dbang gi rgyal pos bsgrub// las kyi bsgrub bsnyen bsgrub sbyor bka' gsum gyis bsgrub// las kyi bzhi mdo don rtsa ba'i snying pos gzungs// de nas yang dag

bshad bya ba// las kyi rgyal pos bsgrub pa'i phyir// rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid las// lam gyi yan lag snying rje bsam// 'phrin las sku gsung thugs kyis sbyar// yon tan theg pa'i sa lam bgrod// 'bras bu
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te// dbang bskur rdzogs nas phyir mi ldog par bshad// las kyi khog don bstan ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi
las// gnyis med thig le yang dag bsgrub// rtog med mnyam nyid dngos gzung med pa'i lam// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la gnas// 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin thob// ces dam tshig chen po nga
yis bshad// rtsa ba byang chub chen po sems kyi la// ting 'dzin 'du 'brel med pas bsgrub// mi 'gyur ye shes mthong ba'i lam// bsam gtan byang chub mthong ba'i sa// 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs
pa thob// ces gsungs/ rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi lam// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor bar sgrub// tshogs lam skyed pa'i sbyor ba ste// sbyor lam ting 'dzin rims kyis 'jug/ sgom lam ye shes dmigs pa
ste// mthong lam 'phro 'du'i byin rlabs can// thar lam stong nyid bsgom pa'o// rjes su 'jug pa spyod pa yis// 'bras bu rigs 'dzin rnam gsum rims kyis thob// ces bshad/ rtsa ba byang chub
sems kyi las// rang byung ye shes snying pos bsgrub// rtsol bral nyag gcig sems kyi lam// rang rig mngon du gyur pa'i sa// 'bras bu kun tu bzang po'i sa non// dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas

yang dang bshad bya ba// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi gzhi// kun gzhi byang chub sems kyis bsgrub// yon tan cir yang 'byung ba'i lam// 'phrin las rang byung rtogs pa'i sa// 'bras bu lhun grub rigs 'dzin thob
ces bstan// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi gzhi// byin brlabs dbang gi rgyal pos bsgrub// thugs rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i lam// thugs bsgrub byin brlabs 'byung ba'i sa// 'bras bu sa bcu non nas thob par

bshad// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi lam// thabs kyi yan lag thabs kyi bsgrub// shes rab rig pa thob pa'i sa// 'bras bu pha rol phyin pa thob// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu// bcud len rnam pa lnga yis

bsgrub// rnal 'byor 'khor 'das yangs pa'i lam// rdzogs chen rang sa non pa yi// 'bras bu mi skye mi 'gag grol tshul thob// ces dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu'i sgrub pa bstan
ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi 'bras bu sgrub pa'i phyir// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum// bsgrub pa'i mdo rtsa snying por bstan// gzhi ni kun gzhi byang chub
sems// lam ni rtog pa'i rin chen la// 'bras bu brtsal med lhun grub ste// mdo rtsa snying pos bsgrub par bya// de yi rang bzhin bdag nyid gsum// ngo bo gnas lugs thig le gsum// ngo bo kun gzhi byang
chub sems// gnas lugs rang byung ye shes de// thig le byang chub sems su 'char// de yi 'phrin las bstan pa ni// sku gsung 'du 'bral med par 'byor// de yi yon tan bstan pa ni// dus gsum 'gyur ba
med par gnas// de'i 'bras bu bstan rtsa ba'i don rtogs cing// rig pas 'khrul gzhi rtsad chod nas// 'bras bu mi 'gyur ba'i don rtogs nas// bsam gtan gyi lam mthar phyin par bstan pa
gnyis// mdo'i don rtogs nas ye shes kyi ngos gzung nas las mthar phyir par bcangs te/ 'bras bu phyag rgya chen por gnas pa gsum mo// las kyi 'bras bu thob lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga

pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// las kyi rgyal pos bsgrub pa'i phyir// mdo don rtsa ba'i snying po'i don rtogs bshad// snying po rang byung ye shes te// 'bras bu rgyal po bskyed cing 'dzin// rtsa ba'i chos
kyi rgyal po ste// las kyi rgyal po 'phrin las yon tan thugs kyis 'gyur// zhing sa dang lam ni sbyong zhing bgrod// mdo ni phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor te// thugs rje'i thabs kyi sbyor ba yin// de phyir

mdo rtsa'i snying por bshad// snang srid phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la// dran rtogs thams cad thugs kyi sprul pa yin// brjod pa thams cad gsung gi snying por gnas// de yi grub rtags bstan pa ni// snang srid

grub na chos skur rtogs// dran rtogs grub na ye shes 'char// brjod pa grub na ye shes 'char// de yi 'phrin las bstan pa ni// phyag rgya lus kyi dkyil 'khor la// stong nyid rig pas las byed de// dngos po

med par sbyor ba yin// dran rtogs thugs kyi cho 'phrul la// snang stong gsal byed las byed de// ye shes snying po sbyor ba yin// brjod pa'i snying po la las kyi rgyal pos las byed de// byin brlabs rgyal pos

dbang skur rgyal pos sbyor zhes bshad// de yi yon tan 'bras bu bstan pa ni// phyag rgya yi dam lus kyi 'bras bu bstan pa ni// srid pa lha tshogs lus la gnas// dran rtog yid kyi 'dzin phur te// dmigs pa'i
'bras bu gang yang sbyor// brjod pa thugs kyi dam pa ste// ye shes kyi 'bras bu skyed cing 'phel ba byed// ces thams cad dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// las kyi sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug

pa'o//// de nas yang zhus pa/ e ma ho/ snang srid chos kyi rgyal po snying po ngo mtshar can// ye shes stobs kyis 'bras bu thob pa'i klu rgyal lags// las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir// srid pa lta byed ji ltar
lags// de yi snying po mdo rtsa snying po rnams// yon tan 'bras bu 'phrin las rnams// man ngag mdo bsdus dung skyong bshad du gsol// ces gsol ba btab ste zhus pas/ chos nyid kyi gnas lugs dgongs

pa mdzad nas gsungs pa// srid pa thugs kyi me long ste// lta byed rig pa'i rgyal po'o// de yis mdo rtsa snying po ni// mdo ni sku la rtsa ba thugs// snying po rang byung ye shes so// man ngag mdor bsdus bshad par
bya// lus ngag yid gsum dad pas nyon// ces bka' stsal to// sku yi las byed thugs kyis 'gyur// snying po 'bras bu 'dzin par gsung// de yi dbang thob byin rlabs 'di ltar 'byung// sku yi 'phrin

las thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ phyag rgya chen po'i thugs dang gnyis med dus gsum kun tu sbyor/ thugs kyi 'phrin las ye shes kun tu sbyor// sa bcu lam lnga thabs kyi rim pas sbyor// ces gsungs/
snying pos 'bras bu pha rol phyin pa ste/ 'jigs pa'i bdud rnams bsgral te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes dam tshig nga yis bshad/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'bras bu ye shes rtogs par bya
ba'i phyir// srid pa lta byed rgyal po bstan// de ltar snying rje dmigs dang ldan// ye shes spyan cig kun tu gzigs/ khams gsum la ni rnam par 'byed cing lta// snying rje khyed kyis theg par
byed// theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu rnams// theg pa chen pos dbang du bsdus// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas yang zhus pa/ e ma ho/ 'bras bu ngo mtshar snying po'i don// rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas thugs rje can// byin rlabs thugs la 'char ba byang chub sems dpa'i klu/ snying rje byin rlabs thugs la thos pa'i klu rgyal ngo mtshar can/ bdag cag byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir// 'bras bu ye shes kyi ngang ngo
bo rang bzhin ji ltar du gnas// 'phrin las yon tan man ngag ji ltar du gnas// mdor bsdus dung skyong bdag la bshad du gsol// ces gsol ba btab ste zhus pa dang/ theg pa kun gyi khyad par la

dgongs nas gsungs pa/ byang chub bsgrub pa'i klu rgyal dung skyong dad pa can/ byang chub sems dpas bshad kyis nyon// 'bras bu ye shes kyi ngang thig le nyag gcig ngo bo mnyam pa nyid/ rang bzhin thugs rje
chen po'i byin brlabs kun la mnyam par gnas so// de yi man ngag mdor bsdus ni// ngang dang ngo bo rang bzhin gsum// ye shes cig pas gzugs sku cir yang 'char// dper na zla ba chu dang chu zla
bzhin// ye shes gcig las gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'byung// dper na gzugs dang gzugs brnyan me long bzhin// me long gsal bas gzugs brnyan snang ba yin// gzugs brnyan snang bas gzugs

sku gsal ba yin// gzugs sku gsal bas snying po shar ba yin// snying po rang byung ye shes te// dper na klu yi rgyal po nga med na// 'jig rten 'di ru char chu ci las byung// char chu med na me tog ci la

'khrung// me tog med na 'bras bu ga nas 'byung// 'bras bu med na snying po ci la gdags// 'bras bu de ni klu rgyal nga yi byin rlabs so// 'bras bu ye shes med na snying po ci la 'char// snying po med na gzugs

sku ci la snang// gzugs sku med na 'bras bu ci la grub// 'bras bu med na snying po ci la gdags// de phyir dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// chos nyid don gyi gnas lugs 'di bzhin te// snying rje chen po theg
pa'i mchog/ 'gro don gzhan la dmigs pas byang chub mchog gi lam// lam gyi yan lag thabs kyis spyad// de bzhin rtogs pas rnal 'byor pas// dang po tshogs lam skyed pa nas// thar lam stong nyid man

chad du// 'gro don gzhan la dmigs pas spyad// de yi theg pa'i khyad phye nas// theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu rnams// theg pa chen pos dbang du sdud// 'bras bu thar pa 'thob par bshad// de nas yang dag bshad
sdud// 'bras bu thar pa 'thob par bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi las// snying rje mchog dang ma ldan na// don byed grub par ngas ma gsungs// theg pa chen

po'i snying rje spyi don yongs la dgongs pa ste// ngo bo stong nyid dag pa la// snying po ye shes cir yang 'char// rang bzhin thugs rje chen po la// byin rlabs thugs rje byang chub sems kyis khyab// gnas
lugs thig le nyag gcig la// yon tan 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs// zhes gsungs/ dngos gzhi byang chub sems kyi lam// snying por gnas pas byang chub sems gzugs skur sprul pa yin// dngos gzhi

byang chub sems kyi gzhi// ngo bo bdag pas ye shes gsal ba yin// dngos gzhi byang chub sems kyi dngos gzhi ni// snying rje shar bas theg pa'i cho gces bya// dam tshig chen po nga yis gdams// srid pa lta

byed thugs kyi me long bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma ngo mtshar snying po'i don// chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong klu rgyal dbang gi mchog/ dam tshig las kyi rgyal
po bsgrub pa'i phyir// bsnyen bsgrub las kyi sbyor ka las kyi 'bras bu rnams// 'khor rnams kun la bshad du gsol// ces zhus pas/ las kyi don byed pa la dgongs nas gsungs pa// e ma ho/ don

byed thugs las sprul pa'i klu chen brgyad// bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor bshad kyis kus par thud// ces bka' stsal to// bsnyen pas rang rgyud sbyor ba ste// thugs kyi bsgrub pa shin tu gces// sgrub pas las kyi
bdag po dbang du sdud pa ste// byin rlabs dbang rnams rdzogs pa gces// las kyi sbyor kas las kyi 'bras bu so sor byed pa ste// dmigs pa'i snying rjes zin pa gces// de yi sgrub thabs bshad pa
ni// bcas dang bzlas lugs sgom thabs gsum// bka' yi 'khrul 'khor man ngag lnga ru bsdebs// bsnyen pa'i bcas la gnyis su bshad// mchod rten bca' dang 'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo dag la gsum
du bshad// srid pa sku yi 'khor lo dang// brjod pa gsung gi 'khor lo dang// ye shes thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// de yi bskor thabs 'di bzhin te// srid pa sku'i 'khor lo gzugs su bskor// gzugs dang

gzugs brnyan tshul du 'khor// brjod pa gsung gi 'khor lo snying po sngags kyi tshig gis bskor// snying po dang 'bras bu bzhin du 'khor// ye shes thugs kyi 'khor lo byang chub sems la 'khor// sbyor ba thabs
kyi shes rab tshul du 'khor// de yi yon tan bstan pa ni// dper na nor bu rin chen 'dra// dgos dgu sems kyi 'dod dgu 'byung zhes bshad// mchod rten bca' ba las kyi bsgom thabs bzhin// bzlas
lugs dag la rnam pa bzhi// ye shes thig le'i bzlas pa dang// thugs rje bskyed pa'i bzlas pa dang// chos nyid gsal ba'i bzlas pa dang// 'bras bu bsdud pa'i bzlas pa'o// de yi yon tan

bstan pa ni// ri rab gling bzhi'i chas pa 'dra// byed pa sems can kun don byed// bsgom thabs dag la rnam pa gnyis// rang rgyud sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang// ye shes thig le rgyas pa'i sgom pa'o// de yi
yon tan stobs mchog glang la khal bkal 'dra// theg pa'i khyad par snying rjes 'byed// bsgrub pa'i bcas la gnyis su bshad// dkyil 'khor bri dang gnyis su mchod pa'i bstan// dkyil 'khor dag la

gsum du bstan// maN+Dal 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang// phyag rgya lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang// rig pa sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang// de yi bri thabs 'di bzhin te// maN+Dal tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ni// dam tshig
gtsang ba'i sngags pas bri// phyag rgya lus kyi dkyil 'khor ni// byin brlab dbang bskur rdzogs pas bris// rig pa sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni// sems dbang thob pa'i bla ma'i byin brlabs zhugs pas bri// de
yi yon tan bstan pa ni// mun nag nang du me sgron bteg pa 'dra// byin brlabs thob pas bar gcod sel// mchod rten dag la rnam pa gnyis// dmigs pa rten gyi mchod pa dang// rten med sems kyi mchod
pa'o// de'i yon tan zhing la chu lud brten pa 'dra// thabs dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs// bzlas lugs dag la rnam pa gsum// dam tshig rjes dran srog gi bzlas pa dang// las la zhugs pa'i bzlas pa
dang// mgo 'dren snying rje'i bzlas pa'o// de yi yon tan bstan pa ni/ khrag spyang gzan la gdung ba 'dra// las kyi rang gshed rang la dbab pa'o// bsgom thabs dag la gsum du bstan// gnyen po stobs
kyis sgom pa dang// las mkhan bdag por sgom pa dang// dmigs pa gshed la dbab pa'i sgom pa'o// de yi yon tan skyes bu las la zhugs pa 'dra// las kyi byin rlabs so sor 'byung// sbyor ka'i bcas dang
bzlas lugs sgom thabs gsum// 'phrin las bzhi'i bsgrub pa ste// bi shwa kar ma'i bzo 'dra dgos// de yi yon tan bstan pa ni// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// rgyal mtshan rtse btags mchod pa

'dra// dgod 'dod thams cad de las 'byung// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// bskyed bsgrub las kyi gzhung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi rgyal po bsgrub

pa la// mdo rtsa snying po'i sgor lugs bstan// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi las// mdo rtsa snying po 'di bzlas na// nyi ma shar gnas la shar ba 'dra// oM ga ru Da tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ las kyi rgyal po thugs rjer
'char// ye shes sku ste rang 'byung ba// phyogs bcur sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yon tan 'bras bu'i bsgrub pa yin// thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas thugs kyi sgrub pa'o// de phyir snying

po de la byos// hUM nA ga rA dza/ sa ma ya dza/ mdo rtsa snying po de la drangs pas na// bi sho kar ma'i lag tu bzo gtad na// las kyi rgyal po rang la ston// kar ma las mkhan grub pa ste// las byed sprul pa'i klu

rtags te// yid bzhin 'dzin gyi thugs sprul klu// klu yi rgyal po'i thugs bsgrubs te// byin rlabs phun sum tshogs don 'byung// zhes bshad/ de na de la nan tan byos// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// las

kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las lnga'i mdo rtsa snying po bshad/ 'khor rnams gus pa'i yid la zung// zhes bka' stsal to// dam tshig mkha' lding rgyal po'i bka' las 'das

na klu rnams bsregs// de nas dam tshig mkha' lding rgyal po la// dam tshig gzhung du blta bar bya// dam tshig mkha' lding rgyal po yang// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi don// de yi man ngag mdor bsdus 'di bzhin

no// ga ru Na tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ thugs kyis snying po dgu pa'o// 'di ni gdung gi drag sngags so// od kaM od kaM khyung ka ra khyung ka ra/ badzra dbyig du/ ma hA kro ta hUM phaT/ 'di ni sku'i snying po'o// oM badzra b+ha

ti g+ha ru ru hUM hUM badzra badzra rA dza tri dza hUM phaT/ de bzlas 'phrin las yongs su sbyor// zhes gsungs so// ha pa o sa tri lnga pa 'phrin las kyi yang snying du bstan pa'o// mdo rtsa snying po sngags kyi bskor lugs bstan

pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mdo rtsa snying po'i bskor lugs la// yon tan 'phrin las 'di sbyar na// stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dra ste/ srid pa'i klu rnams dbang du 'du/

oM ta ki rtsa te byi tsa te/ hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ su ru te su ru te sa sa ha/ nA ga rA dza/ tsa tur ling khri khrag rgyas sni sha ku ru/ nA ga shu pa la li/ bre yang ku ru mA ra ya phaT/ yon tan 'phrin las de sbyar na// rgyal

khrims bka'i chad pa gcod pa 'dra ste/ srid pa'i klu rnams sgrol bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal nyen byed lus la 'char// ye shes thugs kyi 'khor lo ste// srid pa'i klu rnams bka' las 'da' na bsreg cing bran du
bkol// zhes dam tshig chen po de yis bshad// de phyir 'phrin las de bzhin byos// 'phrin las mdor bsdus man ngag rtsa bar gsungs pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'khor rnams kyis zhus

pa/ e ma ngo mtshar snying po'i don// byin gyis brlabs kyis thugs rgyud pa'i bka'/ dbang rnams rims kyis thob pa'i klu rgyal las kyi rje/ las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir// mdo don rtsa ba'i snying po la// thabs
kyi rgyal pos ji ltar sbyar// man gang mdor bsdus gsungs pa rnams// dge bsnyen bdag cag 'khor rnams la// 'gro ba'i don la bshad par zhu// zhes gsol ba btab pas/ klu'i rgyal
po thugs rtog pa rin po che'i 'khor lor dgongs pa mdzad nas gsungs pa/ e ma ho/ bdag gi byin brlabs thob pa dge bsnyen las kyi klu/ legs par bshad kyi lus ngag btud/ ces bka' stsal

to// thabs kyi rgyal po 'khor los sbyar// de yi skor thabs gnyis su bshad// thugs rje rang byung theg pa khyad par gyi 'khor lo dang/ dam tshig las kyi 'khor lo'o// de'i bskor thabs man ngag mdor bsdus

bshad pa ni/ rgyu dang rkyen dang sbyor ba gsum// man ngag gsung gis bsgrub par bshad// thugs rje'i rang byung las kyi 'khor lo ni// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dbang thob pas// rgyu ni chos nyid dag pa la// rkyen

ni rang byung ye shes so// sbyor ba thabs dang shes rab bo// de don rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhung dang mthun par 'khor lo bskor// rgyu ni dar dkar dag la bya// rkyen ni gur kum gla rtsi chu yis sbyang// sbyor

ba byang chub sems kyis bri// bya rgod dang ru'i sgro rtsa yis// thugs rje thabs kyi 'khor lo bskor// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dbus dang dgu// mkha' lding rgyal po'i zhal phyung ste// tsan dan dkar po'i
rtsi mchog dang// byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi byug/ dri mchog spos kyi dud pas bdug/ sems la dbang thob rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems su byin gyis brlabs// de
yi dbang thob byin brlabs zhugs pa'i tshe// bsam gtan dbang du 'dus pa ste// sa bcu lam lnga rim pa thabs kyis gnon// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig

las kyi 'khor lo ni// rgyu ni kun gzhi byang chub sems// rkyen ni 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// sbyor ba rten cing 'brel ba'o// de yi man ngag mdo bsdus ni// bsgrub pa'i dus dang sad pa'i dus// sgrub pa'i dus su 'di

bzhin te// rgyu ni dar tshon sna lnga yis// rin po che yi snyug gu'am// dad pa'i mchu yi dam tshig las kyi 'khor lo bskor// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dbus dang dgu// klu yi rgyal po'i zhal byung ste// snying po lnga

yi bcud blug la// rin chen lnga dang snying po lnga// me tog lnga dang 'bru lnga gtso byas te// sman sna stong gi chu yis byug/ rtsi mchog spos kyi bdug pas bdug/ dam tshig bsrung zhing dbang bskur bya// phun sum tshogs
par byin gyis brlab// de yi dbang rnams thob pa'i tshe// 'dod pa dgu 'gyur dbang du 'dus pa ste// 'jig rten 'di ru longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas yang dag
bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i man ngag mchog tu sgrub// thabs dang shes rab lto sbyar la// dbang du bsdu zhing byin gyis brlabs te// 'dod pa lnga'i gsol ba gdab// snying rje mchog dang rab ldan
te// byin brlabs phun sum tshogs par 'byung// de nas rin po che yi gdung rten nam// la ca'i ga 'u'i nang du bzhugs su gsol// mchod dang bstod pa ci nus bya// de yi yon tan 'phrin las ni// bsod

nams 'phel zhing yon tan 'grub// ces dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// las kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig las kyi phyag rgya 'khor lo// bsgral ba'i

'khor lo ste// rgyu ni sbal nag glud bu'am// sbrul nag gi shun pa la/ rkyen ni nad pa'i rtsa khrag dug chu nag bos sbyar// sbyor ba dmyags pa drag pos bri// dug zan rma bya'i mdongs rtsa'am// mdzes pa'i sprin lag
rus pa yin// dam tshig las kyi 'khor lo bskor// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dbus dang bcu// gnod byed klu yi zhal byung la// thang shing nag po'i dug chu blud// gu gul sbyar ba'i dud bas bdug/ bdag

nyid chen po'i nga rgyal gyis// dgug gzhug bya zhing thun gyis brab// thun dang drag po'i sbyin sreg las// de la dmigs shing drag tu bsgral// de yi las rims rdzogs pa dang// thal ba bag phye gzugs sha

sbyar// nad pa'i khrag dang dug chus sbru// gang gnod bgegs kyi ling ka bca'// snying khar dug gsum yi ge dang// rang gi srog snying drag po sbrel// tshon sna lnga yis skud pas bcing/ khyi'am rabs chad thod par
gzhug/ bal nag re pa nag pos gtums te// mchod rten 'og gam rang gi 'og tu gnan// bsgral ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang zhus pa/ ngo mtshar snying po don pas/

shes rab rgyud las skye ba'i klu rgyal/ e ma ho/ mdo don rtsa ba'i snying po la// thabs kyi rgyal pos bsgrub pa la// nyams myong las kyi drod tshad ji ltar 'byung// byang chub sems dpa' dge bsnyen bdag cag
'khor rnams la// ma nor rim pas bshad du gsol// ces zhus pas/ don rtags la dgongs nas gsungs pa/ e ma ho/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i don du bshad par bya// klu rgyal
ma dros gus par nyon// rtags kyi rim pa 'di med na// rgya med ri dwags shor ba 'dra// las kyi don med phyal par 'gyur// de nas rtags 'di yid la zung// rtags la gnyis su bshad par bya/ khyung gi rtags

dang klu yi rtags// klu yi rtags la gnyis su bshad// ye shes grub dang las kyi klu// ye shes klu yi grub rtags ni// chu bo rgya mtsho dal 'jam dang// de la rang bzhin 'gro dang gru yis gcod// rgya mtsho gting
nas nor bu 'don// rin chen rnyed dang 'bras bu sdud// sman gyi nags la sman 'tshol dang// nags tshal shing gi drung du sgom// me tog rgyas pa'i tshal du 'gro// 'bras bu can gyi skye shing

'dzugs// lo tog 'bras bu smin pa rtsang// sa mkhar pho brang mthon po rtsig/ thang yul chen po mthong ba rnams// de la yid du 'ong zhing nyams dga' spro ba skyes pa rnams// klu yi rgyal po'i grub rtags te// yi ge
klu yi 'khor lo la// rab gnas mchod pa bya zhing gsol ba gdab// de rtags de la dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung/ zhes bshad/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi klu yi grub rtags ni// rab tu sa

g.yos 'byung ba dang// 'on dang sgra snyan 'byung ba dang// bdud rtsi mtsho mo rdol ba dang// nor bu rin chen 'chang ba dang// mchod pa bye brag shom rnams ni// sems can don byed las kyi klu'i grub rtags yin/

rnal 'byor dam tshig la gnas par bya ste/ dam tshig las kyi 'khor lo la// rab tu gnas pa bya zhing/ dam tshig gi mchod pa bya zhing dad pa'i tshogs bskyed par bya'o// byin brlabs yongs su rdzogs par byed/

rnal 'byor pa dngos grub yongs su rdzogs ci 'dod pa 'byung zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ khyung grub pa'i rtags la gnyis te/ ye shes kyi khyung grub pa'i rtags ni/ nyi zla
lus la 'char ba dang// mchod rten mgo la skyes pa dang// stong gsum 'od kyis khengs pa dang// nyi zla'i steng na 'dug pa dang// me tog lus la skyes pa dang// shel gyi mchod rten la skor ba byed pa
dang// bsam gtan gyi brag la 'dzeg pa dang// skas gdang mang po bgrod pa dang// ri mthon gangs la 'dzeg pa dang// sku gdung ring bsrel gyi las byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrog pa

dang// mchod bya yid du 'ong ba gsil ba dang// bdag bsam gtan gyi don spyod pa dang// nyan dang bshad du rtsom pa dang// bdag ting nge 'dzin lha'i nga rgyal la zhugs pa dang/ snying rje'i mchog skyes nas

sems can gyi don byed pa rnams ni/ ye shes kyi don khyung grub pa'i rtags te/ thugs rje rang byung gi 'khor lo la/ rab tu gnas par byas te/ dang po tshogs lam skyed pa nas/ mthar lam stong nyid de bzhin du/
rim pa tshul bzhin dbang rnams bskur/ sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad du/ kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin gyi mchod cing/ ye shes kyi mtshan yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de nas mos pa khyad par can
dad pa dang ldan pas/ thugs rje chen po la gsol ba btab nas dbang zhus na/ sa bcu lam rnams lnga bgrod nas/ 'khor ba 'di las thar ba thob ces na bshad/ 'jigs pa'i nad las thar par 'gyur/ zhes
dam tshig chen bo nga yis bshad/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ sprul pa las kyi khyung grub pa'i rtags ni/ bdag stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas// srid pa bran du 'khol ba

dang// srid pa las bskor 'debs pa dang// bdag slob dpon du gyur nas// nyer nas kyi bkur sti byed po dang// sprul pa las kyi khyung mthong ba dang// sgo nga tshang nas 'khrugs pa dang// bya chen mkha' la

'phur ba dang// rang lus khyung du gyur pa dang// ri rab gling bzhi gcod pa dang// ri rab kha ru phyin pa dang// rno mtshon thogs nas gsod pa'i las byed/ klu'i gzugs brnyan thams cad zhal du za ba rnams ni/

sprul pa las byed khyung gi grub rtags te/ dbang sdud las kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing/ rigs bzhi klu srog rgyud drang/ zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad/ mtshan ma rtags kyi le'u bstan pa ste bcu bzhi

pa'o//// de nas yang zhus pa/ e ma ngo mtshar snying po'i don/ kun tu bzang po thugs dang gnyis med sbyor mdzad klu rgyal ngo mtshar can/ dam tshig las kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i phyir/ thugs kyi 'khor lo ji ltar
lags/ de yi sbyor ba ji ltar bgyi/ man ngag gsang ba mdor bsdus rnams/ klu rgyal 'jog pos bdag la bshad du gsol/ ces zhus pas thugs rin po che'-i spyod pa la dgongs nas bzhugs gsungs/ e ma
ho/ thugs rin po che'i byin brlabs thob pa'i klu rgyal 'jog po khyod// dgongs rgyud thugs las 'char gyis rang sems rtogs// 'di phyi gnyis ka skyid kyi theg chen nyams su long// rang sems dag pa yin

gyis bdag gi bka' 'di yid la zung// zhes bka' stsal to// thugs kyi 'khor lo rin po che// de yi spyir ka gsum du bshad// mdo don sku yi sbyor ba dang/ rtsa ba thugs kyi sbyor ba dang/ snying po bzas bu'i

sbyor ba'o// man ngag mdor bsdus de bzhin te// sku dang sbyor bas 'phrin las 'grub// thugs dang sbyar bas bsgrub thag nye// snying pos sbyar bas las kyi 'bras bu sngon du 'byung/ zhes gsungs/ de nas yang

dag bshad bya ba// thugs kyi 'khor lo rin po che// lta byed rig pa'i rgyal por bshad// ye shes rang byung srid pa thugs kyi me long ste/ mdo don rtsa ba'i snying po bsgrubs na/ thugs rje rang byung gi 'khor lo grub

ste/ ye shes kyi ngang ngo bo rang bzhin du 'char te/ 'bras bu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad/ byin rlabs thugs rje thams cad shugs las 'byung bar shes gsungs/ de
nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig las kyi 'khor lo ni// longs spyod kun gyi bdag po ste// brda don rtsa ba snying pos bsgrubs na/ longs spyod thams cad che la 'dus nas 'gyur/ zhes sungs so// yid
bzhin klu yi byin rlabs kyis// dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig las kyi 'khor lo la// klu yi dge
bsnyen thugs sgrub 'di// thugs kyi sprul pas thugs kyi las byed de// de yi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum// ye shes klu yi 'khor lo dang// sprul pa las byed 'khor lo dang// 'jig rten sprul ba'i las mkhan gsum

du bshad// de yi 'khor lo 'di skad bshad// ye shes klu yi 'khor lo rin po che// mdo don rtsa ba'i snying po oM gyis drang// 'khor lo rgyu rkyen sbyor pa gong du bshad// sbrul mgo dgu pa'i zhal phyung ste// mi yi lus
la sbrul mjug 'khyil// phyag na rin chen thugs kyi 'khor lo bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag na me to pad+ma bsnams// dam tshig can la byin brlabs longs spyod phun sum tshogs par yid kyis spel/ yid kyi dbang
bskur gsol pa gdab// de yi sgrub thabs nyams len ni// thugs rje'i thabs kyis 'khor los shes rab dbang du bsdu/ byin brlabs thugs nas 'byung ba ste/ khyad par byang chub sems la rten// dgos 'dod
yid bzhin bsam bzhin 'grub// de yi las kyi 'bras bu sems la 'dod// yon tan thams cad 'byung zhes gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// las kyi don byed sprul pa'i sku// dam tshig las kyi

'khor lo rin po che// mdo don rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor hUM gis drang// rgyu rkyen sbyor ba gong bzhin la// sbrul mgo bdun pa'i zhal phyung la// mi yi lus la sbrul mjug 'khyil// phyag gnyis thugs kar thal mo
sbyar// gus pa'i tshul gyis gtso la 'dud// dam tshig can la dngos grub ster// thugs kyi dbang bskur mchod gtor gsol ba gdab// de yi sgrub thabs nyams len ni// ye shes thugs kyi 'khor lo lto
sbyar// rin chen shes rab dbang du bsdu// byin brlabs rjes la rten cing 'phel/ khyad par rin chen sku la bcangs// byin brlabs bsam pa thugs kyis bsgrub// de yi las kyi 'bras bu ni// yon tan byin
brlabs nor rdzas 'phel// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten las kyi klu sgrub na// dam tshig las kyi 'khor lo 'di bzhin bskor// rgyu ni sbal nag slud bu

dang// sbrul nag dag gi shun pa la// dar nag shag shog sbyar byas te// rkyen gyi sbrul nag snying khrag dug chus sbyar// sbyor ba gdug pa'i sems dang ldan// mdze po'i srin lag rus pa yis// dam tshig las kyi

'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus dang dgu// mu khyud rang gshed sngags kyis bskor// sbrul mgo lnga pa'i zhal phyung ste// ro stod mi la ro smad sbrul// phyag na sbrul zhags nag po bsnams// g.yon
na nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dam nyams la// mdzo nad las kyi 'khor lor bskor// dug sbyar dug gi rlangs pas bdug/ de yi sgrub thabs nyams len ni// bya khyung las kyi
'khor lo lto sbyar las// las kyi rigs bzhi'i klu srog rgyud dbang bsdu// mdze nad las kyi bdag por dmigs shing bsgrub// de yi las kyis 'bras bu ni// dgra bo gdug pa'i nad kyis 'dzin// de nas las la

sbyor ba'i tshe// mdze pho'i sba khyim du// klu bdud nag po'i zhal phyung ste// ro stod ma la ro smad sbrul// rtsi sman phyag na sbrul nag zhags pa bsnams// g.yon na mdze nad thun zor 'phen// bya rog nag po'i snying

khrag dang// ra rog nag po'i khrag gis byug/ rtsi sman spos kyi dud pas bdug/ las kyi bshed du dbang bskor dgra bo gnyer gtad bya// de yi las kyi 'bras bu ni// dgra bo dri dang rlangs kyis 'chi// da ni dgra

bo'i ling ga bcas ste/ rgyu ni bla tshe gang yin bla lpags la// rkyen ni dgra bo'i dri chus sbyar// sbyor ba dmigs pa'i sems dang pha mes gdung brgyud rus pa'i sa// dgra bo gang yin ling ga bri// mgo la rus bri

snying khar ming// lte bar tsha bri bla la bla btags bri// dug sbyar khu bas zhal du blud/ khong pa spos nas 'dzi bar bsam// gu gul sbyar ma'i dud pas bdug/ 'go ba'i lha dang bral bar bsam// klu srog grub pa'i

rnal 'byor pas// rtags dang sbyar zhing klu srog drang// rigs bzhi klu yi srog sgrub tshe// mdze nad las kyi 'khor lo dang// klu bdun nag po lto sbyar te// bar du dgra bo'i ling ga gzhug/ bal tshon sngon dmar

byad kyis gril// mdze pho'i thod par zhag gsum bsrub// hUM nA ga rA dza sa ma ya dza/ che ge mo'i tsit+ta dzra la ya/ nag po tsit+ta dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya dza/ zhes thun gyis brabs la gsad par bya'o// de nas chu mig
mgo dgu pa'am/ mgo bdun pa'am mgo lnga pa'am/ mgo gsum pa ru gtad par bya/ de yi yon tan 'phrin las ni// gcan zan ma bu 'brel ba 'dra// so sor kha tshar las la shis// zhes dam tshig chen po nga

yis bshad// 'khor lo sbyor ba'i le'u bstan pa ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang klu chen brgyad kyis/ klu'i rgyal po la bskor ba dang phyag mdzad nas zhus pa/ e ma ngo mtshar snying po'i don// 'gro ba'i don

la thugs rje'i mchog/ thugs rje'i mchog dang ldan pa'i klu rgyal byin rlabs can/ las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir/ byin rlabs dbang gi rgyal po ji ltar bsgrub/ de yi mdo rtsa snying po rnams// man ngag mdor
bsdus gsang ba rnams// dge bsnyen bdag cag 'khor rnams la// 'gro ba'i don du bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ byin rlabs thugs rje'i mchog la dgongs nas gsungs pa/ e ma ho/ 'gro don cir yang
mdzad pa thugs rje'i mchog/ 'gro don gzhan la dgongs pa dam tshig las kyi klu chen brgyad/ sa bdag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ legs par bshad kyis bdag la btud/ ces bka' stsal

to// las kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i phyir// byin rlabs dbang bskur rgyal po yi// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyis bsgrub// de yi mdo ni sku la rtsa ba thugs// snying po rang byung ye shes te// man ngag mdor bsdus bshad

par bya// sku la dbang bskur rtsa bas skyed// rang byung ye shes dbang bskur rgyal po'i mchog/ de yi dbang bskur rim pa ni// phyi nang gsang pa gsum du bskur// phyi dbang sku la nang dbang thugs// gsang dbang

rang byung ye shes snying po'o// de yi 'phrin las yon tan bshad pa ni// dang po rtsa ba thugs kyi dbang bskur te// sa bcu lam lnga rims kyis bgrod// de ni sku yi dbang thob ste// sems kyi byin rlabs sna tshogs

'byung// ye shes lnga dang mngon shes drug/ sku gsung sku lnga la sogs 'byung// mngon sum mthong zhing snang ba'i lung ston 'byung// de ni ting 'dzin thabs kyi byin rlabs shar ba yin// de tshe sku yi sbyor sgrol dngos

su nus par 'gyur// de ni las su rung ba'i dbang mchog thob pa yin// de'i tshe 'bras bu ye shes mngon du gyur pa ste/ 'byung ba lnga yi bcud len thob par 'gyur// 'byung ba me yi bcud len thob pa na// phung po

drod dang mi 'bral ci zos 'ju bar 'gyur// 'byung ba rlung gi bcud len thob pa na// phung po len shes shing tshe la 'jigs med thob par 'gyur/ 'byung ba sa'i bcud len phung po zag bcas dang bral te/ tshe 'di

la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya/ 'byung ba chu'i bcud len thob pa na// 'byung ba yum dang sbyor nus bde ba'i chu rgyun 'bab par 'byur// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu

drug pa'o//// de nas yang klu rgyal dga' bos zhus pa/ e ma ho/ ngo mtshar snying po'i don spyad pas// byin brlabs rgyud la 'chang ba klu rgyal chos kyi bdag/ las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir// dbang sgrub rgyal
po sgrub pa la// las kyi sbyor bka' ji ltar bsgrub// man ngag rgyal po mdor bsdus rnams// bdag la byang chub sems dpas bshad du gsol/ ces gsol ba btab ste zhus pas/ o ma ho/ rtsa ba byang chub

sems las snying po'i don spyad gyur na/ rtsol pa med par byin rlabs 'jug/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang mchog 'di// rang sems 'byongs na thob pa yin// rang sems 'byung ba lnga la sbyangs// rtsal chen rlung gi

'khor lo bskor// phyi rlung bkug la nang rlung skyim// gsang ba byang chub sems kyi rlung// bum pa'i mar me bzhin du lta// klu rgyal dga' bo dad pa can// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang mchog 'di// 'byung ba lnga yi
bcud la sgrub// ces bka' stsal to// lan du gsungs pa/ dbang bskur rgyal po bsgrub pa la// de yi las kyi sbyor ka gnyis su bshad/ khyung gi dbang dang klu yi dbang// man ngag mdor bsdus

bshad pa ni/ khyung gi dbang la rnam pa gnyis// thun mong khyad par rnam pa gnyis/ khyad pa byang chub sems la sgrub pa ste// bya thabs 'phrin las gong du spyad// thun mong dag la rnam pa gnyis// rten gyis bskur
dang sems kyis bskur// sems kyis bskur ba bsam pa'i khyad par te// rig pa'i rtsal gyis dbang bskur byin gyis brlab// sems la dbang thob rnal 'byor gyis// ra ba bzhi yi zla ba la// rgyu rkyen sbyor ba

tshul bzhin sgrub// tshe gcig nya'am gnam stong la// byin brlabs thob pa'i bla ma yis// dad pa can gyi slo bu la// rim pas tshul bzhin dbang bskur bya// de yi yon tan 'phrin las ni// byang chub sems dpa'i
sa non te// 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs pa thob// ces gsungs ye shes grub ba'i mtshan rtags su// thugs rje byang chub sems su 'char zhes bshad// de nas sku yi dbang bskur te// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du
sbyar// de yi 'phrin las bstan pa ni// rigs lnga yab yum sbyor ba yis// 'od zer bdud rtsi dkar dmar las// byang chub sems su dbang bskur bya// de yi rim pa bstan pa ni// dang po phyi yi dbang bskur

te// de nas nang ltar byin gyis brlab// de nas gsang ba byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur bya// de nas gsung gi dbang bya// gdam ngag rims kyis bshad// dbang bskur rgyal po'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste
bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// klu yi dbang la rnam pa gnyis/ khyad par sems kyi dbang bskur dang// thun mong brten gyi dbang bskur ro/ khyad par sems kyi dbang bskur ni// snying po
rang byung rigs pa rtsal// sku gsung dbang bskur byang chub sems la bskur// de yi 'phrin las yon tan ni// srid pa kun gyi bdag nyid chen por gnas// snang stong thams cad rang rig thugs kyi snying por

shar// ye shes skus te rang byung ba// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku// ye shes skus te khyad par che// zhes gsungs/ khyad par byang chub sems kyi dbang// mtha' can nyid du rang snang bskur// zhes

gsungs so// thun mong rten gyi dbang la gsum gyis bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang la gsum gyis bshad// dang po rtsa ba thugs kyi dbang bskur te// de nas sku yi dbang bskur te// de nas gsung gi dbang

rgya gdab// de yi 'phrin las bstan pa ni// thugs las dbang bskur 'khor lo ste// dam tshig gtsang ma mi'i sngags pa yis// 'khor lo rgyu rkyen sbyor ba rnams// rang gi dbang thang skyed pa'i zla ba las// tshes
grangs dus tshod rtsis la bris// de nas rin po che'i mchod rten nang du bzhugs su gsol// tsan dan gur gum chu gtor la// rin po che yi mchod pa dbul// rtsa gcig tshun chad bsnyen cing
mchod// dgos 'dod sems kyis gsol ba gdab// 'phro 'du rin chen thugs dam bskul// dam tshig sngags kyi rang lus bsrung// byas te sku gsung thugs la yid bzhin bstim// byin brla pas thugs kyi
dkyil la dbang zhes bshad// de yi yon tan bstan pa ni// sku la dbang bskur thugs la 'dod pa'i yon tan byin brlabs sna tshogs 'byung// chos sku gsal dang ye shes 'char// bde ba 'byung dang lhun gyis
grub// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub// ces dam tshig bshad/ de nas sku yi dbang bskur te// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las lnga// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyis sbyar// de yi 'phrin las
bstan pa ni// dmigs pa'i man ngag yan lag gsum pa'i rgyu// yi ge rtsa gcig sprul par shar// hUM skyed bdag po gnyis las sprul// yan lag yi ge rtsa gcig las// 'od zer snang tshogs bdung rtsir

sprul// yi ge sprul pa'i gnas lnga ru// bdud rtsi bum pa bstan par brtsam// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de yi rim pa bstan pa ni// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bskur// phyi dbang longs spyod phun sum
tshogs pa byin gyis brlab// nang dbang bdag nyid phun sum tshogs par byin gyis brlab// gsang dbang byang chub bdud rtsir phun sum tshogs par byin gyis brlabs// de nas dbang bskur bshad par

bya// dang po sku la dbang bskur longs spyod 'brel// thugs la dbang bskur byang chub 'char// gsung la dbang bskur gdam ngag rdzogs// zhes gsungs/ de yi yon tan bstan pa ni// thugs kyi dbang thob snying
po ye shes 'char// sku yi dbang thob byin rlabs sna tshogs skye// gsung gi dbang thob yon tan sna tshogs 'byung zhes bshad// byin brlabs dbang bskur rgyal po'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad

pa'o//// de nas yang zhus pa/ e ma ho ngo mtshar snying po'i don/ byang chub sems kyi don spyad pas// rang bzhin rnam dag thugs rje can// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dren pa'i thugs rje can// byin brlabs
dbang bskur rgyal po la// bdag cag mos pa dang pas 'dud// thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje 'dzin pa las kyi rje// gsang sngags kun gyi bdag po ste// mthu stobs can la bdag cag

'dud// 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// drag po'i 'phrin las bshad du gsol// klu yi rgyal po thugs rje'i longs spyod can// sa rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// byin brlabs phun sum tshogs pa'i/ 'byung ba'i snying
po thugs rje'i longs spyod can// bdag cag las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa la// las kyi dam tshig ji ltar bsrung// zhes bstod de zhus pa/ bka' stsal pa/ dge bsnyen las kyi klu chen brgyad// las kyi

rA dza bsgrub pa la// dam tshig zhu ba shin tu legs// dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// 'khor rnams gus pas bdag la 'dud// klu yi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i tshe// rtsa ba sngags kyi dam tshig bsrung// gtsor ni byang

chub sems kyi sdom pa blang// dang du byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje bskyed// sdom pa de gsum thub pa de// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin rlob ste// byin brlabs yon tan yon

tan cir yang 'byung// gzhan yang dam tshig bsrung ba ni/ khrus dang gtsang sbra rtag tu bya/ kha zas lnga ni shin tu spang// shin tu bsnol ba gzab par bya// klu sha lto ru yong m-i gtang// yugs sa mo la spyad
mi rung/ khyad par rin chen lus la rten// dam tshig de rnams thub pa ni// byin brlabs longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs/ dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang klu'i rgyal po

pad+mas zhus pa/ e ma ho/ chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong byang chub sems dpa'i klu// las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir// dbang bskur rgyal po ji ltar bsgrub// rtsa ba yan lag 'bras bu rnams// mdor bsdus
man ngag bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ thabs kyi rgyal po snying rje mchog la dgongs nas gsungs pa/ e ma ho/ byin brlabs dbang thob ye shes las kyi klu// legs par bshad kyis nyams su
long// dbang bskur rgyal po rtsa ba byang chub sems la snying rjes sgrub// de nyid byams dang ma ldan na// don byed grub par ngas ma gsungs// rtsa ba bdag po gnyis la bsgrub// yan lag mdor bsdus sku
gsung thugs// 'bras rgyud smin pa'i las rgyud lnga// mdor bsdus man ngag bshad par bya// dbang gi bdag po rnam pa gnyis su bshad// thugs rjes bzhi 'dzin gyi bdag po dang// longs spyod yon tan gyi

bdag po'o// phun sum tshogs pa lnga la dbang thob pa ste/ mchod pa'i bye brag rgya chen po mchod cing 'dod spyod sems kyi thugs dam bskang/ yi dam byang chub sems kyis bsgrub/ de'i dbang thob pa ni bdag

nyid thob pa phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/ thugs rje'i gzhi bdag bo sa dang lam la dbang thob pa de/ dad pa dri ma med pa'i thugs byang chub sems kyis mchod cing bsgrub/ snying rje mchog
gis thugs dam rgyun du bskang// ma brjed rgyun du dad pas bsgrub// de yi dbang thob grub rtags bstan pa ni// thugs kyi byin brlabs rgyun du cir yang 'char// skye ldog lam du bshad par bya// ma rigs
'khrul bzhi chod nas ye shes skye// gzu 'dzin nub nas bde ba 'char// snang ba log na chos skur rtogs// de'i 'bras bu mtha' rtsam nyid du gnas par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs de nas yang zhus pa/

dbang gis bdag po sgrub pa la// sku gsung thugs dang ji ltar sbyar// thabs kyi 'phrin las ji ltar rtsi// zhes zhus pas/ klu'i rgyal po thugs rje gzhi 'dzin gyi bdag po la dgongs nas gsungs pa/ sku dang sbyar

ba 'phrin las te// rnal 'byor lam du zhugs pa'i tshe// mthar lam rtogs nas kun tu bzang po'i sa non par bshad/ 'bras bu mi skye mi 'gag rang bzhin thob// gsung dang sbyar ba snying po'i ste// snying rjes

'gro don spyod pa'i tshe// rigs 'dzin gyis sa non nas/ 'bras bu sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bshad/ thugs dang sbyar ba rtsa ba ste// lam du zhugs nas ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i tshe/ yang dag rdzogs

ba'i sa la gnas nas/ 'bras bu sems nyid mngon du gyur pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// thabs kyi 'phrin las mdo rtsa snying po'i sgrub pa ste/ 'di yi 'phrin las sku la sgrub ste 'dus// rtsa ba thugs kyi sa

lam sbyong ste bgrod// snying po byang chub sems la 'gyur ldog med pa ste// rdzogs pa'i sa la gnas zhes gsungs// de phyir dpa' bo dbang gi rgyal po yis/ sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis rlobs// rtsa ba'i dam
tshig thub pa na// rdo rje sems dpa'i byin brlabs 'jug/ de phyir sku gsung thugs kyi dbang bskur ces// dbang rgya byang chub sems dpas gdab// ces gsungs so// dbang bskur rtsa ba mdor bstan pa'i le'u

nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang bskor ba dang phyag mdzad nas zhus pa// e ma ho/ las kyi dbang thob klu rgyal byin rlabs can// las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir// dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba bstan/ sgrub thabs
'phrin las mdor bsdus rnams// 'khor rnams kun la bshad du gsol// ces zhus pas/ 'phrin las rin po che bcud phyung nas/ 'khor rnams kun la bshad pa/ las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa la// dbang bskur
rgyal po byin brlabs 'tshal// 'phrin las man ngag mdor bsdus rnams// tshang bar bshad kyi lus ngag btud// nyams dga' ba yi gnas dag tu// sa chog bgegs bskrad gzhung bzhin bya// maN+Dal cha mnyam

yid 'ong la// rin chen chu yi chag chag gdab// ba las byung ba'i rnam lnga dang// rtsa mchog spaus kyi byug par bya// de nas cha chen bcu drug thig gdab ste// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad phyogs bzhi rigs// mtshams

bzhi rtsibs tshon mdzes tshon yin// lte ba mthing kha mu khyud dmar// gru chad ljang khu sgo rnams ser// sgo bzhi rigs la sgo khang lta babs bum pa rigs// dkyil 'khor chen po gzhung bzhin bri// yang na sgo bzhi blo
'bur rigs// mdzes pa'i tshon rnams bris nas su// lha yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rin chen lnga yi bum pa la// las kyi bye brag gzhung bzhin bsham// 'khor lo phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru
gzugs// mtshams bzhi dag tu klu rigs bzhi// dgu pa bdun pa lnga pa gsum pa bsnams// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang// de ltar rigs kyi zhal phyung la// byang shar mtshams nas rims kyis

dgod// gru chad bzhi la klu mo rigs bzhi ste// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang ngo// phyag na so so rigs kyi bum pa 'dzin// rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams// gru chad bzhi la rims kyis gzugs// sgo
bzhi du rig sgyur ba khyung// yang na sa bdag rigs bzhi gzugs// shin tu mdzes pa bris par bya// lha'i mtshan nyid gzugs brnyan de bzhin dgod// de nas las kyi bum pa chas byas te// dbus su dung gi

bum pa gzugs// shar du dngul la lho ru gser// nub tu zangs la byang du lcags kyi bum pa gzugs/ de ru bum pa'i snying po ni// sman lnga rin chen lnga la sogs// me tog lnga dang snying po lnga// 'bras bu lnga dang

spos sna lnga// de yi bar chod bsal ba'i phyir// bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bsgom// sder gshog phyag rgyas thugs khar mkha' lding rgyal po bskyed// drag sngags bzlas shing gu gul sbyar ma'i dud bas bdug/ de

ru bum par byang chub sems kyi bcud// byang sems dkar dmar rin chen chung pas sbyang// rin chen chu yis gang bar bsgang// dar mtshon lnga yis kha rgyal bri// tsan dan shugs pas kha brgyan te// 'o ma nal bu

shar dang lho// nub tu seng ldeng sngags bshad yin// byang du se skyer drag po'i shing// de rnams rma bya'i sgro dang ldan par gzugs// gzungs thag dar tshon sna lngas sbrel// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// pra ti bu tsag
sngags bzlas te// bum pa lnga yi mgul du bcing// tshon skud rang gi lag tu bzung// skabs su 'dre bskrad drag sngags bzlas// yungs kar dag la bsngags te brdeg/ skabs su bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas

te// bum pa rdo rjes bskor bar bsam// dar dkar dag gi gur phub la// spos kyi mchod pa rgyun mi gcad// de nas lta spyod ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mchod pa'i rim pa bsham bya ste// 'gro la phan pa'i don
bya'i phyir// rang don spangs la thugs rje skyed// 'di phyi bdag gzhan don du sgrub// tshogs bsags yan lag rgya cher bsag/ dkon mchog gsum la gtso ru blang// de bzhin gtsang rigs mgon po mchod// phyi
nang snang srid lha 'dre la// gser phud btang la dam bdar 'phrin las bcol lo// de bzhin rang gi bsrungs ma mchod// gser phud gtor cha rgyas pas gtang// stong phrag bcu yi bgegs rigs la/ de
bzhin 'byung po'i gtor ma btang// mchod sbyin rtsal la bden ba bdar// de bzhin yul gyi lha klu mchod// chab gtor btang la bden par bdar// de nas mchod pa'i rdzas bsham ste// mtshams

gcad cing bgegs kyang bskrad// skad cig ma'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngags 'dis rdo rje 'dzin par bskyed la// oM badzra pA Ni badzra mahA krod+ha hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa khro bo'i rgyan rdzogs par

bskyed de/ rdo rje klad la bskor zhing/ rdo rje'i mtshan drag po brjod cing/ hUM dang phaT kyi nga ro drag pos khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor la bskor zhing/ khro bo stang stabs kyis khams gsum

zil gyis mnan par bya'o// de nas mchod pa dbul te/ rdo rje 'dzin ba'i lha tshogs la// phyi nang gi mchod pa rgyas par dbul// dge bsnyen klu'i lha tshogs la/ dkar gtor sman gyi mchod pas mchod/ tsan dan

spos kyi mchod pa rgyun du gtang ngo// de nas cho ga la 'jug par bya ste// bsnyen mchod tshogs bsags kyi yan lag rgyas par bya'o// de nas bum pa byin gyis brlabs par byas te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang
rnams rims kyis thob par bya ste/ dbang bskur rgyal po las/ kha dog gi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas de nyid yang dag bshad bya ba// ting 'dzin las kyi sgron ma 'di bzhin te// bdag nyid chen po
rab bskyed nas// mchod bstod bsnyen pa'i las rdzogs las// las kyi bum pa rigs lnga la// byin brlabs dbang bskur 'di bzhin bya// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rims kyis bskyed// bdag nyid hUM las chen
por bskyed// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ yi ge A bzhi phyogs bzhir 'phros pa las/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bsam/ hUM las 'od 'phros yi ge 'di

rnams su gyur te/ zla ba'i steng du bsam/ oM dkar po/ traM ser po/ hri dmar po/ a ljang khu/ de rnams las 'od 'phros bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/ ngan song gsum gyi sdig sgrib

sbyangs/ slar 'dus pa las rigs rnam pa bzhi'i sngags 'di rnams brjod la bskyed do// oM bud+d+ha ga ru Da tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ oM rat+na ga ru Da tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ga ru Da tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ oM karma ga ru

Da tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ shar phyogs su bud+d+ha rigs kyi khyung sku mdog dkar po gser gyi gshog pa can bskyed/ lho phyogs su rin chen rigs kyi khyung sku mdog ser po zangs kyi gshog pa can bskyed/ nub phyogs su

pad+ma rigs kyi khyung sku mdog dmar po lcags kyi gshog pa can/ byang phyogs su las kyi rigs kyi khyung sku mdog ljang khu/ dung gi gshog pa can bskyed do/ khyung de rnams kyi mchu sder lcags las grub
pa/ spyan mig gser du 'khyil ba/ ljags dang spyan dmar ba/ rigs dang mthun pa/ spyi bo'i gtsug na 'od sna tshogs su 'phro ba'o// lus la rigs kyi rdo rjes brgyan pa/ sbrul rigs bzhi zhal du
gsol bar bsam mo/ khyung de rnams kyi thugs kha ru/ hUM mthing kha re re bsam mo// mgrin pa ru i dmar po re re dmigs so// spyi bo'i gtsug tu oM dkar po re re dmigs so// de nas yang bdag gi thugs

kha'i hUM las/ ma sngon dmar cig bdag gi g.yon phyogs su 'phros pa las/ lha mo g.yu'i bye chung ma sku mdog sngon mo// phyag g.yas yab la 'khyud pa/ g.yon g.yu'i bum pa bdag gis thugs kar 'dzin pa cig

bskyed/ yang hUM las 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phros pas/ rin po che'i yi ge 'di rnams su gyur te/ yab rnams kyi g.yon du/ 'byung ba bzhi yum bskyed do// sa ser mo shar phyogs su sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo/
phyag g.yas yab la 'khyud pa/ g.yon na rigs kyi bum pa thugs kar 'dzin pa'o// raM dmar po las lho phyogs su me'i lha mo sku mdog dmar mo// phyag g.yas yab la 'khyud pa/ g.yon rigs kyi bum pa thugs

kar 'dzin pa'o// baM dkar po las nub phyogs su chu'i lha mo phyag gong gi 'dre/ yaM sngo skya las byang phyogs su rlung gi lha mo sku mdog sngo skya phyag 'dre/ lha mo de rnams kyi lus la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas

brgyan pa/ zhal 'dzum la sku sgeg pa/ yid du 'ong ba bskyed do// de nas 'dzab drang zhing 'phro 'du'i byin brlabs byas te/ yab rnams kyi thugs kha'i hUM las thugs 'od zer sna tshogs bdud rtsi sprul te/ yum
rnams kyi thugs khar thim pas/ yum rnams kyi chags pa thugs kyis bskad nas/ 'od zer sna tshogs bdud rtsi dmar por gyur te/ yab rnams kyi thugs khar 'dus pas yab rnams kyi dgyes pa thugs su
bskangs te/ bdud rtsi dkar dmar byang chub sems su gyur te/ bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs su thim pa las/ thugs mnyes pa'i
mchod pa phul/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kyi bcud byang chub sems su bsdus nas slar 'dus pa las/ yab yum rnams bdud rtsi byang chub sems su zhu ste/ bdag gi thugs khar hUM zhes brjod pas/
bdag gi thugs kar nyi zer nyi ma la 'dus pa bzhin du bsam/ de ni phyi ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag nyid la nyid dbang bskur ro// da ni nang ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ gsang ba'i dbang mchog bskur ba

ni/ yab yum rnams gong bzhin du bskyed la/ yab yum rnams kyi mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs par bya ste/ ma sUr+Ya maN+Dal/ zhes brjod pa las pad+ma la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re re bsam/ de rnams kyi steng du
hUM badzra zhes brjod pas/ hUM las gsang ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa re re bsam/ de rnams kyi rtse mo la/ oM dkar po shel 'dra re re bsam/ de nas yang a tsan+Da man+Dal zhes brjod pas/ yum rnams kyi
mkha' la/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du paM pad+ma maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ paM las pad+ma'i dal re bsam/ de'i steng du A dmar po mtshal cog la ma bcag pa'i 'phrom 'dra ba re bsam/ de nas
'phro 'du byin gyis brlabs te/ yab rnams kyi thugs kha'i hUM las/ hUM 'od zer mang po yar drangs te/ mgrin pa'i yi ge A dmar po la thim pas/ hUM mthing kha A dmar por gyur/ a dmar po'i nang nas g.yas

nas g.yon du rgyud nas/ klad pa dung khang gi nang du oM dkar po la thim pas/ A dmar po/ oM dkar por gyur te/ sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud nas/ gsang ba rdo rje'i lam du byung nas byang chub sems su gyur te/
yum rnams kyi mkha' la thim pas/ yum rnams kyi chags pa sbyangs nas/ byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi dmar por gyur te/ slar 'dus paM las/ yab rnams kyi dges pa skyed de/ byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi
dkar por gyur te/ slar 'dus pa las/ de nas yum rnams kyi sbyor 'tshams nas 'od zer 'phros te/ 'og min gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas bde bar gshegs pa yab yum rigs lnga yab phyogs bcu

sangs rgyas 'khor bcas rnams byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du ltem gyis zhu ste/ slar 'dus te/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bcud byang chub kyi sems/ bum pa'i lha tshogs la thim par
bsams te/ bum pa de bzhin nyid byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ gsang ba'i dbang mchog dam par bskur bar bya'o// de nas dbang bskur ba dang/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa

rnams ni las rgyud gzhan las shes par bya'o// rin po che sna bdun dang/ bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad/ bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad brjod do// phyi ltar dbang bskur bar bya'o// rten gyi bum pa dang/ dbu rgyan dang/
dar gyi cod pan dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba dang/ gsang ba'i ming dang/ dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur ro// dbang bskur gsal byed kyi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa/
e ma ho/ byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje can// las kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i phyir// nyid kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// man ngag mdor bsdus rnams// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// ces
zhus pas/ thugs rje rang byung byang chub sems la dgongs nas zhus pa/ e ma ho/ byang chub sems dpa' las kyi dge bsnyen rnams// 'gro ba'i don du byin brlabs can// dam tshig chen po nga yis
bshad// 'khor rnams lus ngag yid gsum btud// ces bka' stsal to// ri bo 'dus pa'i rtse mo'am// chu bran 'dus pa rgya mtsho'i gling// yang na klu rgyal sa bdag 'dus pa'i sar// yang na yid
'ong nyams dga' gnas dag tu/ byin gyis brlabs pa gong bzhin bya// las kyi bca' lugs so sor dbye// shin tu mkhas pa rtags la spyad// shes rab can gyis de bzhin gyis// de nas dam tshig gtsang ma'i

rnal 'byor pas// las kyi bum pa chas byas te// rgyu ni rin chen sa la bya// rkyen ni rin chen chu yis sgru// sbyor ba mos gus dad pas gzo byas te// sems kyis dmigs te gzhung bzhin bskyed// de ru bum pa'i

snying po ni// sman sna lnga la sogs pa ste// rin chen lnga dang snying po lnga// me tog lnga dang 'bras bu lnga// tsan dan la sogs spos mchog lnga// de ru bum pa snying pa'i bcud// klu rgyal gnas pa'i chu mig nas// rin

chen snod du chu blangs te// rtsi mchog ga pur bcud kyis sbyar// gzhan yang sman sna stong dang rab sbyar blug/ dbus kyi pho brang dag la bzhugs su gsol// dar mchog lnga yis kha rgyan dril// shing 'bras bu can
gyis kha brgyan te// ye shes lnga yi gzungs thag gdags// rts-i mchog spos kyi dud bas bsang// bkra shis rdzas kyis mtha' ma bskor// de bzhin longs spyod rdzas rnams bsogs// dkar gsum dag la lto rten

te// de bzhin khrus dang gtsang sbra bya// mchog tu dam tshig bsrung ba gces// de phyir gtsang ma'i dam tshig bsrung// gtsang ma'i mchod pa rgyun du dbul// de bzhin rtsi dang sman gyis mchod// spos kyi mchod pa rgyun

mi gcad// skabs su mchod bstod las gzhung bzhin// dam tshig gcan gyis bsnyen cing mchod// de bzhin bsnyen pa'i sngags 'di rgyun du drang// oM nA ga rA dza sa ma ya dza/ skabs su bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas
te// gdug pa klu'i dug rnams shin tu sbyang ba gces// de nas bum pa byin brlabs te// dbang rnams rims kyis bskur// zhes gsungs so// dbang bskur las kyi le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas de
nyid byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ rig pa gsal byed las kyi sgron ma bstan te/ dang por bdag nyid chen por rab dmigs nas// tshogs bsags yan lag bzhin bya// mchod bstod las rim rdzogs pa

dang// bum pa byin gyis brlab par bya ste// de yi 'phrin las bshad pa ni// dmigs pa'i man ngag yan lag gsum ste// rtsa ba thugs dang sbyar bar bya// hUM bskyed bdag po gnyis gnas sprul pa ste// rig pa
gsal byed las kyi sgron ma bstan te// yan lag yi ge rtsa gcig las// byin brlabs 'phro 'du'i skabs su bshad// yi ge dmigs pa'i gnas lnga ru// bdud rtsi bum pa brtan par bstim// zhes pa ni dbang
bskur las kyi skabs su bshad// de nas de nyid bshad pa'i phyir// gsal byed thugs kyi sgron ma 'di bshad do// oM badzra ma hA krod+ha hUM phaT ces brjod bas/ bdag nyid hUM las rdo rje 'dzin par

bskyed// sder gshog phyag rgya bcas nas su// thugs khar mkha' lding rgyal po bskyed// mkha' lding rgyal po'i thugs kha ru// ye shes rdo rje sems la dmigs// oM nA ga rA dza zhes brjod pas// hUM las ye shes klu r
gyal bskyed// sbrul mgo dgu pa gdeng ka can// rin chen lus la sbrul mjug 'khyil// phyag g.yas rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// g.yon pa rin chen pad+ma bsnams/ longs spyod kun gyi bdag por bskyed// dge

bsnyen chen po'i thugs kha ru// rin chen 'bar ba A las ni// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od 'bar bum 'dra'i gzugs// longs spyod kun gyi rtsa ba ste// 'byung ba'i rgyal po rtsa ba 'dzin// byed pa sems can

kun don byed// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen te// klu yi rgyal po'i thugs mdzod yin// dam tshig shes shing dam tshig ldan// dam tshig can la longs spyod spel// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// yid bzhin
nor bu'i bum nang du// A las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor khar// hUM las dpag bsam ljon shing bskyed// AM las yan lag gyes te// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dbus dang dgu/ oM las me tog 'khrungs
te// 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung zhes bshad// de yis dgos pa thams cad 'grub ces gsungs/ dmigs pa'i man ngag gsum zhes de la bya/ oM nA ga rA dza sa ma ya dza/ zhes brjod pas/ yan lag
phyogs mtshams brgyad du/ pad+ma'i me tog gzhal yas su/ dge bsnyen las kyi klu chen brgyad/ gtso la 'dud pa'i tshul du bskyed// dbus su oM las ye shes sems dpa'i klu// sbrul mgo dgu pa ru bskyed/ yan

lag gsum zhes de la smos/ de nas bum pa byin brlabs te/ oM AHhUM na ga yu yu/ nA ga bu ru dz+wa la ni/ nA ga sa ma ya swAhA/ yi ge rtsa gcig sprul par shar/ zhes de la bshad de/ 'phro 'du'i byin brlabs de
bzhin dmigs/ bdag nyid thugs ka'i huM las 'od zer 'phros pas/ klu'i rgyal po thugs ka'i dam tshig las kyi dge bsnyen rnams kyi thugs kar 'phros pas/ de nas dam tshig gi las la bskul te/ 'gro ba
sems can gyi don la bzhengs nas/ longs spyod kyi dam tshig la dgongs nas/ khams gsum gyi sems can longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa sprul te/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus thams cad du/ rin po che'i

longs spyod sna tshogs pa dang/ bkra shis kyi rdzas su 'bul nas gyur te/ 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod du byin gyis brlabs so// de ltar phyi'i dbang bskur te/ bdag dang 'khor rnams kun la longs spyod phun sum
tshogs par dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs/ de'i yon tan 'bras bu ni/ mi zad gter la sbyor/ ces dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad/ de nas nang ltar byin gyis brlabs la/ gsang ba'i dbang
mchog bskur ba ni// dmigs pa gong dang mthun par bskyed// byin gyis brlabs pa 'di bzhin bshad// bdag nyid hUM las 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'phros pas/ thugs kyi bcud bsdus 'dod yon bdud rtsir

sprul te gyur/ byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi yis// las kyi bum pa ltem gyis khengs par bsam// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// legs nyes shin tu che ba yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ klu la gdug pa'i dug
yod ba'i phyir/ dper na sman gyi rgyal po ga bur 'dra/ lta spyod ldan pas dbang bskur na// yid bzhin thugs su chud pa ste// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub 'gyur zhes// dam tshig chen po nga yis

bshad// de phyir dam tshig med cing lta sgom sems kyis ma 'chun na// mi bde sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung// gdug pa klu'i 'dzin byed bsam ngan gyi nad kyis rgyud rkyen rnams cir kyang 'byung zhes ngag gdug pa

'dzin byed kyis bshad do// de phyir dam tshig gtso ru blangs// mchog tu rdo rje 'dzin pa sgom// dang du bsnyen pa bsgrub pa brnyes// bsrung ba'i sngags la nan tan bskyed// klu gdug sbyang ba shin tu gces// de

nyid de phyir bshad par bya// drag sngags las kyi sbyor ba bshad// oM pa ti raM sa ha/ oM sna ku la swAhA/ oM nA ga le sa ha/ de ni klu yi dug sbyangs te/ khrag rgyas sngags kyi shi sa bstan// skabs su bsrung ba'i sngags

'di bzlas// oM pra ti pu tsa ga badzra dun ting mi li mi li hUM phaT/ rdo rje phyag rgya'i drag sngags te// rang lus rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i che ba skyed// ces gsungs so// de nas dbang
bskur rim pa ste// dam tshig rgyud nas shes par gyis// longs spyod dbang ni bkra shis te// dam tshig can gyi rtag tu bskur/ khyad par dbang thob lha'i rgyal por 'gyur// longs spyod kun la smos ci

'tshal// dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// sdug bsngal nad kyis zin ba'i gang zag la// nad kyi bdud rtsi gsang ba'i dbang bskur na// shin tu sdug bsngal de la shis pa yin// dper na khye kus khye ku 'byin pa
'dra/ dbang bskur lan gsum byas na/ mdze nad bco brgyad zhi bar nges/ des na bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi dbang// byin rlabs zhugs pa'i bla ma yis// rang la rang nyid dbang bskur na// yid bzhin nor
bu 'chang ba yin// dgos 'dod thams cad de la 'byung// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// dbang bskur rgyal po gsal byed sgron ma 'di med na// byin brlabs dbang bskur byed pa rnams// chu la mar
gyi snying po 'don pa 'dra// bskal pa bsgrubs kyang don mi 'byung zhes bshad// dbang bskur gsal byed kyi le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas de nyid bshad pa'i phyir// 'phrin las rim pa
mdor bsdus te// gsang sngags rig pa'i sgron ma bshad// dang po bum pa'i dbang bskur byin gyis brlab// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du byin gyis brlab// de nas rim pa bshad pa ni// dang po rang la dbang

bskur byin gyis brlab// de nas bum pa byin gyis brlab ste// de nas slob ma byin gyis brlab ste// dang po slob ma khrus byas te// bar chod bsal zhing khrus kyi las rnams rdzogs par bya// gtsang ba'i gos gon

pad+ma'i khar bzhag ste/ dbang bskur rim pa 'di bzhin no// dbus kyi bum pa blangs spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad brjod/ hUM/ nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje rigs 'dzin bum pa'i lha// rdo rje dbyings kyi

dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan rigs kyi bu 'di la// rdo rje dbyings nas dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// rdo rje'i snying po rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje 'chang ba bum pa'i lha// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan

rigs kyi bu 'di la// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs/ hUM/ rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje rgyal// rdo rje rgyal ba bum pa'i lha// bud+d+ha rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan 'di la rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang

bskur byin gyis rlobs/ hUM/ rdo rje 'dzin byed rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje khro rgyal bum pa'i lha// rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du// gdug pa 'dul phyir skal ldan 'dre/ hUM/ rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje'i thugs// rdo rje

'bar ba bum pa'i lha'i// snang ba mtha' yas dkyil 'khor du// gdug pa dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// skal ldan 'dre/ rdo rje gsung mchog drag po'i skad// rdo rje drag po bum pa'i lha'i// don yod grub pa'i dkyil

'khor du// gdug pa zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// skal ldan 'dre/ oM badzra mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM rat+na mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM pad+ma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hri/ oM karma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ de

bzhin du dbang rnams rim pas bskur bar bya'o// de nas de nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// rig pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sgron ma bshad// dbus kyi gtso bo yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas/ bdud rtsi byang chub

sems kyi 'od zer skal ldan de'i spyi gtsug tu thim pas/ phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// thul gyis bsregs sbyangs te// mi dmigs pa las yab kyi hUM zhes brjod pas/ kho'i rig pa hUM du bsdus te/ bdag

cag yab kyi thugs kha nas/ hUM mthing nag 'dus par bsam ste/ de nas hUM las du mang po yar drangs te/ mgrin pa'i yi ge oM la thim par bsam// hUM 'di na A dmar mar gyur te/ sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud de/

gsang ba rdo rje'i lam du byung/ sems su gyur nas yum gyi mkha' la thim pas/ byang chub sems su ltor 'od du 'khyil te/ slar byung nas hUM bzhi po la thim pas lus zhu ste/ oM badzra ga ru tsa le tsa le

hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ rdo rje rigs kyi khyung du byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bud+d+ha rigs kyi bum pa blang ste/ spyi bor bzhag ste gong bzhin du brjod do// ting nge 'dzin gyi yab yum rnams kyi sbyor 'tshams nas/
gong bzhin du 'od 'phros pas/ bsregs sbyangs nas mi dmigs pa la/ yab kyis oM zhes brjod pas/ kho'i rigs pa oM du 'dus te/ yab kyi thugs kha'i hUM las 'ub kyis 'dus par bsam mo// de nas gong

bzhin du brgyud de/ yum gyi mkha' la thim pas/ byang chub kyi sems yum ltor 'od du thig ler 'dril te slar phyung ste/ oM du gyur te bzhi po la thim pas 'od du ltem gyis zhu ste/ oM bud+d+ha ga ru Da na zhes bud+d+ha rigs

su byin gyis brlab bo// phyogs gsum des 'dre ste shes par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang rdzogs par bskur ro// rim pa las kyi le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas yang klu'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi longs spyod kyi

mchod pa sna tshogs pa phul nas zhus pa/ e ma ho/ ngo mtshar snying po'i don spyad pas// lta spyod klong du gyur pa/ bde gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// rang bzhin rnam dag chos dbyings nam mkha' che// gzugs

skur sprul nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa// dbang rnams rdzogs pas klu rgyal chos kyi rje// bdag cag 'gro ba'i don bgyid pas// las kyi rgyal po bsgrub ba'i phyir// tshogs lam sbyor lam sgom lam rnams// lta spyod
gnyis med bshad du gsol// ces zhus pas/ klu'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams// bdag gi lta spyod dam pa 'di// las kyi rgyal po bsgrub phyir bshad// 'khor rnams
bdag gi bka' la btud// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi 'phrin las thams cad// gsang sngags mdor bsdus te// sku gsung thugs kyi gsal byed sgron mar bshad pa 'di bzhin no// rang sems gsal bas kun

tu dmigs// ye shes snying po'i ngo bo 'di skad brjod/ hUM/ nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje chos nyid chos sku che// rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje snying po rig pa sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje

snying po 'chang la rdo rje rgyal zhes sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// rdo rje ye shes sangs rgyas che zhes// chos nyid rang byung rgyal pos gsungs// rdo rje 'jigs byed rdo rje skur sprul pa// rdo rje khro bo khro bo

che// rdo rje 'bar ba'i thugs sprul pa// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba che// rdo rje gsung mchog rab sgrogs pa// rdo rje drag po drag shul che// ye shes snying po rang byung khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs// rdo rje lus la rdo rjes
brgyan// rdo rje 'jigs pa 'jigs pa che// rdo rje'i ba spu nyag re nas// rdo rje khro bo chung 'bul phrag stong du sprul// rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che// zhes rdo rje kun tu 'jigs pas gsungs// de
ltar rang sems gsal dmigs na// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la 'dud// ces gsang bdag phyag na rdo rjes gsungs// rdo rje'i gshog pas nam mkha' gcod ces pa nas// rdo rje 'joms pa

'joms pa che// zhes pa ni klu'i rgyal pos bstod pa'o// de ltar yon tan bstod pa na// bskal pa 'bum gyi sdig sgrib sbyang// zhes thugs rje chen pos bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi rgyal po

bsgrub pa'i phyir// rtsa ba las kyi sgron ma 'di gsungs so// nam mkha' gzhi la snying po lam// rdo rje snying po 'bras bur bshad// 'dzin pa las kyi rgyal por gsungs// rdo rje sku la snying po thugs// rdo rje 'chang ba

gsang sngags kun gyi bdag por bshad// rdo rje rgyal ba snying po rang byung ye shes so// de bzhin rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rtsa ba byang chub sems su bsgrub ces dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas de

nyid yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyu 'bras nyid kyi don bshad pa// nam mkha' rgyu la snying po rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi 'bras bur gsungs// rdo rje 'chang ba snying po byang chub sems su bshad// de bzhin don ldan rnal
'byor bas/ ma bgrod shugs kyis sa rnams non// bya ba med pa rnal 'byor che// kun tu chub pas rnam par rol// gnyis su med bas bdag nyid mchog dang ldan// zhes gsungs so// mchog dang ldan pas

rnal 'byor pas// nam mkha' skye med chos nyid de bzhin nyid du sgom// snying po thugs rje kun tu sgom// gsal la rtog pa med par sgom// rdo rje snying po rang byung 'dus ma byas// rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra// zhes

gsungs/ rgyu nyid snying po mthing nag hUM du shar// zhes rang byung rdo rje snying pos gsungs// rig pa byang chub sems kyi zer// phyogs su 'phro zhing kun tu sdud ces dpal kun tu bzang pos bshad// ye shes snying po

hUM gi 'od zer las// raM yaM khaM kyis bsregs sbyangs te// me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam yin// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum por chags// yi ge lam ni 'phro 'du las// de stengs ri

rab mchod rten las// rin chen lnga rgyu las grub ste// bum pa yid bzhin shing dang 'khor los brgyan// longs spyod phun sum tshogs par 'ong// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad/ kha dog gling dang mu khyud
