rnams// chos gzhung spyi dang mthun par bsam// mchod rten bum pa'i khong seng du// yi ge 'bum gyi 'phro 'du las// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad zangs kyi mu khyud
can// rin chen mu khyud bzhi'i gru chad ldan// sgo rnams sgo bzhi sgo rkang bum pa rta babs bum pa rigs// rin po ches brgyan pa ste// rgya khyon yid kyis 'khyud tshad do// de nas yang dag bshad bya

ba// rtsal chen seng ge gsal ba'i khri stengs su// badzra ar+ya tsaN+Da maN+Dal/ badzra sUr+ya tsaN+Da maN+Dal/ badzra pad+ma maN+Dal hUM zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje snying po bzhugs par bsam// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro 'du
yis// las gnyis rdzogs te 'od du zhu ba las/ oM badzra ga ru Da tsa le tsa la hUM zhes brjod pas/ bdag nyid 'jigs byed rdo rje ga ru Da/ 'khor dang bcas par gsal bskyed de/ 'di skad brjod de gsal bar

dmigs// rdo rje snying po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje snying po rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje snying po rdo rje rgyal// rdo rje snying po 'jigs byed rang byung khro bo'i sku zhes brjod de/ bdag nyid chen por rab dmigs so// de nas rang byung

ye shes kyi sku la 'di skad ces brjod do// hUM/ nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje 'dzin// chos sku skye med thugs su chud pa'i rtags// gnyis med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM/ rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'chang// ye

shes snying po 'du 'bral med ba'i rtags// mi 'gyur g.yu rung 'khyil pa phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje snying po 'chang bas rdo rje rgyal// ngan song gnas nas thar ba thob pa'i rtags// rdo rje sangs rgyas bde gshegs

sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje 'jigs byed rdo rje sku// dug gsum rtsad nas chod pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje 'jigs byed khro rgyal chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje thugs// dug lnga

bsregs pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje bdud 'joms 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i gsung mchog drag po'i gsung// snang srid zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje drag po'i sku la phyag

'tshal bstod// rdo rje sku la rdo rjes rab brgyan pa// rdo rje'i sku la bcad du med pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje bsam gtan sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje ba spu nyag re nas/ khro chung 'bum phrag stong du 'gyed pa
ni// gdon bgegs 'byung po sgrol ba'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje gzi brjid chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje gshog pas nam mkha' khyab par gcod pa ni// gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags dang

ldan// rdo rje mkha' lding chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i lcags sder bcu pa yis// rgya mtsho'i gting nas gdug pa 'dzin pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje ri 'bebs rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje'i lcags mchu chen

po rngams pa yis// gdug pa'i klu nams 'dul ba'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje glu 'dul sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i mche ba spu gri gtsigs pa ni// gdug pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje klu
grol sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje spyan mig me dpung 'bar ba ni// gdug pa'i che ba 'joms pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje dug sel sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i rwa gnyis dbyings su

gsor ba ni// chos nyid yum dang dbyings su sbyor ba'i rtags// rdo rje thabs mchog sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i nor bu gtsug na brgyan pa ni// 'gro ba yongs kyi sdug bsngal sel ba'i rtags dang ldan// rdo

rje byad bkrol sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje snying po me dpung 'bar ba ni// bdun rnams 'joms pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje klu 'joms 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar don dang ldan par

bstod pa ni// byang chub sa thob par nga yis bshad// gdug pa klu'i snying khrag 'joms zhes nga yis bshad// byang chub kyi me long ste/ lta byed rig pa'i rgyal po'o// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma/ gsang sngags

snying po mdor bsdus kyi le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir// gsang sngags kun gyi yang mdzod// rig pa gsal byed sgron ma bshad// rgyu 'bras rig
pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdag nyid chen por rab dmigs te// tshogs bsags las rigs skabs 'di gzhug/ ye shes byang khyung 'khor bcas la// mchod bstod 'phrin las rdzogs pa dang// ye shes gsang

byed 'di bzhin sgom// yang dag nyid du rang dbang bskur// bdag nyid chen por bskyed pa yi// spyi bor sa las bdag po bzhi// rigs bzhi dag tu bskyed par bya// rdo rje sbu gu ma bsams te// rig ba'i rgyal

mos dbang bskur bya// mgrin par ya las ra hu la// klu bdud dregs pa chen por bsgom// thugs mchog rdo rje'i me dpung du// gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs// nyi zla pad+ma'i ge sar la// hA snying po

mthing nag hUM cig bsam// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro 'du las// thugs dam rgyud bskul 'gro ba'i bsnyen bskur las// tshur 'dus 'od du zhu ba las// phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur// de nyid gong bzhin 'od

du zhu ba las// oM badzra krod+ha hUM hUM hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ rdo rje'i snying po rdo rje 'chang ba bskyed de/ sku mdog 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags su mthing nag/ don cig gis thabs cir yang mdzad pa'i rtags su/ zhal
gcig phyag gnyis pa/ ye shes khro bos gang kyang 'dul ba'i rtags su/ g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin pa/ khams gsum dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags su/ dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzais pa/ gdug
pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags su/ spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer sdang mig bzlog nas lta ba/ gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rtags su/ smin ma ag tshoms me stag phyogs bcur 'phro/ khams
gsum dbang du sdud pa'i rtags su/ zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs nas/ hUM dang phaT kyi nga ro drag po 'don pa/ gdug pa thams cad bsgral ba dang/ khro bo thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i rtags su/
ljags 'dril mche ba'i gseb nas gnam lcags me 'bar thog tu 'bebs pa/ dur khrod kyi ma mo thams cad 'bangs su 'khol ba'i rtags su/ sku stod glang chen gyi ko rlon mi lpags mchog gis brgyan pa/
gnod sbyin dregs pa thams cad bran du 'khor ba'i rtags su/ sku smad dpa' bo stag gi sham thabs rin chen sa gtis brgyan pa/ gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul ba'i rtags su/ sbrul nag gis brgyan pa/ dug

gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags su/ mi mgo rkam rlon tshar gsum gyis se ral kha ru brgyan pa/ rdo rje srin po bran du 'khol ba'i rtags su/ rdo rje 'phreng ba snyan cha mgur chu do shal dpung rgyan la/ snang srid ma

lus thugs la gsal ba'i rtags tu/ zhabs gyad kyi dor thabs nyi zla'i steng na bzhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad yid kyis bsregs pa'i rtags su/ bskal pa me ri'i nang na gtum khro drag shul che ba/ rdo rje
dang ldan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rje/ zhes gsungs/ de ltar thugs su gsal bsgoms na/ ye shes thugs kyis bdud rnams bsreg/ rang byung mthu yis srid pa gsum kyang sgrol bar byed/ ces

gsungs/ dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ ye shes snying po thugs kyi dbang bskur 'di bzhin te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs ka ru/ thugs mchog ye shes rtse lnga pa/ cha gang me ltar

'bar ba'i gong seng na/ a las zla ba/ ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor me long chung tshad tsam gyi khar/ baM las pad+ma'i ge sar la/ chos sku skye ba med pa'i rtags su/ yi ge a dkar po las ye shes sems dpa'
dmigs ye shes snying po ye nas dag cing rgyas pa'i rtags su/ sku mdog dkar po gser gyi gshog pa can/ ye shes kyi snying po 'phrin las drag po ye nas mdzad pa'i rtags su/ mchu sder lcags las grub pa/
drag po dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags su/ ljags dang spyan rtsa dmar ba/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i rtags su/ rdo rje rwa gnyis rab tu brjid pa/ thugs mchog cir yang dgongs pa'i rtags su/ yid bzhin
nor bu gtsug na 'bar ba/ ye shes snying po thugs su gzigs pa'i rtags su/ gser mig 'khyil ba/ thugs rjes kun la gzigs pa'i rtags su/ khro gnyer glog tu 'khyug pa/ gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul ba'i
rtags su/ sbrul zhal du gsol ba/ ye shes sku la gcad du med pa'i rtags su/ lus la rdo rjes gtams pa/ de ltar tshon gang gsal dmigs te/ ye shes thugs mchog 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags su/ thugs ka
rdo rje gro rgan tsam/ ye shes kyi thugs la gsal 'grib med pa'i rtags su/ ma las nyi ma'i gdan sran ma leb pa tsam/ rig pa byang chub sems kyi snying po ye shes rang byung 'phel ba'i rtags su/

snying po hUM yungs 'bru tsam/ snying po thabs shes rab tu 'brel ba'i rtags su/ nyi zla kha sbyor gyi bar na snying po 'od zer du 'phro ba/ byang chub sems kyi snying po la cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i rtags su/ rdo rje bum pa na

gnas pa/ byang chub kyi snying po thugs rje ye shes dang ldan pa'i rtags su/ rtsa sngags ga ru Da 'bru dgus phyogs mtshams su bskor ba/ thugs rje byang chub kyi sems kyi snying rje byams dang ldan pa'i rtags su/ ye

shes kyi 'od zer rnam pa lngas bskor ba/ ye shes rnam pa lnga dang snying po byang chub kyi sems/ dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i rtags su/ oM dang 'brel te bsnyen pa'o// ye shes zang thal du 'char ba'i rtags su/

'od zer rnam pa lnga lus kyi yan lag rtsa ru 'brel nas byang chub sems kyi sgo phyi nang du gsal ba ye shes kyi snying po cig pas gzugs sku sna tshogs su 'char ba'i rtags su/ 'od zer rnam pa lnga kha dog ma 'dres
pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kun la khyab pa'i rtags su/ zer phyogs bcur 'phro yin rgyug pa/ thig le byang chub la 'dus pa'i rtags su/ ngo bo gsal la rang bzhin stong pa

nyid/ thig le bde stong du rtogs pa'i rtags su thig le 'od kyis khyab pa/ de ltar snying po ye shes gsal dmigs na/ byin brlabs shugs kyis sa bcu lam lnga bgrod/ snying rje'i las kyis pha rol sgrol/ zhes rdo
rje sems dpas gsungs/ de phyogs rnal 'byor dmigs pa gsal bar sgom/ bying rgod rlung gis mkhyen na/ thig le zhar la skye zhes gsungs/ thig le skyes pas gzung 'dzin shugs kyis 'gag/ gzung 'dzin

'gags na bde ba kun tu snyoms/ de ltar grol na sangs rgyas yin/ zhes rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs/ rig pa gsal byed sgron ma'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// rtsa ba byang chub kyi sgron ma 'di/ rig pa stobs su

gyur pa cig dang phrad par shog/ de nas de nyid bshad bya'i phyir// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi rig pa 'di bzhin gsal// de ltar ye shes gsal bsgoms tshe// srid pa lta byed rgyal po ste// thugs kyi me long gces

bar gsungs// ye shes thugs kyi me long gsal byed 'di// thugs rje nyi ma'i snying po 'dra// las kyi rgyal po de nyid sgrub pa'i phyir// mthong lam 'phro 'du'i byin rlabs bshad// dang po ting 'dzin rnam gsum
nas// tshogs bsogs snying rje mchog gis bskyed// lam gyi yan lag rdzogs pa dang// thabs kyi yan lag rdzogs zhes gsungs// ye shes thabs kyi rgyal po sgom// ye shes thabs kyi rgyal po las// ye
shes thugs kyi shes rab me long 'di bzhin sgom// bya rgod lta bu'i sems min pas// rnal 'byor thabs kyi ye shes zang thal rtogs pa yis// shes rab thugs kyi me long dag gsal lta// stobs

su gyur pa'i byang chub kyis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhal mthong ste// kun tu bzang po'i zhing khams cis kyang snang// gzugs rnams thams cad ye shes snying po snang ba'i sku// snang ba'i gzugs

brnyan thams cad kun// de nyid yang dag snying po rang byung rang las shar ba yin// dper na lteng ka'i chu dang zla ba chu zla bzhin du shar// thig le byang chub sems kyi dpe// bum pa'i mar me lta bu'o// thig le
byang chub sems kyi 'od// dper na nyi ma zer gyi kha dog bzhin// rang gsal bde gsal kun tu snang// thig le rang sar grol ba'i dpe// za 'og dpe khyim lta bus mtshon// thig le gnyis su med pa'i
dpe// nam mkha' bzhin du yongs la khyab// de ltar gnyis su snang ba'i yon tan gzugs brnyan thams cad kun// snying po rang las shar ba yin// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// mi g.yo bsam med chos kyi
sku// de ltar sku phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po rang la shar ba yin/ de bzhin de yi ngang las byung// mi g.yo lam bstan chos nyid dang// kun tu bzang po'i thugs dang mnyam// byin
rlabs thams cad shu las 'byung// zhes gsungs/ de ltar nam zhig rtogs pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag/ bdag nyid thugs la 'dus ces rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ de ltar snying po
byang chub mthong ba'i tshe// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi las 'grub ste// 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs pa thob// ces rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs// gsal byed sgron ma'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// gsang

sngags thugs kyi yang mdzod/ lta spyod dam pa 'di/ skal ldan skyes mchog cig dang phrad par shog/ de nas de nyid bshad pa'i phyir// thar lam byang chub sems kyi sgron ma bshad// bdag nyid chen por rab
dmigs nas// byang chub sems kyis tshogs bsags te// 'phrin las gzhung bzhin bya bar gsungs// thabs kyi yan lag rdzogs pa dang// thar lam byang chub 'di bzhin sgom// ye shes thugs kyi snying po

las// phyogs bcur 'od 'phros 'jig rten khyab bar dmigs// bde gshegs thugs mchog mnyes pa phul// 'gro ba yongs kyi sdug bsngal sbyangs// byang chub sems su gyur nas tshur 'dus hUM la thim// thugs kyi dbang thob byin

rlabs zhugs par bsam// las su rung ba'i dbang thob ste// mthing nag 'od zer bkrag dang ldan// thugs kyi dbang thob 'od 'phros te// rdo rje'i ra phrag rgyud phug ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar ston// de bzhin rgyun nas

gsung mchog pad+ma'i rdo rje nas// gong bzhin 'phro 'du'i las byas te// tshur 'dus gsung mchog AM la thim// gsung gi dbang thob byin rlabs zhugs par bsam// las su rung ba'i dbang thob ste// gsung mchog

rdo rje pad+ma rdo rje dmar la gdang// gsung gi dbang thob 'od 'phros pas// rdo rje rwa phrag rgyud phug ste// nas g.yas nas g.yon du phug/ klad pa dung khang gi nang du 'od du 'khyil// tshangs pa'i bu ga nas gong bzhin du/ 'od kyi rgyud

ma chad par phyogs bcu kun tu 'phros pa las// bde gshegs sku mchog mnyes pa phul// 'gro ba yongs kyi sdig sgrib sbyangs// byang chub sems nas tshur 'dus pas// sku mchog ye shes oM du gyur// sku'i dbang thob byin rlabs

zhugs par bsam// sku gsung thugs las su rung ba'i dbang thob/ snying po hUM las hUM grangs med pa rdo rje'i ra phrag rgyud phug nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar ston/ de bzhin rgyud nas thugs khar gsung gi aM la thim/

rje'i ra phrag rgyud phug nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar ston/ de bzhin rgyud nas thugs khar gsung gi aM la thim pas/ hUM mthing ka aM dmar por gyur/ rdo rje'i ra phrag rgyud phug nas/ nas g.yas nas g.yon

du phug zhugs/ sku mchog yi ge oM la thim/ aM dmar po oM la thim/ oM dkar por gyur nas/ tshangs pa'i bu ga nas gong bzhin du 'od 'phros pa las/ srid pa gsum kyang 'od du ltem gyi zhu/ byang chub sems kyi
bdud rtsi dkar dmar du gyur ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun byang chub kyi bdud rtsis khengs par dmigs/ tshur 'dus bdag nyid gsos sbyangs te/ bdag nyid bdud rtsi byang chub sems su gyur pas/ de nas hUM

zhes brjod pas/ sems nyid mngon du gyur te/ 'od zer rnam pa lnga la gong bzhin du 'phros te/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa las// bdud rtsi nyid la nyid sbyar te/ bdud rtsi nyid la sems nyid byang chub thig le

'od du 'dril/ snying po gnyis su med pa yis// snang srid rgyal ba'i zhing khams su gyur te/ dkyil 'khor lha dang lha mo dang/ gtso dang 'khor dang bcas pa dmigs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu

bzang po'i zhing khams su lta'o// dper na za 'og gi be khyim mam/ nyi zer gyi rdul cha bzhin du dmigs so// de ltar ye shes kyi lha tshogs gsal ba'i dus su/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyu la dri med dag pas/ dri yang

dag pa'i lta spyod dag par mthar phyin pa'o// snying po byang chub sems kyi snang ba kun dang dus gsum du sbyar bas/ snang srid thams cad lha'i dkyil 'khor du gsal bar rtogs pas/ mahA yo ga'i lha spyod mthar

phyin pa'o/// snying po byang chub kyi sems ye nas stong gzhi dag las/ ye shes lnga dang ldan ba'i phyir/ a nu yo ga'i stod spyod mthar phyin pa'o// de'i tshe snying po byang chub kyi sems za 'og gi be khyim bzhin du

thugs rje ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pas/ rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga mthar phyin pa'o// de'i tshe snying po byang chub kyi sems thig le bde stong bdag med du gsal bas/ chos kyi sku la mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas zhes rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// de ldan rnal 'byor don spyod na// gsang sngags rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// mthar phyin byang chub sems kyi sgron ma/ las kyi rgyal po'i
le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen thugs kyi yang mdzod gsal ba'i sgron ma 'di/ rgyal po ba su d+ha ra'i thugs su rgyud/ mtsho ma dros pa'i 'gram/ ri spos ri ngad ldan gyi

rtsar/ shing chen dpag bsam ljon shing gi rtsa bar klu'i rgyal po'i dngos grub thob ste/ gsang sngags kyi lta spyod 'dis gtan la dbab pa'o// de nas de nyid yang dag bshad bya ba/ rtsa ba las kyi rgyal po chos

nyid a la bstim pa'i phyir/ rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi sgron ma bshad/ dang po ting 'dzin rnam gsum nas/ byang chub sems kyi yan lag rdzogs byas te/ snying po byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu/ mthar phyin rgyu skye
med 'di bzhin sgom/ ye shes thugs kyi snying po las// byin brlabs 'phro 'du 'od bzhin dmigs// snang srid thams cad byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// thams cad lha'i phyag rgyar shes shing rtogs pa
las// bzlas brjod brnyen pa rdzogs par 'bul// yengs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos skur gsal ba dang bying med rgyun du bzlas/ ngang la rgyun du gnas pa/ bde gshegs thugs te sbyang mi dgos/

sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// de nas de nyid bshad pa'i phyir// ye shes snying po thugs kyi snying po las// gong bzhin thugs kyi 'phro 'du ste// snang srid thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin du// dmar phyam gyis
zhu bar bsam/ de las dbang gi lha tshogs su gyur te/ srog gi dgongs pa shes par bya/ de nas dbang gi lha tshogs thams cad/ bdag gi sku gsung thugs la 'dus te/ rang bzhin du 'dus thim par bsam/
dper na nyi ma'i snying po la/ zer phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa bzhin nam/ chu zla zla ba la 'dus pa bzhin nam/ gzugs brnyan gzugs sku la 'dus pa bzhin du/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dbang gi
rang bzhin du gyur nas/ bdag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la gnyis su med par thim par bsam mo// de ltar dbang rims rdzogs pa na// gnyis med byin rlabs rang la 'char// sems kyi byin rlabs sna tshogs

'byung// yi dam lha gsal lung ston 'byung// kun tu bzang po'i thugs dang gnyis med gnyis su med pa ston/ zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas de nyid bshad bya ba// ye shes thugs kyi snying po
las// gong bzhin thugs kyi 'phro 'du ste// snang srid thams cad drag po'i las su gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i sku gsung thugs la gong bzhin du thim par bsam mo// de nas drag po'i las
byas na// rang rig snying po byin rlabs can// srid pa gsum yang sgrol bar 'gyur// ye shes thugs kyis bdud rnams bsreg/ rang byung mthu yis srid pa gsum yang sgrol bar nus zhes gsungs/ zhes dam tshig
chen po nga yis bshad// de nas de nyid bshad bya ba// ye shes thugs kyi snying po las// gong bzhin thugs kyi 'phro 'du las// snang srid thams cad zhi rgyas kyi las su gyur te/ ye shes sems dpa'i sku
gsung thugs la gong bzhin du 'dus par bsam mo// de nas zhes pa'i las byas na// rang rig snying po byin rlabs kyis// mi ro rkam po la bdud rtsi'i zil thigs 'byung ba bzhin// thang cig yud kyis shes ba

skye// skye ldog zla tshes lta bur bshad// byin rlabs bdud rtsi lta bu yin// kun kyang sos par nga yis bshad// byin rlabs shugs kyis sa bcu lam lnga bgrod/ rdo rje'i las kyis kha lo bsgral/ zhes rdo rje sems

dpa' nga yis bshad/ de nas de nyid bshad bya ba/ ye shes snying po las/ 'phro 'du'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang// gnyis su med phyir rdzogs rim bshad// gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i phyir// snang srid thams

cad snying po rang gi sems// snying po 'du 'bral med pa ste// yang dag mtha' ste rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// e ma ho/ chos rnams thams cad rmi

lam tshul// snang stong ngo bo nyid kyis dben// ma skyes pa yi chos nyid 'di// dngos por bden par ma gsungs so// sgyu ma'i tshul du skyed pa yin// sgra ming tshig las 'das pa yin// rang gi ngo bor bstan du

med// 'jig med dbang po'i sa thob pas// bde gshegs sku ste sbyang mi dgos// theg gsum sa bcu mi gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor rdzogs rim mchog gi sa// gsang sngags mchog gi spyod pa rnams// rnal 'byor mchog gi
mchog 'dod pas// dang po tshogs lam bskyed pa nas// ting 'dzin rim 'jug sems rtsal sbyang// las su rung ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'phrin las gso bzhin bya bar gsungs// de nas byang sems

mthar thug 'di bzhin sgom// snang srid gnyis med rang la bsdu// rang sku lha yi nga rgyal kyang// gong bzhin rims kyis bsdu ba ste// bye tshan la yar mar thim mam// rdo tshan la kha ba bab pa bzhin du bsdu/ rdo rje

dang snying po yang 'od du zhu ste/ aM la thim par bsam/ oM yang hUM yungs 'bru tsam la thim pas/ huM de ye shes lnga dang ldan te/ snying po de nyid chos sku las/ mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir zhabs kyu 'a la bsdu/ 'a ha la

bsdu/ ha zla tshes la bsdu/ zla tshes zlum po thig le can la bsdu/ thig le byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ming snang bar dmigs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na snang srid thams cad chos kyi sku'i ngang du gnas

par gyur te/ snang srid thams cad thig le bde stong pa bdag med du shes par bya'o// de'i tshe byang chub kyi lam mthar phyin to// sku gsung 'du 'bral med de rdo rje 'chang// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sa la

gnas// phyag rgya chen po'i sku zhes de la gdags// de la bshad du med do// de la gcad du med do rdo rje rgyal// zhes rang bzhin rdo rje sems pas gsungs/ de ltar de la spyad par bya zhes/ dam tshig chen po nga

yis bshad// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi sgron ma/ las po'i lta spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// bdag 'dra sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// rgya yi skad bsgyur lo ts+tsha'i tshig sbyangs nas// rgyal po ba su d+ha ra'i
dgongs pa 'di// rin chen snying po gser phul nas// mos gus dad pa'i sgo nas zhus// srog gis btsal kyang 'di don mi rnyed de// las 'phro dag pa cig dang phrad par shog/ dus la bab na smon lam btsan
par shog/////

rgya gar skad du/ nA ga rA dza pu ri tan tra ti tsi tsit+ta ya/ bod skad du/ klu'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud thugs yang dag pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje che la thabs mkhas pa de 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can gyi don mdzad nas/ shar phyogs gangs kyi ri bo chen po la byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzhal yas khang/ rin po che sna

bzhi las grub pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang/ bdug spos sna tshogs dang/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bkra shis pa'i bya sna tshogs kyis sgra sgrog pa'i gzhal yas khang de na/ sems can thams cad la tshad med pa
khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de yang sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan rang gzigs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang/ byang chub

sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa mang po dang thabs gcig tu ting nge 'dzin la gnas so// de nas 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang yang ldan/ tshe dang dbang thang

yang rgyas/ bar du gcod pa'i 'byung po kun yang nye bar zhi/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar ba'i dus na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ri nag po dgu 'das pa na gangs kyi ri'o// de'i phyi rol na spos

kyi dad ldan pa'i tshu rol na/ chu zheng lnga bcu dngas pa'i mtsho chen po ma dros pa zhes bya ba/ klu thams cad kyi gnas chen po de na/ klu dang/ gnyan dang/ sa bdag la sogs pa kun gyi gzhal yas khang bsam gyis

mi khyab pa yod do// de rnams kyi dbus na/ rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ phyi nang med pa rin po che dngul gyi rtsigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ rin po che gser gyi

brtsig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ rin po che zangs kyi brtsig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ rin po che lcags kyi brtsig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ dbus na gser gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od zer

sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i ka gdung can/ chu srin nyi ma'i rgyan btang ba/ sbrul dang sbal pa mang po'i zar tshags/ rin po che'i gru chad bzhis brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che dang/ pad+ma

rin po che dang/ rin po che rin po che dang/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ bzhi'i gdan la klu'i rgyal po gzhon nu gtum po zhe bya ba sprul pa stong dang ldan pa/ sku'i man ngag las 'bum dang ldan pa// srid pa gsum dbang du sdud par
byed pa/ srid pa gsum dbang du 'gyed par yang byed/ khams gsum gyi sems can rnams la mdangs dang ldan par byed/ mdangs 'phrog par yang byed/ lo tog dang/ sman dang/ nags tshal dang/ mgo
lcogs rnams smin cing rgyas par yang byed/ 'bri zhing mi smin par yang byed/ skyes pa dang bud med rnams nad tsi tsi dz+wa la dang/ 'bras dang/ shu ba dang/ phol mig dang/ g.yam pa la sogs gtong

bar yang byed/ gso bar yang byed/ 'byung po dang/ srin po dang/ dur khrod kyi bdag po dang/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa la sogs pa rnams 'joms shing rlag par yang byed/ mi rlag cing 'joms par yang mi byed/

klu nang la mthun zhing gtong grogs dang ldan par yang byed/ mi mthun zhing klu nang zas su za bar yang byed/ de lta bu'i klu mi srun pa de/ stobs dang ldan pa'i ri zhes bya ba/ spos kyi ngad du ldan par 'byung ba/

gzhal yas rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa/ yang rtse yod pa/ nyams dga' ba/ sa bsil ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ me tog sna tshogs pa dang yang ldan/ de na rdzu 'phrul ston cing bzhugs so// de nas 'dzam bu gling gi

mi rnams kyis kyang/ mtsho ma dros pa dang spos ngad ldan pa'i ri la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i klu gzhon nu gtum po zhes bya ba/ srid pa gsum dbang du sdud pa cig gis sems can thams cad mi bde bar byed do zhes bya

ba yang grags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po gzhon nu tum po de/ stobs dang rdzu 'phrul yang rgyas par gyur nas/ sems can thams cad la mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'byung// rims dang/ yams dang/ mdze nad
dang/ 'bras kyi nad dang/ phol mig la sogs pa thams cad gtong bar byed/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog dang/ rtsa ba dang/ sman dang/ mgo lcogs la sogs pa smin par yang byed/ grong khyer chen

po ser skya ru/ ser bas sog ma yang med par byed/ grong khyer chen po ser skya ru skye ba sum brgyar sad kyis bcud thams cad med par yang byas/ rlung sna tshogs gtong bar yang byed/ 'byung po dang ma rungs pa

rnams rlag par yang byed/ klu nang zas su za bar yang byed/ skyes pa dang bud med kyi mdangs 'phrog par yang byed/ nad tsi tsi dz+wa las zin par yang byed/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'jig pa la thug/ 'dzam bu'i
gling gi sems can rnams kyang bred cing 'dar/ 'jigs shing sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa mdzad pa'i spyan snga ru/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ bcom ldan

'das 'dzam bu'i gling du klu'i rgyal po gzhon nu gtum po zhes bya ba/ rdzu 'phrul stong dang ldan pa/ sprul pa bye ba dang ldan pa zhig gis sems can rnams kyi srog dang dbugs 'phrog par yang byed/ sad dang/
ser ba dang/ mu ge la sogs pas 'dzam bu gling du bkrag med par gtong/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bred stor bar yang byed/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'jig par yang byed/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'dul bar bgyi 'tshal na/ ji ltar mkhyen pa dang/ thugs rjes gdul bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ma phyag na

rdo rje khyod 'jigs shing skrag par ma byed cig/ sngon yang 'jig rten khams su ma rungs pa'i khro bo'am/ gdug pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa la thug pa la/ thugs rje dang byin rlabs kyis thul

ba yin gyis/ 'dir yang bran bzhin du thul te 'ong bas/ 'khor rnams kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal ma zhan cig ces gsungs nas/ klu'i rgyal po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas phyag na
rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das srid pa gsum yang zhig la khad/ lo tog dang me tog thams cad bskams/ grong khyer chen po ser skyar skye ba lnga brgyar ser bas sog ma man chad med

par byas pas thugs rje dang ting nge 'dzin gyis kho'i gnas su gshegs nas gdul 'tshal lo// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas stsal pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje legs so/ khyod 'khor rnams dang lhan
cig tu sog ma med kyi khyim du 'deng ngo// ji ltar thul bar byin gyis brlabs zin gyis gsungs nas ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas su gnod sbyin

gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi khyim du gshegs nas/ bcom ldan

'das kyis glang po che'i lta stangs kyis sbrul nag po ri rab tsam cig tu sprul nas/ mdzod spu'i bu ga nas 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phros te sog ma med kyi gnas 'od zer gyis snang bar mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis glang po che'i lta stangs kyis kyang bltas/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pa yang mthong/ bcom ldan 'das klu chen po'i gzugs su bzhugs pa yang mthong nas/ kye ma kye ma zhes

skrag cing lus zhum ste/ ba spu gyen du 'greng zhing lus 'dar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid ma bzod de/ khro gtum pas zil gyis non nas nga'i khyim du dgra gzhan 'ongs pa 'di su zhig yin/ klu chen po

dang stobs 'gyed nus pa 'di su zhig yin/ srog dang dbugs rngab cing bza' bar bya'o// srog 'phrog par bya'o// dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// nad tsi tsi dz+wa la gtang ba bya'o// ral gri dang gtun shing gi char

dbab par bya'o// gnam lcags kyang dbab par bya'o// zhes zer zhing klu'i rgyal po sog ma med khros nas 'khrug par gyur/ khros pas gad mo'i sgra phyung/ smin ma dpral bar bsdus/ bzhin bsgyur/ lce dril/ skra
'greng/ skrag par byed/ lag na mtshon thogs te sgra chen po ca co'i sgra phyung nas/ 'jigs pa chen po glog 'bar ba 'byin cing/ sprin nag po chen po las bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du gnam lcags
dbab par 'dod pas/ glog gi tshogs kyang brdeg par 'dod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byams pa dang thugs rje gzigs nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med sdigs shig ces

bka' stsal to// de nas lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyan nas/ sog ma med kyi khyim dang nye bar rdo rje gsor zhing khro ba'i sngags 'di brjod cing song ngo// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badzra pA Na

ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA ba ta ye/ oM tsaN+Da d+ha be ka pa re b+ha/ sa ra sa ra bi ri tu tu tu mu la sa ma ya bi ri/ hu ru hu ru hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha b+ho b+ho pan d+ha nA ga nan d+ha pra ha ra tu/ mahA krod+ha rA dza spu ta spu ta/ bai' re bai' re/ sa ra

sa ra/ ma man+ta tu ti/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas rig pa'i rgyal po gsang bsgrub kyi sngags 'di brjod ma thag tu/ klu'i khyim dang bcas te 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad me 'bar ba gcig tu gyur to// de nas klu'i

rgyal po sogs ma med kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces/ kyai phyag na rdo rje dang nga ci'i phyir stobs 'gyed nus/ ngas dbugs rngub pa gcig gis bza' bar bya'o/ khyod kyi srog dang dbrog

par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon phyag na rdo rje khros 'khrugs zil gyis non nas lus rab tu 'dar zhing khros pa'i gad mo 'byin/ mche ba gtsigs/ mig bgrad de/ klu'i rgyal po'i bka'
sdod cig/ yang nga'i rtags gang yin pa ring por mi thogs par bstan par bya'o// nga'i stobs gang yin klu'i rgyal pos ltos shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba gsor zhing klu'i rgyal po sog ma med la brdeg par 'dod/

bdag gis klu'i stobs dang bcas pa/ bzhon pa dang bcas pa gzhom par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces phyag na rdo rje ha cang yang khro ba'i dbang du ma 'gro bar phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis klu'i

rgyal po skrag par byos la/ klu'i rgyal po rnams la ma 'tshe zhig/ ces bka' stsal pa dang/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje 'bar ba cig ri khyim la bsnun no// de nas klu'i khyim dum bur

bcom nas/ rdo rje 'bar ba mig ces bya ba khros pa'i ming smras pa/ s+pho Ta ya hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ nA ga bi d+ha ra na ya hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ sarba sha truM pra ma na tha ya hUM phaT/ bi ri bi ri swAhA/ krod+ha na sha ya phaT/ bi da ra na ya

phaT/ ma ra ya phaT ku la ud sad ka na ya phaT/ sa smin ka ra na ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor klu thams cad 'chi bas
'jigs pa byed pa'i mchod pa'i sngags zab mo 'di brjod pa tsam gyis bshad ma thag tu ri dang/ brag dang/ khyim dang tshal dang/ skyed mos tshal dang bcas pa 'di dag thams cad g.yos
so// rab tu g.yos so// 'ur ro// rab tu 'ur ro// chem chem mo/ rab tu chem mo// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// de nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'jigs skrag ste/ khro ba dang bral te/ snying stor lus 'dar
nas/ lus la rngul phyung nas/ snying nas ngo tsha ba dang bcas par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te/ 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol/ gong du bdag gis
gnod sems sngar byas pa brjed par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bshad pa/ khro bo chen po drag shul chen po'o// gtum po drag po 'jig par bgyid pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de las
bdag skyabs su gsol// zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ klu'i rgyal po khyod phyag na rdo rje la bzod par gsol cig/ klu'i bdag po khyod sdug bsngal mang po 'byung bar mi 'gyur

ro// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga na mchis bzhin du/ de dag snying 'dul ba dka' zhing/ rdo rje mi
bzad pa'i gnam lcags 'bebs/ ri'i char 'bebs/ lo tog rnams 'joms/ sad dang/ sprin dang/ rlung 'byung ba'i sprin dang/ glog 'bar ba gtong bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i phyi ma'i

tshe/ phyi ma'i dus na/ sems can mi srun pa rnams kyi ched du me ma mur gyi char 'bebs par ci ste mi bgyid de me lce 'bar ba dang glog 'gyu ba dag gtong bar bgyid na/ ral gri dang/ gtun shing dang/ 'khor
lo dang/ mdung thung gi char 'bebs par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i sgra dag gis kyang/ lo tog thams cad kyi bcud 'phrog par yang bgyid/ sems can thams cad kyi mdangs 'phrog par bgyid/ srog

'joms par yang bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu la bdag nyid kyis ji ltar brjod pa tsam dang/ dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi lus zhig par 'gyur zhing/ klu thams cad kyi snying 'gas par 'gyur ba
dang/ lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis klu thams cad dum bu lnga bcur chad pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du ma rungs pa thams cad dang/ phyir rgol ba thams cad dang/
dgra rnams rnam bar 'jig par 'gyur ba dang/ rul bar 'gyur ba dang/ phung bar 'gyur ba dang/ myag par 'gyur ba dang/ lus la me 'bar ba la sogs las/ de lta bu brjod pa yin/ de la bcom ldan
'das kyis ji ltar sems can bde ba thob pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang/ klu thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa 'di byin gyis brlabs zin gyis/ dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa klag pas grub pa/ bsgrub par ma byas
par rig pa brjod pa tsam gyis mod la las byed pa yin te/ tshes grangs dang sbyar ba med/ skar ma dang sbyar ba med/ snyung ba dang sbyar ba med par las 'di la bsgrub pa yang mi dgos/ de la las byed

par 'dod na/ khro bo rgyal po rang brjod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do// de nas khro bo chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khu tshur gyi snying po mi zad pa'o/ khro bo dang klu thams cad kyi srog 'phrog pa/ drag po chen po

dang ldan pa/ klu thams cad kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM s+phu ta s+phu ta/ mahA kro d+ha hUM/ sid+hi sid+hi s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po'i dam tshig chen po phyi bsgrub kyi yang snying las thams cad pa'i gzungs

brjod ma thag tu klu chen po dang/ brang gis 'gro ba'i klu dang/ nya'i klu dang/ grul bum gyi klu dang/ sa srin gyi klu dang/ 'byung po'i klu dang/ sbal pa'i klu dang/ lcong mo'i klu dang/ sbrul gyi klu dang/ klu rgyal rigs

dang/ bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ gdol pa can dang/ gnyan gyi klu dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang/ klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po dang/ klu'i rgyal po

nor rgyas dang/ klu'i rgyal po gzi ldan dang/ klu'i rgyal po thod chung dang/ klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang/ klu'i rgyal po ba su ta ka dang/ klu'i rgyal po se na dang/ klu'i rgyal po dag sha ka dang/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma

med dang/ sha za ba la sogs pa'i klu de dag thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel nas sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ngo// de nas phyogs bcu nas klu rnams nye bar rings par 'ongs nas/ klu'i rgyal po sogs ma med
kyis sna drangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces klu'i rgyal pos gsol pa/ phyag na rdo rjes sngags bshad pa ni mi bzad pa lags te/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bzod
par dka' ba/ 'chi ba dbyug pa stobs po che lags so// zhes gsol to// yang sog ma med kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su gsol to// dam tshig la yang bdag gi bu dang
bcas/ gnyen dang gzhon pa dang bcas te gnas par bgyi'o// bdag bde ba la gnas par bgyid do// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che mgon lags te/ dpung dang bcas te bzhon pa dang bcas pa gsum la skyabs

su gsol lo// gang dang gang du khro bo chen po'i snying po klog pa dang/ dran pa dang/ ming tsam 'dzin pa 'chi ba'i sgo nas kyang/ bdag gis stobs dang bcas/ gzhon pa dang bcas pas gnod pa bgyid mi nus
so// yongs su skyab pa'i phyir kun tu dus dus su char dbab par bgyi/ bcud gtang bar bgyi'o// lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu smin cing rgyas par bgyi'o// thams cad du hUM zhes brjod
pa tsam gyis las bgyi'o// dam tshig can gang na gnas par yang gnod sdig mi bgyid do zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas yang klu mang po gzhan rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bdag cag la yang bskyabs su gsol/ dam tshig la yang bdag cag klu rnams bu dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ gnyen dang bcas te/ bdag cag bde ba la gnas bar bgyi'o// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che
mgon lags te/ bu dang bcas pa gsum la skyabs su mch-i'o// 'dir ri la gnas pa'i klu gzhan gzhon nu/ gzhon nu gtum po klu mang ba'i nang na dgra bgyid pa/ bdag cag klu gzhan srog 'joms par

bgyid pa'i dgra de dag bsal du gsol/ gang dang gang na khro ba'i snying po klu thams cad skrag bar byed pa 'di klog pa dang/ dran pa dang/ ming tsam yang 'dzin pa mchis pa'i sgo nas kyang bdag cag klu rnams
stobs dang bcas pa/ gzhon pa dang bcas pa gnas der gnod sdig mi bgyid pa lags kyang/ de thams cad dam tshig la gnas par bgyid do// yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir kun tu dus dus su char dbab par
bgyi'o// bcud gtang bar bgyi'o// thams cad du hUM zhes brjod pas zhi bar bgyi'o// bdag gi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi'o// dam tshig can gang na gnas par yang gnod sdig mi bgyid do zhes klu gzhan gyis
gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang klu gzhan rnams la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po dang klu mang po rnams la dam tshig smas pa de legs so// de de bzhin du byos
shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na bcol ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad skyab par gyis shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo

ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ rtsa ba dang/ mgo lcogs dang/ sman dang/ nags tshal thams cad yongs su skyang bar gyis shig/ klu'i rgyal po khyed la rjes su gdams pa ni 'di dag yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling rin po che sna bdun gyi rang
bzhin du byas pa yin gyi/ gzhan ni ma yin no// zhes bka' stsal pas/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la sogs pa klu de dag thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de/ 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ste dam tshig sngar gsol ba las/ gzhan du bgyid cing rjes su mi bsgrub na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bslus
par gyur cig/ lus rul cing dri nga bar gyur cig/ dum bu lnga bcur 'jig par gyur cig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur cig/ bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi thob par gyur
cig/ ji ste bdag khro bo'i dam tshig las 'gal bar byed na/ ri la gnas pa'i klu gzhon nu gtum po ma gtogs par/ dgra thams cad 'joms pa'i klu gzhan mang po dang bdag mi mthun par gyur cig/ bcom
ldan 'das ri la gnas pa'i klu gzhon nu gtum po la bdag cag gis sdom pa sbyin mi nus so// zhes klu gzhan gyis gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de dag la legs so legs so// de bzhin du

byos shig bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa ni sngon ston pa mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du lta'o// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che dang mnyam pa dang 'dra ba ni/
bdag gis ma mthong ma 'tshal to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzungs brjod pa rnams la bdag gis rna ba'i bu gas mnyan par bya'o// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pa tsam gyis kyang bran gyi dngos po mchi bar

bgyi'o// mthong bas sbyin par bgyi'o// char dbab pa'am/ mi dbab pa'am/ char chungs na ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ khro bo'am zhi ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das hUM zhes bya ba'i sgras 'tshal

bar bgyi la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du lus bsgrub par bgyi la/ thams cad du klags pas 'grub pa'am/ bla na med pa 'grub par bgyi'o// dril bu'i sgra dang rdo rje gsor bar bgyi'o// rdo rje dang dril bu'i
sgra brjod pa tsam gyis las thams cad bgyi'o// ci bsams pa'am ci bcol ba'i las bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med nyid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ phyag na rdo rje
la gsol pa/ bdag kyang gong du gsol pa las gzhan du mi bgyid do// bran dang/ khol po dang/ las mkhan bzhin du bgyis na/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das dang phyag na rdo rje gnyis kyis byin gyi brlabs kyis
bdag mnar med pa'i dmyal bar gyur cig/ 'on pa dang long bar gyur cig/ mdze can dang shu ba can du gyur cig/ mig nas me 'bar bar gyur cig/ mgo a dza ga'i dog pa ltar 'gas par gyur cig/ lus
rul zhing dri nga bar gyur cig/ de ltar ngam mnos pa bzhin las thams cad 'grub par bgyi'o// dus dus su char pa'i rgyun dbab par bgyi'o// sad dang/ ser ba dang/ rlung 'byung ba thams cad med par
bgyi'o// ji srid du las 'bum byed par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes brjod pa'am/ rdo rje gsor ba'am/ dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra brjod pa tsam la rna ba'i bu gas mnyan pa'i las bgyi'o// ston pa mngon par
mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig pa 'dzin pa kun gyi las bgyi'o// 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten rgyud las/ sngon byung ba gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po gzhon nu gtum po de/ thugs rje dang ting nge 'dzin gyis sngon byung ba de ltar btul na/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can thams cad la/

mthu stobs des don bya ba'i ched du/ nga rjes su bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// rjes su bsgrub mi 'tshal lam zhe na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal phyag na rdo rje khyod nyon

cig/ mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i gzhon du gtum po de/ sems can gyi don du rjes su bsgrub par bya'o// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan thugs rje can/ rjes bsgrub ji ltar sgrub ce na/ thabs cig mi

'tshal lam zhe na/ zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje nyon cig/ klu'i rgyal po 'di byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed// dbang drug cu rtsa gnyis kyang rdzogs par yang bskur/

rig pa'i ye shes kyang skyes nas/ klu'i rgyal po yang yid shin du gdungs par gyur/ 'khor ba la skyo ba drag tu skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sngar
yang las ngan pa'i dbang gis zhe sdang gi rigs klu ru skyes/ da lta ma rig pa'i dbang gis srid pa gsum la gnod pa yang byas pas/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis bgyis pa lags kyang/ bdag mnar med pa'i dmyal
bar mchi lags pas/ bcom 'das dad pa skyes pa la brten nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes bzung la/ bdag bla na med pa'i sa la rdo rje 'chang chen po thob par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das ji
ltar thugs rje dang byin gyi rlabs kyis gzung bar bgyi'o// zhes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po de la legs so legs so// de ltar yin gyis kyang/ khyod 'gyod sems drag tu skyes pa dang/

sems bskyed pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ ye shes skyes pa dang/ khyod sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ro/ khyod kyang ngas bstan pa 'di la las 'bum gyis la/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i las kyis shig khyod phyi ma'i tshe phyi

ma'i dus na rgyal ba byams pa'i bstan pa la/ sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpar skye bar bya'o zhes gsungs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po yang dga' bas rgyas par gyur nas/ las thams cad rjes su bsgrub par
bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po las 'bum byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das dges pa
chen po/ snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhengs la rjes sgrub rim pa bshad du gsol/ las kyi gtso bo du tsam bdog/ las kyi bye brag ji ltar lags// bdag gis ma 'tshal bshad du gsol// de nas

bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ dpal phyag na rdo rje legs so de legs so// rjes bsgrub las kyi rim pa bshad// las kyi gtso bo rnam lnga ste// las kyi bye brag
bsam thag cad// de nas phyag na rdo rje yis// las chen lnga po ji ltar lags// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bsnyen pa bsgrub dang klu bsgrub dang// tha ma
gnan pa gsod dang gsum// dbul ba yang phyir gter bsgrub bzhi// sems can phan gdags nad gso lnga// bde gshes 'dus pa'i las chen po// gnyan po dang po sgrub pa ji ltar lags// bdag gis mi
'tshal bshad du gsol// nyon cig dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje// gnyen po la yang rnam gnyis te// phyi sgrub dus su phyag na rdo rje ste// nang sgrub dus su bya khyung ga ru Da 'o// gsang sgrub dang

po bshad par bya// dang po nyams dga' sa phyogs bya// rgyas pa'i gtor ma mnyam bzhag la// ba'i lnga mdzes maN+Dal bsham// spos dang tsan dan dri yis dgang/ khrus dang gtsang sbras lus rgyas bya// byed pa'i stan la gnas nas kyang/

shudz+nyA na yi sngags brjod pas// bdag dang dngos kun stong par bsam// de nas rang sems hUM du sgom// de nyid spro dang bsdu byas nas// de nyid yongs su gyur pa las// badzra zhes pa'i sgra brjod pas// bdag

nyid rdo rje rtse dgur bsgom// de nyid spro dang bsdu byas nas// de nyid yongs su gyur ba las// badzra pA Ni'i sgra brjod pas// bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa// g.yas pa rdo rje
rtse dgu 'phyar// g.yon pa dril bu dku ru brten// sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar// dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar// zhabs gnyis bgrad bas klu rnams gnon// lus la klu lnga'i rgyan gyis brgyan// mgo la

rgyal rigs sbrul dkar khra// ske la bram ze sbrul ser khra// dpung la rje rigs sbrul dmar khra// rked pa la dmangs rigs sbrul sngo khra// rkang pa la gdol pa sbrul nag khrag/ mthong ba tsam gyis klu rnams

skrag/ de thugs a las zla dkyil de// dbus su yi ge hUM yang sgom// de zer las byung phyag na rdo rje'i sku// snga ma ji bzhin spyan drangs la// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// de nas gsang sgrub snying po

bzlas// na mo rat+na tra ya yA/ na maHtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM tsaN+Da be ga ba re b+ha/ sa ra sa ra bi ri/ tu tu tu mu la sa ma ya bi ri/ hu ru hu ru hUM/ ti Sha ti Sha b+ho b+ho pan/ nA ga nan/ d+ha pra

ma hA ra tu/ mahA krod+ha rA dza spu ta spu ta/ bai re bai re/ sa ra sa ra man ta tu ti/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ ting 'dzin ma nyams gsang sngags bzlas/ klu rgyal chen po bsgrub par bya'o// srid gsum 'byung po
rdul du rlog/ slar 'dus rang gi hUM la bstim// bdag nyid gzi mdangs bskyed par bya'o// 'bum mam bye bar brjod par bya// gsang sgrub bsgrubs rtags byung ba dang// phyi bsgrub nang bsgrub gsang sngags
bzlas/ klu rgyal chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas skabs su mchod pa dang// gtor ma dag gtang sngags rings kyis// de nas dkyil 'khor lus la bsdu// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las// gsang
bsgrub dang po bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan 'das/ gsang bsgrub dang po gsungs pa yis// klu rnams ma lus bran du 'gyur// zab mor sbyor ba
bshad pa legs// gnyen po gnyis pa bshad du gsol// legs so dpal chen phyag rdo rje// gsang bsgrub gnyis po ngas bshad kyi// dang po bde ldan gnas mchog tu// dri dang me tog gis spras pa'i// gzhal
yas khang mchog mdzes pa ru// bde bar stan la 'dug nas su// shU n+ya ta yi sngags brjod pas// bdag dang dngos kun stong par bsgom// de yi ngang las yi ge keng kar bsgom// de nas keng na ra ken zhes
brjod pas// bdag nyid bya khyung ga ru Da// sku mdog gtso ma'i gser 'dra bsgom// g.yas g.yon gshog pas bar snang khebs// gnam lcags stong gi mchu sder can// me dpung 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du can// ba

spu nyag ma re re la// bsam gyis mi khyab khro chung khro// mig gnyis nyi zla rab tu 'bar// klu rgyal stong gi gdan gyis mdzes// mthong ba tsam gyis klu rnams 'bros// klu 'dul ga ru Da'i skur bsgoms la// khyung

dkar bstod bzlog ngan bsngags bzlas// oM rA dza ma hA ga ru Da hUM hUM/ oM badzra pA Ni ga ru Da hUM hUM dza dza ra tsa pri tshe hUM phaT/ nyi shu rtsa bdun gsang sngags mchog/ klu rnams mang po skrag par 'gyur// rgyun du

bzlas na dngos grub thob// rtag tu gu gul dkar po lus la brten// gla rtsi chu yis lus po bkru// de nas bya khyung rgyal po bskul// dpag bsam shing las bzhengs pa'i bya khyung khyod// gser mig 'khyil pa'i

'od zer khyod// ye shes spyan la lcags kyi gshog pa can// rdo rje mchu sder thogs med lcags kyu can// ri rab rtse na gnas shing rgya mtshor mchu btsugs te// klu rgyal gdan du bting nas klu bran zas su za// de
phyi klu rnams nga yi bka' la nyon// klu rnams nga yi bka' la ma nyan na// klu yi gnas ris stong zhing brlag ga re// de ltar klu rnams bka' las ma 'da' zhig/ nga yis bka' las 'das gyur
na// nam mkha' lding gi rgyal pos zos par 'chi'o// de nas rbad pa'i sngags kyang bzlas// oM ra tsa mahA ga ru Da/ khyung rba hur hur b+h+yo// 'di ni gsang sngags bcu gsum pa'o// yi ge chad na nus

pa med// drag na klu rnams skrag par byed// gar song song bzlas na sdig che bas// rmi lam log pa byung na bzlas// las mi btub na bzlas par bya'o// gtor ma dbul na zan gyi chang bu brgya rtsa dang/ sha chang nya

rnams mang por dbul// de yi phyag rgya bca' ba ni// mthe bong gnyis bsnol mdzug mo gnyis cig bsnol// gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sprad de brkyang// srin lag gnyis ni thung bar nang du bkug/ mthe'u chung

gnyis ni thad du so sor brkyang// gtor ma dbul ba dang/ rtag tu bsnyen pa dang/ dang po bar dang tha ma dag tu bsgrub/ bya khyung rgyal po phyag rgya 'di dag yin/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ ga ru Da pU tsa swAhA/ bA ling kha hi khA hi/
zhes gtor ma gtong ngo// ma grub spogs pa'i cho ga yis// glang bu dmar po zangs la legs byas te// de'i khong du dngul chu blugs te// gzugs rten gang na yod pa der// 'og tu sbas na dgos 'dod der kyang

grub/ khro ni yi ge cig pa yin// gnas lnga srung ba rtsa bzhi gnan// 'di yang bla ma'i zhal las shes// gsad dang bsrung ba'i man ngag yin// gsad par song na 'di lta ste// lto ru song na lbos drir 'chi// ra la

song na dri ru 'chi// gtong la song na mdze ru 'ong// lag pa gnad na zha grum 'ong// gsang gnas dgag na skye rgyud 'chad/ min na ma dang sring mo 'chi// 'di yang khyad par las lnga yin// rmongs pa phal gyi spyod
yul min// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yid dga' rab tu skyes nas/ legs so legs zhes gsol to// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ zab mo khyung gi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste gsum
de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// bsnyen po bsgrub pa rab rtsogs nas// klu rgyal chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir// phyi bsgrub rim pa bshad du gsol// de la yang ni rnam
gnyis te// yang snying spu ta'i las bshad 'tshal// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par 'tshal/ khyod kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// bye
ba 'bum sde las 'di bshad// dang po bsnyen pa bsgrub pa bshad// dang po nyams dga'i sa phyogs su// dri dang me tog gis spras pa'i// gzhal yas khang mchog mdzes pa ru// bsnyen pa'i sgrub
lugs gsum pa las// gang yang rung bar rnams bya'o// klu gtor rgyas ba legs bshams la// bdag gzhan gsal bar bskyed bya ste// dang po stong nyid ting 'dzin bsgom// de'i sngags ni/ oM shun+ya tA dz+nyA

na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bdag dang dngos kun stong par bsam// de nas rang nyid hUM du bsgom// de nas spro dang bsdu byas te// 'od du gyur pa bsgom par bya'o// badzra zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pas/ bdag nyid

rdo rje rtse dgur bsgom// de'i spro bsdu byas 'od du zhu// badzra pA Ni zhes brjod pas// bud+d+ha mchod sems can gyi don byas/ bdag nyid sgrib pa byang/ bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan

gsum pa// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse dgu pa// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar// dbu skra ser po gyen du 'khyil// zhabs gnyis bgrad pas klu rnams gnon// lus la sku lnga'i rgyan

gyis brgyan// mgo la rgyal rigs sbrul dkar khra// ske la bram ze rigs sbrul ser khra// dpung pa la rje rigs dmar khra// sked pa la dmangs rigs sbrul sngo khra// mgo bo khar bcug za ba'o// rkang pa la gdol

can sbrul nag khra// mthong ba tsam gyis klu rnams skrag/ de thugs a las zla dkyil 'khor// de dbus yi ge hUM yang sgom// de zer las byung phyag na rdo rje'i sku// snga ma ji bzhin spyan drangs la// gnyis su med

par bstim par bya// des ni bdag nyid bskyed par bya'o// mdun du pam las ban d+ha ni// btso ma gser 'dra'i rnam pa bskyed// de yi nang du yi ge phuH/ ser po gsal bar bsgom par bya// de spro bsdu bya 'od du
zhu bas// nA ga zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pas// gur kum mdog 'dra'i sbrul ser po// lus po gcig la mgo bo bdun pa// ban d+ha gang bar bzhugs par bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// mahA nA ga rA dza'i

sgras// sngags kyi bdag po'i sku bskyed do// gzugs mdzes byis pa chung ngun gyi// cha byad gser gyi mdog tu gnas// sku tshad bcu drug sor dang ldan// ro stod mi la ro smad ni// gdug pa sbrul du 'khyil bar
bskyed// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdeng kas mdzes// zur phud lnga pa'i cod pan can// thal mo sbyar nas bka' sdod pa'o// de thugs ma las nyid dkyil 'khor// de dbus sa bon phuHser sgom// de 'og las byung

sngags bdag sku// snga ma ji bzhin gzugs kyi sngos// ma dros mtsho nas spyan drangs la// snga ma'i gzugs la gnyis med bstim// de las ci zhig bya zer// mdun na bka' ni sdod pa la// bran dang khol po las
mkhan dang// g.yog po'i tshul du gyis shig pa'am// bgegs la sogs pa tshar gcod pa// bka' bsgo'i rim pa sna tshogs bya// de nas klu yi snying po bzlas// oM phu ta phu ta mahA krod+ha hUM/ sid d+hi

sid d+hi/ s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT swAhA/ las dag grangs med las la 'jug na 'bum rgyun du bzlas na dngos grub thob// de ltar sbyor ba zab mo 'di// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas gsungs pa/ rtog pa'i rgyal po
mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ bdag gzhan bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol// bsnyen pa bsgrub pa bshad pa legs// kye kye bcom ldan 'das bsnyen pa la yang du tsam
bdog/ bsnyen pa'i bsgrub lugs ji ltar lags// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bstan par bya/ khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bsnyen pa la
yang rnam gsum ste// phyi gnyis nang gsum gsang sngags kyis// gang ltar bzlas kyang klu rnams 'grub// bsnyen pa'i bsgrub lugs gnyis yin te// brten can bsgrub dang brten med do// brten can bsgrub la

rnam gnyis te/ khang bu'i tshul du bsgrub pa'o// rten med gtor ma la brten nas// mdun du ting 'dzin bdag gzhan bskyed// de la khang bu'i bsgrub pa ni// dben pa'i gnas sam khyim gyi nang/ khru gang tshad ldan

khri rtsigs la// steng du pad+ma 'dab brgyad bya// de steng tshad ldan bdag gis ni// sku mchog mdzes pa brtsigs par bya'o// phyi rol g.yam khang gru bzhi rtsigs sbyin pa'i sa dang shog 'dag dang// gur kum chu dang

sbrang rtsi dang// tshal dang ga pur tsan dan dang/ khyim gyi sa dang khyim gyi chu// gtsang po chen po'i chu dang ni// gangs dang gting rings khron pa'i chu// klu rgyal klu yi rgyu ru bshad// mdzes pa'i sku mchog bzhengs nas
kyang// rin chen gser chus sku mchog bsgyur// shar lho mtshams su nya gdong bzhag/ lho nub mtshams su rtag gdong bzhag/ nub byang mtshams su mar ka ta// byang shar mtshams su se mdzes so// de rnams
dkar ser dmar sngo mdog/ dar dang za 'og gur kyang dbub// gser dngul zags lcags byu ru sogs// gtor ma rgyas dang spos sogs kyis/ khang bu'i nang yang dgang bar bya// bdag gzhan bskyed cing
bsnyen pa drangs// skabs su gtor ma gtang zhing bskul tshig stod// spos dud gtang zhing sngags bdag kyang// nyin gsum mtshan gsum sbyor ba yis// bod cing las bcol dam bdar ro// de nas klu rgyal
dngos su bsgrub// ci 'dod las kyang byed par 'gyur// bris sku'i tshul du bsgrub pa ni// gtsang ma'i ras la mchod rten ni/ khru gang mtho gang sor drug tshad// mdzes par bris la dbus su ni// sngags
bdag rgyal po tshad ldan bri// bri ba'i gzugs la yang rnam gnyis te// sku tshad bcu drug sor dag la// ro stod mi la ro smad ni// gdug pa sbrul du 'khyil ba las// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdeng kas
mdzes// thal sbyar bka' ni nod par bri// yang na bcu dgu sor dag las// zhabs gnyis dngos su brkyang pa can// sbrul mgo bdun gyis rab mdzes pa'i// sbrul mgo sbrul gyi logs gnyis nas// gsum dang
bzhi yis 'khril nas kyang// g.yas g.yon zhabs gnyis dag kyang ni// sbrul bdun dag gis chun por 'khril ba bri// thal mo sbyar nas mdzes bar bri// de yang brten bya'i rim pa'o// yang na mdzes pa'i ban
d+ha'i nang// gur gum chu yis legs byugs nas// tsan dan chu yis legs par byug/ shog bu dag la klu rgyal gzugs bris la// maN+Dal khar bzhag bdag gzhan bskyed// de yang rten gyi rim pa'o/ khang bu'i

bris sku gzugs rnams la// spyan dbye bsnyen pa'i rim rdzogs nas// mchod pa byas la bsnyen pa'o// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i grangs dang bsnyen pa'i bsgrub lugs bstan pa'i le'u
ste lnga pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// phan gdags las kyi rim pa las// nad brtag rim pa gang yin pa// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad
du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// skad cig tsam gyi ting 'dzin gyis// bdag gzhan legs par bskyed byas nas// mdun du
gtor ma legs bzhag la// ming dang rus pa legs dmigs la// phyi bsgrub snying po spu ta bzlas// de nas bdag la nyams myong ni// yang dag pa ru lus la 'byung// mgo nas zhugs nas na na ni// ma mo'i

rigs rnams yin par shes// snying nas zhugs nas na ba dang// 'phyo zhing 'gro snying 'dod pa dang// mi dga' drag por na ba dang// rgyal pos rgyab brten byas par shes// rked pa na dang rtsa rnams 'khyug/ lus

po lci dang rkang lag na// lus po sbrid dang smin ma zad// sha ro byung dang sha bkra byung// lus la sha 'phrig byung ba dang// sa bdag klu gnyan yin zhes bya// de ltar rang gi nyams ci byung dang// nad pa dag dang

bstun bar bya// mthun par gyur na gso ru btub// mi mthun na gso mi btub par shes par bya// de 'dra'i sbyor ba zab mo ni// sangs rgyas la ni 'byung mi 'gyur// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/
nad pa gso ru btub mi btub bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// nad pa skad ngan rim pa yi// gang gnod 'dre
yis ngos gzung la// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs po dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyis rtse gcig yid kyi nyon// dang po ya stags bsag byas

te// shing skra btsan dug ske tshe dang// nyungs kar gu gul kla sran dang// tshil chen dag dang sbyar te btub// zhib tu btags te ri lu bya// sran ma chung shos tshad du'o// de la bsnyen pa 'bum tsho bskyal// de nas
nad pa'i gan dag tu// bdag gzhan legs par bskyed byas la// bka' bsgo rim pa tshul bzhin bya// de nas thugs kha'i 'od zer las// sngags bdag bskul te bgegs bkug nas// nad pa'i snying kha'i dri
la bstim// bgegs kyi dngos por gyur par bsam// de nas lag pa'i srin lag nas// dkar nag skud pa btags nas ni// sngags mkhan cig gis 'dzin du gzhug/ de nas slob dpon dag gis ni// gyo

mag nang du me blugs phyi sgo tham khar khyer/ rdo rje'i 'gros bya dril bu dkrol rdo rje gsor/ rdo rjai 'gros re re la ril bu re me'i nang du bsreg par bya/ bdun gyi grangs ni thim pa dang// nad pa'i gan du 'ongs nas

ni// sna ru bdug cing gsang sngags bzlas// de yi ting 'dzin rim pa ni// rang nyid e las gru gsum ni// chos 'byung sbyor ka'i rnam par bsam// de nas mtshon cha'i char phab la// bgegs kyi dngos po myags

par bsam// de ltar byas na nad pa ni// skad ngan 'don cing sma bar 'gyur// de su zhig yin zhes bri// phyi bsgrub snying po spu ta bzlas// mtha' rten mA ra ya yang gdags// de yi sbyor ba zab mo ni// bgegs la

sogs pa dngos su 'ong// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ nad pa skad ngan 'don pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// tsi tsi dz+wa la gso ba'i phyir// klu bsgrub dkyil
'khor bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bstan par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// dang po nyams dga'i sa phyogs su// bgegs la sogs pa bskrad byas

nas// dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya/ khru phyed nas tsam khru do'i bar// maN+Dal khod snyoms dgod par bya// de ltar snyoms pa'i maN+Dal la// mkhas pas thig chen gdab par bya// gnam thig dag kyang gdab
bar bya// de nas sa thig gdab bar bya// slob dpon khro bdag shar du bltas// slob ma mdzes ldan nub tu blta// bya rog bdag po thig skud gdab// de nas slob dpon lhor bltas nas// slob ma byang
bltas thig cig gdab// de nas zur thig gnyis po gdab// thig skud dag ni btab ba'i tshe// gsang chen phyag na rdo rje'i snying po bzlas// dgra bgegs tshogs rnams byer bar bsam// thig chen brgyad las
bcu drug gdab// de las sum cu so gnyis so// de la dbus su pho brang bya// de yi rgyab tu pad+ma'o// de yi rgyab sgo sbrul mgo bya// de nas tshon gyi rim pa gtang// dbus su nag po pad ser bya// gru

chad ljang khung sgo rnams phyogs dang bstun// shar sgo dkar te lho ser nub dmar// byang sgo ljang ste sbrul mdzes mtshon pa bya// de ni tshon gyi rim pa'o// de nas gzugs brnyan dgod bya ste// dbus su phyag na rdo

rje'i gzugs// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad// shar du sngags bdag rang dang dgu// gru chad brgyad la mdzo rtol brgyad// gnyan gyi rigs su shes par bya// lha rnams dag dang sgo bzhi la// rigs lnga'i
klu tshogs dgod par bya// shar du rgyal rigs lhor bram ze// nub tu rje rigs dgod par bya// byang du dmangs rigs gdol can dgod// de dag la yang bdun bdun te// sbrul dkar sbal pa lcong mo dang// nya

dang chu rta chu lug chu glang ngo// sbrul mgo phyin phyogs dag tu ni// sa bdag srin po dgod par bya// de ni gzugs brnyan rim pa'o// de nas rgyan rnams dgod par bya// rnal 'byor pa ni nub tu blta// shar lho

mtshams su gtor ma gnyis// lho nub mtshams su bum pa bzhag/ nub byang mtshams su rma bya gzugs// byang shar mtshams su bdud rtsi bzhag/ byang du klu shing sgreng la bzhag/ lho ru nad pa'i 'dug sa bya// hom

gyi cha rkyen hom dang sbag/ sbyor tsa'i cha rkyen rang sar bzhag/ dar dang ras kyi yol ba dgram// spos dang tsan dan dri yis bdugs// ba dmar 'o ma rtag tu bzung// gtsang ma'i gos dang zas bza' 'o// 'dod

chags tshogs dang bsnol kyang spong// bum pa'i chu yis rtag tu bkru// dgos pa'i ya stags 'tshog par bya// de ni rgyan gyi rim pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bskyed bya ste/ shu dz+nyA na yi sngags brjod pas// thams

cad stong pa'i ngo bo bsam// de nas b+hUM la gzhal med khang// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// 'dab brgyad pad+ma sbrul mgos brgyan// de yi dbus kyi lte ba la// yi ge mthing nag hUM yang bskyed// phyogs brgyad pad+ma
dag la ni// phuHdgu rnal 'byor pas sgom bya// de bzhin gzugs brnyan thams cad la// yi ge phuHyi rnam pa bsam// de nas dbus kyi hUM las ni// spros bsdus 'od du zhu ba las// badzra zhes bya sgra brjod

pas// rdo rje nag po rtse dgu bsgom// de nas spro dang bsdu byas nas// badzra pA Ni sgra brjod pas// phyag na rdo rjer gyur par bsgom// de thugs a las zla dkyil bsgom// de stengs sa bon hUM yang bsgom// de zer
las byung phyag rdor dgug/ de nas phuHkun zhu ba las// sbrul mgo bdun pa dgu bskyed do// sa bon gnyis las 'od 'phros pas// dbyings nas klu chen dgu yang dgug/ de bzhin phuHkun zhu ba
las// gzugs brnyan gang yin ngo bo bsam// de nas klu tshogs mang po kun// las ni ci bya zer ba las// bka' bsgo rim pa sna tshogs bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje la// sngags rigs bklag cing
rnam lnga dbul// de nas sngags bdag dbu gzung nas// sa bdag sa srin yan chad la// klu sman bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dbul// de la yang ni rnam bzhi ste// spyan drangs mchod pa dbul ba dang// sngags rings
klag dang shan ting gdags// stong tsho re re gdags par bya// de nas spyan drang mchod pa dbul// slob dpon nad pa la sogs kun// bum pa'i chu yis legs par bkru// klu rnams kun la mchod pa dbul// hUM/
sngags kyi bdag po spyan 'dren na// dkar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi dbul// dkar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi yis// zas kyi ro mchog ldan gyur cig/ zas kyi ro mchog ldan nas kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang
ldan gyur cig/ 'dis 'og ma rnams 'dre'o// mngar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul// mngar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi yis// zas kyi ro mchog ldan gyur cig/ zas kyi ro mchog ldan nas kyang// klu rnams

mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ snying bu zho sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul// snying bu zho sha'i bdud rtsi yis// klu yi snying nad sos gyur cig/ klu yi snying nad sos nas kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ mkhal ma zho

sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul// mkhal ma zho sha'i bdud rtsi yis// klu yi mkhal nad sos gyur cig/ klu yi mkhal nad sos nas kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ rgya mtsho sbu ba'i bdud rtsi 'bul// rgya mtsho
sbu ba'i bdud rtsi yis// klu'i klad pa 'khrugs pa sos gyur cig/ klad pa 'khrugs pa sos nas kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ dbang po lag pa'i bdud rtsi 'bul// dbang po lag pa'i bdud rtsi

yis// klu yi rkang lag na ba sos gyur cig/ rkang lag na ba sos nas kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ chu srin sder mo'i bdud rtsi 'bul// chu srin sder mo'i bdud rtsi yis// klu yi sder mo gog pa
sos gyur cig/ sder mo gog pa sos nas kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ 'gron bu dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul// 'gron bu dkar po'i bdud rtsi yis// klu yi swo nad sos gyur cig/ klu yi swo nad
sos kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ til mar dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul// til mar dag gi bdud rtsi yis// rna ba'i dbang po nyams pa sos gyur cig/ rna ba'i dbang po nyams pa sos nas
kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ dung gtsug g.yas su 'khyil ba'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ dung gtsug g.yas su 'khyil ba'i bdud rtsi yis// klu yi rus pa chag pa sos gyur cig/ klu yi rus pa chag pa
sos nas kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ li khri dmar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul// li khri dmar po'i bdud rtsi yis// klu yi khra nad skam pa sos gyur cig/ khra nas skam pa sos nas
kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ ras skud dmar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul// ras skud dmar po'i bdud rtsi yis// klu yi chu rgyun 'khums pa sos gyur cig/ chu rgyus 'khums pa sos nas kyang// klu

rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ dar tshon sna lnga'i bdud rtsi 'bul// dar tshon sna lnga'i bdud rtsi yis// klu yi pags pa ral ba sos gyur cig/ pags pa ral ba sos nas kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan

gyur cig/ na ga ge sar bdud rtsi 'bul// na ga ge sar bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ byi lang ka'i snye ma'i bdud rtsi 'bul// byi lang ka'i snye ma'i bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs

dang ldan gyur cig/ dri lang ka'i snye ma'i bdud rtsi 'bul// dri lang ka'i snye ma'i bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ mon sran gre 'u'i bdud rtsi 'bul// mon sran gre'u'i bdud rtsi yis// klu

rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ khra sran bre bo'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ khra sran bre bo'i bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ gla gor zho sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul// gla gor zho sha'i bdud rtsi yis// klu

rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ lung ltang sho sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul// lung ltang sho sha'i bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ sho sha sum brgya drug cu'i bdud rtsi 'bul// sho sha sum brgya drug
cu'i bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ nya phyis dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul// nya phyis dkar po'i bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ sha 'bras dkar po'i bdud rtsi
'bul// sha 'bras dkar po'i bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ gser gyi me tog bdud rtsi 'bul// gser gyi me tog bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ g.yu sgong
'bar ba'i bdud rtsi 'bul// g.yu sgong 'bar ba'i bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ 'bras bu gsum gyi bdud rtsi 'bul// 'bras bu gsum gyi bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan

gyur cig/ rtsa ba lnga yi bdud rtsi 'bul// rtsa ba lnga yi bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ ga bur shes kyi bdud rtsi 'bul// ga bur shes gyi bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur
cig/ pu rtse shel gyi bdud rtsi 'bul// pu rtse shel gyi bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ tsan dan smug po'i bdud rtsi 'bul// tsan dan smug po'i bdud rtsi yis// klu
rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ 'dam bu nag tshal bdud rtsi 'bul// 'dab bu nag tshal bdud rtsi yis// klu yi gnas khang nyams pa bskongs gyur cig/ klu yi gnas khang nyams pa bskongs

nas kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ 'bru sna sna tshogs bdud rtsi 'bul// 'bru sna tshogs bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ rtsi sman sna tshogs bdud rtsi 'bul// rtsi sman sna

tshogs bdud rtsi yis// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ klu rnams mdangs dang ldan nas kyang// do nod mi 'di thong gyur cig/ do nod nad 'di thong gyur cig/ mi dang nad du khrol gyur cig/ de nas rnal

'byor sngags grub kyis// bsnyen sngags dag la shan+ting ni// blu blu brtags la stong tsho bzlas// de nas gdug rtsub byab par bya// nad kyi dngos po thon bya ste// rma bya thogs la 'di skad du// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag
po tshur nyon cig/ dang po bka' byung su yi bka'// dang po ston pa rnam gnyis bka'// da lta bka' byung su yi bka'// da ltar rigs 'dzin bdag gi bka'// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bka' la nyon// rig pa 'dzin

pa'i bka' ma bcag/ nga ni phyag na rdo rje yin// nga ni klu yi gnyen po yin// klu brgya zas su za ba yin// klu brgya gos su gyon pa yin// klu 'bum gdan du 'dings pa yin// klu sngas lus la brgyan pa yin// rgyu

sbyor yon gyi bdag po la// lto 'phye rigs kyi gdug rtsub phyung// 'dis 'og ma 'dre/ grul bum klu'i gdug rtsub phyung// nya yi klu'i gdug rtsub phyung// sbal pa'i klu'i gdug rtsub phyung// gnyan gyi klu'-i gdug rtsub

phyung// rgyal rigs klu'i gdug rtsub phyung// bram ze klu'i gdug rtsub phyung// rje rigs klu'i gdug rtsub phyung// dmangs rigs klu'i gdug rtsub phyung// gdol can klu'i gdug rtsub phyung// sa bdag sa srin

gdug rtsub phyung// gdug rtsub thams cad phyir phyung zhig/ de yi ting 'dzin rim pa ni// nad kyi dngos po 'thon par bsam// de nas nad kyi dam bdar te// sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig/ do nub mi 'di mi

gtong zhing// do nub gdug rtsub mi 'don cing// rigs 'dzin bka' las 'da' byed na/ khyod kyi shi sa bstan pa ni// dam tshig sngags kyi byin brlabs dang/ khro bo yag sha me dbal gyis/ khyod kyi snying nas

'tshig 'gyur zhing// mdze nad sna tshogs khyod la 'ong// mig nad me 'bar khyod la 'od// 'on pa long ba khyod la 'ong// mdze can shu ba khyod la 'ong// bla med 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// 'o na de la ma thug
gis// do nod mi 'di thong dang// do nod nad 'di thon dang// 'dis 'og ma rnams 'dre/ khrag nad chu ser 'di las thon dang// klu nad mkhris pa 'di las thon dang// mi dang nad du khrol dang// mdze
nad sna tshogs 'di las thon dang// bad kan nad rnams 'di las thon dang// mdze rigs dug thabs 'di las thon dang// sbrul gyi dkar po 'di las thon dang// sbal pa dkar po 'di las thon

dang// lcang ke dkar po 'di las thon dang// nya mo dkar mo 'di las thon dang// chu rta dkar po 'di las thon dang// chu glang dkar po 'di las thon dang// chu lug dkar po 'di las thon dang// sbrul gyi ser
khra 'di las thon dang// sbal pa ser po 'di las thon dang// lcong ke ser po 'di las thon dang// nya mo ser mo 'di las thon dang// chu rta ser po 'di las thon dang// chu lug ser po 'di las thon

dang// chu glang ser po 'di las thon dang// sbrul gyi dmar khra 'di las thon dang// sbal pa dmar po 'di las thon dang// lcong ke dmar po 'di las thon dang// nya mo dmar mo 'di las thon dang// chu rta dmar

mo 'di las thon dang// chu glang dmar po 'di las thon dang// chu lug dmar po 'di las thon dang// sbrul gyi sngo khra 'di las thon dang// sbal pa sngon po 'di las thon dang// lcong ke sngon po 'di las thon

dang// nya mo sngon mo 'di las thon dang// chu rta sngon po 'di las thon dang// chu glang sngon po 'di las thon dang// chu lug sngon po 'di las thon dang// sbrul gyi nag khra 'di las thon dang// sbal pa nag khra 'di
las thon dang// lcong ke nag khra 'di las thon dang// nya mo nag mo 'di las thon dang// chu rta nag po 'di las thon dang// chu glang nag po 'di las thon dang// chu lug nag po 'di las thon dang// nad

rnams thams cad phyir phyung zhig/ sngar byas nad rnams phyir phyung zhig/ da mi byed par dam chos shig/ sngags kyi bdag po khye chung gzhon nu// gzhon nu gtum po/ srid gsum dbang sdud/ gdug pa tshar gcod/

sbrul mgo bdun pa/ zur phud lnga pa/ mi dang nad du khrol dang/ gdug pa dug lnga bskyed pa ste/ dug lngas nad lnga rgyas par byed// nad lnga thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// sngags bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal
lo// de nas nad rnams 'thon bar 'gyur// de ltar sngags bdag ji ltar bar// klu chen brgyad nas sa srin bar// kun la rim bzhin shes par bya// de nas sngags bdag cig phul// phyis ni dug kyang byab par

bya// de la yang ni 'di skad do// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig/ spu sdug de ni rma bya dang// sngags kyi de ni bdag po yis// dug rnams de ni phyir phyung zhig/ reg pa'i dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ ltas pas

dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ sbyor ba'i dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ yid kyi dug rnams phyir phyung zhig kha rlangs dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ klu chen brgyad kyi dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ gnyan gyi dug rnams phyir phyung
zhig/ rgyal rigs dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ bram ze'i dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ rje rigs dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ dmangs rigs dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ gdol can dug rnams phyir phyung

zhig/ sa bdag sa srin dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ sngar byas dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ phyis byas dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ da mi byed par dam chos shig/ sngags kyi bdag po khye chung gzhon nu// zur phud lnga pa/

sbrul mgo bdun pa/ gdug pa tshar gcad do// srid sum dbang sdud/ khyod kyis mi thul gang yang med/ khyod kyis mi phyin gang yang med// do nod nad 'di thon dang// mi dang nad 'di khrol dang// gdug pa dug
lnga bskyed pa ste// dug lngas nad rnams rgyas par byed// nad rnams thams cad 'don mdzad pa// sngags bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dug rnams 'don pa'i rim pa'o/ khyad par dug sngags bdag la yin
no// de yi ting 'dzin rim pa ni// rma bya dug rnams byabs pa'i tshe// bdag bzhin du nad byung bsam// des ni nad kyi dngos po sos// de ltar nyin mtshan thams cad du// rgyun mi chad par las rnams
brtsam// de ltar las rnams brtsams na// ji lta bu yang 'tsho bar 'gyur// de ni klu sgrub rim pa rdzogs// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya// rgyas pa'i gtor ma gnyis po gtang// ye shes sems dpa'
gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' phyir bzlog la// rim bzhin zhu ste 'jim par bsam// de nas thugs ka la yang spros pas// rlung gi dkyil 'khor cher bsams te// s+pha ra na phaT kyi sgra brjod
pas// gang gnon sa ru gzugs brnyan ni// bskyal nas glud kyi dngos po bsam// sa tshon phyags te chu la 'bod// gzugs brnyan rnams kyang chu la 'bod// bum chu lhag mas nad pa ni// mgo lus med par
bkru bar bya// de ltar sbyor ba zab mo 'di// bde bar gshegs pa'i las chen yin/ bcu gcig lon kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur// 'byung po gzhan la smos ci dgos// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ klu
bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// las kyi sbyor ka bshad pa legs// klu yi thugs dam bskang ba yis// de yi rim pa ji ltar

bgyi// bdag gis ma 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// klu yi thugs dam bskang bar 'dod na 'di ltar shes par

bya ste// de la dang po bca' gzhi'i rim pa ni// sna tshogs 'bru las byas pa'i phye// rin chen tsan dan 'bru sna tshogs// phul lnga phul bzhi bre phyed phul do la// bang rim bzhi yi ri rab bya// phul lnga bshams la lha
bshos bya// de ltar tshad ldan ri rab steng// pad+ma srab mo 'dab brgyad bzhag/ dbus su phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs// 'dab ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad dang sngags bdag dgu// sbyor ba mkhas pas
dgod par bya// bang rim bzhi yi dang po la// mkhas bas gnyan gyi gzugs rnams dgod// de 'og bang rim gnyis pa la// rigs lnga'i klu tshogs dgod par bya// de 'og bang rim gsum pa la// sa bdag
rigs tshogs dgod par bya// ri rab dag gi kha dog ni// shar dkar lho ser nub dmar byang ljang ngo// ri rab rtse mo ser por bya// shar du rgyal rigs/ lhor bram ze/ nub tu rje rigs/ byang du dmangs rigs
gdol can dgod par bya// gnyan dang sa bdag gar mdzes dgod// de ni phyogs kyi rim pa'o// ri rab steng gi rtse mo la// smyag ma mgo rangs tshig dgu la// dar dang za 'og ras mas brgyan// shog shog dag

la 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad gur du dbub par bya// lte ba phyag na rdo rje rtsa ru gzugs// phyag na rdo rje rgyan du bya'o/ kha dog mthun pa'i nam mkha' lnga// ri rab phyogs bzhi dbus su dgod// shog bu dag la
'dab brgyad gur// ri rab phyogs bzhir gzugs par bya// nam mkha'i gru rnams thams cad du// bya spu sna tshogs rgyan du gtang// 'dab brgyad shog gu gur rnams la// klu yi gur du shes par bya// kun la
dar zab ras mas gdags// dar tshon sna lnga'i gdugs kyis dgab// ri rab dag gi lhab shos dang// bang rim dang po bar dag tu// shag pa'i shing la nad pa'i gzugs// byas la shar dang nub tu

gzugs// ming dang gzugs kyang bri bar bya// de nyid glud kyi dngos po bsam// ri bdun mtsho bdun gling bzhi mu khyud bcas// gling chen glud mchog ri rab steng// gtsang ma'i shing leb steng du bca'// klu
gzugs rim pa mang po kun// bag zan dag la bya bar bshad// rgyas pa'i gtor ma bcu yang bzhag/ gtor ma rnams kyi kha dog ni// phyag na rdo rje sngags bdag klu chen rgyal rigs dkar// gnyan gyi gtor ma
khra bor bya// bram ze ser po rje rigs dmar/ dmangs rigs gdol chen nag po sngo// sa bdag sa srin dang po mtshungs// slob dpon dag la gtsang gos dang// gtsang ma'i thod kyang bcing bar bya// yas gzhi

khal gcig bre bzhi bzhag/ yon bdag 'khor bcas khrus byas la// mdun du dad pa rab skyed la// de ni bcwa gzhi'i rim pa'o// de nas dang po stong nyid bsgom// de nas hUM las yi ge yaM// rlung gi dkyil 'khor

bsgom par bya// de nas hUM las yi ge baM// chu yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de nas hUM las yi ge laM// gser gyi sa gzhi bsgom par bya// de nas hUM las yi ge su// ri yi rgyal po ri rab bsgom// de nas hUM

las phyag na rdo rje skur// snga ma ji bzhin bskyed par bya// de nas thugs kha'i hUM las ni// yi ge duHser mang po spro// de nas mahA nA ga dang/ nA ga zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pas// klu gzugs mang po

sna tshogs kun// rang rang gzugs su gyur par bsgom// de nas phyag na rdo rje rang ni// klu rnams kun gyi ye shes kyi// sems dpa' spyan drangs bstim par bya// de nas klu rnams mang po kun// las ni ci bya zer
ba las// glud kyi dngos po 'di bzhes bya// de nas bsnyen sngags grub tshad bzlas// de nas mdaus kyi mchod pa brtsam// de nas mtshams bcad pa dang// bshags pa dag kyang bya// mchod pa rim pa bzhin du
dbul bar bya// de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbu gzung nas// sa bdag sa srin yan chod la// gnas nas spyan drangs gshegs su gsol// hUM/ 'og min lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje
ni// sku mdog 'jigs pa mi bzad pa// dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar// zhal bgrad mche gtsig 'jigs pa che// mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku mchog can// spyan gsum bzlog pas 'jigs pa che/ khro gnyer

'bar bas drag shul che// lus la klu lnga'i rgyan gyis brgyan// mgo la rgyal rigs sbrul dkar khra// skye la bram ze sbrul ser khra// dpung pa rje rigs sbrul dmar khra// rked pa dmangs rigs sbrul sngo khra// rkang pa

gdol can sbrul nag khra// zhabs gnyis bgrad pas klu rnams gnon// 'khor du khro rgyal 'bum gyis bskor// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse dgu 'phyar// phyag g.yon dril bu dku la brten// klu rgyal 'dul ba'i mthu bo

che// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las mdzod// de nas sngags bdag spyan drangs te// hUM/ klu mtsho 'khy-il ba'i nang shed nas// sngo nag 'khyil ba'i nang shed na// gzhal yas rin chen sna bzhis byas// shar
phyogs dngul dang lho phyogs gser// nub phyogs zangs te byang phyogs lcags// de lta bu yi nang shed na sngags kyi bdag po gshegs su gsol// sngon gyi bskal ba dang po la// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa

dang// sdud pa po phyag na rdo rje'i spyan snga du// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa// sngags kyi bdag por dbang yang bskur// 'gro drug 'dul bar dbang yang bskur// 'jig rten mthu chen dbang yang bskur// lnga
brgya dus kyi tha ma la// rnal 'byor kun gyi srungs mar bsgom/ khol po bya bar dam tshig phog/ las mkhan bya bar dam tshig phog/ 'bangs kyi tshul du dam tshig phog/ 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las

mdzod// de ring glud mchog rigs kyi mdos// glud mchog mdos kyi las mdzod cig/ de nas klu chen brgyad po spyan 'dren na// hUM/ 'dab brgyad gser gyi khri stengs na// sngags bdag sku las sprul pa'i klu chen
brgyad// klu bdag chen po gzugs chen po/ khye chung 'bum gyi sprul pa 'gyed// dug lnga'i 'od zer sna tshogs kyis// nad rnams sna tshogs bzlog par 'gyed// 'di spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las

mdzod// de ring glud mchog rigs kyi mdos// glud mchog mdos kyi las mdzod cig/ de nas gnyan spyan drang ste// hUM/ rgya mtsho yangs pa'i dkyil shed na// gdug pa'i gnyan chen mdzo rtol brgyad// sprul pa
mdzo rtol sna tshogs 'gyed// g.yas kyi rwa la thog ser 'bebs// g.yon gyi rwa la glog dmar khyug/ rmig gzhi rnams la na bun 'thib/ kha rlangs khros pas sbrul du byung// 'jigs byed chen po gnyan chen
gzugs// 'dir spyaun 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las mdzod// de ring glud mchog rigs kyi mdos// glud mchog mdos kyi las mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal rigs spyan drang ste// hUM/ shar du bltas pa'i chu mig

nas// rgyal rigs klu tshogs gshegs su gsol// zhe sdang pho mo'i bu de ni// byol song ha la lto 'phye'i rigs// sbrul dkar sbal pa dkar po dang// nya dang lcong ge chu rta dang// chu glang chu lug dkar po'i
gzugs// 'od zer 'phros pas yid kyi dug/ 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las mdzod// de ring glud mchog rigs kyi mdos// glud mchog mdos kyi las mdzod cig/ de nas bram ze spyan drang ste// hUM/
