bram ze'i rigs mchog spyan drang na// lhor bltas mdzes pa'i chu mig nas// klu bdag chu la gnas pa'i bu// byol song gdug pa sbrul gyis rigs// sbrul ser sbal pa lcong mo dang// nya dang chu rta chu glang
dang// chu lug ser po'i gzugs// lus la sbyor ba'i dug chen 'phro// nad rnams ma lus sel bar byed// bram ze chen po 'chi bdag ste// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las mdzod// de ring glud mchog
rigs kyi mdos// glud mchog mdos kyi las mdzod cig/ de nas rje rigs spyan drang ste// hUM/ nub bltas sa gzhi rdo yang dmar// rje rigs 'chi bdag gnas yin te// chu la gnas pa'i klu chen po// lus la
kha rlangs dug chen 'phro// nad rnams ma lus sel par byed// rje rigs chen po 'chi bdag ste// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs phrin las mdzod// de ring glud mchog rigs kyi mdos// glud mchog mdos kyi las
mdzod cig/ de nas dmangs rigs spyan drang ste// hUM/ dmangs rigs chen po 'chi bdag ste// byang bltas chu mig nag po nas// dmangs rigs chen po gshegs su gsol// sku ni sbrul sngon sbal pa sngon po
dang// lcong mo nya dang rta dang glang lug sngon po// sku la reg ba'i dug chen 'phro// dmangs rigs chen po 'chi bdag ste// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las mdzod// de ring glud mchog rigs kyi
mdos// glud mchog mdos kyi las mdzod cig/ de nas gdol can spyan drang ste// hUM/ gdol chen 'chi bdag gnas chen po// byang bltas chu mig nag po na// sku ni sbrul nag sbal pa nya dang
lcong// rta dang glang dang lug dang ni// sku la ba so'i dug chen 'phro// gdol can chen po 'chi bdag ste// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las mdzod// de ring glud mchog rigs kyi mdos// glud mchog mdos

kyi las mdzod cig/ de nas sa bdag spyan drang ste// ri dang sgung tshigs shing gcig brag rtsa nas// sa bdag sa srin gshegs su gsol// gyong po khra'o 'dzin gyong po// sgur po zha'o rigs ngan po// sprul sku sna
tshogs 'gyed mdzad pa// zha grum sna tshogs nad rnams gtong// sa bdag chen po 'chi bdag ste// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las mdzod// de ring glud mchog rigs kyi mdos// glud mchog mdos kyi
las mdzod cig/ de nas mchod pa dbul te// phyag na rdo rje dag la ni// sngags rings klag cing rnam lnga dbul// de nas sngags bdag dbu gzung nas// sa bdag sa srin yan chod la// bdud rtsi'i mchod pa
'bul// mdos chog bya/ hUM?/ sngags kyi bdag po spyan 'dren no// dkar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul// mngar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi yis// zas kyi ro mchog ldan gyur cig/ zas kyi ro mchog ldan nas

kyang// klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ mngar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi rnams// klu sgrub kyi le'u nas 'byung ba bzhin bya'o// de nas sngags rings klag cing bdud rtsi rnams dung phor du blug la/ sngags
bdag la bdud rtsi chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du dbul/ mdos bdag yin gyis mdos 'di bzhes// glud bdag yin gyis glud 'di long// yon bdag yin gyis yon 'di long// de ring glud chen mdos 'di
bzhes// mi 'di de ring gtang du gsol// rin chen sna bzhi'i gter 'bul gyis// gter gyi dbyig tu 'di bzhes shig/ gzha' tshon skud pa'i nam mkha' 'bul// rgyan gyi gter tu 'di bzhes shig/ mdzes pa'i
pad+ma gur chen 'bul// gdugs kyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ dar tshon sna lnga'i rgyan chen bgrems// rgyan gyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ glud chen gzugs brnyan ming rus 'bul// 'bangs kyi gter du 'di
bzhes shig/ klu sman sna tshogs bdud rtsi 'bul// gsol zas gter du 'di bzhes shig/ de ring mi 'di khyod kyis thong// de ring glud 'di khyod kyis long// de ring mi bas glud che 'bul// glud bdag chen po
glud bzhes shig/ gdug rtsub dug rnams khyod kyis thon// grul bum gdug rtsub khyod kyis thon// sha za'i gdug rtsub khyod kyis thon// gdug rtsub dug rnams ma lus thon// klu bsgrub kyi le'u las shes par
bya'o// mdos bdag chen po mdos long zhig/ sngags bdag rgyal po glud bzhes shig/ de ring glud 'di bzhes su gsol// yon bdag 'khor bcas glud du 'bul// de ring mdos 'di mi bzhes
su// yon bdag 'khor bcas mdos su 'bul// gdug pa dug lnga skyed pa ste// dug lngas nad lnga rgyas par byed// nad rnams thams cad 'joms bdag pa// sngags bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// yon bdag
'khor bcas kyis me tog gtor phyag bya/ glud 'bul mdos bdag mdos bzhes bya'o// sngags bdag rag/ hUM/ klu chen brgyad po spyan 'dren na// mchod pa 'bul ba dang bdud rtsi 'bul ba klu sgrub las shes/
klu chen brgyad po tshur nyon cig/ mdos bdag chen po mdos bzhes cig/ klu chen brgyad po glud bzhes cig/ yon bdag gi ni yon 'di long// de ring glud chen mdos 'di bzhes// mi 'di de ring gtang du
gsol// rin chen sna bzhi'i gter 'bul gyis// gter gyi dbyig tu 'di bzhes shig/ gzha' tshon sna lnga'i nam mkha' 'bul// rgyan gyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ mdzes pa'i pad+ma'i gur chen 'bul// gdugs
kyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ dar tshon sna lnga'i rgyan chen bgrems// rgyan gyi gter tu 'di bzhes shig/ glud chen gzugs brnyan ming rus 'bul// 'bangs kyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ klu sman sna tshogs
bdud rtsi 'bul// gsol zas gter du di bzhes shig/ de ring mi 'di khyod kyis thong// de ring glud 'di khyod kyis long// de ring mi bas glud chen 'bul// glud bdag chen po glud bzhes shig/ gdug rtsub
dug rnams khyed kyis thon// rgyal rigs gdug rtsub khyod kyis thon// des 'dre/ klu sgrub dang mthun/ mdos bdag chen po mdos bzhes shig/ klu chen brgyad po glud bzhes shig/ de ring glud 'di bzhes su
gsol// yon bdag 'khor bcas glud 'bul lo// gdug pa dug lnga skyed pa ste// dug lngas nad lnga rgyas par byed// nad rnams thams cad 'joms mdzad ba// klu chen brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM/ gnyan
gyi klu tshogs spyan 'dren na// mdos bdag yin gyis mdos 'di bzhes// glud bdag yin gyis glud 'di long// yon bdag yin gyis yon 'di bzhes// de ring glud 'di bzhes// de ring mi 'di gtang du
gsol// rin chen sna bzhi'i gter 'bul gyis// gter gyi dbyig tu 'di bzhes shig/ 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i nam mkha' 'bul// rgyan gyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ mdzes pa'i pad+ma'i gur chen 'bul// gdugs

kyi gter du bzhes su gsol// dar tshon sna lnga'i rgyan chen 'grems// rgyan gyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ glud chen gzugs brnyan ming rus 'bul// 'bangs kyi gter du bzhes su gsol// klu sman sna tshogs mchod pa
'bul// gsol zas gter du 'di bzhes shig/ de ring mi 'di khyod kyis thong// de ring glud 'di khyod kyis long// de r-ing mi bas glud chen 'bul// glud bdag chen po glud bzhes shig/ gdug
rtsub dug rnams khyod kyis thon// gong gi 'dre/ rgyal rigs nas sa bdag sa srin yan chod// mdos bdag chen po mdos bzhes shing// de ring glud 'di bzhes su gsol// yon bdag 'khor bcas glud du

'bul// gdug pas dug lnga skyed pa ste// dug lngas nad lnga rgyas par byed// nad lnga thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// gnyan chen brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM/ rigs lnga'i klu tshogs spyan 'dren// dkar gsum
'dre/ mdos bdag yin gyis mdos 'di bzhes// glud bdag yin gyis glud 'di bzhes// yon bdag yin gyis yon 'di long// de ring glud chen mdos 'di bzhes// de ring mi 'di gtang du gsol// rin
chen sna bzhi'i gter 'bul gyis// gter gyi dbyig tu 'di bzhes shig/ gzha' tshon sna lnga'i nam mkha' 'bul// rgyan gyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ mdzes pa'i pad+ma'i gur chen 'bul// gdugs kyi gter du
'di bzhes shig/ dar tshon sna lnga'i rgyan chen 'grems// rgyan gyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ glud chen gzugs brnyan ming rus 'bul// 'bangs kyi gter du bzhes su gsol// klu sman sna tshogs bdud rtsi
'bul// gsol zas gter du 'di bzhes shig/ de ring mi 'di khyod kyi thong// de ring glud 'di khyod kyi long// de ring mi bas glud chen 'bul// glud bdag chen po glud bzhes shig/ gdug rtsub dug rnams
khyod kyi thon// dug rnams gong gis 'dre// mdos bdag chen po mdos bzhes shig/ de ring glung 'di bzhes su gsol// yon bdag 'khor bcas glud du bzhes// gdug pa dug lnga skyed pa ste// dug lngas
nad lnga rgyas par byed// nad rnams thams cad 'don mdzad pa// rigs lnga'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM/ sa bdag sa srin spyan 'dren no// dkar gsum 'dre/ mdos bdag 'dre/ sa bdag rgyal po glud 'dre/
yon bdag yin gyis yon 'di long// de ring glud chen mdos 'dre/ mi 'di de ring gtang du gsol// rin chen sna bzhi'i gter 'bul gyis// gter gyi dbyig tu 'di bzhes shig gzha' tshon sna lnga'i nam mkha'
'bul// rgyan gyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ mdzes pa'i pad+ma'i gur chen 'bul// gdugs kyi gter du 'di bzhes shig/ dar tshon sna lnga'i rgyan chen 'grems// rgyan gyi gter du/ glud chen gzugs brnyan ming
rus 'bul// 'bangs kyi gter du bzhes su gsol// klu sman sna tshogs bdud rtsi 'bul// gsol zas gter du 'di bzhes shig/ de ring mi 'di khyod kyis thong// de ring glud 'di khyod kyi long// de r-ing mi
bas glud chen 'bul// glud bdag chen po glud bzhes shig/ gdug rtsub dug rnams khyod kyis thon// dug 'dre/ mdos bdag chen po mdos bzhes shig/ sa bdag rgyal po glud bzhes shig/ de

ring glud 'di bzhes su na// rgyal po chen po'i gzugs sgyur nas// 'dzam bu gling bzhi'i zas nor la// rgyal po chen po longs spyod mdzad// skye 'gro rtsis kyi byang bu 'grang// legs nyes sho la rgyan bkye
nas// bka' las 'gal ba'i skyon can rnams// ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs par mdzad// sku ni dung mdog dkar po la// gser gyi gzha' ris 'od dang bcas// sku la gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// sku ni stong
gsum khyab par sprul// sprul pa'i rgyal po 'dir gshegs la// mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'di 'bul gyis// smyug ma dkar po tshigs dgu dang// dar zab rgyan dang 'phangs med nor// ser dkar la sogs mthun
pa'i rdzas// rgyu sbyor yon bdag don ched du// dga' mgu rangs pas khyod la 'bul// klu rgyal chen pos don mdzad nas// de ring bdag gis mchod 'bul gyis// yon bdag 'di la gnod ma byed// de ring
rjes kyi las mdzod cig/ chos skyong ka la tsakra ni// sku la ljang nag ber chen gsol// phyag na mnga' bzangs bya rgod bsnams// ral pa nag po mun rum 'bar// sma ra nag po ag tshoms me ltar
'bar// bgrang 'phreng nag po se ral ga/ bdud rta nag po chibs su chibs// srog bdud 'dzam gling mi la gcod// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs rdzas 'di long// mi snying rlon dang dar nag gur// mthun pa'i
dam rdzas 'di bzhes la// mi dang dam rdzas brjes mdzod la// rnal 'a'abyor bdag gi bka' ma bcag/ klu rgyal chen po'i ngo ma bcag/ hUM/ bdud chen 'bum gyi gtso mdzad pa// 'jigs byed yam rje nag po

ni// sku mdog dug sdong nag po 'dra// g.yas kyi phyag na bdud kyi khram shim thogs// g.yon pa'i phyag na rtsis kyi byang bu thogs// sprul pa khram thogs stong dang ldan// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs rdzas 'di
long// bya snying la sogs dam rdzas 'di// mi dang dam rdzas brjes mdzod la// rnal 'byor bdag gi bka' ma bcag/ klu rgyal chen po'i ngo ma bcag/ bdud bran kun gyi ngor ma gtang// de ring rjes kyi las
mdzod cig/ hUM/ yam shud chen po 'chi bdag ste// btsan rigs kun gyi gtso mdzad pa// chibs su rta dmar chibs chibs nas// sku la za 'og ber chen gsol// klu 'dud sbrul gyi chun bos brgyan// ban d+ha
dmar po gnam la 'phyar// sprul pa rol po skya bdun 'gyed// 'dir spyaun 'dir bzhugs rdzas 'di long// bshos bu mda' ni ltong dmar stsogs// mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'di bzhes la// mi dang dam rdzas
brdzes mdzod la// rnal 'byor bdag gi bka' ma bcag/ klu rgyal chen po'i ngo ma bcag/ btsan phran kun gyi gtsor mdzad pa// 'jig byed yam shud dmar po ni// btsan phran kun gyi dor ma

gtang// de ring rjes kyi las mdzod cig/ hUM/ dge bsnyen chen po tshur nyon cig/ dam pa chos kyi srungs ma mdzad// dam tshig nyams pa'i srog rtsa gcod// skyes pa dar ma'i dgra bla mdzad// klu yi sprul pa 'bum
sde 'gyed// 'dir spyaun 'dir bzhugs rdzas 'di long// ra snying ra khrag ra gsob dang// ra tshil gsur chen gtang ba yis// dge bsnyen chen po mnyes gyur nas// mi dang dam rdzas brjes mdzod la// rnal
'byor bdag gi bka' ma bcag/ klu rgyal chen po'i ngo ma bcag/ de ring rjes kyi las mdzod cig/ hUM/ pho rgyud gdon tshogs ma lus kun// the rang dgu stong 'gong po 'gyed// sa bdag klu gnyan ma mo'i
tshogs// kun gyi dkrugs ma khyed kyis byas// rgyab rten kun gyi bka' mnyan nas// phung 'dri dkrugs ma lo la shom// mthun pa'i dam rdzas ra lug dang// glud dang yas sogs sna tshogs 'di// bde bar byas
na khyed la bster// shes par gyis la yas 'di long// mi dang dam rdzas brjes 'di gyis// rnal 'byor nga yi bka' ma bcag/ klu rgyal chen po'i ngo ma bcag/ de nas bden bdar dpang btsugs la// dgongs
mo ya stags gtang bar bya// des ni pho rgyud rjes sogs so// phyi bsgrub dag la brgyad dang bcu dgu'i drag sngags gdags// nyungs kar gtor zhing drag sngags dag gis brab// bgegs rnams tshar lang gcad

par bya// gsang chen phyag rdor byin rlabs dang// klu rgyal chen po'i ngo chen gyis// tshangs chen rang yang sel 'gyur na// bgegs la sogs pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de nas klu rjes brtsam par bya// dang po

dkyil 'khor gong ma ru// gsang chen phyag rdor sku bskyed cing// gsang bsgrub sngags kyang grub tshad bzlas// mchod pa rnam lnga rgyas par ni// sngags rings bklag cing dbul bar bya// skabs su klu rnams gnad
la bor// de nas maN+Dal gnyis pa ru// bdag gzhan gsal bar bskyed byas la// bka' bsgo rim pa tshul bzhin bya// glud dang nad par rjes mdzod cig/ de nas phyi bsgrub spu ta ni// grub tshad bar du bzlas

par bya// de nas rjes kyi mchod pa brtsam// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig/ bcom ldan phyag rdor sku sprul pa// gzhon nu gtum po khro bo ste// klu rigs kun gyi gnyen po byed// rgya mtsho'i gting na

bzhugs tsam na// klu rgyal chen po sog med lags// spos ngad ldan par bzhugs tsam na/ khye chung 'bum gyi gtso bo mnga' yang mdzad// 'dzam bu'i gling du mtsho tsam na// srid pa pho mo'i bsnyen po mdzad// de
ring rjes 'di byed tsam na// lha 'dre yongs kyi skos mkhan mdzad// nan ltar skos kyis thebs tsam na// sku yi mkhyen bzhi'i man ngag 'bul// sku yi sprul pa stong gsum 'gyed// dug lnga spros pa
nad rnams sel// sngags bdag chen po spyan 'dren na// dkar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul// dkar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi yis// zas kyi ro mchog ldan gyur cig/ zas kyi ro mchog ldan nas kyang// klu
rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig/ klu rnams mdangs dang ldan nas kyang// de ring rjes kyi las mdzod cig/ mngar gsum nas gzung bdud rtsi sna tshogs bar// klu bsgrub le'u byung ba bzhin du 'bul// de nas

sngags rings bklag cing dung phor gyis// sngags bdag la ni dbul bar bya'o// spu ta nA ga rA dza a mr-i ta swAhA/ zhes bzlas so// klu'i 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung bar bsam// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag

po tshur nyon cig/ 'dud do yab cig klu la 'dud// mchod kyang yab cig klu rgyal mchod// rten kyang yab cig klu rgyal rten// 'bod kyang yab cig klu rgyal 'bod// yab cig klu la mi 'dud du// 'dzam gling mi yi

grong khyer du// srin po pho mo'i gdon rnams dang// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang// lha srin la sogs sde brgyad dang// gnod sbyin la sogs ma lus kyis// rgyu sbyor yon bdag ma lus la// sems kyi
sdug bsngal lus kyi na tsha gtong// de rnams 'dul phyir yab cig khyod la 'dud// yab cig khyod la mthu ma chung// rigs 'dzin bcol ba'i las ma bul// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las mdzod// rgyas

pa'i gtor ma ba ling 'bul// sngags bdag sku tshe 'od dang ldan gyur cig/ lho dang byang dang shar nub dang// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu// rgya skyegs rams dang bu ram ka ra dang// zhu mkhan btsod

dang sbrang rtsi shing thog dang// tshwa dang bal dang sha sna ma lus dang// shog bu sna tsha dar zab g.yu sgog tshogs// zas phud sna tshogs dang// sbrul dang sbal pa chu rta chu glang nya dang lcong ge'o// kun gyi sha dang pags pa

dang// nya lcibs rtsal pa'i sgo nga dang// nad pa'i khrag dang nad pa'i skra// de rnams cha snyoms rin chen rdzas kyi skong bu nyi shu ru// tshad ma rdzas srang nyi shu blug pa'i rdzas// dag cing dad pas sngags bdag khyod la
'bul/ khyod kyang bzhes la nor gyi dbyig mdzod cig/ dug rnams ma lus 'don pa rma bya'i mdong// rgyu sbyor yon bdag nad rnams 'don pa'i phyag char bzhes// nyungs dkar dug la sogs pa'i rdzas// drag po
las kyi mthun rdzas 'di// dgra bgegs tshar gcod don du bzhes// bag zan dag la byas pa yi// nad pa'i gzugs brnyan 'di// rgyu sbyor yon bdag don du bzhes mdzod cig/ 'dab brgyad
shog bu'i gur chen 'di// sku yi dril bu 'di bzhes shig/ dar zab la sogs ras mas brgyan// na bza'i gter du 'di bzhes shig/ gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags// byu ru mu tig man
shel rnams// rin chen sna tshogs phur pa 'di// rin chen gter du bzhes su gsol// klu rnams dges mdzad chu lug dmar po ni// klu yi nor bu 'di bas che ba med// sngags bdag thugs dam 'di las

bskongs pa med// rgyu sbyor rjes su 'di las che ba med// dar zab brgyan pa'i cha lugs 'di// de ring rjes kyi rdzas su 'bul// sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig khyod kyis mi thon gang yang med/ khyod kyis ma

phyin gang yang med// de ring mi 'di rjes mdzod cig/ de skad bya zhing chu lug dag kyang btab// nad pa'i dri gos sna gsum lug la g.yog/ skabs su nas gtor phyag kyang btsal// de nas sngags bsgrub bzlas

pa bya zhing dam yang bdar// dam bdar klu bsgrub le'u nas lta// de ni sngags kyi rim pa'o// maN+Dal gsum pa'i rtsar phyin la// hUM/ klu chen brgyad po tshur nyon cig// sngags kyi bdag po'i sprul pa ste// 'chi

bdag klu chen brgyad du byung// klu rigs kun gyi gtso bo mdzad// sprul pa klu bran 'bum sde 'gyed// klu chen brgyad po spyan 'dren na// dkar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi nas// klu sman tshogs kyi bdud rtsi'i

bar// klu bsgrub le'u nas byung ba bzhin du dbul// kun la rim bzhin shes par bya// de nas sngags rings gong dang sbyar// hU/ klu chen brgyad po tshur nyon cig/ 'dud do yab cig klu la 'dud// dang po la
sogs gong dang sbyar// de rnams 'dul phyir yab cig khyed la 'dud// yab cig khyed kyang mthu ma chung// rigs 'dzin bcol ba'i las ma bul// 'dir spyaun 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las mdzod// rgyas pa'i ba

ling gtor ma 'bul// klu chen brgyad po 'od dang ldan gyur cig/ lho byang nas gzung nas de ring rjes kyi rdzas 'bul lo// zhes pa'i bar gyi gong dang mthun// de skad byas nas/ klu chen brgyad po tshur nyon

cig/ khyed kyis mi thon gang yang med/ khyed kyis mi phyin gang yang med/ khyed kyis mi rjes gang yang med// de ring mi dang glud du brjes// rjes grub pa'i las mdzod cig/ ces pa gong dang mthun// de ni klu chen

rim pa'o// maN+Dal bzhi pa'i rtsa ra phyin la/ hUM/ gnyan chen sde brgyad tshur nyon cig/ 'chi bdag gnyan chen 'bum sde 'gyed// gnyan chen kun gyi gtso bo byed// rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs tsam na// klu rigs
gnyan chen sde brgyad las// mdzo rtol 'bum gyi sprul pa 'gyed// 'dzam gling mi la gnod pa byed// gnyan chen sde brgyad spyan 'dren na// gzhan rnams klu chen brgyad dang mthun// de nas rgyal
rigs rjes chen bya// dkyil 'khor lnga pa'i rtsar phyin pa// ting 'dzin sgom pa gong dang mthun// hUM/ rgyal rigs klu tshogs tshur nyon cig/ rgyal rigs chen po 'chi bdag sde// shar bltas chu mig
dkar po nas// sbrul dang rtsang ba nya dang rta dang glang// chu lug dkar po la sogs 'byed// yid kyi dug chen 'phros pa yis// dgra bgegs ma lus mdze nad gtong// rgyal rigs klu tshogs spyan 'dren
na// gzhan rnams klu chen ji lta bar// kun la rim bzhin shes par bya// de nas bram ze klu tshogs nas// gdol can chen po'i 'chi bdag bar// rgyal rigs 'chi bdag dang sbyar// rigs lnga rjes kyi rim pa

rdzogs// de nas sa srin rjes chen bya// maN+Dal drug pa'i rtsar phyin la// ting 'dzin sgom pa gzhan dang mthun// hUM/ sa bdag sa srin klu tshogs tshur nyon cig/ sa bdag chen po 'chi bdag ste// ri dang rtsing bu
sgog tshigs gram skams sa dang// brag dang shing gcig rtsa nas ni// sa bdag chen po'i gnas chen nas// gyong po rgur po theng po dang// zha bo 'dzin gying dmar po byed// sa bdag nad chen dug dag
gis// dam nyams dgra bgegs nad kyis 'dzin// sa bdag klu tshogs spyan 'dren na// gzhan rnams klu chen ji bzhin mtshungs// des ni sa bdag rim pa rdzogs// de nas skabs su yon bdag gi na tsha thon

las rjes kyis byas la/ me tog gtor la khrus kyang bya'o// de nas 'di'i rjes kyang bya// hUM/ klu rigs ma lus tshur nyon cig/ nga ni phyag na rdo rje yin// gzi byin yag sha med dbal gyis// sprul pa cho 'phrul
stong yang 'gyed// ma lus mtha' yas ma lus rdzas// ma lus non dang ma lus snan// ma lus glud dang ma lus rjes// dam tshig bde mtshig ma lus dang/ khyed kyang ma lus dbang gis 'khor// sngar byas da mi

byed par gyis// mi dang glud dang rjes rdzas dang/ khyod kyis myur du rjes 'di gyis// gsang chen phyag na rdo rje dam ma 'dral// dam chos gnyan po lung ma bshig/ mthun pa'i dam rdzas ngo ma bzlogs// sngags

bdag rgyal po ngo chen mdzod/ khyod las ngo che gang yang med// rgyu sbyor yon bdag don gyi phyir// rjes 'di gnas su skyol bar mdzod// rgyal rigs nad rnams rjes gyur cig/ bram ze'i nad rnams rjes gyur
cig/ dmangs rigs nad rnams rjes gyur cig/ gdol can nad rnams rjes gyur cig/ gnyan gyi nad rnams rjes gyur cig/ sa bdag gnad rnams rjes gyur cig/ gdug rtsub thams cad rjes gyur cig/ mdze nad 'bras
nad phol mig dang// shu ba g.yan pa'i nad rnams rjes gyur cig/ mi dang dam rdzas brjes mdzod cig/ hUM/ klu chen rgyal po tshur nyon cig/ gnyan chen sde brgyad tshur nyon cig/ rgyal rigs klu yang
tshur nyon cig/ de bzhin rigs bzhi'i klu yang tshur nyon cig/ sa bdag sa srin tshur nyon cig/ de ring rjes 'di mi mdzad cing// de ring mi 'di mi gtong zhing// mi dang nad du mi 'bral

zhing// sngags ngor mi 'di mi gtong zhing// rigs 'dzin bka' las 'da' byed pa/ khyod kyi shi sa bstan pa ni// phyi ma'i lan chags rgyab nas 'ded// mi yi lan chags ngo la 'ded// mdze nad sna tshogs khyod

la 'ong// 'on pa long ba khyod la long// sngags kyi cho 'phrul khyod la 'ong// dar cig bsdad pa'i thabs med par// klad nad drag bos thebs par 'gyur// 'o na de la ma thug gis// 'dir spyon mchod rdzas 'di

bzhes la// rjes 'di gnas su skyol bar mdzod// rjes 'di gnas su skyol nas kyang// mi dang nad du 'phrel gyur cig/ mi dang glud du brjes mdzod cig/ de nas chu lug dgu po la// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan
nas kyang// rang rang rigs kyi gzugs brnyan g.yas su gdags// rjes kyi gzugs brnyan g.yon du gdags// rin chen phur pa rwa la gdags// skyong bu nyi shu khal du dgal// shog shog gur gyi steng du
dbub// rigs dang bstun pa'i dar sna gdags// rgyas pa'i gur du dbul bar bya// de nas phyogs dang bstun la gtang// de lta bu yi cho ga ni// 'dzam bu'i gling nas rnyed pa dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyi

dgongs pa yin// de nas sbyor dka' nub tu bca'// hoM shing shar du sbreng la gzhag/ sbyor ka'i cha rkyen rang sar gzhag/ hoM gyi cha rkyen hoM dang sbrag/ brgya rtsa brgyad kyi sbyor ba yis// bgegs rnams rdul du brlag

par bya// tha ma mnan dang thal ba rlung la bskur// sngon bzhin sbyar la shes par bya'o// de nas klu rtan spo bar bya'o// de nas rta gnyan po bsdam// des ni rjes chen rim pa rdzogs// de ltar sbyor ba rdzogs byas

nas// de lta bu yis tsi tsi dza la 'tsho bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis de skad gsungs// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ klu rjes gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes
gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// klu rgyal dbang bskur rim pa yis// slob ma byin gyis ji ltar brlab// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje ni/ khyod kyang
rtse cig yid kyi nyon/ khyod la nga yis bshad bar bya// mdzes shing nyam dga'i sa phyogs su// dkyil 'khor gzhung nas byung bzhin bri// gzugs brnyan mi dgos sa bon dgod// dar dang ras kyi yol pa
dgab// spos dang tsan dan dri yis dgang// gsang chen phyag rdor sny-ing po yis// sa sbyang bgegs bskrad la sogs bya// klu rgyal chen po'i sku bskyed la// lha la brten la sa slong bya// de nas maN+Dal
legs byas la// ba li rnam lngas byugs nas kyang// tsan dan ga pur la sogs dri yi byug/ gur kum chus kyang legs byug la// bdag gzhan gsal bar bskyed nas kyang// gsang chen bsnyen pa

'bum tsho re// klu rgyal dag la bsnyen pa bskyal// rgyas pa'i gtor ma rgyun mi 'chad// des kyang dngos grub chen po thob// des ni bsnyen pa'i rim pa rdzogs// de nas lhag par gnas byas te// de la yang ni rnam
gnyis te// bum pa'i lhag par gnas pa dang// slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o// de la dang por bshad par bya// dang po dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri// gzugs brnyan mi dgod sa bon dgod// gser ma dngul

lam zangs sam lcags// yang na rin chen sa gzhi'o// rtsa ba nag sogs med pa yi// bum pa lnga yang dgod par bya// bum pa'i snying po gser dngul lam// sbrang dang 'o ma bu ram dang// 'bru sna tshogs par byas

la bsgrub par bya'o/ kha tshar ma nyams ras kyis dkri// shing lo shun pa'i kha brgyan bya// mi re'i gtor ma gnyis bshams la// mchod pa rnam pa lnga yang tshogs par bya// bdud rtsi bum pa sngon bzhin bya// ze zhal

gnyis kyang bsham par bya// spos dang tsan dan dri sogs kyis// dkyil 'khor khang pa dag par bya// de ni brgyan gyi lor mo'o// de nas shUn+ya tA'i sngags brjod pas// bdag dang maN+Dal stong par sgom// de nas

hUM las phyag rdor sku// snga ma ji bzhin bsgom par bya// de nas klu tshogs mang po kun// snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya// bsnyen pa 'bum tsho bskyal bar bya// bum pa re'i nang du/ khri tsho re re bskyal bar bya// des

ni bum pa lhag gnas rdzogs// de nas slob ma lhag gnas bya// slob ma'i gtso bo 'di skad do// ho/ bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yin// gnyis med thugs rjes gzung slad du// bdag
kyang rtag tu skyabs su gsol// dkyil 'khor dam par bdag gzhug phyir// lhag nas rim pa mdzad du gsol// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad du// bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ khyod ni tshul chen snod yin

te// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// dbang bskur dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir// dbang bskur dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// lha gnas rim pa tshul bzhin bya// spu ta stong tsam bzlas par bya// de nas dkyil

'khor lho nub phyogs su// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// pad+ma'i dbus su sngags bdag dgod// phyag na rdo rje gzugs brnyan bzhag/ de nas phyag na rdo rje la// mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya// sngags kyi
bdag po de dang mtshungs// dang por slob ma lha la phyag gsum byed du gzhug/ thal mo sbyar nas mdun du gzhag/ de nas slob dpon 'di skad do// bu tshur nyon cig snod ldan khyod// dpal phyag na

rdo rje'i grong khyer du// bu yang rab tu gnas bya zhing// rtag tu dam tshigs srung pa gsum// klu yi mchod pa byed nus sam// phyag rdor sku ru sprul pa byed nus sam// de ltar nus na bu khyod la// lhag

gnas dngos grub nga yis sbyin// de nas slob mas gsol ba// ho bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// ji ltar lung bsgo rim pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgo ba yis// rtag tu dam tshig bdag gi bskyang// ting nge
'dzin dang mchod pa dang// las kyi bzlas brjod bdag gis bgyi// bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol// de nas slob dpon dag gis kyang// slob ma phyag gsum byed du gzhug/ de nas bla mas slob ma

ni// dpal ldan phyag rdor sku ru bskyed// de nas mchod pa rnam lnga ni// sngags bdag phyag na rdo rje la// lad mo zlos shing slob mas dbul// hUM/ dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dang// sngags kyi bdag po rnam gnyis
la// dus tshod bzang po do nod kyang// rigs 'dzin dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// byin gyis brlab phyir rnam lnga yis// mchod pa dag kyang bdag gis dbul// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// de

nas sngags rings dag gis ni// me tog nas gzung gtor ma'i bar// rnam lnga re la tshigs bshad te// sngags rings tshar res dbul bar bya// badzra d+hU be/ badzra puSh+pe/ badzra A lo ke/ badzra gan d+he/ badzra mA le/ de

nas rigs ngo brtag pa'i phyir// so shing dag kyang 'dor du gzhug/ bla mas 'di skad so shing sbyin// bu khyod grong khyor dam pa ru// bzhugs nas rigs kyang brtag ba'i phyir// sor brgyad tshad ldan gtsang ma'i
shing// so shing bzung nas dbus su dor// slob mas gsol ba/ ho/ bla ma'i lung ni bsgo ba bzhin// so shing dag kyang bdag gis dor// ji ltar dpal ldan phyag rdor gyi// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes
kyi// dngos grub rnam bzhi thugs kyis ni// dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir// dbus mchog dga' ldan sar ltung shog/ so shing dor ba'o// de nas bsrung skud gdags par bya// bla mas gsungs pa/ bu khyod

nyon cig skal ldan khyod// dngos grub bgegs kyis bar chod byed// bgegs rnams kun las bzlog pa'i phyir// dpal ldan phyag rdor snying po yis// brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags srad bu la// mdud pa nyi shu rtsa lnga
bya// g.yon gyi dpung du gdags pa yis// bgegs rnams ma lus zhi gyur cig/ slob mas gsol pa/ ho/ ji ltar bla mas gsungs pa yi/ khro rgyal sngags bzlas srad bu yis// bdag gi lus rnams bsrungs
gyur nas// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rnams kun// rdul phran bzhin du brlag nas kyang// dpal ldan phyag rdor skur gyur nas// sku yi dngos grub thob 'gyur shog/ bsrung skud btags te/ de nas ku sha
dgram par yang bya'o// bla mas gsungs pa/ bu tshur nyon cig rigs mchog khyod// zab mo sngags dang sgom pa yang// dngos grub rtags ni 'byung mi 'byung// 'jug pa'i dus su rmi lam
gyis// bzang ngan ltas rnams brtag pa'i phyir// ku sha gtsang ma'i rtswa mchog dang/ khyod kyi sngas su gding bar bya// slob mas gsol pa/ ho/ bla mas bstan pa'i rdzas/ nyal ba'i sngas su bdag 'dings

gyis// phyag na rdo rje'i lus zhugs nas// klu rgyal dngos grub bdag bsgrub kyi// grub rtags ma lus dngos grub kyang// sngags bdag rgyal pos do nod ston// nyal nas nang par sngon de ni// rmi lam ci byung

bzlas par bya// rmi lam yang ni rnam gnyis te// dngos su 'ong dang sprul pa 'gyed// dngos ni khye'u chung gzhon nu 'ong// yang na sbrul mgo bdun par 'ong// de rnams bdag la mgo ba dang// byung na rmi lam rab

tu bzang// g.yag chen mang po 'ded pa 'ong// chu rta chu lug chu glang du// byung bzhin bdag gis byed na bzang// de ltar dngos su sprul pa'i rtags// 'ded dang lus la 'khril la sogs// byung na ngan pas
bsnyen pa bzlas// de ni slob ma lha gnas rdzogs// de nas nang par dro la ni// dbang bskur rim pa rdzogs byas nas// dad ldan slob ma mdzes pa des// rim pa bzhin du khrus byas la// dar dmar dag gis
mig bkab la// dkyil 'khor drung du phyag gsum bya// de nas thal mo legs sbyar la// tshig bshad 'di ni bzlas su gzhug/ ho/ bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dus tshod bzang po da nang ni// bdag gis lus
ngag dad dang ldan// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dang// sngags bdag la sogs klu rnams kyi// grong khyer dam par bdag gzhug gsol/ khyed ni sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dpa' bo chen po bdag gzhug
gsol// mdzes pa'i 'gro mchog ma mthongs bas// da nang bdag kyang rab tu gzhug/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag gzhug gsol// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do// bu khyod legs so legs

so// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dang// sngags bdag la sogs grong khyer 'dir/ khyod kyang nga yi rab tu gzhug/ khyod kyang dad pa rab tu skyed// mthun pa'i dam rdzas khyed kyis sbyin// dus mchog bzang po da nang
nas// nam ji srid 'tsho yi bar du/ khyod kyang ci 'dod dngos grub 'ong// yid gnyis med par 'dir zhugs shig/ de nas khro bo'i chu la ni// gsang chen phyag rdor sngags bzlas la// slob ma'i lus bgegs

rnams bskrad// de nas phyag gsum byed du gzhug/ de nas dang po lho phyogs su bkri// slob mas 'di skad brjod par bya// hUM/ dpal ldan phyag rdor grong khyer du// lho yi phyogs la rab brten nas// yon bdag
dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// lus ngag yid gsum dang ba yis// bdag kyang phyag gsum rab tu 'tshal// de nas thal mo sbyar byas nas// oM na ma te hUM/ na ma me hUM/ na mo na ma swAhA/ de ltar sku
gsung thugs kyis ni// phyag gsum dad pas byed du gzhug/ de nas shar phyogs su khrid la// ho/ dpal ldan phyag rdor grong khyer gyi// shar gyi phyogs ni nas rab brten nas// sku yi dngos grub thob bya'i

phyir// lus ngag yid gsum dang ba'i phyir// bdag kyang phyag ni rab tu 'tshal// de nas thal mo de nyid snying khar sbyar la// oM na ma she hUM/ na ma me hUM/ na mo na mo na ma swAhA/ de ltar sku gsung thugs kyis

ni// phyag gsum dang bas byed du gzhug/ de nas rab tu byang khrid la/ ho/ dpal ldan phyag rdor grong khyer gyi// byang gi phyogs la rab brten nas// 'phrin las dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// lus ngag yid gsum

dngas pa yis// bdag kyang phyag ni rab tu 'tshal// de nas thal mo de nyid snying khar sbyar la// A+oM na ma she hUM/ na ma me hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swAhA/ de nas sku gsung thugs kyis ni// phyag gsum dang bas byed du

gzhug/ de nas nub tu rab khrid la// ho/ dpal ldan phyag rdor grong khyer gyi// nub kyi phyogs la rab brten nas// gsung gi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// lus ngag yid gsum dang ba yis// bdag kyang phyag

gsum rab tu 'tshal// de nas thal mo de nyid snying khar sbyar// oM na ma she hUM/ na ma me hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swAhA/ phyag bya'o// de nas me tog legs bskur te// lag tu thogs la 'di skad brjod// phyag rdor grong du
bdag mchi'o// dpal ldan sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dngos grub ni// yang dag bdag gis thob bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dbus su bdag dor gyis// phyag rdor sku la phog par shog/ de skad rjod la dbus

su ni// brtan la phab la rab tu bshad// sbu ta la pra ti dza ho// me tog dor ba'o// de nas slob mas 'di skad do// dus mchog bzang po da nang yang// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dkyil 'khor bzang po bstan

du gsol// dpal ldan phyag rdor grong khyer mchog/ nad la sogs pa zhi byed pa'i// mdzes ldan grong khyer pad tshal du// bdag kyang rab tu lta bar 'tshal// mig kyang rab tu dbye ru gsol// de nas slob dpon

gyis 'di skad rab tu brjod do// bu khyod skal ldan da nang yang// grong khyer chen po ngas bstan gyis/ khyod kyang dga' ba rab tu skyed// mun la mar me ji bzhin du// ma rig mun pa bsal nas kyang// ye shes
mig gis 'jig rten kun// gsal zhing dngas pas khyod kyis ltos// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// mig mchog bzang po da nang dbye// mig dbye ba'o// me tog mgo la btags la// dpal ldan phyag rdor
sku gsung thugs// yon tan mchog dang 'phrin las dang// sngags kyi bdag po dbang mchog rnams// rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya// de nas dad ldan phyag byas nas// dkyil 'khor klu tshogs

bstan par bya// yang ni phyag gsum byas nas kyang// thal mo sbyar te 'di skad do// ho/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor chen po yang// bla mas bdag kyang lta ba la// rab tu rgyas par bstan pa legs// bdag gis kyang
ni mdzes par mthong// da ni bla mas dbang bskur yang// dpa' bo chen pos bskur du gsol// bdag kyang dga' ba rab tu bskyed// de nas skabs der dam tshig chu yang blud par bya'o// klu sman 'o ma bcas
pa'i chu// g.yon du thogs la 'di skad do// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par bye// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob// ye shes chu bo'i bdud rtsi 'di// nga yis

khyod la blud pa yis/ khyod kyang bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyon// dam tshig srung ba'i las rnams kyis// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ blud par bya bar the tsom med// de nas dbang bskur rim pa bya// phyag gsum byas nas thal sbyar bya// lho yi
phyogs su khri btsigs la/ khri yi steng du slob ma gzhag/ de la phyag rdor sngags bdag gi/ dbang rnams rim bzhin rdzogs par bskur// de nas bla mas dbus kyi ni// bum pa blang la mgor gzhag la// tshig

bshad 'di yang brjod par bya// hUM/ dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// sku yi dbang mchog thob bya'i phyir// skal ldan khyod la bskur bar bya// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan

dang// 'phrin las dbang mchog rnam lnga las// sku yi dbang mchog bskur ba yis// sku yi dbang mchog thob gyur cig/ sku yi dbang mchog thob nas kyang// phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas/ khyod kyi sku mchog thob

pa yis// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kun// zug rngu tsam yang med gyur cig/ de skad byas la slob ma yang// phyag rdor sku ru byin gyis brlabs// oM spu ta spu ta mahA krod+ha hUM/ sid+hi sid+hi spo ta ya hUM phaT/

kA ya badzra swAhA/ dus mchog bzang po de ring nas// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ khyod kyang phyag rdor sku ru byas// klu tshogs mang pos tshugs mi 'gyur// de nas bum chu spyi bor blugs// des ni phyag rdor sku ru

'gyur// de nas shar gyi bum pa bteg la// snying kha dag tu rab bzhag nas// hUM/ dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// thugs kyi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// skal ldan khyod la bskur bar bya// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje
yi// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las dbang mchog rnam lnga las// thugs kyi dbang mchog bskur ba yis// thugs kyi dbang mchog thob gyur cig/ thugs kyi dbang mchog thob nas kyang// phyag
rdor thugs dang ldan gyur cig/ khyod kyi dbang mchog nos pa yis// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kun// zug rngu tsam yang med gyur cig/ de skad byas la slob ma yang// phyag rdor thugs su

byin gyis brlab// oM spu ta spu ta mahA kro ta hUM/ sid+hi sid+hi spo ta ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta badzra swAhA/ tsit+ta badzra swAhA// dus mchog bzang po nam langs nas// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ khyod kyang phyag rdor thugs su

byas// klu tshogs mang pos tshugs mi 'gyur// de nas bum chu snying khar blug/ des ni phyag na rdo rje yi// thugs su gyur par the tshom med// de nas lho'i bum pa bteg la// lte ba'i dbus su rab gzhag la// hUM/

las kyi phyag na rdo rje yi// yon tan dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// skal ldan khyod la bskur bar bya// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las dbang mchog rnam lnga
las// yon tan dbang mchog bskur ba yis// yon tan dbang mchog thob gyur cig/ yon tan dbang mchog thob nas kyang// phyag rdor yon tan ldan gyur cig/ khyod kyi yon tan brjod pa yis// bgegs dang

log 'dren thams cad kun// zug rngu tsam yang med gyur cig/ de skad byas la slob ma la// phyag rdor yon tan byin brlabs bya// oM spu ta spu ta mahA kro d+ha hUM/ sid+hi sid+hi sbo ta ya hUM phaT// tsit+ta badzra swAhA/ dus

mchog bzang po de ring nas// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ khyod kyang phyag rdor yon tan byas// klu tshogs mang pos tshugs mi 'gyur// de nas bum chu lte bar blugs// des ni phyag rdor yon tan grub// de nas nub
kyi bum pa bteg la// ske'i mgrin par rab gzhag nas// hUM/ dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// gsung gi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// skal ldan khyod la bskur bar bya// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// sku
gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las dbang mchog rnam lnga las// gsung gi dbang mchog bskur ba yis// gsung gi dbang mchog thob gyur cig/ gsung gi dbang mchog thob nas kyang// phyag rdor
gsung dang ldan nas kyang/ khyod kyi nga rgyal brjod tsam gyis// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kun// zug rngu tsam yang med gyur cig/ de skad byas la slob ma yang// phyag rdor gsung du byin gyis

brlab// oM spu ta spu ta mahA krod+ha hUM/ sid+hi sid+hi sbo ta ya hUM phaT/ kA ya badzra swAhA/ dus mchog bzang po de ring nas// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ khyod kyang phyag rdor gsung du byas// klu tshogs mang pos tshugs mi
'gyur// de nas bum chu mgrin bar blugs// de nas byang gi bum pa bteg la// gsang ba'i gnas su rab gzhag la// hUM/ dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// 'phrin las dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// skal
ldan khyod la bskur bar bya// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las dbang mchog rnam lnga las// 'phrin las dbang mchog bskur ba yis// 'phrin las
dbang mchog thob gyur cig/ 'phrin las dbang mchog thob nas kyang/ khyod kyis 'phrin las brtsams pa yis// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kun// zug rngu tsam yang med gyur cig/ de skad byas la slob

ma yang// phyag rdor 'phrin las byin gyis brlabs// oM spu ta spu ta mahA krod+ha hUM phaT/ sid+hi sid+hi spau ta ya hUM phaT/ karma ni swAhA/ dus mchog bzang po de ring nas// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ khyod kyang phyag rdor
'phrin las byas// klu tshogs mang pos tshugs mi 'gyur// de nas bum chu gsang bar blugs// de ni phyag rdor 'phrin las grub// de nas sngags bdag dbang yang bskur// sbrul mgo bdun pa'i gzugs brnyan

ni// slob ma'i mdun du nges par gzhag/ tshig bshad 'di yang brjod par bya// bu tshur nyon cig dbang ldan khyod la// phyag rdor sku ru khyod byas te// klu rgyal chen po grub pa'i gzugs// bran dang khol po yang

g.yog dang// 'bangs dang tshul du sngon du gtang/ khyod kyis rtag tu 'di sgrubs shig/ klu yi dam tshig khyod kyis srung// klu yi snying po khyod kyis zlos// ku yi gtor ma rgyas pa khyod kyis thong// rgyas pa'i klu sgrub
byed pa'i tshe// 'dod chags bsnol dang brtsog kyang spong// dkar gsum zas dang dngar gsum zas// ba dmar 'o ma khyod kyis sten// dam tshig mchod pa gsang sngags zlos// gnyen po bsgrub pa yun

ma thung// 'on tam 'bras bu grub nas kyang// ci 'dod dngos grub gter bar 'gyur// oM spu ta spu ta mahA krod+ha hUM/ sid+hi sid+hi spo ta ya hUM phaT swAhA/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlos su gzhug/ de ni sngags bdag mdun du
ni// bran gyi dngos po mchis par bsam// de nas gtor ma'i dbang bskur sbyin/ khro rgyal sngags bdag dges bya'i phyir// yo byad 'tshogs pa'i ba ling 'di// byin gyis brlabs nas khyod la gtad/ khyod kyis

kyang ni rtag tu thong// de nas kyang dngos grub bar chod srung// de nas bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur te// klu rnams gsol mdzad bdud rtsi'i sman// ma lus 'tshogs pa'i bdud rtsi 'di/ khyod kyis 'dul ba'i dbang

bskur gyis/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu 'bul// des kyang dngos grub chen por 'gyur// de nas sngags kyi dbang bskur te// gsang chen phyag rdor snying po yis// klu rnams ma lus zil gyis gnon// phyi bsgrub
nang bsgrub gsang sngags kyis// mtha' yas 'bum phrag las rnams 'grub// bsgrubs na lha yang 'grub par nges// bskrad na lha yang skrod par nges// sbyor ba ci bsams 'grub par
'gyur// sngags rings gsang sgrub phyi dang nang// shog bu dag la bris la lag tu gtad/ khyed kyang rtag tu rgyun ma gcad// de nas gtor ma gnyis po gtang// sngags bdag phyag na rdo rje
yi// 'bras chen la sogs rnams kyang gtang// bdud rtsi bum pa kun kyang dbul// de nas phyag gsum byed du gzhug/ tshig bshad 'di yang brjod du gzhug/ ho/ bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang// dpal ldan phyag
na rdo rje dang// sngags bdag la sogs klu tshogs kyis// spyan sngar ji ltar dam nos pa// de ltar bdag gis dbang yang thob// dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar// bdag kyang phyag na rdo rje
las// sngags bdag la sogs bran du byas// de ltar brjod pa'i bla ma la// gser dang dngul dang byu ru dang// mu tig man shes a ka ru// zangs lcags 'khar ba'i rgyan can dang// gser g.yu bang mdzod

'bru sna dang// dar dang za 'og gnas dang khyim// yul zhing ba lang glang po che// rta mchog ba mo rta rgod dang// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ bdag rang gis kyang sna drangs nas// yid 'thad gces pa'i nor
rnams kyang// bla ma la ni dbul bar bya// nor dang dbul ba'o// de nas bum chu kun bsdoms la// slob ma rnams la khrus bya// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' phyir bzlog

la// sa tshon phyags la chu la dbo// de ltar dbang mchog zab mo ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyis rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// 'khor lo dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ khog dbub rim pa ji ltar bgyi// bdag gis ma 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so
dpal ldan phyag na rdor/ khyod la nga yis bstan par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bca' ba rdzas dang byug pa rgyan// gnyen po'i gshed dang bsgrub pa sngags// rgyan gdan gzugs dang rten
bca'// ngan sngags byad btson du bzung// ma grub spogs pa'i cho ga yis// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor bar bya// bca' ba rdzas la rnam pa bcu ste// nyung kar gu gul dkar po dang// ske tshe mi sha ga pur

dang// rma bya'i mdongs dang btsan dug ra// rgya tsha rang gi ga pur dgu// gla rtsi dang ni rdzas rnams kun// sha ba'i pags pa'i khug ma ru// blug la mchan khung g.yon du gdags// byug pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo

ni// nang gi bum pa bcas te// zangs kyi 'gun de nang du ni// klu yod chu mig dgu yi chu// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu dang ni// gangs kyi 'khyag pa bzhu ba'i chu// chu bzhi gzhi blangs bum pa bca'// bum pa'i nang du a

ru ra// skyu ru ra dang ba ru ra// sbrang dang bu ram ba mar 'o ma dang// phag pa khyi dkar 'o ma dang// lug smug 'o ma dang// rta dang khyi dkar dang// sngar med gzhon nu mdzes pa yi// 'o ma rnams kyang

blug par bya// gla rtsi dag dang ga pur dang// klu sman sna tshogs 'bru sna tshogs// bum pa'i nang du blugs par bya// bum pa ras sngon dag gis gril// man 'dzi dag gi kha ru gzhag/ bsnyen sngags 'bum tsho bzlas

par bya// de nas skabs su phyi khrus legs byas la// me long du bum pa'i chu sgo nga re// blug nas gu gul dkar po dang// 'dag pa byas la lus kyi gnad du bsku// bsku ba la yang rnam gnyis te// gnas lnga srung

zhing rtsa bzhi gnan// de yang bla ma'i zhal la shes// gsang chen phyag rdor snying po bzlas// mthe bong tsam gyi sku yang bsgom// de ltar byug pa byas nas kyang// klu rigs kun gyis tshugs mi 'gyur// a+thi+-i/ gnyen po

gshed kyi 'khor lo yang// rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya// phyi bsgrub dus su phyag rdor sku// nang bsgrub dus su byang khyung ka ru bzla// de gnyis grub na sngags bdag grub// bsgrub pa'i sngags ni phyi nang ngo// a+thi+-i/

rgyan dam pa gzugs kyi 'khor lo ni// ya la tho bya rma bya lnga// mgo ba'i phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga// legs par nan tan gzugs par bya// de yang gnyen pa'i rjes su shes// a+thi+-i/ rten bca' ba yi 'khor lo
ni// ris su bris dang lugs su blug/ 'bur du gtod dang rgyan chen btags// spyan dbye la sogs ji bzhin bya// de yang brten bcas de'i le'u las shes// a+thi+-i/ ngan sngags byad la gnyis te// bgegs la

sngags rgod gdags pa dang// dgra la gdags pa gnyis yin te// bgegs kyi sngags la sngags chen po// brgya dang bcu dgu'i drag sngags kyis// klu rgyal chen po'i snying bskul nas// dam nyams 'byung po rdul

du lhogs// dgra la gdags pa 'bum yod de// nang bsgrub nang nas shes par bya// a+thi+-i/ drag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba la// rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya// bskor ba'i tshul du bskor ba dang// dkrugs pa'i

tshul du bskor ba dang// de yang dkrugs pa'i le'u las shes par bya'o// a+thi+-i/ de ltar phyi yi 'khor lo dgu// zab mo sbyor ba'i man ngag ste// kun gyis shes na ngo mtshar med// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs byung

ba'o// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ 'khor lo dgu khog dbub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// brgya dang bcu dgu'i drag

sngags kyis// bsnyen pa'i sham bu byas nas kyang// ji ltar 'byung po tshar gcad pa// bdag gis ma 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yi bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse

gcig yid kyis nyon// bsnyen sngags sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// shin tu che ba'i bgegs rnams la// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba tsom// oM spu ta spu ta nA ga ra dza tshe tshe nA rA dza 'ur 'ur/ nA ga rA dza

myags myags/ nA ga rA dza hur hur/ nA ga ra dza nan/ phu yu/ tan tu pa/ nag po bam tsi tsi rgyas/ trag thur snying la gul gul/ myags myags/ rtsa bzhi bskum/ shan shan srog la shan/ tsha byung nag po sod/ mA ra ya

rbud/ thig sha pra be sha ya rbud/ tsi tsi tri pa li mi li ka/ 'dar 'dar hUM hUM phaT// ni sha mahA krod+ha hUM phaT/ ha zhen ha zhen/ nA ga zhen na ga zhen/ nA ga rA dza ku ma ra b+h+yo/ brgya dang bcu dgu'i las kyis ni// dgra
bgegs thams cad thal bar gtong// stong tsho gcig tu bzlas gyur na// lha chen tshangs pa'ang 'chi 'gyur na// gnod byed bgegs la smos ci dgos// 'dzam bu'i gling nas rnyed par dka'// rtog pa'i rgyal po
mchod rten gyis rgyud las/ drag sngags drag pos bgegs tshar gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// 'khor lo dkrugs pa'i rim pa

yis// sngags bdag bran zhing ji ltar bgyi// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// shog bu gro ga ras
dag la// gur kum chu yis 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad phyi rim mu khyud gsum// rim pa ji bzhin bskor bar bya// de yi phyi rim me ris bskor// 'khor lo'i lte bar sngags bdag gzugs// gur gum chu yis

tshad ldan bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la spu ta'i sngags bri// sngags kyi god snyoms dgod par bya// phyi rol mu khyud dang po la// sngags rings dag gis bskor bar bya// de nas nang gi mu khyud la// gsang bsgrub

bsngags kyis bskor bar bya// de yi nang gi mu khyud la/ khyi rgya dub pa'i sngags kyis bskor// de nas bdag gzhan bskyed par bya// sgo ba'i rim pa byas nas ni// zangs sam 'khar ba'i ga 'ur gzhug/ g.yam

khang gru bzhi'i nang du gzhug/ rtag tu spos dang tsan dan byug/ dam tshig mi yi sel mi gzhug/ rang nyid gsang bsgrub bsnyen rdzogs nas// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor bar bya// de nas mtshams gcad bsnyen pa

dang// de nas las kyi 'khor lo dkrug/ dang po rig byed rgyal po gzhug/ de rting khro bo'i sa bon gnyis// de rting khro bo chen po gzhag/ de rting drag po'i gzir ba gzhag/ de rting drag pos sa bon gzhag/ de rting
dngos grub snying po gzhag/ de rting nA ga'i snying po gzhag/ de rting zhi ba'i sa bon gzhag/ phyi bskor sku yi drag sngags kyis// klu rnams ma lus bskrad par 'gyur// de nas nang gi rim pa la// dang
po sa bon gnyis pa gzhag/ de rting rig byed rgyal po gzhag/ de rting drag po gzir ba gzhag/ de rting chen po'i khro bo gzhag/ de rting dngos grub snying po gzhag/ de rting drag po'i sa bon gzhag/ de

rting nA ga'i snying po gzhag/ de rting zhi ba'i sa bon gzhag/ nang bskor gsung gi drag sngags kyis// klu rnams ma lus brgyal bar 'gyur// de nas thugs kyi rim pa la// dang por khro bo chen por bzhag/ de rting

rig pa'i rgyal po gzhag/ de rting sa bon gnyis pa gzhag/ de rting drag po'i gzir ba gzhag/ de rting dngos grub snying po gzhag/ de rting sa bon gcig pa gzhag/ de rting nA ga'i snying po gzhag/ de rting zhi ba'i sa
bon gzhag/ gsang bskor thugs kyi drag sngags kyis// klu rnams ma lus brlag par 'gyur// de ltar 'khor lo bskor byas nas// gsang sngags gnyis kyang brlag par 'gyur// ting 'dzin sngags sbyor rgyun mi
gcad// bdag nyid lha mchog skur gsal bsgom// de ltar byas nas sngags bdag ni// bran gyi dngos por dngos su 'ong// klu gtor rgyas pa rtag tu gtang// zla ba gsum du bskor gyur na// dngos su skad ngan
'ong// rtags kyi mtshan ma mi stas kun// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ sngags bdag las ma btub na drag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bco lnga
pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// zhu 'dul rim pa ji ltar lags// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis
bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// dang por bdag gzhan legs bskyed la// thugs khar sngags kyi 'phreng ba bsam// de nas dam la btags pa'i tshe// drag po sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// nad

pa'i rma tshogs bsregs nas kyang// nad kyi dngos po gang yin pa// bya sgro thab tu tshig ltar bsgom// de nas sngags de rang la 'dus// snga ma bas kyang gzi mdangs che// zho rkyal bzhin du bdag nyid bsam// de

'bra'i sbyor ba zab mo ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi brnyes so// rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ zhu 'dul gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can/ khrus kyi
bum pa ji ltar lags// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bstan par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// dang po dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i

rtsar// gser dngul zangs lcags bum pa ru// gtsang ma'i chu dang ba mar 'o ma ru// a ru ra dang skyu ru ra// bu ram sbrang dang ga pur mu tig shel// bum pa'i snying po 'tshogs par blug/ de nas bum pa bskyed bya
ste// dang po stong nyid ting 'dzin sgom// de nas b+h+raM las ban d+ha ni// rin chen gzhal yas bsgom par bya// de nas dbus su hUM las phyag na rdo rje'i sku// snga ma ji bzhin bsgom par bya// ye shes
sems dpa' bkug la bstim par bya// de nas nyungs kar dag la bzlas la bum par blug/ khro chung mtshon cha can du bsgom par bya// de nas nang par sngon de ru// nad pa khrus byas dbyung bar bya// sngags
bzlas zhu 'dul der yang bsam// mtha' rten shan ting ku ru gdags// de na gnyid kyi spogs kyang thon// rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ bum pas khrus sbyor bas gnyis kyi spogs 'don pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun
pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// rmi lam rtags dang rmi lam spogs// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdor/ khyod la nga
yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// sbrul dang sbal pa lcong mo chu lug chu rta chu glang mdzod dang rtol/ sdig pa rtsangs pa sre mo byi ba/ khyi dang phag pa nya khyi ba// sdom

dang kha brgyad byi la dang// chu dang bud med ral pa can// sems can ma rung sna tshogs dang/ khye'u gzhon nu mang po dang// skyes pa gzhon nu mang po dang// g.yag chen 'bum sde 'gyed pa dang// 'ded dang nor rnams bka' ba dang// bdag
gir byed dang shul du 'ong// shin tu bzang por rab tu bshad// de rnams lus la 'khris pa dang// ded dang rdeg dang za ba dang// bdag la gzugs mi sdug pa ston// rmi lam la sogs yin shin tu ngan// de
rnams 'don pa'i rim pa ni// gang byung gzugs brnyan legs byas la// maN+Dal khar bzhag mchod pa legs par 'bul// dug sbrul dug rnams 'don zhing dngos la rma byas byab// des ni rmi lam spogs

rnams thon// yang dag lus ni thal bar nyigs par bsgom// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ rmi lam gyi spog 'don pa dang/ rmi lam gyi rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas phyag
na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// klu rgyal las kyi sngags sbyor gyis// klu gnyan bgegs sogs ma lus pa// thun sngags bco brgyad ji ltar brab// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du

gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdor/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// oM badzra nA ga rA dza nA ga pu me sa kra badzra yag sha krod+ha nA ga ma ra ya phaT/ oM badzra tig sna nA ga ra

dza sa ma ya/ khad kha phu mes kra mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga ra dza tsakra nA ga pu ma sa kra mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza gar na sa ta nA ga phu me sa kra ma ra ya phaT/ nA ga ra dza mud ka ra ya krod+ha ya nA ga pu me sa kra ma ra ya

phaT/ nA ga rA dza ga to rang nA ga pu me sa kra ma ra ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza thibs thibs/ mugs mugs nA ga pu me sa kra mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza ra ga nA ga pu me sa kra mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza ra ka sha

nA ga pu me sa pra mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza ma du dmig rag sha nA ga pu me sa kra mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga rA dze badzra ka ra ma badzra mad kar stong thog rag sha pa/ ta ling du me rag sha nA ga sha mA ra ya phaT/ a ga ni dz+wa raM

krod+ha mA ra ya phaT/ ag ne pra b+h+yo b+h+yo phaT/ ag ni dz+wa la mA ra ya Ta/ raM dz+wa la raM mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza nA ga zhung zhung/ rbad mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza kI la ya pu me sa kra mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza pa ltar chem

pus me sa kra ma ra ya phaT/ drag po las kyi thun sngags te/ bco brgyad las kyi gzer sngags te/ 'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yang yin/ nA ga rA dza staM pa ya/ nA ga rA dza u

ta ra tsa a/ nA ga rA dza ma ra ya/ nA ga rA dza aM gu sha ya/ nA ga ra dza ba sha ho/ nA ga rA dza zhib shan ting ku ru ye swAhA/ nA ga rA dza kra se/ nA ga rA dza bi sha ba ya/ nA ga rA dza ta pa ta ye/ nA ga rA dza pra star/ nA ga rA dza

sbar na phaT/ nA ga rA dza hUM/ nA ga rA dza chem chem/ rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ drag po sngags dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje

can/ khyi brgya du ba la sogs kyis// klu rgyal chen po ji ltar bsgrub// bdag gi ming 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis

nyon// dang por bdag gzhan legs bskyed la// bka' bsgo rim pa byas nas ni/ khyi rgyab dub pa'i bsnyen pa drang// de bshad pa'i bsgrub pa rnams// sbu ti'i las bzhin 'dir kyang mthun/ khyad par las phrag
bcu gcig bshad// de nas klu'i rgyal po khros pa dang/ dgra thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ gtum po rnams srung bar byed pa'i cho ga brjod par bya'o// nyungs kar

dang/ ba'i lci ba dang/ gcin dang sbyar la/ klu'i rgyal po sbrul mgo bdun pa la li khris bskus te dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la/ rkang pa gnyis kyis steng du gnan te stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ dbyar

gyi tshe na sad dang rlung 'bab pa rnams la/ spyi bor rdo rje bsnun la/ de'i tshe rlung dang/ sad dang/ mi bzad pa rnams 'bebs par mi byed cing/ ji tsam gzugs brnyan gyi bar du ser ba phyis kyang mi 'byung
ngo// seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa la/ brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i sngags bzlas te/ lus kyi dkyil du legs par btab na/ sad dang/ rlung dang/ sprin rnams kun bsdom par gdon mi za'o// dus dus
su na gas char kyang 'bebs// gang du klu rgyal gzugs mthong dor// me tog lo ma 'bras bu der// kun yang gnod par mi byed do// rnam par 'jig par mi byed do// gzugs de gang yod mthong
ba na// thams cad tshig ste 'bros par 'gyur// 'on te dgra rnams gzhom par 'dod na/ sa bon bdun pa pu dag bsres la/ lan tshwa nag po dang de la bsre/ de la gzugs brnyan byas te/ brgya rtsa brgyad du

bzlas brjod byas la/ tsi ti snying pa'i nang du gnan/ gang gi ming bcug na mkhon dang mi srun zhing/ dbang du gyur nas skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur// bran du gyur nas bdag la 'go bar 'gyur// 'on te bskrad

par 'dod na/ hoM gi thal ba dag la ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya// gtor na nges par bskrad do// 'on te de nyid gsad par 'dod na// seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad du byas la/ brgya rtsa

brgyad pa'i sngags snying khar btab nas kyang/ ri bo'i rtser bskyal na zhag gsum gyis 'chi/ phur bu de nyid lha khang dag tu btsugs na thams cad 'tshig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ bskrad dang grong khyer gzhom

par 'dod na// lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad tshad byas la// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas la// grong khyer rA dza 'gu li sgor// btsugs ma thag tu grong khyer 'jig/ gnod pa gang yang smin par 'gyur// de nyid
dur khrod du bcug nas ni// srin po yi dags gnod sbyin gyis/ khyim rnams thal ba rdul bzhin gtong// klu yod mtshor btsugs khyim rnams rdul du rlog/ 'di bzhin du yid kyis bsam pa'i las 'bum sde dag

kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ khyad par gyi las bcu gcig pa'o// gang gis shes na kun kyang 'grub// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ khyi rgya dub pa kho'i khyad par gyi las bcu gcig pa bstan pa'i le'u ste
nyi shu pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// sbyin sreg la sogs rim pa yis// 'byung po gnod bgegs ji ltar 'dul// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du
gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// dben pa'i gnas su rab 'dug la// dkyil 'khor 'brub khung gru gsum rko/ gru gsum kha la

kha khyer bya/ kha khyer gru re gru gsum re// re re kha ru ling kha re// mgo phyir la bstan la gzhag/ kha khyer dag la rtsang gis bskor// brub khung nang du raM dang phu// sa dmar dag gis bri bar bya// gtor ma 'bras
dang chan dang ni// bdud rtsi la sogs kun kyang ni// legs par mdun du gzhag par bya// nyungs kar la sogs ske tshe dug chu rnams// g.yas kyi phyogs su bzhag par bya// dug shing sna tshogs mdun du
gzhag/ rnal 'byor kha ni lho ru bstan// nad pa'i 'dug sa lho ru bya// srin lag dang ni ling ga'i ske/ tshon sna lnga dang 'brel bar bya// bdag nyid char pa chur bcug bgo/ sre mog dag gis byad

lus bsku// skra bcing dbyar snam gos kyang brje// de ni sngon 'gro'i rim pa'o// de nas bdag nyid phyag rdor skur// snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya// de nas gru gsum bskyed par bya ste// hUM/ skye med e yi rang

bzhin nam mkha' 'dra// nam mkha' la rten 'byung ba'i tshogs// kun gyi gzhi ste gru gsum e yi gnas// skye med nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'gyur med kyang// gzugs brnyan 'brub khung bskyed par bya// yi ge phu
yi rang bzhin spros par bya/ e ag ne maN+Dal des 'brub khung ni gru gsum du// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar bar bsgom par bya/ de nas raM las me bskyed de// hUM/ me yi sa bon yi ge raM// raM las gdug pa'i
me lce byung// gdug pa'i me lce 'od zer gyis/ khams gsum ma lus sreg par byed// sreg byed me lce 'bar ba che// 'brub khung e yi gzhal yas su// 'jig rten bsreg cing bzhugs su gsol// e raM/ des
ni me chen rab 'bar ba'i// 'jig rten dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// de nas phur las sngags bdag ni// hUM/ sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dran la// e me yi gdan stengs su// drag po'i phu dmar zhu ba
las// sngags bdag me lha'i tshul ston la// sku mdog dmar po me yi gzugs// lus la me 'bar 'jig rten bsreg/ 'jig rten bsreg pa'i mthu bo che// me yi tshul du sku bzhengs 'tshal// hUM phu/ de ni sngags
bdag sku yi mchog/ dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed pa'o// de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te// hUM/ sngags bdag me yi tshul bstan pa// bzhugs ni me ri'i rtse la bzhugs// gnas ni me dpung dkyil
du bzhugs// sku ni dmar po 'jigs pa ste// lus la me 'bar lams se lams/ kha nas me 'bar stong gsum sreg/ mig nas me stag tho ro ro// lag na me thogs stong gsum sreg/ spyi bo'i gtsug nas me
'phros pas// steng gi lha yang sreg par byed// rkang pa'i zhabs nas me 'phros pas// 'og gi klu bdud ma lus sreg/ nyi ma lho nub mtshams shed na// gdug pa'i sprin dmar mtshams shed na// gdug pa'i me
dpung 'bar ba la// 'khor du me dpung 'bum gyis bskor// sa dang gnam phyed kun tu sreg/ srid pa gsum yang sreg gyur na// 'jig rten dgra bgegs smos ci dgos// 'dir spyon 'dir bzhugs 'phrin las
mdzod// sngags bdag me lha'i tshul ston pa// bzhugs ni me ri'i rtse la bzhugs// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya mchog stis+tha lhan// dgra bgegs rnams rdul du rlogs// hUM raM/ de nas
gnyis med thim gyur nas// mchod rdzas yo byad kun kyang dbul// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig/ do nod drag po'i sbyin sreg gis// bgegs rnams 'dir khug la// ling ga dag la thim
par bya// hUM/ rnams ma lus sgrub pa'i phyir// mchod rdzas rnam pa 'di bzhes la// bdag gi 'phrin las myur du mdzod// de skad byas la gtor ma gsog/ sngags rings klag cing dbul bar bya'o// de nas ling
kha gsum cig gtubs la// dum bu re re mer sreg cing sngags bzlas so// sngags bdag la zas su sbyin sreg za bar bsam mo// de bzhin kun la bya'o// de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su

gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' rang la bsdu// thal ba rlung la phyar la btang// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ las kyi sbyin sreg bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes
gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// tsakra las kyi sbyor ba yis// big nan swarba ji ltar 'dul// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad
par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// ras sam gro ga gshog bu la// rtsibs brgya tsakra legs bris la// dbus su bgegs kyi ming bris la// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la spu ta'i sngags// legs par khong

snyoms bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i phyi rol sbrul gnyis kyis// mgo sprad gzhug ma bsnol mar bri// tsa kra'i rgyab tu sngags bdag gzugs// bris la gzhag par the tshom med// tsakra kha sbyar dag tu bya// de nas shog

bu ras dag la// bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan legs bris la// snying khar ming la dpral bar rus// mtha' ma hUM gis bskor bar bya// 'dren pa'i snying po gsang bar bri// de ni tsakra'i bar du gzhug/ de nas tsakra
maN+Dal khar// legs par gzhag ste sngags kyis brab// sham bu brgya dang bcu dgu gdags// zla ba gcig tu bskor gyur na// 'byung po kun kyang rdul du rlog/ de nyid bsad par 'dod na phur pa gdab// de

nyid gnon na tsit+ta'i 'og/ de nyid spro na ri tsir yur// de nyid 'chi na ga 'ur gzhug/ de nyid rings par 'dod na phur bzhi brgyang// de nyid sham bur dril te sbu ta'i rjes la tshar gcod pas/ sna gdags la dril
sngags brab// de ltar sbyor ba zab mo yis// bgegs la sogs pa tshar gcad nas// phyis ni ming yang med par 'gyur// de yang dang po bdag gzhan bskyed// bka' bsgo gzugs la bstim par bya// de nas
sngags kyi sbyor ba brtsam// mtha' ma las rnams gang byed kyang// tsakra kha sbyor bar dag nas// bgegs kyi gzugs ston bsad sogs bya// tsakra ga'u'i nang du gzhug/ klu sman bdud rtsi'i mchod pa
'bul// des ni ci 'dod las 'grub pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs nas gsungs// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ 'khor lo kha sbyor bgegs 'dul ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis
pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rje gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// sngags rings mchod pa'i las tshogs rnams// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod
la nga yis bstan par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// spyir ni sngags rings las rnams ni// kun la khyab pas legs pa gong na med/ khyad par 'ga' tsam bshad par bya// de nas khro rgyal cho ga

ni// ral gri mtshon cha dbyug pa'am// ka ra bI ra se'u lcug ma/ khro rgyal gsang sngags rigs po yis// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas na// gtsang ma'i gnas su legs bzhag la// gang tshe sad deng ser ba byung

ba'i tshe// bskor ba byas nas gang du ser ba 'bab pa stsogs// sngon du 'bab pa ma lus kun// dpag tshad nang tshun chad mi 'byung na// nye bar smos kyang ci dgos la// yang na klu mi srun pa rnams// sad dang rlung

dang nad gdug gtong ba rnams// klu rnams thams cad la thal chen nyungs kar chu dag la// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/ khyim gyi nang du gtor gyur na// mtshams med ma lus gcad 'gyur na// de na rig

pa 'dzin pa yis// nyungs kar chu la bzlas byas nas/ khyim gyi steng du gtor gyur na// klu rnams thams cad grol bar 'gyur// kun kyang dbang du nges par 'gyur// hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis kyang// klu rnams

klad nad drag pos 'debs// ri rtse ba'i lci bas maN+Dal bya// lan bdun bzlas brjod khyab gtor te// de dbus gzugs bzhag rlung gcad bya// seng ldeng phur pas grwa bzhir btab// ji srid ma phyung bar du klu
rnams bcings par 'gyur// de ltar ma rungs pa thams cad gcad nas/ thams cad la yid la bsams pas kun sbyar ro// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ mchod sngags kyi khyad par gyi las kyi le'u
bstan ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// b+ha ri sha yi rim pa yis// 'dzam gling mi rnams ji ltar gsol// bdag gis ma 'tshal bshad du

gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// yul gyi chu mig nA ga'i sar// sbra dkar phub ste maN+Dal bya// tsan dan spos chus chag chag
gdab// klu gtor rgyas pa legs bshams la// mtshan ldan thod pa dri chus byug/ gu gul chus kyang legs byugs la// nang du shog bu dag la sngags bdag gzugs// gur kum chu yis tshad ldan bri// de nas
bdag gzhan bskyed bya ste// dang po bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i sku// gong ma bzhin du gsal bar bsgom// de nas sngags bdag ni// dam tshig sems dpa' phu las bskyed// ye shes sems dpa'
de nyid dgug/ bsgom pa tshar pa phob ces bya// de nas nyin gsum mtshan gsum du// thun du gcad la nyungs kar brab// nA ga rA dza chems chems zhes brjod// de ltar dang po mtshams gcad nas// gtor ma
la bcom bskul nyin mtshan du// rgyun mi gcad par las rnams brtsams// de ltar zab mo'i las brtsam pas// zhag bdun dag na b+ha ri sha/ 'dzam gling khyab par 'bab par 'gyur// gal te des kyang ma
phebs na// lcags kyi sgyed po kha dgu la/ kha sbub dag tu bzhag nas kyang// tsha ba'i dmyal ba'i me bsams te// du ba long par 'dug par bsam// gu gul nag po'i dud pa yis// 'og nas bdug par gdon

mi za// nyungs kar ske tshe la sogs pa'i// thun rdzas kun gyis brab cing gzer// rdo rje rtse dgu dag la gsang chen rtse dgu bzlas/ khro rgyal sku bsgom klu rgyal mgo nas gnan// de nas rgyun mi 'chad par

'bab// gal te des kyang ma thebs na// de nyid rang gi sbal pa nya lcong gsum// yod na shin tu gces pas legs// med nA ga yod nges chu dang rko mo nas// de gsum dong rtsal zangs gzhong du// nya lcibs dag
blug 'o ma chu// sbal pa'i rkang pa dag nas dkar nag skud pas gdags// seng ldeng phur pa la btags maN+Dal khar// btsugs la phur pa khro rgyal du bsgom par bya// bdag gzhan gsal bar legs bskyed
la// 'od zer 'phros pas ste sngags bdag bskul bas// nA ga thams cad bkug nas dngos la bstim// de nas drag sngags btags te sngags bzlas nas// nyungs kar thun gyis dngos la brab// gu gul nag

pos bdug par bya// nA ga rnams kyis char pa phob pa ma// nA ga ra dza phob bya'o// de ltar sbyor ba zab mo ni// ji ltar then kyang phebs par 'gyur// 'dzam gling phebs pa'i char phab nas// sems can kun gyi
gsos su 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis nges par gsungs// rlung ni drangs nas nyin zhag ni// bdud du 'bab par gdon mi za// the tshom med pa las yin no// zab mo sngags 'di phebs par bya// oM spu ta spu ta

mahA krod+ha hUM sid+hi sid+hi hUM phaT/ b+ha ri sha ya pa ta ya pa ta ya swAhA/ dbang du sprin rnams bsdu ba'i sngags// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ char dbab pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo

rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// b+ha ri sha ya bzlog pa gang// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bstan par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig
yid kyis nyon// dang po hoM gi thal ba la// nyungs kar ske tshe hom thal la// 'bum tsho bzlas la gnas su gtor// des ni thams cad 'chad par 'gyur// mtha' rten pa tu pa ta ye// gdags la

drag tu bskrad par bya// rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ char pa gcad pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// zab mo sbyor ba'i tsha ba'i

rims nad ji ltar gsol// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// ba'i rnam lnga khyim gyi chu'i sa blangs

la// nA ga yod nges chu sna dgu yis sbrus// sbrang dang 'o ma dag kyang rdzas su btang// de la 'dag pa legs byas gzugs kyang bya// sbrul mgo bdun pa tshad dang ldan pa bya// sbrul mgo bdun pa'i spyi bo ru// zla

ba'i gzugs brnyan mtheb gang tsam// de dbus rin chen nas tsam bya// sbrul dang sbal pa nya dang lcong// lnga lnga gzugs brnyan bco lngas bskor// de kun mgo la gong bzhin sbyar// de nas bdag gzhan legs

bskyed la// bsgo ba'i rim pa byas nas kyang// sngags kyi sbyor ba rab bskul nas// sngags kyi 'od zer rab 'phros pa'i// mu tig rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis// spyi bo'i zla ba'i 'od zer rin chen la 'phog pa tsam

gyis// bsil ba'i chu bo'i rgyun gyis mgo lus bkru// dag par bdud rtsis khrus byas la// des ni nad pa'i lus zla ba'i 'od zer rgyas par 'gyur// bum pa'i chu la sngags bzlas gong gis sbyor ba bya// de ni

bdud rtsir gyur nas khrus kyang bya// bco lnga'i 'khor gyi spyi bo nas// bdud rtsi'i chu bo gong bzhin 'bab// des kyang rims nad sel bar 'gyur// mtha' rten shan ting ku ru gdags// skabs su gtor ma dag

kyang gtang// de ltar rgyun mi bcad pa'i las rnams brtsams na nges par 'tsho// yang na sbrul mgo bdun pa'i gzugs dag la// sbrul mgo re la phu re bsam// de nas sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// phu kun zhu ste

bdud rtsi'i rgyun// char pa bzhin du 'bab par bsam// des kyang rims nad 'tsho bar 'gyur// de nas phyis ni kru mchod bya// gtsang ma'i chu la ni gzugs brnyan rnams kyang bskyal bar bya/ rtog pa'i rgyal po

mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ rims nad srung ba'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// klu yi smin lam rim pa yis// klu rnams dgyes par mdzad pa'i
rim pa bzhin// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// de nas me tog lag tu thogs byas la// dge
bsnyen dag ni klu rgyal de// klu 'brug ni 'bod gcig la// pho brang ni mtshan gsol ba/ ri rab ni gling bzhi dang/ rgya mtsho ni gling dgu dang/ mtsho mo ni dal chen dang/ ne'u gsing ni bzang mdzes

dang/ rin chen mtshal gyi thig phran dgye/ mu tig khu 'phang shar ra ra/ g.yu yin bun thul lu lu/ dga' bo dang ni nye dga' dang/ ma dros ni gzi ldan dang/ pad+ma ni chu lha dang/ 'jog po ni dung skyong dang/ snga
bdag ni klu chen brgyad/ gnyan chen ni sde brgyad dang/ rgyal rigs ni bram ze dang/ rje rigs ni dmangs rigs dang/ gdol chen ni sa bdag dang/ dge bsnyen klu gnyan sa bdag rnams/ mnga' bdag ni

yongs kyi rje/ pho brang ni longs kyis bskor/ chen po ni chen mo dang/ lcam dral ni gcen gcung dang// sprul pa ni klu chen brgyad/ yon bdag ni 'khor bcas kyis/ mchod pa ni dam pa rnams/ sman rnams ni 'di

mchis te/ na ga ni ge sar dang/ rgya mtsho ni lbu ba dang/ chu srin ni sder mo dang/ dbang po ni lag pa dang/ bal po ni se'u lcug ma dang/ kan ta ka ri dang/ ne lo ni ut+pa la/ 'dab bu'i rtsa ba dang/ ras skud ni

dmar po dang/ dar tshon ni sna lnga dang/ mtshal gyi ni lcog la dang/ li khri ni dmar po rung/ ga pur ni shel dag dang/ pu tshe ni shel dag dang/ dung gtsug ni 'khyil ba dang/ 'dam bu ni nags tshal dang/
dkar gsum ni mngar gsum dang/ zhal zas ni bda' dgur sbyar/ ting 'dzin dbang sgyur nas/ yid bzhin gyi mchod sbyin 'di/ klu la ni mchod par 'bul/ mchod pa ni 'di bzhes las/ yon bdag ni
'khor bcas kyi/ nongs 'gal ni ci mchis pa/ mthol bshags ni bzod pa gsol/ rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ klu'i smon lam gyi le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol
pa/ kye kye bcom ldan thugs rje can// phyi bsgrub nang bsgrub las rnams dang// sngags bdag nas gzung sa srin bar// las la gzung pa'i bskul tshig rnams// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs

so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje/ khyod la nga yis bshad par bya/ khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// de la dang por sngags bdag bskul ba ni// spos dud gtang zhing snying po drang// ba ling thogs la 'di skad

bskul// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig/ nga ni phyag na rdo rje yin// nga ni klu yi gnyen po yin// klu brgyad zas su za ba yin// klu brgyad gos su gon pa yin// klu 'bum stan du 'dings pa yin// klu lngas

lus la brgyan pa yin// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// ri rab chen po'i byang phyogs na// gser gyi ri bdun rtsa shed na// rol mtsho chen po bdun gyi rtsa shed na// dgu 'das gang ri de nas ni// spos ngad ldan

pa'i rtsa shed nas// gdug pa'i klu mtsho bgyi ba ste// ming ni ma dros mtsho zhes bya// mchu zheng lnga bcu yod pa'i mtsho// nA ga rigs mchog kun gyi gnas// de yi lhun po'i nang shed na// rin chen sna
bzhi'i gzhal yas khang// shar phyogs rin chen dngul las byas// lho phyogs rin chen gser las byas// nub phyogs rin chen zangs las byas// byang phyogs rin chen lcags las byas// de yi lhun po'i gzhal

yas khang// sbrul dang sbal ba'i za ra tshags// chu srin nya yi ka gdung dang// sbrul chen brgyad kyi rta babs can// sbrul chen brgyad kyi sgo rgyan can// dug gi 'od zer stong ste 'khrug/ de yi lhun po'i nang shed

na// gser gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// de yi lhun po'i gdan steng na// rin chen sna bzhi'i khr-i stengs na// klu rgyal 'bum gyi gseb bshed na// de nas sngags kyi bdag po bzhugs// de na zur phud lnga pa
bzhugs// de na sbrul mgo bdun pa bzhugs// de nas gzhon nu gtum po bzhugs// de nas klu rgyal chen po bzhugs// de na srid gsum dbang sdud bzhugs// de na sprul pa'i rgyal po bzhugs// de na nag po

chen po bzhugs// de na dug gi rgyal po bzhugs// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig/ sngon gyi bskal pa bar ma la// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa dang// sdud pa po phyag na rdo rje'i spyan lam du// bran po'i tshul
du zhal gyis bzhes// las mkhan tshul du zhal gyis bzhes// bstan pa bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes// dgra bgegs 'dul ba zhal gyis bzhes// nad rnams gso bar zhal gyis bzhes// sprul pa dgye bar zhal

gyis bzhes// sngon gyi bskal pa tha ma la// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bka' la nyon// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bka' ma bcag/ sngags kyi bdag po'i bka' ltar song// sbrul mgo bdun pa gang ltar song/ khye chung gzhon nu

gang ltar song// srid gsum dbang sdug gang ltar song// gdug pa tshar gcod gang ltar song// nag po chen po gang ltar song// zur phud lnga pa gang ltar song// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig/ bzhengs

shig bzhengs shig dbyings nas bzhengs// shel mtsho dngas pa'i dbyings nas bzhengs// sku ni klu rgyal chen po la// ro stod mi la ro smad sbrul// gdug pa'i sbrul mgo bdun gyis gdengs// zur phud lnga yi cod
pan can// sku mdog btso ma'i gser mdog can// dug lnga'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro// sprul pa klu chen 'bum yang 'gyed// 'khor du klu rgyal 'bul gyis bskor// klu rgyal gtso bo tshur spyaun// bzhengs shig

bzhengs shig dbyings nas bzhengs// spos ngad ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ khye'u chung gzhon du gshegs su gsol// sku ni khye'u chung gzhon nu la// 'khor du khye'u chung 'bum gyis bskor// sku la dar dkar ber
chen gsol// dbu la dar gyi pan can// sprul pa khye'u chung 'bum sde 'gyed/ khye'u chung gtso bo da tshur spyon// bzhengs shig bzhengs shig dbyings nas bzhengs// bar snang sprul pa'i dkyi 'khor
nas// sprul pa'i rgyal po gshegs su gsol// sku ni gdug pa sprul nag 'bum gyis brgyan// gdug pa sbrul gyi chu 'phyang can// dug lnga'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'khor du sprul nag stong gis rnam par
bskor// sprul pa sbrul nag stong sde 'gyed// sbrul nag gtso bo da tshur spyon// bzhengs shig bzhengs shig dbyings nas bzhengs// gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ khro rgyal chen po gshegs su

gsol// 'khor ni khro rgyal 'bum gyis bskor// sprul pa khro rgyal 'bum sde 'gyed// klu bdud 'dul ba'i mthu bo che/ khro rgyal gtso bo da tshur spyon// do nod rigs 'dzin bdag 'bod na// las mkhan rgyal po da

tshur spyon// grub pa'i rtags cig da tshur ston// bzlas pa'i tshad cig da tshur zung// sngags kyi bdag po da tshur nyon// rig 'dzin bka' las 'da' byed cing// 'bod pa'i tshe na snyan sra zhing// mngags pa'i tshe

na bang bul zhing// rnal 'byor dgra bgegs mi 'dul zhing// grub pa'i rtags cig mi ston cing// bzlas pa'i tshad cig mi 'dzin na/ khyod kyi shi sa bstan pa ni// dam tshig sngags kyi byin brlabs dang/ khro bo

yag sha me dbal gyis// mdze nad sna tshogs khyod la 'ong// mig nad me dbal khyod la 'ong// 'on pa long ba khyod la 'ong// mdze nad shu ba khyod la 'ong// bla med 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// 'o na de la ma thug
gis// rigs 'dzin nga yi bka' la nyon// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bka' ma bcag/ bos pa'i tshe na snyan ma sra// mngags pa'i tshe na bang ma bul/ khru gang tsam las gting ma zab// chag gang tsam las dbang ma

mtho// 'bem gang tsam las rgyang ma ring// sprul pa stong sde 'dir khyed las// dgra bgegs ma lus da tshur thul// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig/ sum cu rtsa gsum yangs stengs nas// yab cig klu
rgyal spyan 'dren na// dam rdzas gnyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ sngags kyi bdag po tshur nyon cig/ shel mtsho dngas pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// klu chen rgyal po
gshegs su gsol// dam rdzas gnyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i las 'di grub par mdzod// hUM/ spos ngad ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ khye'u chung gzhon nu spyan 'dren na// dam rdzas gnyan gyi
gtor ma 'di long la// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ bar snang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// sprul pa'i rgyal po spyan 'dren na// dam rdzas gnyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i las
rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ khro rgyal chen po spyan 'dren na// dam rdzas gnyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par
mdzod// spos dang ba ling bcas pa yis// nyin gsum mtshan gsum bskul byas nas// dngos su 'ong na las byed do// sngags bdag bod pa'i rim pa'o// de nas rigs lnga'i klu tshogs las la bskul ba/ hUM/

rigs lnga'i klu tshogs tshur nyon cig/ nga ni phyag na rdo rje yin// klu brgya zas su za ba yin// klu brgya gos su gon pa yin// klu 'bum gdan du 'dings pa yin// klu lnga lus la brgyan pa yin// de phyir klu rnams
bka' la nyon// hUM/ rgyal rigs klu tshogs 'chi bdag gnas nas skyod// sdang ba'i dgra la gnas nas skyod// gnod pa'i bgegs la gnas nas skyod// shar bltas brag 'bab me tog skyes// sa gzhi rdo yang

dkar po skyes// rgyal rigs chen po'i gnas yin te// 'khor dang chas te dgra la chos// rgyal rigs klu tshogs tshur nyon cig/ nga yis ma nyes kho yis nyes// bka' las 'gal ba kho yis byas/ khyod kyi thugs

kyang khong gis 'gal// 'di la rtags phyung mtshan ma ston// gzhal yas khang nas skyod pa'i tshe// sku ni sbrul dkar sbal pa dkar// nya dang lcong skye dkar po ste// chu rta chu lug chu glang dkar// chu bdag chu la

gnas pa'i bu// zhe sdang pho mo'i bu de ni// byol song pho mo'i lto 'phye rigs// 'dzam gling mi la rnam par 'tshe// byol song ha la mthu chen rigs// de yi gzugs brnyan chu glang dkar// chu glang dkar pos

'jigs pa ste// g.yas kyi rwa las thog ser 'bebs// g.yon gyi rwa la glog dmar 'khyug/ rmig bzhi rnams la na bun 'thul/ kha rlangs 'phros pas sbrul du 'khyug/ de 'dra'i byol song mthu bo che// nA ga yu dang

chu ru dang// phu phu'i sgra yis bos nas kyang// bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i skur bsgoms pas// mig gnyis gser chu zhun ma 'dra// mig las byung ba'i sbrul gnyis kyis// sdang ba dgra yi ske la 'khril// chu glang

dkar po'i steng du skyon// rlung tshub drag pos rgyab nas phul// drung na nyams thag 'dug pa la// byol song glang gi kha rlangs las// sbrul dang sbal pa mang po yis// dam nyams dgra bo'i lus de la// lhu tshigs

yan lag ba spu la// bdud dang gdug pa gzhug par gyis// lus la 'khril dang za bar gyis// gzhan yang kha rlangs sna rlangs la// sbrul dang sbal pa mang po yis// klu nad mdze nad phol mig dang// 'bras dang

shu ba g.yan pa thong// rgyal rigs 'chi bdag tshur nyon cig/ skra dang smin ma da tshur phyi// klad mdze klad la myur du thong// byad nad gdong la la mor thong// rkang mdze rkang la zhen du chug/ nad rnams lhang lhang

'khyug tu chug/ snag mdze snag la zhen du chug/ tsha ba me 'bar mthong du chug/ rgyal rigs na seg 'brel du chug/ sbrul dang sbal pa za ru chug/ nya dang lcong mo 'khril du chug/ chu rta chu glang 'ded du
chug/ bdun brgyud rtsad nas chod la shog/ bcol lo gdams so rgyal rigs klu// bskal pa'i mthar yang ma gtang zhig/ de nas bram ze'i rigs rnams bskul te/ hUM/ bram ze 'chi bdag gnas nas

skyod// sdang ba'i dgra la gnas nas skyod// gnod pa'i bgegs la gnas nas skyod// lhor ltas gting thung dri yang zhim// rtag tu skye 'bri med par 'bab// sa gzhi rdo yang ser por gnas// bram ze chen po'i
gnas yin te// 'khor dang chas te dgra la chos// kwa ye bram ze'i klu tshogs tshur nyon cig/ nga yis ma nyes 'di yis nyes// bka' las 'das pa kho yis byas/ khyod kyi thugs kyang kho yis 'gal bar

byas// 'di la rtags phyung mtshan ma ston// gzhal yas khang nas skyod pa'i tshe// sku ni sbrul ser sbal pa ser// nya dang lcong mo ser po ste// chu rta chu lug chu glang ser// chu bdag chu la gnas pa'i bu// zhe sdang pho

mo'i bu de ni// byol song gdug pa lto 'phye'i rigs// 'dzam gling mi la rnam par 'tshe// byol song ha la mthu chen te// de yi gzugs brnyan chu glang ser// chu glang ser po 'jigs pa ste// g.yas pa'i rwa la thog

ser 'bebs// g.yon pa'i rwa la glog dmar 'khyug/ rmig bzhi rnams la na bun 'thul/ kha rlangs khros pas sbrul du byung// 'di 'dra'i byol song mthu bo che// nA ga yu dang tshu ru dang// phu phu'i sgra yis bos nas
